Lines: Well, Carol says she and Susan want me to be involved, but if I'm not comfortable with it, I don't have to be involved.. basically it's entirely up to me.

Name: monica
Lines: Curry.

Name: monica
Lines: I know this is going to sound unbelievably selfish, but, were you planning on bringing up the whole baby/lesbian thing? Because I think it might take some of the heat off me.

Lines: No it's not.

Name: ross
Lines: Look, I, uh- I realise you guys have been wondering what exactly happened between Carol and me, and, so, well, here's the deal. Carol's a lesbian. She's living with a woman named Susan. She's pregnant with my child, and she and Susan are going to raise the baby.

Or, y'know, uh, hey!, I'll go down there, and I'll give Barry back his ring, and you can go with Carol and Susan to the OB/GYN...

We're sorry for the inconvenience, and hope you'll accept this-  -football phone as our free gift.' Do you believe this?! Now I have a thousand dollars, and a football phone!

Lines: No, not even close. Forget Vail, forget seeing my family, forget shoop, shoop, shoop.

Name: monica
Lines: Rach, here's your mail.

Name: rachel
Lines: Thanks, you can just put it on the table.

Name: monica
Lines: No, here's your mail.

Name: rachel
Lines: Thanks, you can just put it on the table.

Name: monica
Lines: Would you just open it?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my god, oh, you guys are great.

Name: monica
Lines: We all chipped in.

Name: joey
Lines: We did?

Name: monica
Lines: You owe me 20 bucks.

Name: rachel
Lines: Thank you. Thank you so much!

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler, here you go, got your traditional Thanksgiving feast, you got your tomato soup, your grilled cheese fixin's, and your family size bag of Funyuns.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wait, wait, Chandler, this is what you're havin' for Thanksgiving dinner? What, what, what is it with you and this holiday?

Name: chandler
Lines: All right, I'm nine years old.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, I hate this story.

Name: chandler
Lines: We just finished this magnificent Thanksgiving dinner. I have--and I remember this part vividly--a mouthful of pumpkin pie, and this is the moment my parents choose to tell me they're getting divorced.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my god.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes. It's very difficult to appreciate a Thanksgiving dinner once you've seen it in reverse.

Name: joey
Lines: Uh, hi. We uh, we used to work together.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, at Macy's. You were the Obsession girl, right? I was the Aramis guy.  Aramis? Aramis?

Name: joey
Lines: I gotta tell you. You're the best in the business.

Name: joey
Lines: I'm serious. You're amazing. You know when to spritz, when to lay back.

Name: joey
Lines: Ooh, you smell great tonight. What're you wearing?

Name: joey
Lines: Listen, uh, you wanna go get a drink or something?

Name: joey
Lines: What's wrong?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh. What?

Name: joey
Lines: Wait, wait, wait!

Name: joey
Lines: So I guess you all saw it.

Name: rachel
Lines: Saw what?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, we were just laughing. You know, how laughter can be infectious.

Name: joey
Lines: Set another place for Thanksgiving. My entire family thinks I have VD.

Name: chandler
Lines: Tonight, on a very special Blossom.

Name: monica
Lines: Mmm, looking good. Ok, cider's mulling, turkey's turking, yams are yamming.  What?

Name: ross
Lines: I don't know. It's just not the same without Mom in the kitchen.

Name: monica
Lines: All right, that's it. You know what? Just get out of my way and stop moping.

Name: ross
Lines: That's closer.

Name: rachel
Lines: I got the tickets! I got the tickets! Five hours from now, shoop, shoop, shoop.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, you must stop shooping.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ok, I'm gonna get my stuff.

Name: joey
Lines: Chandler, will you just come in already?

Name: chandler
Lines: No, I prefer to keep a safe distance from all this merriment.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Look out, incoming pumpkin pie!

Name: chandler
Lines: Ok, we all laughed when you did it with the stuffing, but that's not funny anymore.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, Monica, I got a question. I don't see any tater tots.

Name: monica
Lines: That's not a question.

Name: joey
Lines: But my mom always makes them. It's like a tradition. You get a little piece of turkey on your fork, a little cranberry sauce, and a tot! It's bad enough I can't be with my family because of my disease.

Name: monica
Lines: All right, fine. Tonight's potatoes will be both mashed with lumps, and in the form of tots.

Name: ross
Lines: Ok, I'm off to talk to my unborn child.

Name: monica
Lines: Ah!

Name: ross
Lines: Ok, Mom never hit.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ok, all done.

Name: monica
Lines: What, Phoebe, did you whip the potatoes? Ross needs lumps!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, I'm sorry, oh, I just, I thought we could have them whipped and then add some peas and onions.

Name: monica
Lines: Why would we do that?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, 'cause then they'd be like my mom used to make them, you know, before she died.

Name: monica
Lines: Ok, three kinds of potatoes coming up.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ok, good-bye you guys. Thanks for everything.  Oh, sorry! Oh, sorry!

Name: chandler
Lines: The most unbelievable thing has happened. Underdog has just gotten away.

Name: joey
Lines: The balloon?

Name: chandler
Lines: No, no, the actual cartoon character. Of course the balloon. It's all over the news. Right before he reached Macy's, he broke free and was spotted flying over Washington Square Park. I'm goin' to the roof, who's with me?

Name: rachel
Lines: I can't, I gotta go.

Name: chandler
Lines: Come on. An 80-foot inflatable dog let loose over the city. How often does that happen?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Almost never.

Name: monica
Lines: Got the keys? or Got the keys!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ok.

Name: ross
Lines: Ok, ok, here we go.  Ok, where am I talking to, here? I mean, uh, well, there is one way that seems to offer a certain acoustical advantage, but...

Name: ross
Lines: Ok, ok, ok, ok, here goes. You know, I, you know, can't do this. Uh, this is too weird. I feel stupid.

Name: ross
Lines: Hello, baby. Hello, hello.

Name: rachel
Lines: I loved the moment when you first saw the giant dog shadow all over the park.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, but did they have to shoot him down? I mean, that was just mean.

Name: monica
Lines: Ok, right about now the turkey should be crispy on the outside, juicy on the inside. Why are we standing here?

Name: rachel
Lines: We're waiting for you to open the door. You got the keys.

Name: monica
Lines: No I don't.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes, you do. When we left, you said, \got the keys.\"

Name: monica
Lines: No I didn't. I asked, \got the ke-eys?\"

Name: rachel
Lines: No, no, no, you said, \got the keys\"."

Name: chandler
Lines: Do either of you have the keys?

Name: monica
Lines: The oven is on.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, I gotta get my ticket!

Name: joey
Lines: Wait, wait, we have a copy of your key.

Name: monica
Lines: Well then get it, get it!

Name: joey
Lines: That tone will not make me go any faster.

Name: monica
Lines: Joey!

Name: joey
Lines: That one will.

Name: ross
Lines: And everyone's telling me, you gotta pick a major, you gotta pick a major. So, on a dare, I picked paleontology. And you have no idea what I'm saying, because, let's face it, you're a fetus. You're just happy you don't have gills anymore.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, please. I am not singing to your stomach, ok?

Name: ross
Lines: Shh!  Hey, uh, did you just feel that?

Name: ross
Lines: Does it always, uh--?

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, hey, you're my baby, and I can't wait to meet you. When you come out I'll buy you a bagel, and then we'll go to the zoo.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, hey, I'm your daddy. I'm the one without any breasts.

Name: joey
Lines: Nope, not that one.

Name: monica
Lines: Can you go any faster with that?

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, I got one keyhole and about a zillion keys. You do the math.

Name: monica
Lines: Why do you guys have so many keys in there anyway?

Name: chandler
Lines: For an emergency just like this.

Name: rachel
Lines: right now. But I'm not.

Name: monica
Lines: I swear you said you had the keys.

Name: rachel
Lines: No, I didn't. I wouldn't say I had the keys unless I had the keys, and I obviously didn't have the keys.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ooh, ok, that's it. Enough with the keys. No one say keys.

Name: monica
Lines: Why would I have the keys?

Name: rachel
Lines: Aside from the fact that you said you had them?

Name: monica
Lines: But I didn't.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, you should have.

Name: monica
Lines: Why?

Name: rachel
Lines: Because!

Name: monica
Lines: Why?

Name: rachel
Lines: Because!

Name: monica
Lines: Why? Because everything is my responsibility? Isn't it enough that I'm making Thanksgiving dinner for everyone? You know, everyone wants a different kind of potatoes, so I'm making different kinds of potatoes. Does anybody care what kind of potatoes I want? Nooooo, no, no!  Just as long as Phoebe gets her peas and onions, and Mario gets his tots, and it's my first Thanksgiving, and it's all burned, and, and I... I...

Name: chandler
Lines: Ok, Monica, only dogs can hear you now, so, look, the door's open. Here we go.

Name: monica
Lines: Well, the turkey's burnt.  Potatoes are ruined, potatoes are ruined, potatoes are ruined.

Name: ross
Lines: Here we come, walkin' down the—this doesn't smell like Mom's.

Name: monica
Lines: No, it doesn't, does it? But you wanted lumps, Ross?  Well, here you go, buddy, ya got one.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, god, this is great! The plane is gone, so it looks like I'm stuck here with you guys.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, we all had better plans. This was nobody's first choice.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, really? So why was I busting my ass to make this delicious Thanksgiving dinner?

Name: joey
Lines: You call that delicious?

Name: monica
Lines: Stop it, stop it, stop it!

Name: chandler
Lines: Now this feels like Thanksgiving.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ooh.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ugly Naked Guy's taking his turkey out of the oven. Oh my god. He's not alone. Ugly Naked Guy's having Thanksgiving dinner with Ugly Naked Gal.

Name: joey
Lines: I've gotta see this. All right Ugly Naked Guy!

Name: monica
Lines: Ooh, Ugly Naked Dancing!

Name: phoebe
Lines: It's nice that he has someone.

Name: chandler
Lines: Shall I carve?

Name: rachel
Lines: By all means.

Name: chandler
Lines: Ok, who wants light cheese, and who wants dark cheese?

Name: ross
Lines: I don't even wanna know about the dark cheese.

Name: monica
Lines: Does anybody wanna split this with me?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, I will.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ooh, you guys have to make a wish.

Name: monica
Lines: Make a wish?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Come on, you know, Thanksgiving. Ooh, you got the bigger half. What'd you wish for?

Lines: The bigger half.

Name: chandler
Lines: I'd like to propose a toast. Little toast here, ding ding. I know this isn't the kind of Thanksgiving that all of you all planned, but for me, this has been really great, you know, I think because it didn't involve divorce or projectile vomiting. Anyway, I was just thinking, I mean, if you'd gone to Vail, and if you guys'd been with your family, if you didn't have syphilis and stuff, we wouldn't be all together, you know? So I guess what I'm trying to say is that I'm very thankful that all of your Thanksgivings sucked.

Lines: And hey, here's to a lousy Christmas.

Name: rachel

Lines: Ah, I'm gonna be one of his helpers. It's just such a slap in the face, y'know?

Lines: Hey, do you guys know what you're doing for New Year's?  Gee, what?! What is wrong with New Year's?

Lines: Pheebs, I can't believe he hasn't kissed you yet. I mean God, by my sixth date with Paolo, I mean he had already named both my breasts! ...Ooh. Did I just share too much?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, he's kinda like the guy I went to see that with. Except, except he-he's smarter, and gentler, and sweeter... I just- I just wanna be with him all the time. Day and night, and night and day... and special occasions...

Name: chandler
Lines: Wait a minute, wait a minute, I see where this is going, you're gonna ask him to New Year's, aren't you. You're gonna break the pact. She's gonna break the pact.

Name: phoebe

Name: ross

Name: chandler

Name: chandler
Lines: I'm not saying it was a good idea, I'm saying I snapped!

Name: chandler

Lines: Oh, that'd be great! Okay, but if you do, make sure it seems like you're there to see him, okay, and you're not like doing it as a favour to me.

Name: chandler

Lines: Okay, alright, I have a question, then.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, David, I, I think you are a sweeping sorta fella. I mean, you're a sweeper! ...trapped inside a physicist's body.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, yeah, oh, I'm sure of it. You should just do it, just sweep and throw me.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh yeah, right now.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, now you're just kinda tidying.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can hop.

Lines: So tell me something. What does the phrase 'no date pact' mean to you?

Name: monica
Lines: I'm sorry, okay. It's just that Chandler has somebody, and Phoebe has somebody- I thought I'd ask Fun Bobby.

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah.

Name: joey

Lines: I happen to know a Fun Bob.

Name: rachel

Name: joey
Lines: Ooh ooh ooh ooh, there's no room for milk!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, y'know, this is so not what I needed right now.

Lines: Oh, it's-it's Marcel. He keeps shutting me out, y'know? He's walking around all the time dragging his hands...

Name: chandler
Lines: That's so weird, I had such a blast with him the other night.

Name: ross
Lines: Really.

Lines: Yeah, we played, we watched TV.. that juggling thing is amazing.

Name: chandler

Lines: No, no, he hasn't been around.

Lines: So when, when do you leave?

Lines: Hi.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, you're not going?  Oh, why?

Name: phoebe
Lines: So-so you're really not going?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh don't do that.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh no no.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, but I can't do that-

Name: phoebe
Lines: It's your thing, and-

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, um, stay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Stay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Getting so good at that!

Name: chandler
Lines: You remember Janice.

Name: monica
Lines: Vividly.

Name: monica
Lines: Hi.

Name: joey
Lines: Sandy! Hi! C'mon in! ...You brought your kids.

Name: ross
Lines: Par-tay!

Name: monica
Lines: That thing is not coming in here.

Name: ross
Lines: 'That thing'? This is how you greet guests at a party? Let me ask you something, if I showed up here with my new girlfriend, she wouldn't be welcome in your home?

Name: monica
Lines: I'm guessing your new girlfriend wouldn't urinate on my coffee table.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay. He was more embarrassed about that than anyone. Okay? And for him to have the courage to walk back in here like nothing happened...

Name: monica
Lines: Alright. Just keep him away from me.

Name: ross
Lines: Thank you.  Alright, I'll, uh... catch up with you later.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my gosh! Rachel, honey.. are you okay? Where-where's Paolo?

Name: rachel
Lines: Rome. Jerk missed his flight.

Name: phoebe
Lines: And then... your face is bloated?

Name: rachel
Lines: No. Okay. I was at the airport, getting into a cab, when this woman- this blonde planet with a pocketbook- starts yelling at me. Something about how it was her cab first. And then the next thing I know she just starts- starts pulling me out by my hair! So I'm blowing my attack whistle thingy and three more cabs show up, and as I'm going to get into a cab she tackles me. And I hit my head on the kerb and cut my lip on my whistle...oh...everybody having fun at the party?  Are people eating my dip?

Name: joey
Lines: Wow, that's, uh, dirty.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, kids...

Name: ross
Lines: Look at him. I'm not saying he has to spend the whole evening with me, but at least check in.

Name: chandler
Lines: But you found me!

Name: chandler
Lines: Kill me. Kill me now.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey everybody! It's Fun Bobby!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey Fun Bobby! Whoah! Who died?

Name: chandler
Lines: Alright, Janice, that's it! Janice... Janice... Hey, Janice, when I invited you to this party I didn't necessarily think that it meant that we-

Name: chandler
Lines: I'm sorry you misunderstood...

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, will you give me the thing.

Lines: Hi, Max!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Are you alright?

Name: phoebe
Lines: You're going to Minsk.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh yes, yes, yes you can. Just say, um, 'Phoebe, my work is my life and that's what I have to do right now'. And I say 'your work?! Your work?! How can you say that?!'. And then you say, um, 'it's tearing me apart, but I have no choice. Can't you understand that?'. And I say  'no! No! I can't understand that!'.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ooh, sorry. Um, and, and then you put your arms around me. And then you put your arms around me.  And, um, and then you tell me that you love me and you'll never forget me.

Name: phoebe
Lines: And then you say that it's almost midnight and you have to go because you don't wanna start the new year with me if you can't finish it.  I'm gonna miss you. You scientist guy.

Lines: Alrightalrightalright.  There.

Lines: ...I think that bitch cracked my tooth.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Just wanna check my horoscope, see if it was right.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God.  Phoebe. Don't look now, but behind us is a guy who has the potential to break our hearts and plunge us into a pit of depression.

Lines: Where?  Ooh, come to Momma.

Lines: He's coming. Be cool, be cool, be cool.

Lines: No!

Lines: Yes, and I get my ya-yas from Ikea. You have to put them together yourself, but they cost a little less.

Name: ross
Lines: Look, Rachel, this is poker. I play to win, alright? In order for me to win, other people have to lose. So if you're gonna play poker with me, don't expect me to be a 'nice guy,' OK? Cause once those cards are dealt...

Name: ross
Lines: No, that, that was, I mean, as opposed to uh, the uh, ok. Is this over yet Rach?

Name: ross
Lines: No, no, wait, ok, ok, look at the other side. Look at Julie's column.

Name: ross
Lines: No, Rach, come on. Rach! Rach, no, no! She's not Rachel, she is, she is not, Ra--Rachel?

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, cut him some slack. It was Chandler's idea.

Name: ross
Lines: Rach! Whoops! Rach, hey, open up, please!

Name: ross
Lines: I just wanna read something. It's your pro list.

Name: joey
Lines: [opens the drapes] Hey, Ross! What are you doin'?

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, Joey. You wanna open the window?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, yeah, I do.

Name: ross
Lines: I am, uh, I am...

Name: ross
Lines: Rach, come on, open up. Rach, come on, come on, Rach. You got to give me another chance.

Name: ross
Lines: No?

Name: ross
Lines: Rach, come on, look, I know how you must feel.

Name: ross
Lines: No, but, but I wanna be with you in spite of all those things.

Name: ross
Lines: You know what? You know what? If, things were the other way around, there's nothing you could put on a list that would ever make me not want to be with you.

Name: joey
Lines: [quietly] I never know how long you're supposed to wait in this type of a situation before you can talk again, you know? [Ross stares blankly at him] Maybe a little longer.

Name: ross
Lines: Hi.

Name: ross
Lines: Look, can, can you do something for me?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh. Ugly Naked Guy is decorating his tree. Oh my God, you should see the size of his Christmas Balls.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, how much did you guys tip the super this year?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, we were gonna give fifty, but if you guys gave more, we don't wanna look bad.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, actually this year we just made him homemade cookies.

Name: chandler
Lines: And twenty-five it is.

Name: joey
Lines: You gave him cookies?

Name: monica
Lines: Money is so impersonal. Cookies says someone really cares. . . Alright, we're broke, but cookies do say that.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can see that. A plate of brownies once told me a limerick.

Name: chandler
Lines: Phoebs, let me ask you something, were, were these, uh, funny brownies?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Not especially. But you know what, I think they had pot in them.

Name: ross
Lines: So you guys, who else did you tip with cookies?

Name: rachel
Lines: Uhh, the mailman, the super.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, and the newspaper delivery guy.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh my God.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: joey
Lines: Uhhh, I don't think you're gonna like this.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ooh, goooosh, ooh, these are cookies smashed in the sports section.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh look, and he did my crossword puzzle.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, but not very well, unless 14-across, 'Gershwin musical' actually is bitemebitemebitemebiteme.

Name: joey
Lines: I can't believe it's Christmas already. Ya know, I mean, one day your eatin' turkey, the next thing ya know, your lords are a-leapin' and you geese are a-layin'.

Name: chandler
Lines: Which is why geese are so relaxed this time of year.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey guys.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey Rach. I, uh, got you a little present. [Rachel is not impressed]. . I'll open it. It's a Slinky! Remember, huh. [sings] Walks down stairs, alone or in pairs, everyone knows it's. . . just a big spring. Alright, you still mad at me becuase of the whole. . .

Name: rachel
Lines: Horrible and degrading list of reasons not to be with me?

Name: ross
Lines: How 'bout from now on we just call it the 'unfortunate incident'? [Rachel walks off] Hey Gunther, you got stairs in your place?

Name: ross
Lines: Here, go nuts. [gives him the Slinky and goes and sits with others at the couches]

Name: ross
Lines: Hey guys.

Name: chandler
Lines: What's in the bag?

Name: ross
Lines: Um, just some presents.

Name: joey
Lines: C'mon show us what you bought. . . You know you want to.

Name: ross
Lines: [childishly] OK. OK, this is a picture frame from Ben to my parents, huh.

Name: monica
Lines: Cute.

Name: ross
Lines: I got some, uh, hers and hers towels for Susan and Carol. And, uh, I got this blouse for mom.

Name: monica
Lines: Ross, that is gorgeous!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah?

Name: monica
Lines: Look at these authentic fake medals. I tell ya, mom's gonna be voted best dressed at the make-believe military academy.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Happy Christmas Eve Eve. [sees Ross's picture frame] Oh my God, where did you get this?

Name: ross
Lines: Uh, Macy's, third floor, home furnishings.

Name: phoebe
Lines: This is my father, this is a picture of my dad.

Name: chandler
Lines: Nah, Phoebs, that's the guy that comes in the frame.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No it isn't, this is my dad, alright, I'll show you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe, I thought your dad was in prison.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, that's my stepdad. My real dad's the one that ran out on us before I was born.

Name: rachel
Lines: How have you never been on Oprah?

Name: phoebe
Lines: [showing her pictures] OK, look, see, this is him. My mother gave me this picture before she died, same guy.

Name: monica
Lines: Honey, uh, this is a picture of the frame guy posing in front of a bright blue screen with a collie.

Name: phoebe
Lines: It's not a blue screen... it's just, maybe it was just really clear that day. OK, I have to talk to my grandmother. [turns to leave]

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, wait a minute honey.

Name: monica
Lines: Wow.

Name: joey
Lines: So anyway, I'm trying to get my boss's ex-wife to sleep with me. . .

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, but when Phoebe has a problem, everyone's all ears!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hi Gram. Whatcha doin'?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Um, gram, um, can I see the pictures of my dad again?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Just, you know, to see... um.

Name: phoebe
Lines: OK, is this really my father?

Name: phoebe
Lines: OK, I smell smoke. Maybe that's 'cause someone's pants are on fire.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ya know, in all the years that we have been grandmother and granddaughter, you have never lied to me.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh God.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Alright, so, what, he's not a famous tree surgeon? And then, I guess, OK, he doesn't live in a hut in Burma where there's no phones?

Name: phoebe
Lines: OK, that makes no sense. Why would the villagers worship a pharmacist?

Name: phoebe
Lines: [realizes] Oh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh.

Name: chandler
Lines: Ya know I remember my father, all dressed up in the red suit, the big black boots, and the patent leather belt, sneakin around downstairs. He didn't want anybody to see him but he'd be drunk so he'd stumble, crash into something and wake everybody up.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, that doesn't sound like a very merry Christmas.

Name: chandler
Lines: Who said anything about Christmas?

Name: monica
Lines: Hi.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, anyone hear from Phoebe yet?

Name: rachel
Lines: No, nothin'.

Name: monica
Lines: I hope she's OK.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, I know exactly what she's goin' through.

Name: monica
Lines: How do you know exactly what she's going through?

Name: joey
Lines: She told us.

Name: chandler
Lines: So whaddya got there Monica?

Name: monica
Lines: Just some stuff for the party.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, what're you guys doin' here, aren't you supposed to be Christmas shopping?

Name: monica
Lines: You guys haven't gotten your presents yet? Tomorrow's Christmas Eve, what're ya gonna do?

Name: chandler
Lines: Don't you have to be Claymation to say stuff like that?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, by the way Mon, I don't think the mailman liked your cookies. Here are the ornaments your mom sent. [hands her a smashed box]

Name: monica
Lines: Well, maybe the mailman liked the cookies, we just didn't give him enough.

Name: joey
Lines: Monica, pigeons learn faster that you.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, Rach, you know what? I think, I think I know what'll make you feel better. How 'bout you make a list about me.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wha... forget it Ross, no, I am not gonna stand here and make a list of. . .

Name: ross
Lines: C'mon Rachel.

Name: rachel
Lines: OK, you're whiney, you are, you're obsessive, you are insecure, you're, you're gutless, you know, you don't ever, you don't just sort of seize the day, you know. You like me for what, a year, you didn't do anything about it. And, uh, oh, you wear too much of that gel in your hair.

Name: ross
Lines: See there, you uhh, alright, ya, you did what I said.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, and you know what? You're right, I do feel better, thank you Ross. [she walks off and Ross puts his hand to his hair]

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, um, in Albany, can I have the number of Frank Buffay. . . OK, um, in Ithica. . . alright, um, Saratoga. . . Oneonta. Alright, you know what, you shouldn't call youself information. [hangs up]

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hello grandma, if that is in fact your real name.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, not so good. Upstate's pretty big, he's pretty small, you do the math.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No I just, just wanted to know who he was, ya know.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Whattaya mean?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wow. Thank you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh, got it. Ooh, I'm gonna see my dad. Wish me luck, Grandpa! [blows a kiss to a picture of Einstein]

Name: joey
Lines: Phoebe here with the cab yet?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, she, she brought the invisible cab. . . hop in.

Name: joey
Lines: Well she better get here soon, the outlet stores close at 7.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, don't worry. I figure it'll be 2 hours to Phoebe's dad's house, they'll meet, they'll chat, they'll swap life stories, we'll still have plenty of time.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, here she comes.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Can you believe this. In, like, two hours I'm gonna have a dad. Eeeshk.

Name: chandler
Lines: Eeeshk.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, big stuff.

Name: phoebe
Lines: OK, let's go.

Name: chandler
Lines: OK.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Alright, here, you have to hold this. [hands Chandler a piece of paper]

Name: chandler
Lines: OK. [reads paper] Brake left, gas right?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh, yeah, that's my cheat sheet.

Name: chandler
Lines: [grabs for seat belt] Where's my seat belt?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, no no, that side doesn't have one, the paramedics had to cut through it. [Chandler jumps out of the car]

Name: chandler
Lines: [Chandler gets in the back seat] Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey. [Phoebe takes off, Joey and Chandler are thrown back in the seat]

Name: ross
Lines: C'mon, just tell me, please, please.

Name: monica
Lines: For the sixteenth time, no... I do not think you're obsessive.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, gosh, it's hot in here.

Name: monica
Lines: Rach, get the heat. [Rachel holds up her hand with wet fingernail polish] Ross, could you turn the heat down please?

Name: ross
Lines: Sure. By the way, there's a difference between being obsessive and. . .

Name: monica
Lines: Ross, the heat!

Name: ross
Lines: Fine, OK! Heat, heat, heat, and I'm the obsessive one. [goes to the radiator and starts turning the knob] OK, this way is on, so this is. . . [breaks off the knob] off.

Name: rachel
Lines: Did you just break the radiator?

Name: ross
Lines: No, no, I was turnin' the knob and, and. . . here it is.

Name: monica
Lines: Well put it back.

Name: ross
Lines: It uhh, it won't go back.

Name: rachel
Lines: I'll call the super.

Name: monica
Lines: Here, let me try.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, oh that's right, I forgot about your ability to fuse metal.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, it's Funny's cousin, Not Funny.

Name: rachel
Lines: [on phone] Hi, Mr. Treeger. Hi, it's Rachel Green from upstairs. Yes, somebody, uh, broke our knob on the radiator and it's really hot in here. Yes, it's, it's hot enough to bake cookies. Well, do you think we could have a new one by 6? Wha t, no, no, Tuesday, we can't wait until Tuesday, we're having a party tonight.

Name: ross
Lines: OK, tip the man.

Name: monica
Lines: No, if he doesn't like our cookies, too bad, I am not gonna be blackmailed. Look if worse comes to worse, it gets a little warm, we'll call it a theme party.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ooh, this is it, 74. [screeches to a halt, Joey and Chandler are thrown into the plexiglass wall in the cab]

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, so that's what this is for.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wow, this is it, I'm gonna meet my dad. This is like the biggest thing ever, huh.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah.

Name: joey
Lines: Sure is.

Name: phoebe
Lines: OK, here I go. I'm goin' in.

Name: chandler
Lines: Alright.

Name: joey
Lines: Good luck Phoebs.

Name: phoebe
Lines: OK, here I go. . . here I go. . . I'm goin'. [she just sits in the cab]

Name: rachel
Lines: [answers door] Hi, welcome to our tropical Christmas party. You can put your coats and sweaters and pants and shirts in the bedroom.

Name: ross
Lines: [sitting at table talking to a girl] It's hard to tell because I'm sweating, but I use exactly what the gel bottle says, an amount about the size of a pea. How, how can that be too much?

Name: monica
Lines: [carrying an ice cube tray] Ice, ice, ice squares anyone? Take a napkin. Alright.

Name: ross
Lines: Monica, Monica, your guest are turning into jerky, OK.

Name: monica
Lines: Really? I'm perfectly comfortable. [one of the guest opens the refrigerator] Hey, hey, hey, get in line buddy, I was next. [she opens the refrigerator and leans into it]

Name: rachel
Lines: [answering the door] Mr. Treeger.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, yeah, well hey, welcome to our sauna.

Name: ross
Lines: Alright, alright, here's the chance. Monica give him cash, Rachel give him your earrings. Something, now, anything.

Name: monica
Lines: No, I will not cave.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, I'm with Mon.

Name: ross
Lines: Alright, alright, you know how you say I never seize the day? Well, alright, even though he's your super, I'm seizing. [approaches Mr. Treeger] Mr. Treeger, here is 50 bucks, merry Christmas.

Name: ross
Lines: No no, no, that, that's your Christmas tip, alright. Oh, hey, do you think there's a chance you could fix that radiator now?

Name: monica
Lines: Ross.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: [to Ross] Looks like he's playin' baseball.

Name: ross
Lines: You mean hardball?

Name: monica
Lines: Whatever.

Name: rachel
Lines: What'cha gonna' do?

Name: ross
Lines: Excuse me, I'm seizing. Mr. Treeger, here's another 50, happy Hanukkah. Will uh, will this help with the knob getting?

Name: monica
Lines: So, wait, you really did like my cookies?

Name: rachel
Lines: Nice seizing. . . gel boy.

Name: rachel
Lines: Huh-huh, no act--no, uhh, that, that is basil.

Name: rachel
Lines: Huh-hoo, yeah, no, it's still basil.

Name: phoebe
Lines: OK.

Name: joey
Lines: How far'd ya get?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Mailbox.

Name: chandler
Lines: Alright, we're gettin' closer.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: joey
Lines: Phoebs, what's goin' on?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, it's just like, ya know, it's a whole mess of stuff, ya know. It's like, yesterday, ya know, my dad was this, like, famous Burma tree surgeon guy and, ya know, now he's a, a pharmacist guy and. . .

Name: joey
Lines: Well, maybe he's, maybe he's this really cool pharmacist guy.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, maybe, yeah. You know, and, and I'll knock on the door and, and he'll hug me and I'll have a dad. Ya know and I'll, I'll go to his pharmacy and everyone will be really nice to me 'cause, you know, I'm Franks daughter.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, so why not go knock?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, 'cause, I mean, what if, what if he's not this great dad guy? I mean, what if, what if he's just still the dirtbag who ran out on my mom and us? You know what? I've already lost a fake dad this week and I don't think I'm ready to lose a real one.

Name: joey
Lines: Phoebs, that's OK. You took a big step today.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, and someday when you're ready, you'll make it past the hedges.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, and when you do, he'll be lucky to have you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You guys. I'm sorry about your shopping.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, that's OK, we'll figure something out.

Name: joey
Lines: Uh, listen Phoebs, I know you're not goin' in there but do you think it'd be alright if I went in and used his bathroom? Oh, that's fine, never mind. Cool, snow, kinda like a blank canvas.

Name: chandler
Lines: Ho, ho, ho, holy crap is it hot in here!

Name: joey
Lines: Really, hey, you mind if I turn the heat down?

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, we could have used that kind of thinkin' earlier.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, Phoebs, how'd it go.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, I couldn't go in.

Name: monica
Lines: Honey, I'm sorry.

Name: ross
Lines: Are you OK?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, yeah, no it's OK 'cause, I mean, I know he's there, so, that's enough for now.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, guys, it's after midnight, merry Christmas everyone. [Ross and Phoebe hug, Monica and Rachel hug, Chandler is left standing]

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, Monica, the knob was broken so I just turned it off from underneath, I hope that's alright.

Name: joey
Lines: Rach, these are for you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wiper blades. I don't even have a car.

Name: joey
Lines: No, but with this new car smell, you'll think you do.

Name: chandler
Lines: OK, Phoebs, your turn.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ahh, toilet seat covers! Is that what you were doing while I was getting gas?

Name: joey
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You guuuyys.

Name: joey
Lines: And for Ross, Mr. Sweet-tooth.

Name: ross
Lines: You got me a cola drink?

Name: chandler
Lines: And, a lemon lime.

Name: ross
Lines: Well this, this is too much, I feel like I should get you another sweater.

Name: chandler
Lines: And last but not least.

Name: joey
Lines: They're ribbed for your pleasure.

Name: joey
Lines: I'm excited! I've never gotten reviewed before.

Name: joey
Lines: Here it is, here it is. [reading from newspaper] The only thing worse than the mindless, adolescent direction was Joseph Tribbiani's disturbingly unskilled portrayal of the king.

Name: ross
Lines: I don't want to.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: joey
Lines: Maybe they do. I've been doin' this ten years and I haven't gotten anywhere. There's gotta be a reason.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh c'mon. Maybe you're just, uhhh... paying your dues.

Name: joey
Lines: No, no, no, it.. it's too hard. It's not worth it. I quit.

Name: joey
Lines: When I was little, I wanted to be a veteranarian, but then I found out you had to put your hands into cows and stuff.

Name: ross
Lines: [sullenly] Hiiiiii.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, yeah, just a tough day at work. A stegosaurus fell over and trapped a kid. Whoa, whoa, I know this jacket, this is, th--Fun Bobby's jacket! Where is he, what. He, he's here, isn't he?

Name: ross
Lines: Don't toy with me.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, Fun Bobby!

Name: ross
Lines: Not at all! I love this guy. Hey, I was so psyched to hear you're back with my sister!

Name: joey
Lines: No, I'm alright man. Really.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey no, seriously, I don't need you to pick me... [Fun Bobby picks Joey up off the ground, bounces him. Joey laughs.] Alright! It still works.

Name: joey
Lines: I just had a glass.

Name: ross
Lines: Oooooh.

Name: joey
Lines: [realizing what everyone else did a minute ago] Ooooooh.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah but, you know, now that I think about it, I don't think I've ever seen Fun Bobby without a... a drink in his hand.

Name: joey
Lines: Monica, have you ever been with him when he wasn't drinking?

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, my agent just called me with an audition for Days of Our Lives!

Name: joey
Lines: With a man?

Name: joey
Lines: What about Ross? I mean, are you still mad at him cause he made that list about you?

Name: joey
Lines: Well, I think it went pretty well. I.. I got a callback for Thursday.

Name: joey
Lines: No.

Name: joey
Lines: OK, uh.... listen, there's something I want to talk to you about. The network casting lady...

Name: joey
Lines: Oh yeah, yeah, she's great, but... I kinda got the feeling that she was sort of... coming on to me. And I definitely would get the part if I would've... you know... if I would have sent the Little General in.

Name: ross
Lines: What? What's wrong?

Name: ross
Lines: Alright.

Name: ross
Lines: Hi.

Name: ross
Lines: Yes, yes I am. Are you a, uh, a friend of Rachel's?

Name: ross
Lines: A date.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, oh, you're... uh... you're, oh you're the date.

Name: ross
Lines: Yes, yes I am. And you are a....

Name: ross
Lines: Well, I am going to, uh... get a beverage. It was nice, nice... uh... meeting you.

Name: ross
Lines: I, uh, well... I... I met Russ.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, I didn't know we were, uh, seeing other people.

Name: ross
Lines: Well, uh, for your information, there's a woman at the museum, who's curator of moths and other... uh... winged things... who's, uh, let it be known that she is drawn to me much like a... well, you know. But so far I've been keeping her at bay, but, uh, if this is the deal...

Name: ross
Lines: OK, well, um, have a nice evening.

Name: ross
Lines: [upset] She's dating. She's dating.

Name: ross
Lines: What do you mean?

Name: ross
Lines: See what? I don't know what she sees in... innn that goober. And it takes him, what? Like... like... I don't know, uhh... uhhh, hello.... a... week, to get out a sentence.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, the part's mine if I want it.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, if I'm willing to sleep with the casting lady.

Name: joey
Lines: Ten years I've been waiting for a break like this Chandler, ten years! I mean, Days of Our Lives. That's actually on television.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, I guess I could sleep with her... I mean, how could I do that?

Name: joey
Lines: I've never slept with someone for a part.

Name: joey
Lines: Sorry.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, she's totally good looking. I mean, if I met her in a bar, or something, I'd be buying her breakfast. [pause] You know, after having slept with her.

Name: joey
Lines: I just... I just don't think that I want it that way though, y'know? I mean, let's say I do make it, alright? I'm always gonna look back and wonder if it was because of my talent or because of.. y'know, the Little General.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, but after Denise DeMarco, I had to promote it.

Name: ross
Lines: [condescendingly] Dysprosium? Try mendelevium.

Name: ross
Lines: [to Russ] For your information, it's a card sharp, not a card shark.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh you do, do you?

Name: ross
Lines: Of... of what?

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, you're a doctor of gums. That's the smallest body part you can major in. It's like day one, floss. Day two, here's your diploma.

Name: ross
Lines: No, no, let me finish.

Name: ross
Lines: No, you let me fini...

Name: ross
Lines: Hi.

Name: ross
Lines: Where ya goin'?

Name: ross
Lines: Ooooohhhh.

Name: ross
Lines: What's going on, is... uh, Bobby drinking again?

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: ross
Lines: How'd the callback go?

Name: joey
Lines: It was unbelievable! I walked in there and she was all over me.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, I couldn't do it. I told her I didn't want to get the part that way.

Name: ross
Lines: Good for you.

Name: joey
Lines: But wait, wait, wait. Then, after I left her office, she caught up with me at the elevator and offered me an even bigger part.

Name: joey
Lines: Soooooo... you are now looking at Dr. Drake Ramore, neurosurgeon, recurring in at least four episodes!

Name: joey
Lines: Alright... I've got to go shower. [leaves]

Name: ross

Lines: Well, Monica keeps changin' the channel.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh that's great, why don't you tell mommy on me.

Name: rachel
Lines: Now I'm mommy in this little play? Alright look, I refuse to get sucked into this like, weird little Geller dimension thing OK. So I'm gonna go and take a nice long hot bubble bath because you kids are driving me crazy. [goes in the bathroom]

Name: monica
Lines: OK, what're we gonna do about this?

Name: ross
Lines: Well, I guess we could tape Entertainment Tonight.

Name: monica
Lines: Not that, this, US. Oh my God, Ross, you-re, you're, it's jus-, you-, ever sin- you been here.

Name: ross
Lines: Ow, ow, OK. Alright, alright, Mon, Mon, you've gone ultrasonic again, alright.

Name: monica
Lines: I just can't stand you being here all the time.

Name: ross
Lines: Why, why, why can't you stand me being here? I don't, I, we're just, ya know, we're just havin' fun.

Name: monica
Lines: Fun? Fun, you think this is fun?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, c'mon I mean I though, you know, I thought we're just foolin' around. Like when, uh, when we were kids.

Name: monica
Lines: Ross, I hated you when we were kids.

Name: ross
Lines: You hated me when we were kids?

Name: monica
Lines: Yes. I hated you. I mean I, I, loved you in a 'you're my brother so I have to' kind of way, but basically, yeah, I hated your guts.

Name: ross
Lines: Why did you hate me?

Name: monica
Lines: Because, you were mean to me and you, you teased me and you always, always got your way.

Name: ross
Lines: And that wasn't fun for you?

Name: monica
Lines: Duh-huh!

Name: ross
Lines: I can't believe you hated me.

Name: monica
Lines: Now I love you. And not just 'cause I have to.

Name: ross
Lines: Really?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah. You're just gonna have to stop pissing me off.

Name: ross
Lines: I can do that.

Name: monica
Lines: Then I won't have to kill you.

Name: ross
Lines: So you wanna watch uh, Entertainment Tonight?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah, thanks. You know what?

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: monica
Lines: If you really want to watch that Serengetti thing, you can.

Name: ross
Lines: Ohh... OK. [changes the channel]

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Listen. You are not going to believe this but, that is not me singing on the video.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, how did you find out?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, OK, the record company sent over this piece of paper for me to sign, saying that it's OK for someone else to sing for me. That was my first clue.

Name: monica
Lines: So what're you gonna do?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, I can't work with people who would do this.

Name: monica
Lines: Sure.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I mean this poor woman.

Lines: What woman?

Name: phoebe
Lines: The voice woman. Ya know, I mean, she has a great voice but she doesn't have a video.

Name: rachel
Lines: OK, Phoebs. But what about you?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well I have a video, you have to pay attention. No this, this voice woman, she's so talented but, according to the producer people, they said she doesn't have like the right look or something, ya know. I mean, it's like, she's like one of those an imals at the pound who like nobody wants 'cause they're not pretty enough or you know. Like, like some old dog who's just kind of like stinky and. Huuuuh, oh my God, she's smelly cat. Oh, oh that song has so many levels.

Lines: Hey Eddie, you uh, wanna play some foosball?

Lines: [stares in disbeliefe] Yeah o-, OK, alright. [oven timer goes off] Doesn't matter, time for Baywatch.

Lines: You don't like that show?

Lines: Well that's the brilliance of it. The pretty people... and the running.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh o-, OK man.

Lines: [singing] Smelly cat, smell-ly cat, what are they feeding you? Everybody.

Lines: Monica.

Lines: [sings] They won't take you to the vet.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Chandler.

Name: monica
Lines: Joey.

Lines: [sings] It may not be a bed of roses.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Rachel.

Lines: [sings] And you're no friend to those with noses.

Lines: I'm sorry I'm late, what happened?

Lines: We, we just wanna see the end.

Lines: So what happens next?

Name: joey
Lines: Well, I get the medical award for separating the siamese twins. Then Amber and I go to Venezuela to meet our other half-brother, Ramone. And that's where I find the world's biggest emerald. It's really big but it's cursed.

Name: chandler
Lines: God that is good TV.

Name: chandler
Lines: Phoebs, play with meeee.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No. This game is grotesque. Twenty armless guys joined at the waist by a steel bar, forced to play soccer forever. Ahh, hello, human-rights violation.

Name: chandler
Lines: Ya know Phoebs, don't feel so bad for 'em. After they're done playing, I break out the little plastic women and everybody has a pretty good time.

Name: phoebe

Name: chandler
Lines: Ah he's a, he's not a big fan of foosball.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh oh, ooh, are we not getting along with the new boy?

Lines: No he's, he's alright, just uh, he spends most of his time in his room.

Name: phoebe

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh yeah, it'll be fun. [throws a tennis ball at Eddie's bedroom door]

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hi, um, I just thought that it would be fun if the three of us had some beers and got to know each other.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh good, ok. Oh nooo, I have to go because I'm late for my um, Green Eggs and Ham discussion group. Um tonight it's why he would not eat them on a train. Have fun bye.

Name: chandler
Lines: That was so lame.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I know, yeah. Ok, talk to him. [leaves]

Name: chandler
Lines: So, you uh, you think that Speed Racer guy gets a lot of tickets er?

Name: chandler
Lines: What're you kidding? I broke up with her. She actually thought that Sean Penn was the capital of Cambodia.

Lines: Well it's not Sean Penn.

Name: phoebe
Lines: And a crusty old man said I'll do what I can and the rest of the rats played moroccas. That's it, thanks, good night.

Lines: Great set tonight Phoebs.

Lines: I know.

Lines: Well, we should probably get going.

Lines: Ya know, I was thinking. Ya know how we always stay at your apartment? Well, I thought maybe tonight we'd stay at my place.

Name: monica
Lines: Well, maybe you don't need them.

Name: ross
Lines: My baby sister, ladies and gentlemen.

Name: monica
Lines: Shut up, I'm happy.

Lines: Oh, this is so nice. Alright I have to make a speech. I just wanna say that of all the guys that Monica has been with, and that is a lot, I like you the best.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ok.

Lines: Not a lot, Phoebe's kidding, Phoebe's crazy.

Lines: Phoebe's dead.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hi.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, uh, he's not here right now, uh, I'm Chandler, can I take a message, or, or a fishtank?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, oh, c'mon in.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh yeah, your uh, name came up in a uh, conversation that terrified me to my very soul.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes. Hey, can I ask you, is Eddie a little...

Name: chandler
Lines: Bit country? C'mon in here you roomie.

Name: chandler
Lines: Bye.

Lines: So, we gettin' a fish?

Name: joey
Lines: Phoebs, check it out, check it out, check it out, check it out.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, ooh, Soap Opera Digest, oh that's one of my favorite digests.

Name: joey
Lines: Page 42, page 42, page 42.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ok, ok, ok. Ooh, hey 'new doc on the block, Days of Our Lives' Joey Tribbiani.' Ooh, cool picture.

Name: joey
Lines: Ooh, I look good.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey is this true, that you write a lot of your own lines?

Name: joey
Lines: Uh, well, kinda yeah. Like, remember last week when Alex was in the accident? Well the line in the script was, 'If we don't get this woman to a hospital, she's going to die.' But I made it, ' If this woman doesn't get to a hospital, she's not gonna live.'

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ohh, ok, I see what you did there. Aren't you afraid though, that the writers are gonna be kinda mad when they read this?

Name: joey
Lines: Huh? Never really thought about the writers. The scripts just kinda come to my house. But you know what? This makes me look good, which makes the show look good, which makes the writers look good so how could they be mad about that?

Name: joey
Lines: I fall down an elevator shaft? What the hell does this mean, I fall down an elevator shaft?

Name: joey
Lines: They can't kill me, I'm Francesca's long lost son.

Name: joey
Lines: No. No way, I'm not signing that.

Name: joey
Lines: How can they do this to me?

Name: monica
Lines: Well it wasn't that many guys. I mean, if you consider how many guys there actually are, it's a very small percentage.

Lines: Hey, it's not that big a deal, I was just curious.

Lines: G'night.

Lines: Alright, before I tell you, uh, why don't you tell me how many women you've been with.

Lines: Ok, it is definitely less than a ballpark.

Lines: Eddie, I didn't sleep with your ex-girlfriend.

So we're just gonna take this guy right off ya and put him here in Mr. Pocket. Tangellon? [picks up the fruit an tosses it to Eddie, it hits Eddie in the chest and falls]

Name: monica
Lines: Well yeah.

Lines: Oh, yay. Ok about that two.

Lines: And, well, don't you have a lot of wild oats to sew? Or is that what you're doing with me? Oh my God, am I an oat?

Name: monica
Lines: But you've only slept with two people.

Lines: Wow. Oh wow. You know I love you too, right.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross, Ross, please listen to me. Ross, you are so much better for me than Paolo ever was. I mean you care about me, you're loving, you make me laugh.

Lines: Oh, hey, if I make you laugh, here's an idea, why don't you invite Paulo over and have a little romp in the sack and I'll just stand in the corner and tell knock-knock jokes.

Lines: God, Ross, look, what you and I have is special, all Paolo and I ever had was...

Lines: Animal sex, animal sex? So what're you saying, I mean, you're saying that like, there's nothing between us animal at all. I mean there's not even like, uhm, a little animal, not even, not even like, like chipmunk sex?

Lines: Ok, Ross, try to hear me. Ok, I, hey, I'm not gonna lie to you. Ok, it was good with Paolo.

Name: ross

Lines: But, what you and I have is so much better. Ok, we have tenderness, we have intimacy, we connect. Ya know, I swear, this is the best I have ever had.

Name: monica

Name: monica
Lines: Hi. Uh, we'll be right there, we're just trying to decide something. [shuts the bathroom door]

Lines: Good, good, good. So, is uh, was your moustache, did, used to be different?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh. How do you uh, ya know, keep it so neat?

Lines: Oh. And what do you call that?

Lines: No.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ok, ok, ok, I will, I will, I, hey, I will clean the apartment for two months.

Name: rachel
Lines: Agghhh.

Lines: So were you in Nam?

Name: rachel
Lines: Rock-paper-scissors?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeesss.

Lines: Fine, go have sex.

Lines: No, no way. You've got it totally the other way around my friend. John Voit was...

Name: rachel
Lines: Honey.

Lines: What, what oh....[Ross and Rachel go into her room]

Lines: It's not gonna happen. They're doing it tonight, we can do it tomorrow.

Lines: So, when I woke up this morning, he'd stolen all the insoles out of my shoes.

Lines: Because he thinks I slept with his ex-girlfriend and killed his fish.

Lines: Naa, they said that when they found my body, my brain was so smashed in that the only doctor that could have saved me was me. Supposed to be some kind of irony or somethin.

Lines: But Joey, you're gonna be fine. You don't need that show, it was just a dumb soap opera.

Name: joey
Lines: Phoebe, this was the greatest thing that ever happened to me.

Name: monica
Lines: Um, I straightened out your shower curtain so you won't get mildew. What? To me that's nice.

Name: chandler
Lines: It's gonna be ok. You know that?

Name: joey
Lines: No, I don't. It's like, ya know, you work your whole life for somethin' and you think that when you get it it's never gonna be as good as you thought it would be. But this so was. Ya know, it changed everything. Like the other day, I got this credit card application, and I was pre- approved. Huh? I've never been pre-approved for anything in my life.

Name: chandler
Lines: I'm sorry man.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, Joey honey, I don't know if this'll mean anything to you but you'll always be pre-approved with us.

Name: joey
Lines: No, that means nothin to me.

Name: chandler
Lines: Uhhhaahh.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah alright. What're these, raisins?

Name: chandler
Lines: [throws it across the room while Eddie's not looking] Listen Eddie, um, I've been thinking about our current living situation and uh, why are you smiling?

Name: chandler
Lines: [looks in the fish bowl to see a fish cracker] Well that's not an, even a real fish. No, that's a goldfish cracker.

Name: chandler
Lines: Ok, good night. [walks towards his room] You big freak of nature.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh man.

Name: ross
Lines: You got it.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey Eddie. Daahh!! What're you doin' here?

Name: chandler
Lines: Why?

Name: chandler
Lines: I can't sleep now.

Name: chandler
Lines: No, look, that's it, it's over, I want you out, I want you out of the apartment now.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hannibal Lecter...better roommate than you.

Name: chandler
Lines: I didn't realize that.

Name: chandler
Lines: GET OUT NOW!!

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes please.

Name: chandler
Lines: I want you out.

Name: chandler
Lines: Where did you hear it from before?

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey. Whe-ell, look at you, finally got that time machine workin' huh?

Lines: Seriously, you like it? This guy was sellin' them on 8th avenue and I looked at 'em and I though, you know what I don't have?

Name: monica
Lines: A mirror?

Name: joey
Lines: Fine, make fun. I think it's jaunty.

Name: monica
Lines: Wow, for a guy who's recently lost his job, you're in an awfully good mood.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, I'll be alright. I mean it's not like I'm starting from sqare one. I was Dr. Drake Remoray on Days of Our Lives. Heh? I mean that's gotta have some kind of cache.

Name: monica
Lines: Cache? Jaunty?

Name: joey
Lines: Chandler gave me word of the day toilet paper. I'm gonna get some coffee.

Lines: Hey.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey.

Lines: Oooh, so so so, did you read the book?

Lines: Oh my God, it was incredible.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Didn't it like totally speak to you?

Name: rachel
Lines: Woah, woah, woah, what book is this?

Name: monica
Lines: Rachel you have to read this book. It's called Be Your Own Windkeeper. It's about how women need to become more empowered.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah and oh, and but there's, there's wind and the wind can make us Goddesses. But you know who takes out wind? Men, they just take it.

Lines: Men just take out wind?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ya-huh, all the time, cause they are the lightning bearers.

Lines: Wow.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well that sounds kinda cool, kinda like The Hobbit.

Name: monica
Lines: It is nothing like the Hobbit. It's like reading about every relationship I've ever had, except for Richard.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh yes, no, Richard would never steal your wind.

Name: monica
Lines: No.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, 'cause he's yummy.

Name: monica
Lines: Yes. But all the other ones.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh yes. Oh and, the part about how they're always like drinking from out pool of inner power, but God forbid we should take a sip.

Name: joey
Lines: Anybody want a croan.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ok, this is a typical lightning-bearer thing. Right there, it's like, um, 'Hello, who wants one of my fallic shaped man cakes?'

Lines: So, you're not mad at me for getting fired and everything?

Name: joey
Lines: No, can we get back to me?

Name: joey
Lines: Alright. Cab driver number two?

Name: joey
Lines: But I was Dr. Drake Remoray. How can I go from bein' a neurosurgeon to drivin' a cab?

Name: joey
Lines: But this is a two line part, it's like takin' a step backwards. I'm not gonna do this.

Name: joey
Lines: I'm sorry. See ya.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, God, oh, God, I mean it's just so.

Name: monica
Lines: Isn't it.

Name: rachel
Lines: Uhh, I mean this is like reading about my own life. I mean this book could have been called 'Be Your Own Windkeeper Rachel'.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I don't think it would have sold a million copies but it would have made a nice gift for you.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey you guys.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey.

Lines: Uh, sweetie we've gotta go.

Name: rachel
Lines: NO!

Lines: No?

Lines: No, why do we always have to do everything according to your time table?

Lines: No, see this isn't about the movie theatre, this is about you stealing my wind.

Lines: You go girl. I can't pull that off can I?

Name: ross
Lines: Excuse me, your, your, your wind?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes, my wind. How do you expect me to grow if you won't let me blow?

Name: ross
Lines: You, you know I, I don't, have a- have a problem with that.

Lines: Ok, I just, I just really need to be with myself right now. I'm sorry.

Lines: Um-um, um-um.

Lines: You're right, I don't have to apologize. Sorry. Damnit!

Lines: What is it?

Name: ross
Lines: I, I don't know, it's got all this stuff about wind and trees and there's some kind of sacred pool in it. I mean, I don't really get it but she's, she's pretty upset about it.

Lines: Oh my God.

Lines: Woah.

Lines: My animals. Hey the guy said they suited me, he spoke with an accent, I was all confused. I don't know what I'm gonna do.

Lines: Well I guess you can start by drivin a cab on Another World.

Lines: What?

Lines: That audition.

Name: joey
Lines: That's a two line part.

Lines: So what.

Lines: So suck it up man, it's a job, it's money.

Lines: Hey, look, I don't need you getting all judgemental and condescending and pedantic.

Lines: Yeah.
