Lines: I am your friend.

Name: joey
Lines: Well then tell me things like, 'Joey you'll be fine,' and, 'Hang in there,' and, and, 'Somethin' big's fonna come along, I know it.'

Name: ross
Lines: But I don't know it. What I do know is that you owe $2300 at Isn't it Chromantic.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey Ross, I'm aware of what I owe.

Name: ross
Lines: Ok, well then get some sense. I mean it took you what, 10 years to get that job, who knows how long it's gonna be till you get another.

Name: joey
Lines: Look, I don't wanna hear this right now.

Name: ross
Lines: Huh, I'm just saying...

Name: joey
Lines: Well don't just say.

Name: ross
Lines: Ya know, maybe, maybe I should just go.

Name: joey
Lines: Ok.

Name: ross
Lines: Ok. I'll see ya later. Just think about it, ok.

Name: joey
Lines: I don't need to think about it. I was Dr. Drake Remoray. That was huge. Big things are gonna happen, you'll see. Ross, you still there?

Name: chandler
Lines: Ahhhh-gaaaahhh. Eddie what're you still doin' here?

Name: chandler
Lines: Look Eddie, aren't you forgetting anything?

Name: chandler
Lines: Maybe 'cause the last one was made by Pepperidge Farm. Look Eddie, isn't there something else you're supposed to be doing right now?

Name: chandler
Lines: Look you have to help me out here. I thought we had a deal. I thought by the time...

Name: chandler
Lines: Your last roommate's kidney?

Name: joey
Lines: Hey Gunther, let me get a lemonade to go.

Name: joey
Lines: Ah, it's career stuff. I don't know if you heard but they killed off my character on the show.

Name: joey
Lines: I fell down an elevator shaft.

Name: joey
Lines: What?

Name: chandler
Lines: Daaahhhh!

Name: monica
Lines: Aaahhhhhhh! Aaahhhh!

Name: chandler
Lines: Why must everybody watch me sleep? There'll be no more watching me sleep, no more watching.

Name: monica
Lines: I wa-

Name: chandler
Lines: Uuuh.

Name: chandler
Lines: Get out. Get out, get out, get out, get out, get out, get out.

Name: chandler
Lines: You, move out. Take your fruit, your stupid small fruit and GET OUT!

Name: chandler
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: chandler
Lines: This is not out of the blue, this is smack dab in the middle of the blue.

Name: chandler
Lines: You want some help.

Name: joey
Lines: All the way to the airport huh? You know that's over 30 miles, that's gonna cost you about so bucks.

Name: joey
Lines: What?

Name: joey
Lines: Ohh, you know what it is? It's smudgy 'cause they're fax pages. Now when I was on Days of Our Lives as Dr. Drake Remoray, they'd send over the whole script on real paper and everything.

Name: joey
Lines: And, and just so you know, if you wanted to expand this scene like, like have the cab crash or somethin', I could attend to the victims 'cause I have a background in medical acting.

Name: joey
Lines: No no, uh, don't thank me for comin' in. Uh, at least let me finish. Uh, we could take the expressway but uh, this time of day you're better off taking the budge. You were goin' for the word bridge there weren't ya. I'll have a good day. [gets up and leaves]

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ok, question number 28, have you ever allowed a lighning bearer to take your wind? I would have to say no.

Name: monica
Lines: And I would have to say pah-huh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?

Name: monica
Lines: Do you not remember the puppet guy?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah you like totally let him wash his feet in the pool of your inner power.

Name: monica
Lines: And his puppet too.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah ok, well at least I didn't let some guy into the forest of my righteous truth on the first date.

Name: monica
Lines: Who?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Paul.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ok, ok, ok, moving on, moving on, next question. Ok number 29, have you ever betrayed another goddess for a lightning bearer? Ok, number 30.

Name: monica
Lines: Woah, woah, woah, let's go back to 29.

Name: rachel
Lines: Not uh, not to my recollection.

Name: monica
Lines: Huuh, alright, Danny Arshak, ninth grade. Oh, c'mon Rach, you know the bottle was totally pointing at me.

Name: rachel
Lines: Only 'cause you took up half the circle.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Listen to you two. It's so sad. Looks like I'm gonna be going to the goddess meetings alone.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well not when they find out you slept with Jason Hurley an hour after he broke up with Monica.

Name: monica
Lines: One hour? You are such a leaf blower.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh hey uh, be careful with that 3-D last supper, Judas is a little loose.

Name: ross
Lines: [enters] Oh my God, what's goin' on?

Name: joey
Lines: They're takin all my stuff back. I guess you were right.

Name: ross
Lines: No look I wasn''t right, that's what I came here to tell you. I was totally hung up on, on my own stuff. Listen, I'm someone who needs the whole security thing, ya know. To know exactly where my next paycheck is coming from buy you, you don't need that and that's amazing to me. I could never do what you do Joey.

Name: joey
Lines: Thanks Ross.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah. And you should hold out for something bigger. I can't tell you how much respect I have for you not going to that stupid cab driver audition.

Name: joey
Lines: I went.

Name: ross
Lines: Great, how did it go?

Name: joey
Lines: I didn't get it.

Name: ross
Lines: Good for you.

Name: joey
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: You're livin' the dream.

Name: joey
Lines: Huh?

Name: ross
Lines: All right then.

Name: joey
Lines: [movers removing a glass parrot] Oh, not my parrot.

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: joey
Lines: I can't watch this.

Name: ross
Lines: [approaching the mover holding the parrot] Hey hold on, hold on. How much for the uh, how much to save the bird?

Name: ross
Lines: Dollars? You spent $1200 dollars on a plastic bird?

Name: joey
Lines: Uhhh, I was an impulse buyer, near the register.

Name: ross
Lines: Go ahead, go ahead with the bird. Ok, do you have anything for around 200?

Name: ross
Lines: Huh.

Name: ross
Lines: I'll take it. My gift to you man.

Name: joey
Lines: Thanks Ross. I really like that bird though...I'll take the dog though.

Name: rachel
Lines: Here are your cakes.

Name: monica
Lines: We didn't order cake.

Name: rachel
Lines: No, I know, they're from me. Look you guys this is not good. I mean we have enough trouble with guys stealing our wind without taking it from each other.

Name: monica
Lines: You're right.

Name: rachel
Lines: You know.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I love you goddesses. I don't ever want to suck your wind again.

Name: rachel
Lines: Thank you. So are we good?

Name: monica
Lines: We're good.

Name: rachel
Lines: We're good?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ok, let me take these cakes back 'cause they're gonna take that out of my paycheck.

Name: chandler
Lines: [enters] Ding dong, the psycho's gone.

Name: monica
Lines: Are you sure this time?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes, yes I actually saw him leave. I mean that guy is standing in the window holding a human head. He is STANDING IN THE WINDOW HOLDING A HUMAN HEAD!

Name: monica
Lines: There is no alley behind Macy's.

Name: chandler
Lines: Our next cocktail party?

Name: chandler
Lines: Eddie, do you remember yesterday?

Name: chandler
Lines: Do you remember talking to me yesterday?

Name: chandler
Lines: So what happened?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh sweet Moses.

Name: monica
Lines: So on this road trip, did you guys win any money?

Name: monica
Lines: Nice.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Is anyone else starting to really like him?

Name: chandler
Lines: May I help you?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I'm, I'm sorry...[Eddie forces his head in the door] Ahhh. Have we met?

Name: chandler
Lines: I, I'm sorry, I uh [unchains the door and opens it all the way] I already have a roommate. [Joey turns around in the leather recliner]

Name: joey
Lines: Hello.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, he's lived here for years, I don't, I don't know what you're talking about man.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well I, I think we'd remember something like that.

Name: joey
Lines: I know I would.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey no problem.

Name: chandler
Lines: See ya. [shuts the door] Goodbuy you fruit drying psychopath. So you want me to help you unpack your stuff?

Name: joey
Lines: Na, na I'm ok. Oh and uh, just so you know, I'm not movin' back in 'cause I have to. Well, I mean, I do have to. It's just that that place wasn't really, I mean, this is...

Name: chandler
Lines: Welcome home man. [they hug and jump around]

Name: joey
Lines: A little foos?

Name: chandler
Lines: Absolutely.

Name: joey
Lines: What happened to the foosball?

Name: chandler
Lines: Ah that's a cantelope.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey look, are we gonna have to bring this out every time Ross comes over?

Name: joey
Lines: He paid a lot of money for it.

Name: chandler
Lines: I'm gonna hold him a different way. Look I don't understand, if you hated it so much, why did you buy it in the first place?

Name: joey
Lines: Well, I had a whole ceramic zoo thing goin' over there but now, without the other ones, it just looks tacky.

Name: chandler
Lines: So is he housetrained or is he gonna leave little bathroom tiles all over the place? Stay. Good, STAY! Good fake dog.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey. Watcha guys doin?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Why are you guys so upset? It's Old Yeller, it's a happy movie.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: What're you talkin' about?

Name: phoebe
Lines: C'mon, happy family gets a dog, frontier fun.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah but Phoebs, what about the end?

Name: phoebe
Lines: What when Yeller saves saves the family from the wolf and everyone's happy?

Name: rachel
Lines: That's not the end.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yu-huh. That's when my mother would shut off the TV and say 'The end'.

Name: monica
Lines: What about the part where he has rabies?

Name: phoebe
Lines: He doesn't have rabies, he has babies. That's what my mom said.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What, what's about to happen? [starts watching] I've never seen this part before. Hey, Travis, watcha doin' with that gun? Oh no, no no Travis, put down the gun. No no no no, he he's your buddy, he's your Yeller, no, no no, the end, THE END. [hear the gunshot from the TV]

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, have you guys eaten, because uh, Richard and I just finished and we've got leftovers... Chicken and potatoes... What am I wearing?...Actually, nothing but rubber gloves.

Name: joey
Lines: Ya know, one of these times you're gonna really be naked and we're not gonna come over.

Name: monica
Lines: Alright, I've got a leg, three breasts and a wing.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, how do you find clothes that fit?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, hey, Monica, we've got a question.

Name: monica
Lines: Alright, for the bizillionth time, yes I see other women in shower at the gym, and no I don't look.

Name: joey
Lines: No, not that one. We're trying to figure out who to bring to the Knicks game tonight, we have an extra ticket.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, Ross can't go so it's between my friend Eric Prower who has breath issues and Dan with the poking. [starts poking Monica in the shoulder] 'Did you see that play? Do you want some more beer? Is that Spike Lee?'

Name: monica
Lines: Ok. [Richard walks in] Hey, why don't you ask Richard?

Name: joey
Lines: Ok, uh, hey Richard, if you had an extra ticket to the Knicks game and you had to choose between a friend who smells and one who bruises you who would you pick?

Name: chandler
Lines: Ok, that's Eric.

Name: monica
Lines: I meant, why don't you take Richard to the game? What?

Name: joey
Lines: I don't know.

Name: monica
Lines: C'mon. Keeps his fingers to himself and he's always minty fresh.

Name: chandler
Lines: I don't know, Richard's really nice and everything, uh, it's just that we don't know him really well, ya know, and plus he's, ya know, old [Monica gives him a glare] -er than some people, but, uh, younger than some buildings.

Name: monica
Lines: So what, he's a little older, big deal, I mean he's important to me. Ya know if you ask him, he might take you on his Jag. [walks off]

Name: joey
Lines: How do we say yes now and make it seem like we're not doin' it just to ride in the cool car?

Name: chandler
Lines: Ok, this could be tough.

Name: joey
Lines: [Monica walks back in the kitchen] Ok ok ok ok. Monica, we'll bring him, but only if he takes the Jaguar.

Name: chandler
Lines: Ooh, you almost had it.

Name: ross
Lines: [smells Ben's butt] No no, you're fine, you're fine.

Name: ross
Lines: Hi.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh you guys are not gonna believe what happened.

Name: ross
Lines: Ok, we were sitting over there playing on the floor and he grabs the table and he pulls himself up. He pulled himself up. Standing man. I'm sorry you guys missed it but I did tape it so it you guys want to see it.

Name: ross
Lines: I don't believe this. I miss, I miss the first time of everything. I missed, what, the first time he rolled over, the first time he crawled. What else did I miss? Has he spoken yet, is he driving, does he have a favorite liquour?

Name: ross
Lines: Ooh, I, I'm so sick of missing stuff. Ya know, I want him for more than, than a day, I want him for a whole weekend. No listen , I mean, I feel like-

Name: ross
Lines: Really? I mean, I, I had a whole speach prepared.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh look, did, did you just see that? Did you see? He just waved, he just waved, he's never waved before, you've never waved before. Yes he has. Very good.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey Phoebs, whatcha got there?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ok, Love Story, Brian's Song, and Terms of Endearment.

Name: monica
Lines: Wow, all you need now is The Killing Fields and some guacamole and you've got yourself a part-ay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I talked to my grandma about the Old Yeller incident, and she told me that my mom used to not show us the ends of sad movies to shield us from the pain and sadness. You know, before she killed herself.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey. Where is he, where's Richard? Did you ditch him?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah right after we stole his lunch money and gave him a wedgie. What's the matter with you, he's parking the car.

Name: monica
Lines: So'd you guys have fun?

Name: chandler
Lines: Your boyfriend is so cool.

Name: monica
Lines: Really?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, he let us drive his Jaguar. Joey for 12 blocks, me for 15.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow, he must like you the best.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, what about that thing he did when he tipped the guy who showed us to our seats. You never even saw the money, it was like this. [With money in his palm] Hey Chandler, thanks for showing us to our seats [shakes his had and passes the dollar].

Name: chandler
Lines: You're welcome. Hey Joey, thanks for parking the car [passes the dollar back].

Name: joey
Lines: No problem. Hey Chandler

Name: chandler
Lines: I think they get it.

Name: joey
Lines: Ok.

Name: chandler
Lines: There's the man.

Name: joey
Lines: He-he-eyy. [Shakes his had and passes the dollar]

Name: joey
Lines: Ok. He kept my dollar.

Name: monica
Lines: So your first whole weekend without Ben, what're you guys gonna do?

Name: ross
Lines: Well, ya know, they're a little behind the times in Colonial Williamsburg.

Name: ross
Lines: Buy mommy.

Name: ross
Lines: Have a good time. Ok, Ben.

Name: monica
Lines: Ross.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: Look. [they look at Joey in the kitchen with a cigar in his mouth, looking at his reflection in a spatula] Joey, do you know we can see you from here?

Name: joey
Lines: How come Richard looks so much cooler with one of these than me?

Name: ross
Lines: Well for starters, you may want to light it and lose the spatula.

Name: monica
Lines: You know what, I think it's cute, you trying to be more like Richard.

Name: joey
Lines: Not like him, per-se, just not un-like him.

Name: ross
Lines: Look it's the artist formerly known as Chandler.

Name: chandler
Lines: Just tryin' somethin' here, ya know.

Name: monica
Lines: So Joey, why didn't you grow a moustache?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh we flipped for it. I got the cigar, he got the moustache. Figured if we both grew it, we'd look like dorks.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, you really sidestepped that land mine.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey listen, we've gotta go, I promised Richard we'd meet him downstairs.

Name: monica
Lines: You're meeting Richard?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, we're goin' to a Ranger game.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, didn't he tell ya?

Name: monica
Lines: Well, he told me he was going out with the guys, I just didn't know that you were the guys.

Name: chandler
Lines: You hear that? We're the guys.

Name: joey
Lines: We're the guys.

Name: monica
Lines: With that moustache doesn't Chandler remind you of Aunt Sylvia?

Name: ross
Lines: Thank you.

Name: ross
Lines: Hi, we're visitiing. It's Ben and his da-da. Da-da. Can you say da-da? Look, I'm gonna tell your momies you said it anyway so you might as well try.

Name: rachel
Lines: No luck huh?

Name: ross
Lines: Naa. A while ago I got a sah out of him, which I thought, ya know, might turn into sah-condary caregiver but... Hey, would you uh, would you hold him for a sec, 'cause I, I gotta take this off.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, yeah sure, Ok. [she takes Ben and holds him at arms length]

Name: ross
Lines: What're you doing?

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh, I'm holding Ben.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, well, he's a baby not a bomb.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ok.

Name: ross
Lines: Well just hold him like you'd hold a football.

Name: rachel
Lines: This is how I would hold a football.

Name: ross
Lines: Ok, here, here. There we go.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ok, I'm sorry, I'm just not very good with babies. I mean I haven't been around them, I mean, you know, since I was one.

Name: ross
Lines: It's alright, it's no big deal.

Name: rachel
Lines: Really?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, definitely, I'm sure you'll feel totally different when it's our baby.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: rachel
Lines: You think about stuff like that?

Name: ross
Lines: Uhh, yeah. I mean, actually I kinda think that we'll have, we'll have two babies.

Name: rachel
Lines: Two, two babies?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah. Ya know, a boy and a girl. Hopefully the girl will come first so Ben here won't feel too competitive.

Name: rachel
Lines: Then what's gonna happen?

Name: ross
Lines: Well, we won't wanna raise kids in the city so we'll probably move to uh, Scarsdale.

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, that way I figure, ya know, we'll be far enough away from our parents that we don't have to see them all the time but close enough that they can come over and babysit whenever we want. And yes, I know, the taxes are a little higher than, let's say, Nassau county but the school system's supposedly great.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow. Wow, that's great. Great. Ok, wow, you know what.

Name: ross
Lines: Huh?

Name: rachel
Lines: I'm off my break now so uh, um here you take this [hands back Ben] and um, I am gonna go pour these very nice people some coffee. Ok. Oh look at that, I don't have a pot. I don't have a pot. Well, hey, maybe I've got one at home, or in Scarsdale. Hey is that a door? [leaves]

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, ok, murder, cancer, soccer teams eating each other in the Andes.

Name: monica
Lines: So you watched the movies huh?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh huh, what is happening to the world? I mean, no no no, 'cause ET leaves, and and Rocky loses, Charlotte dies.

Name: phoebe
Lines: With the web, the spider she dies, she does. She has babies and dies. It's like ya know, hey welcome home from the hospital, thud.

Name: monica
Lines: Alright, you wanna feel better?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: Ok, here, watch this.

Name: phoebe
Lines: It's a Wonderful Life. Yes I've heard of this.

Name: monica
Lines: So you can't lose, it's there in the title. Wonderfullness is baked right in.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Please, I almost fell for that with, uh, Pride of the Yankees, I thought I was gonna see a film about Yankee pride and then, boom, the guy gets Lou Gehrig's disease.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Phoebe, just watch that, I promise it will resotre all your faith in humanity.

Name: chandler
Lines: [runs in] Hey, big guy, game time.

Name: monica
Lines: There's a game?

Name: chandler
Lines: Uh, yeah, I just got my pick-up sticks back from the shop. Bring your nerves of steel.

Name: monica
Lines: Listen, um honey, I appreciate this but you don't have to keep hanging out with them for me, I mean, they have each other.

Name: monica
Lines: Alright that's great, then just go. Go Knicks.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, then go Vassar.

Name: monica
Lines: Ok, then just go.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, why does this bother me so much? I mean I don't wanna be one of those people who tells their boyfriend they wanna spend 24 hours a day with them.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Sure.

Name: monica
Lines: It's just that he doesn't have that much free time, ya know, and I don't know, what do I do?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Does it matter? You're ultimately just gonna die or get divorced or have to blow your pets head off.

Name: rachel
Lines: [enters] Aghh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Me too. [leaves]

Name: monica
Lines: I've got a question. Richard made plans again with the guys.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah well, Ross just made plans for the whole century.

Name: monica
Lines: Ya know what, I think I'm gonna go to my room and read Cosmo, maybe there's something helpful in there. Know what, at least maybe I can learn how to do an at home bikini wax with leftover Cristmas candles.

Name: ross
Lines: [enters] Ok, what the hell happened back there?

Name: rachel
Lines: I don't know, you tell me. One minute I'm holding Ben like a football, the next thing I know, I've got two kids, I'm living in Scarsdale complaining about the taxes.

Name: ross
Lines: Well I'm sorry, I think about stuff. Ya know, I mean, you're at work, you're assembling bones, your mind wanders.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross, you have planned out the next 20 years of our lives, we've been dating for six weeks.

Name: ross
Lines: C'mon, what, you never think about our future?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes, but I, I think about who's apartment we're gonna sleep at tomorrow night and, and where we're gonna have dinner next Saturday night. I do not think about what our childrens' names are gonna be. You know what our childrens names are gonna be.

Name: ross
Lines: No, no, I mean, ya know, I, I read a book and there was a girl named Emily and I thought, I thought that might be good.

Name: rachel
Lines: What was the book?

Name: ross
Lines: The big book of childrens' names.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ok, Ross, Ross, ok listen, what we have is amazing.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: But I do not want to have everything decided for me. I spent my whole life like that. It's what I had with Barry, that was one of the reasons I left. I, I like not knowing right now and I'm sorry if that scares you but if you want to be with me you are gonna have to deal with that.

Name: ross
Lines: Ok fine.

Name: rachel
Lines: Thank you.

Name: ross
Lines: We're not done.

Name: rachel
Lines: I didn't know that.

Name: ross
Lines: Ok, then you're gonna have to understand that you're with a guy who's not gonna stop planning his future with you because he knows that we're gonna end up together and if that scares you, tough, 'cause you're gonna have to deal with that.

Name: rachel
Lines: Fine, I will.

Name: ross
Lines: Good, 'cause I love you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well I love you too.

Name: ross
Lines: Well that's the first time we've said that.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes it is.

Name: ross
Lines: Well, I'm gonna kiss you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well you better.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey. Oh thanks for the great movie tip.

Name: monica
Lines: Did you like it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh yeah. You know, I don't know if I was happier when um George Bailey destroyed the family business or um, Donna Reid cried, or when the mean pharmacist made his ear bleed.

Name: monica
Lines: Alright, I'll give you the ear thing but don't you think the ending was pretty wonderful?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I didn't watch the ending, I was too depressed. It just kept getting worse and worse, it should have been called, \It's a sucky life and just when you think it can't suck any more it does.\"

Name: chandler
Lines: Kick save and... denied.

Name: joey
Lines: Man you are incredible.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh really, I didn't know they had foosball in the 1800's.

Name: monica
Lines: [enters] Honey. Uh, not to sound too Florence Henderson but, dinner's on the table.

Name: monica
Lines: [grabs the other two bars on Richard's side and scores] Score! Now can we go?

Name: chandler
Lines: See, that's why we don't let her play.

Name: monica
Lines: Um-hmm.

Name: chandler

Lines: NO! No, I'll take that for ya.

Name: phoebe
Lines: [cutting Mrs. Greene off] Ha-ha, that's great, ha-ha. I can't wait to hear the rest of it, ya know, but I really have to go to the bathroom so... Hey, come with me. Yeah, yeah, it'll be like we're gal pals, ya know, like at a restraunt. Oh, it'll be fun, c'mon. [they go in the bathroom]

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God, oh my God, oh my God.

Name: chandler
Lines: Ok, think, what would Jack and Chrissy do?

Name: joey
Lines: [peeks back out] Ok, now that your coat is safely in the bedr-, [sees that the coast is clear] oh, ok we can come back out in the living room.

Name: monica
Lines: So uh, Joey and Chanlder, I, I think it's time that you take Dr. Greene over to your place.

Name: chandler
Lines: Uhh, yes, absdolutely, um. Why again?

Name: monica
Lines: Because that's where the party is you goon. See this is just the staging area.

Name: joey
Lines: Right this is staging.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, this more than anything else, is the staging area.

Name: joey
Lines: [as they're walking out, Dr. Greene questioningly gestures at the Happy Birthday sign over the door] This is clearly in the wrong apartment. [they all walk across the hall]

Name: chandler
Lines: Alright you guys are off to party number one [ushers 3 guys into Monica's apartment] and you, you are off to party number two [ushers four women into his apartment. Two guys try to follow and Chandler blocks them and shoos them off to Monica's apartment] Alright fellas, let's keep it movin', let' keep it movin.

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler could you at least send some women to my party? [buzzer goes off] Alright that's Ross.

Name: chandler
Lines: Ok, they're coming, shhh. [Runs into Monica's apartment and grabs one last girl to take to his apartment]

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh, thank you for the wonderful dinner.

Name: ross
Lines: Thanks for being born.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh, thank you for my beautiul earrings, they're perfect. I love you.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, now you can exchange them if you want, ok.

Name: rachel
Lines: Now I love you even more.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my gosh, wow. Monica. Oh my god. Mom. This is so great.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow you, you. I had no idea.

Name: ross
Lines: Really?

Name: rachel
Lines: No, I knew.

Name: ross
Lines: All right.

Name: monica
Lines: Ok, everybody, there's food and drinks on the table. Go across the hall.

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: monica
Lines: Right now, Joey and Chandler's, go now.

Name: rachel
Lines: Why.

Name: monica
Lines: Just go.

Name: rachel
Lines: Daddy.

Name: rachel
Lines: Both of them are here, both of them, both of them are here?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, we could count again.

Name: rachel
Lines: I can't believe this is happening.

Name: ross
Lines: You know what, this is ridiculous, ok. This is your birthday, this is your party. I say we just put 'em all together and if they can't deal with it, who cares.

Name: rachel
Lines: I do.

Name: ross
Lines: That's who.

Name: chandler
Lines: Look, are you gonna be ok?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, I have to be, I don't really have a choice, I mean, you know, I could look at the bright side, I get two birthday parties and two birthday cakes.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, actually just one birthday flan.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: chandler
Lines: It's a traditional Mexican custard dessert...Look talk to Monica, she's on the food committee.

Name: chandler
Lines: Joey, Joey. Hey, some girl just walked up to me and said, 'I want you Dennis,' and stuck her tounge down my throat. I love this party.

Name: joey
Lines: Quick volleyball question.

Name: chandler
Lines: Volleyball.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, we set up a court in your room. Uh, you didn't really like that grey lamp, did you?

Name: chandler
Lines: Joey, a woman just stuck her tounge down my throat, I'm not even listening to you.

Name: chandler
Lines: Ok, that's me. [runs back]

Name: rachel
Lines: Listen honey, can you keep dad occupied, I'm gonna go talk to mom for a while.

Name: ross
Lines: Ok, do you have any ideas for any openers?

Name: rachel
Lines: Uhh, let's just stay clear of 'I'm the guy that's doing you daughter' and you should be ok.

Name: monica
Lines: Ok people, I want you to take a piece of paper, here you go, and write down your most embarassing memory. Oh, and I do ask that when you're not using the markers, you put the caps back on them because they will dry out.

Name: ross
Lines: Hi Dr. Greene. So, uh, how's everything in the uh, vascular surgery....game?

Name: ross
Lines: I'm sorry. See that's the good thing about my job. All the dinosaurs on my table are already dead.

Name: monica
Lines: Listen you guys, I don't mean to be a pain about this but, um, I've noticed that some of you are just placing them on. You wanna push the caps until you hear them click. [she demonstrates, Gunther starts to walk to the door] Gunther, where're you going?

Name: monica
Lines: No. No you can't go. No this is fun. Come on we're just getting started. Here, here's your marker.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Listen if you wanna go, just go.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Alright, I can get you out.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Shh. In a minute, I'm gonna create a diversion. When I do, walk quickly to the door and don't look back.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, here, I, I'll get it for ya. Whad'ya want?

Name: ross
Lines: Scotch. Alright, I'll be back in 10 seconds with your scotch on the rocks in a glass.

Name: ross
Lines: Cool.

Name: ross
Lines: I know.

Name: ross
Lines: Hi. Uh, I have been in the bathroom. Stay clear of the salmon mousse.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, mine too. Isn't that neat, scotch neat. Would you excuse me? [walks out in the hallway, Mr. Greene is walking out of Chandler and Joey's apartment] Hey, hey, where you uh, sneakin off to mister?

Name: ross
Lines: No. no.

Name: ross
Lines: No, um, see 'cause that, that is, that is the staging area. If you go in there, it'll ruin the whole illusion of the party. Yeah, I think you take your scotch back in there and I will get your cigarettes for you sir.

Name: ross
Lines: All righty roo. [closes the door] What a great moment to say that for the first time. [goes to get the cigarettes and glasses]

Name: monica
Lines: Ok, the first person's most embarassing memory is, 'Monica, your party sucks.' Very funny.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh no, ooh, ooh, did somebody forget to use a coaster?

Name: monica
Lines: What? [she runs over to where Phoebe is, Phoebe signals for Gunther to go] I don't see anything.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Great, I'm seeing water rings again.

Name: ross
Lines: Mine.

Name: ross
Lines: Um-hmm. [puts them on] I have a condition, apparently, that I require two different sets of focals.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well those are very popular frames.

Name: ross
Lines: Neil Sedaka wears them.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, like a chimney.

Name: ross
Lines: Ohh, big smoker. [Packs the cigarettes and flings one on Mrs. Greene in the process. Finally gets one in his mouth and it look really out of place] Big big smoker. In fact I'm gonna go ou into the hallway and fire up this bad boy. [as he walks into the hall, he comes face to face with Mr. Greene]

Name: ross
Lines: Yes. [pulls them off and hands them to Mr. Greene] I was just warming up the earpieces for you.

Name: ross
Lines: [pulls the cigarette off his upper lip and hands it to Mr. Greene] Yeah, yes it is, I was just moistening the tip.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ok, ok, she's taking the trash out so I can get you out of here but it has to be now, she'll be back any minute.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, only the three of you, any more than that and she'll get suspicious.

Name: phoebe
Lines: There isn't time. You must leave everything. They'll take care of you next door.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Everything you've heard is true.

Name: monica
Lines: Could you guys please try to keep it down, we're trying to start a Boggle tournament.

Name: monica
Lines: You, and you, you're supposed to be at my party. And Gunther! What are you doing here?

Name: phoebe
Lines: [enters with the three people she got out] Ok, welcome to the fu-oh.

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Alright, I'm sorry but these people needed me. They work hard all week, it's Saturday night, they deserve to have a little fun. Go.

Name: monica
Lines: Ya know, my party is fun. I mean, maybe it's a little quieter, less obvious sorta fun but, you know, if people would just give it a chance... [volleyball hits her in the head from behind]

Name: rachel
Lines: You want me to see a therapist?

Name: rachel
Lines: Ok mom, you know what, fine, I'll make an appointment ok, but you know what, right now, I gotta go, I gotta go do a thing.

Name: rachel
Lines: Daddy, daddy, you know what, I really wanna hear more about this, I really do, but I just have, I just have to do a, some stuff.

Name: chandler
Lines: [running out of his apartment after a girl] Ok, ok, you can be shirts and I'll be skins. I'll be skins. [sits down beside Rachel] Hey, how you holdin' up there, tiger? Oh, sorry, when my parents were getting divorced I got a lot of tigers. Got a lot of champs, chiefs, sports, I even got a governor.

Name: rachel
Lines: This is it, isn't it? I mean, this is what my life is gonna be like. My mom there, my dad there. Thanksgiving, Christmas. She gets the house, he's in some condo my sister's gonna decorate with wicker. Oh, Chandler how did you get through this?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I relied on a carefully regimented program of denial and, and wetting the bed.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ya know, I just, so weird. I mean I was in there just listening to them bitch about each other and all I kept thinking about was the fourth of July.

Name: chandler
Lines: Becasue it reminded you of the way our forefathers used to bitch at each other?

Name: rachel
Lines: It's just this thing. Every year we would go out on my dad's boat and watch the fireworks. Mom always hated it because the ocean air made her hair all big. My sister Jill would be throwing up over the side and my dad would be upset becasue nobody was helping and then when we did help he would scream at us for doing it wrong. But then when the fireworks started, everybody just shut up, you know, and it'd get really cold, and we would all just sort of smush under this one blanket. It never occured to anybody to bring another one. And now it's just...

Name: chandler
Lines: I, I know. [Hugs her. Ross walks out and Chandler puts her in his arms.]

Name: monica
Lines: Ok, thanks for coming, I hope you guys had fun.

Name: monica
Lines: Ok will do. So glad you came.

Name: monica
Lines: Ok, let me go check. Your mom want's to say goodbye.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh ok.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ok.

Name: joey
Lines: Ahh, you drive safe.

Name: ross
Lines: I'm getting ready for the water skiing. [Mr. Greene opens the door which pulls Ross in] How are you doing?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, uh, Dr. Greene, where are you going?

Name: chandler
Lines: Sorry, we're on a major flan high.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh no, you're not supposed to be here. This is the staging area, you should, it's all wrong, you should leave, ya know, get out. [opens the door, the guys are right there] Or perhaps you'd like a creme d'menthe.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh all right, then I guess we're going back into the hallway.

Name: joey
Lines: Thanks for coming Mrs. Greene. [grabs her and kisses her to distract her. She goes limp in his arms. Mr. Greene leaves.] Well, ok, you take care.

Name: monica
Lines: Thank you.

Name: monica
Lines: Ok everybody, it's time for flan.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yup, get ready for the gelatenous fun.

Name: joey
Lines: Kinda looks like that stuff you get when you get a bad infection.

Name: monica
Lines: Ok, that's enough.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ok Rachel, make a special flan wish.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ok, I've got one. [blows out the candles. Somebody calls out 'heads up' and the volleyball lands in the flan] Wow, those things almost never come true.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ok, Chandler, Mon, there's only one bananna nut muffin left.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, I ordered mine first.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, but I'm, I'm so much faster...

Name: monica
Lines: Give it to me.

Name: chandler
Lines: No.

Name: monica
Lines: Give it to me.

Name: chandler
Lines: Ok, you can have it. [He licks it and offers it to her.]

Name: monica
Lines: [She grabs the coffee cup on the table and licks the rim.] There you go, enjoy your coffee.

Name: chandler
Lines: That was there when I got here. [Takes a bite of his muffin.]

Name: phoebe
Lines: [enters] Hey you guys, you will never guess who's coming to New York.

Name: monica
Lines: [Chandler tries to come back with a smart-ass remark but can't swallow the muffin.] Quick, Phoebe, tell us before he can swallow.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh ok, Ryan, that guy I went out with, who's in the Navy.

Name: rachel
Lines: You went out with a guy in the Navy?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I met him when I was playing guitar in Washington Square Park. Ryan threw in salt water taffy 'cause he didn't have any change.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, is that when you wrote salt water taffy man?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No. No, he is my submaring guy. He resurfaces like every couple years and we have the most amazing three days together. Only this time he's coming for two weeks. Two whole weeks, which means yay.

Name: rachel
Lines: So wait, this guy goes down for like two years at a time?

Name: monica
Lines: That'll teach you to lick my muffin.

Name: ross
Lines: [enters] Hiii.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh no, what happened?

Name: ross
Lines: Well, I just spoke to Carol. Ben's got the chicken pox.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, so if you haven't already had it, chances are you're gonna get it.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well I've had it.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, I've had it.

Name: monica
Lines: Had it.

Name: chandler
Lines: Had it.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, I've never had it, I feel so left out. [Sees a red bump on her arm.] Oh look!

Name: monica
Lines: Honey, you made the bed again. I told you, you don't have to do that. This isn't camp.

Name: monica
Lines: Baddest. Otherwise the song would be Fat Fat Leroy Brown.

Name: monica
Lines: Just waiting for you sweetie.

Name: monica
Lines: I'm sorry, I'm sorry. You know what, the way you did it was just fine.

Name: monica
Lines: If I tell you, you'll think I'm crazy.

Name: monica
Lines: Ok, you see, the tag shouldn't be at the top left corner, it should be at the bottom right corner.

Name: monica
Lines: I'm just easing you in.

Name: monica
Lines: Alright, you see these little flower blossoms? They should be facing up, not down, because, well, the head of the bed is where the sun would be. You don't love me any more do you.

Name: monica
Lines: Really? Wow, well then come on, I wanna show you how to fold the toilet paper into a point.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, look Joey, I'm just saying if you need something to hold you over, I can get you a job right here as an entry level processor.

Name: joey
Lines: But don't you need experience for a job like that?

Name: chandler
Lines: It's not that hard to learn. And as for people realizing you have no idea what you're doing, hey, you're an actor. Act like a processor, people will think you're a processor.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey thanks. Scott Alexander, Joey Tribbianni. Joey is a uh, fellow processor.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh yeah yeah. I process. People want the processing, I'm the one they call.

Name: joey
Lines: Uhh, well, right now I'm in between things. You know how it is. One day you're processing, the next day you're not so much... processing any more.

Name: chandler
Lines: I was just telling Joey about the opening in Fleischman's group.

Name: joey
Lines: Ha-ha. [Scott leaves] Are all you processors dorks?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, this lipstick looks just great on you.

Name: monica
Lines: You look fabulous honey, you really do.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah? Are you sure, really. [She picks up a mirror and sees the white splotches all over her face.]

Name: rachel
Lines: You see, you look beautiful. For god sakes, dim the lights.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I, I, I'm hideous.

Name: monica
Lines: It's gonna be ok. Ryan's been under water. He's just gonna be so glad that you don't have barnicles on your butt.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Come in.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey Ryan, what's up?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, no no, you have to stay back. I, I have the pox.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Chicken. Which is so ironic considering I'm a vegetarian.

Name: phoebe
Lines: 'Cause my, my grandmother's never had chicken pox. Please, please tell me you have, 'cause oh my God, I forgot how cute you are.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ohh, ohh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, or you know, you could just wish that I didn't have them now.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Nope. You don't want to see a face covered with pox.

Name: phoebe
Lines: And you hate fish. Oh. That's so sweet, alright. Ok, alright, you can see. This is me... [she unveils herself right as a huge lightning bolt crashes outside. Ryan screams in terror.] Oh, I am scary.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I hate this. 'Cause I tell you, I had the most amazing two weeks planned for us, and almost everything I had in mind, we had to be a lot closer than this.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ok, this is the most romantic disease I've ever had.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, how's the first day goin'?

Name: joey
Lines: Pretty good. It's like you said. It's mostly just putting numbers from one column into another column.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well there you go.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey and everbody is so nice. I just had a good talk with that lady with the red hair, Jeannie.

Name: chandler
Lines: Jeannie, the head of east coast operations Jeannie?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, turns out our kids go to the same school. Small world huh?

Name: chandler
Lines: Weird world. Your kids?

Name: joey
Lines: I figure my character has kids.

Name: chandler
Lines: Ya know there isn't a part of that sentence I don't need explained.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, see when you're acting you need to think about stuff like that. My character, Joseph the processor guy, has two little girls, Ashley and Brittany. Ashley copies everything Brittany does.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, invisible kids can be that way sometimes.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah. Joseph and his wife, Karen, are thinking of having a third kid... Ya know what? Just did.

Name: chandler
Lines: Really? Wow. That's some pretty powerful imaginary sperm you must have there.

Name: phoebe
Lines: That you don't stop talking about it.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Let's just play, ok. Good, ok. [She picks up the dice.] Here we go, double sixes, here we go... [She starts to rub the dice all over herself.] Here we go, come to mama, just getting ready to roll the dice...

Name: phoebe
Lines: No. This is what I do for luck, ok.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No. Here. [Throws them on the table.] There. Ooh, double sixes.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uhh, I can't stop thinking about it. It's just so hard. I just wanna grab all these houses and rub 'em all over my body. [Grabs a handful of the houses.]

Name: phoebe
Lines: Give it.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, come on. You know you want it, you know you want it too, come on. Let's just be bad, it'll feel so good. [She starts scratching him.]

Name: phoebe
Lines: Now do me, do my back. Oh come on, harder.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, stop that, stop that right now.

Name: ross
Lines: You know, I might have expected this of you Phoebe, but Ryan, you're a military man.

Name: joey
Lines: You and Milton have to join us on the boat. Karen'll pack a lunch, you'll bring the kids, we'll make a day of it.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, thanks, thanks. Bye bye Jeannie.

Name: joey
Lines: What a phony.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I'm sure you'll teach her a lesson when she steps off the dock onto nothing. Hey Mr. Douglas.

Name: joey
Lines: Sir.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well the people in my group wanna spend the holiday weekend with their families.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah Bing, what's that about?

Name: chandler
Lines: It's about cutting my people a little slack, ya know, for morale. Look, if you wanna see some rough numbers, I can get them to you by Wednesday.

Name: joey
Lines: This company was not built on rough numbers. Am I right Mr. Douglas.

Name: chandler
Lines: Uh, if you say so sir.

Name: joey
Lines: Joseph's good, isn't he?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I'm going to kill you.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, hey, I just figure Joseph's the kinda guy that likes to mix it up. Ya know, get in there, ruffle some feathers.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why?

Name: joey
Lines: Look, I'm sorry but that's what Joseph does, ok. If you try to pull somethin', he'll call you on it. 'What're you tryin' to pull,' he'll say.

Name: monica
Lines: This is for the scratchy twins out there. I taped oven mits to their hands.

Name: monica
Lines: It's for their own good.

Name: monica
Lines: Exactly. Oh, I love that I can be totally neurotic around you now. Tell me the truth. Don't you like it better now that everything on your desk is perpendicular?

Name: monica
Lines: Very good.

Name: monica
Lines: You know what. Tomorrow I'm gonna do your clocks.

Name: monica
Lines: I'm gonna set them to my time.

Name: monica
Lines: No no. See, in my bedroom I set my clock six minutes fast. You wanna know why?

Name: monica
Lines: No forget it, I'm not gonna tell you now.

Name: monica
Lines: No. See you don't understand.

Name: monica
Lines: No. You don't have any of these cute little obsessive things.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: Alright, well tell me one of yours.

Name: monica
Lines: What if they get mixed up?

Name: monica
Lines: You would not. I can't believe this. I hate this, you're too normal. I can't believe my boyfriend doesn't have a thing. My boyfriend doesn't have a thing.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey. Mr. Douglas is looking for you.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why? Wh- wh- why is Mr. Douglas looking for me?

Name: joey
Lines: 'Cause he has a strong suspicion that you dropped the ball on the Lender project.

Name: chandler
Lines: Wha- wh- why, why, why does he suspect that?

Name: joey
Lines: Becasue at first he thought it was Joseph. But after he asked Joseph about it, turns out it was you. Anyway, I just thought you should know.

Name: chandler
Lines: Alright, that's it. Look Joey, I'm sorry, I realize this is the role of a lifetime for ya, and if I could just fire Joseph, I would, but unfortunately that's not possible so I'm gonna have to let both of you go.

Name: joey
Lines: What're you talking about, everybody loves Joseph.

Name: chandler
Lines: I don't, I hate Joseph, ok. I think he's a brown-nosing suck up.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh yeah. Well you can't fire Joseph. You know why, 'cause he's not in your department.

Name: chandler
Lines: Alright, ok, alright. So I can't fire Joseph but uh, I can sleep with his wife.

Name: joey
Lines: Karen.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, Karen. I'm thinking about having an affair with her. Oh, you know what? I just did.

Name: joey
Lines: Ahh. What the hell are you doing to me man.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh well it's not me, it's my character, Chandy. Yeah the rogue processor who seduces his co-worker's wives for sport and then laughs about it the next day at the water cooler. In fact, I have her panties right there in my drawer.

Name: joey
Lines: Really?

Name: chandler
Lines: No freakshow, she's fictional.

Name: joey
Lines: Take it easy. If it means that much to you, I'll uh, I'll go find something else.

Name: chandler
Lines: Thank you.

Name: joey
Lines: It's just that, I, I'm gonna miss Joseph. I liked him. His wife, she was hot. [Chadler pushes him out the door by the face.]

Name: phoebe
Lines: Can I please take these off? I swear I won't scratch.

Name: rachel
Lines: No sorry hon, Monica's orders.

Name: ross
Lines: Ok, dinner's on.

Name: rachel
Lines: And there's a peach cobbler warming in the oven so the plate's gonna be hot but that shouldn't be a problem for you.

Name: ross
Lines: Alright you kids, bye now.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh look, a low budget puppet show.

Name: phoebe
Lines: It's such a shame you can't see which finger I'm holding up.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Please. [Ryan pulls the cork with his teeth and spits it into Phoebe's mits.]

Name: phoebe
Lines: I got it. [Wipes it up with her mits.]

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You know what, that's it, that's it. [She rips off the mits, Ryan follows her lead.]

Name: monica
Lines: What's up?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah?

Name: monica
Lines: No honey. You have to sleep on this side of the bed because I have to sleep on this side of the bed.

Name: monica
Lines: No. Big deal, so you have a side of the bed, everybody has a side of the bed.

Name: monica
Lines: Alright, go on.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God, you're a freak.

Name: rachel
Lines: So uh, Ryan, were you shipping off to?

Name: ross
Lines: So do you have like any nuclear weapons on board?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well do you get to look through one of those like, those periscope thingys.

Name: ross
Lines: Wow, it, it's neat learning about submarines.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ok, I'll walk you out.

Name: ross
Lines: Bye Ryan.

Name: rachel
Lines: It was nice to meet you.

Name: rachel
Lines: So do you uh, think we can get you one of those uh, uniform things?

Whenever I would see him I was always think y'know ‘You’re the reason, you are the reason why their not together.’ and I hated that guy. And it didn’t matter how nice he was, or how happy he made my Dad.

Lines: Hi-hi, I’m Joey.

Lines: Hi, I’m Chandler.

Lines: Come on guys! Let’s go! Come on, it’s second down.

Lines: It just amazes me that your still pulling stuff like this.

Lines: Y'know, I was thinking about ah, asking her for her number.

Lines: Thanks man, but I think it makes a stronger statement if I ask for it myself, y'know.

Name: chandler
Lines: Whoa-ho, whoa! No, I was thinking about y'know for me, as a part of that whole getting over Janice thing you were talking about.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, yeah, that. All right, means that much to ya, I’ll let you have her.

Name: chandler
Lines: Thanks. What, let me have her?! What do mean? Like if you didn’t I wouldn’t have a shot?

Name: joey
Lines: Well I don’t like to say it out loud, but, yeah! Don’t feel bad man, we all have our strengths. You’re better with numbers and stuff.

Name: chandler
Lines: Math!! You’re giving me math! All right, look y'know what, forget about it, you go for the girl, we’ll see who gets her.

Lines: Chandler, I want you to run a post pattern to the left, okay. And sweetie..

Lines: Yeah, I know, go long. Y'know, it’s like all I’m doing is running back and forth from the huddle.

Lines: Yeah.

Lines: Okay. Hut! Hike!

Name: joey
Lines: Fumble!

Name: joey
Lines: What the hell’s the matter with you?! This is my favourite jersey.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well now you have two. Hey, I am good at math.

Name: joey
Lines: All right, that’s it. Y'know I was still gonna let you have her. But now, forget about it. Prepare to feel very bad about yourself.

Lines: Hey! Well, I’ve been preparing for that my entire life! Or something about you that’s mean!

Name: monica
Lines: All right, come on guys, let’s go! Tie score, and we’re runnin’ out of time. Forty-two!! Thirty-eight!! Hike!

Lines: Oh I got it!!  Oh! Ew! Broken boob! Ow!

Lines: After!!

Lines: Before!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Now, does it really matter?

Lines: Well, okay, I made a touchdown. It was my first touchdown. So?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh Pheebs, that’s great. It doesn’t count.

Lines: Cheater, cheater, compulsive eater.

Lines: Oh my God!

Lines: Y'know what, that’s fine, maybe you haven’t grown up, but I have.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh-ho, okay.

Name: ross
Lines: Ow! Ow! Okay, okay, fine, fine! All right, you wanna win by cheating, go ahead, all right. Phoebe the touchdown does count, you win.

Lines: Woo-yay!!

Name: monica
Lines: No! Listen, I’m not gonna go through this with you again, okay. Just once I wanna beat when you can’t blame it on the broken nose, the buzzer, or the fact that you thought you were getting mono. Let’s just call this, tie score and it’s halftime.

Lines: Okay, first of all, I don’t play with cheaters, and second of all, you know I had swollen glands!!

Lines: When Mom and Dad drove you to the hospital to get your nose fixed, I swam into the lake and fished it out.

Lines: Come on Phoebe, let’s go! Come on, it’s time to get serious, huddle up. Joey, keep your head in the game.

Lines: Hi.

Lines: I love this game!!

Lines: Forty-two to twenty-one! Like the turkey, Ross is done!

Lines: It’s no surprise that your winning, ‘cause you got to pick first, so you got the better team.

Lines: No ah, hold on a second Joe, where do Dutch people come from?

Lines: Yes!!

Lines: You hear that! That is her chose, mister I’ll let you have her! I win! You suck! I rule all! A mini-wave in celebration of me!!

Lines: Nice going. You just saved yourself a couple months of sex.

Lines: Y'know what, it doesn’t matter, ‘cause she picked me. Me! From now on I get the dates and you have to stay home on Saturday nights watching Ready, Set, Cook!

Lines: Save the breakthroughs for therapy, okay. The clock is ticking. We have no time, and we are losing, we are losing to girls.

Lines: This sucks, I was just up by that much!

Lines: Are we playing football or what? Come on you hairy-backed Marries.

Lines: We have to do this. We are playing for women everywhere. Okay, just think about every lousy date that you ever had, okay, every guy who kept on the TV while you’re making out...

Lines: God, I’m not lame, okay. I can do something. I can throw, would you let me throw, come on this is my game too.

Lines: All right Rachel, you sweep behind, I’ll pitch it to you, you throw it down field to Phoebe. All right. Break.

Lines: Guys! Guys! Come on! It’s Thanksgiving, it’s not important who wins or loses. The important thing is,  the Dutch girl picked me! Me! Not you! Holland loves Chandler! Thank you, Amsterdam! Good night!!

Lines: Eh..., I don’t, I don’t know.

Lines: Well, as old as he is in dog years, do you think Snoopy should still be allowed to fly this thing?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Lines: Oh, sure! Do you need me to train somebody new?

Name: rachel

Lines: Well, I’m gonna go see her. I want to bring her something, what do you think she’ll like?

Lines: I’m gonna get back to retraining.

Lines: Look out kids, he’s coming!

Lines: And I gotta go sell some Christmas trees.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Have fun. Oh wait, no, don’t! I forgot I am totally against that now.

Name: joey
Lines: What? Me having a job?

Lines: No, no, I am against innocent trees being cut down in their prime, and their, their corpses grotesquely dressed in like tinsel and twinkly lights.  Hey, how do you sleep at night?

Name: joey
Lines: Well, I’m pretty tired from lugging the trees around all day. Hey, Phoebe listen, you got this all wrong. Those trees were born to be Christmas trees, their fulfilling their life purpose, by, by making people happy.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes. Yes, and ah, ah, the trees are happy too, because for most of them, it’s the only chance to see New York.

Name: rachel
Lines: Gunther, Gunther, please, I’ve worked here for two and a half years, I know the empty trays go over there.

Name: rachel
Lines: Huh. Well, y'know that’s actually a really good idea, because that way they’ll be closer to the mugs. Y'know what, you should have the other waitresses do that too.

Name: rachel
Lines: Gee, I always heard them talk about that, I just always thought that it was a club they went to. Oh God, I’m, I’m sorry.

Name: ross
Lines: So, this must be kinda neat for ya, huh? I mean, your Dad tells me that you get a couple of days off school, and you, you ah, don’t have to sell those cookies anymore.

Name: ross
Lines: Wow, you ah, you really like all this space stuff, huh?

Name: ross
Lines: I think you would have to clean a whole lot of apartments to go all the way to India.

Name: ross
Lines: Huh. Well, good luck to Dad. Say, how many more boxes would you have to sell in order to win?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Lines: Four hundred, huh? Well, that sounds do-able.  How much are the boxes?

Name: ross
Lines: And what is second prize?

Name: ross
Lines: Well, that makes sense.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, Sarah, anything.

Name: ross
Lines: Hi, I’m selling Brown Bird cookies.

Name: ross
Lines: No, hi, I’m, I’m an honorary Brown Bird

Name: ross
Lines: Ah, well, it means that I can sell cookies, but I’m not invited to sleep-overs.

Name: ross
Lines: No, please, please, um, it’s for a poor little girl who wants to go to Spacecamp more than anything in the world.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, okay! I’m going. I’m going.

Name: ross
Lines: All right!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey. What, what are you doing here?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, I-I thought a lot about what you said, and um, I realilized duh, all right maybe I was a little judgmental. Yeah,  oh, but oh...

Name: joey
Lines: Look now, Phoebe remember, hey, their just fulfilling their Christmas....

Name: phoebe
Lines: Destiny.

Name: joey
Lines: Sure.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes.

Name: joey
Lines: All right.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.  Yikes! That one doesn’t look very fulfilled.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, that’s, that’s ah, one of the old ones, he’s just taking it to the back.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You keep the old ones in the back, that is so ageist.

Name: joey
Lines: Well we have to make room for the fresh ones.

Name: phoebe
Lines: So, what happens to the old guys?

Name: joey
Lines: Well, they go into the chipper.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Why, do I have a feeling that’s not as happy as it sounds?

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: ross
Lines: ...and these come in the shapes of your favourite Christmas characters, Santa, Rudolph, and Baby Jesus.

Name: joey
Lines: All right, I’ll take a box of the cream filled Jesus’s.

Name: ross
Lines: Wait a minute, one box! Come on, I’m trying to send a little girl to Spacecamp, I’m putting you down for five boxes. Chandler, what about you?

Name: chandler
Lines: Ahh, do you have any coconut flavoured deities?

Name: ross
Lines: No, but ah, there’s coconut in the Hanukkah Menoreoes. I tell you what, I’ll put you down for eight boxes, one for each night.

Name: ross
Lines: Mon?

Name: monica
Lines: All right, I’ll take one box of the mint treasures, just one, and that’s it. I-I started gaining weight after I joined the Brown Birds.  Remember, how Dad bought all my boxes and I ate them all?

Name: ross
Lines: Ah, no Mon, Dad had to buy everyone of your boxes because you ate them all. But ah, y'know I’m sure that’s not gonna happen this time, why don’t I put you down for three of the mint treasures and just a couple of the Rudolph’s.

Name: monica
Lines: No.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, come on, now you know you want ‘em.

Name: monica
Lines: Don’t, don’t, don’t, don’t, don’t do this.

Name: ross
Lines: I’ll tell you what Mon, I’ll give you the first box for free.

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: ross
Lines: Come on! All the cool kids are eating ‘em!

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m training to be better at a job that I hate, my life officially sucks.

Name: joey
Lines: Look Rach, wasn’t this supposed to a temporary thing? I thought you wanted to do fashion stuff?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, yeah! I’m still pursuing that.

Name: chandler
Lines: How... exactly are you pursuing that? Y'know other than sending out resumes like what, two years ago?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, I’m also sending out.... good thoughts.

Name: joey
Lines: If you ask me, as long as you got this job, you’ve got nothing pushing you to get another one. You need the fear.

Name: rachel
Lines: The fear?

Name: chandler
Lines: He’s right, if you quit this job, you then have motivation to go after a job you really want.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well then how come you’re still at a job that you hate, I mean why don’t you quit and get ‘the fear’?

Name: chandler
Lines: Because, I’m too afraid.

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t know, I mean I would give anything to work for a designer, y'know, or a buyer.... Oh, I just don’t want to be 30 and still work here.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, that’d be much worse than being 28, and still working here.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: Can’t I just look at the handles on them?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, fine. Gunther, y'know what, I am a terrible waitress, do you know why I’m a terrible waitress? Because, I don’t care. I don’t care. I don’t care which pot is regular and which pot is decaf, I don’t care where the tray spot is, I just don’t care, this is not what I want to do. So I don’t think I should do it anymore. I’m gonna give you my weeks notice.

Name: rachel
Lines: Gunther, I quit.

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Lines: I spelled out boobies.

Lines: Ross, but me down for another box of the mint treasures, okay. Where, where are the mint treasures?

Lines: Ah, we’re out. I sold them all.

Name: monica
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: Monica, I’m cutting you off.

Name: monica
Lines: No. No, just, just, just a couple more boxes. It-it-it’s no big deal, all right, I’m-I’m cool. You gotta help me out with a couple more boxes!

Lines: Mon, look at yourself. You have cookie on your neck.

Lines: NA

Lines: Oh my God, how did you do that?

Lines: Okay, stop what you’re doing, I need envelope stuffers, I need stamp lickers.....

Lines: Me! On my computer.

Lines: Well you sure used a large font.

Lines: Eh, yeah, well ah, waitress at a coffee shop and cheer squad co-captain only took up so much room.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey-hey-hey that’s funny! Your funny Chandler! Your a funny guy! You wanna know what else is really funny?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Something else I might have said?

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t know, I don’t know, weren’t you the guy that told me to quit my job when I had absolutely nothing else to do. Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha!!

Name: ross
Lines: Sweetie, calm down, it’s gonna be okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: No, it’s not gonna be okay Ross, tomorrow is my last day, and I don’t have a lead. Okay, y'know what, I’m just gonna, I’m just gonna call Gunther and I’m gonna tell him, I’m not quitting.

Name: chandler
Lines: You-you-you don’t wanna give into the fear.

Name: rachel
Lines: You and your stupid fear. I hate your fear. I would like to take you and your fear....

Lines: Hey! I got great news!

Name: chandler
Lines: Run, Joey! Run for your life!

Lines: What? Rachel, listen, have you ever heard of Fortunata Fashions?

Name: rachel
Lines: No.

Name: joey
Lines: Well my old man is doing a plumbing job down there and he heard they have an opening. So, you want me to see if I can get you an interview?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! Yes, I would love that, oh, that is soo sweet, Joey.

Name: joey
Lines: Not a problem.

Name: rachel

Lines: Well, before we answer that, I think we should address the more important question. How dumb are you?

Lines: I’m sorry, okay, I’m sorry. I wa-I was disgusted with myself, and this morning I was so, I was so upset and then I got your message and I was so happy, and all I wanted was to get her out of my apartment as fast as possible.

Name: rachel
Lines: Whoa!! Whoa, whoa, wait a minute. What time did your little friend leave?  Oh my God. She was there? She was still there? She was in there, when I was in there?!

Name: ross
Lines: Listen. Oh hey, hey, the important thing was that she meant, she meant nothing to me!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, that is so sweet. I think I’m falling in love with you all over again.

Name: chandler
Lines: Y'know what, I think we can go out there. I mean they have more important things to worry about.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, we’ll be fine.

Name: ross

Lines: Wax the door shut, we’re never leaving, ever.

Lines: Hi, it’s Phoebe. Listen someone’s gonna have to take my 9:00 with Mr. Rehack, ‘cause it’s like 9:15 now, and I’m not there.

Name: ross
Lines: Don’t you realise none of this would’ve ever happened if I didn’t think at that same moment you weren’t having sex with Mark?

Name: rachel

Name: ross
Lines: La-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la! Okay, okay, yeah, I would have been devastated but, I would still want to be with you. Because it’s, I mean it’s you.

Lines: What? Come on Rach, tell me what you’re thinking?

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m thinking, I’m gonna order a pizza.

Lines: Because that would be crazy?

Name: rachel

Lines: You can have the last piece, if you want.

Lines: Well, I should think so. You slept with someone.

Lines: They’re gonna get through this, aren’t they?

Lines: Yeah, come on, it’s Ross and Rachel, they’ve got too.

Lines: What if they don’t?

Name: chandler

Name: joey
Lines: Well y'know, I’ve been walking the same way since high school. Y'know, y'know how some guys they walk into a room and everybody takes notice. I think I need a ‘take notice’ walk.

Name: chandler
Lines: Are you actually saying these words?

Name: ross
Lines: What, now you’re not even taking to me?  Look Rachel, I-I’m sorry, okay, I’m sorry, I was out of my mind. I thought I’d lost you, I didn’t know what to do. Come on! Come on, how insane must I have been to do something like this? Huh? I-I don’t cheat right, I, that’s not me, I’m not Joey!

Name: joey
Lines: Whoa-ho-ho!  Yeah, okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey. It’s three in the morning. They don’t know that I’ve come home yet. You notice how neither one of them are wondering where I am.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, y'know, people can be so self-involved.

Name: ross
Lines: Y'know what, y'know what, I’m-I’m not the one that wanted that, that break, okay. You’re the one that bailed on us. You’re the one that, that ran when things got just a little rough!

Name: rachel
Lines: That’s....

Name: ross
Lines: That’s what?!

Name: rachel
Lines: That is neither here nor there.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, well here we are. Now we’re in a tough spot again, Rach. What do you want to do? How do you want to handle it? Huh? Do you wanna fight for us? Or, do you wanna bail?  I just can’t see us throwing away something we know is so damn good. Rachel, I love you so much.

Name: rachel
Lines: No Ross!!  Don’t! You can’t just kiss me and think you’re gonna make it all go away, okay? It doesn’t work that way. It doesn’t just make it better. Okay?

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, okay, okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: I think you should go.

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: rachel

Lines: You can’t say that!! You-you don’t know!! I mean I thought I was gonna pass out from the pain! Anyway I-I tried, but I-I couldn’t...bend that way. So...

Name: joey
Lines: That’s right I stepped up! She’s my friend and she needed help! And if I had too, I’d pee on anyone of you! Only, uhh, I couldn’t. I got the stage fright. I wanted to help, but there was too much pressure. So-so I uh, I turned to Chandler.

Name: chandler
Lines: Joey kept screaming at me, “Do it now! Do it!! Do it! Do it now!!” Sometimes late at night I can still here the screaming.

Name: joey
Lines: That’s ‘cause sometimes I just do it through my wall to freak you out.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Except for you. You go away.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, bye.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No.

Lines: But, it’s not like we’re losing anything. Y'know?

Lines: It’s not like we-we know each other or anything. Or that have anything in common.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I-I like pizza!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God, so do I!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wait-wait-wait, wait! Puppies. Cute or ugly?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh, well! But umm, still I’m-I’m mad at you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well umm, do you wanna get something to eat? I’m kinda hungry.

Name: phoebe
Lines: All right, stop it. Now you’re just doing it to freak me out.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh-hooo, I missed you.

Name: ross
Lines: I missed you too.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ooh, I was soo nervous about that letter. But the way you owned up to everything, it just showed me how much you’ve grown. Y'know?

Name: ross
Lines: I suppose.

Name: rachel
Lines: You have! Ross, you should give yourself credit. I mean my Mom never thought this would work out. It was all, “Once a cheater, always a cheater.”

Name: ross
Lines: Umm-hmm.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ooh, I just wish we hadn’t lost those four months, but if time was what you needed just to gain a little perspective...

Name: ross
Lines: WE WERE ON A BREAK!!!!!!!

Name: chandler
Lines: Coffee house?

Name: monica
Lines: You bet.

Name: ross
Lines: And for the record, it took two people to break up this relationship!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah! You and that girl from that copy place, which yesterday you took full responsibility for!!

Name: ross
Lines: I didn’t know what I was taking full responsibility for! Okay?! I didn’t finish the whole letter!

Name: rachel
Lines: What?!!

Name: ross
Lines: I fell asleep!

Name: rachel
Lines: You fell asleep?!

Name: ross
Lines: It was 5:30 in the morning, and you had rambled on for 18 pages. Front and back!!  Oh-oh-oh, and by the way, Y-O-U-apostrophe-R-E means ‘you are,’ Y-O-U-R means ‘your!’

Name: rachel
Lines: Y'know I can’t believe I even thought about getting back together again! We are so over!!

Name: ross
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, oh, and hey-hey-hey, those little spelling tips will come in handy when you’re at home on Saturday nights playing Scrabble with Monica!!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey!!

Name: rachel
Lines: I just feel bad about all that sleep you’re gonna miss wishing you were with me!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, no-no-no don’t you worry about me falling asleep. I still have your letter!!!

Name: rachel
Lines: And hey! Just so you know, it’s not that common! It doesn’t happen to every guy! And it is a big deal!!

Name: chandler
Lines: I KNEW IT!!!!

Name: monica
Lines: Gin.

Lines: We were playing Gin? Y'know if we were a couple, we could play this game naked.

Name: monica
Lines: Will you stop!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay. All right.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, all right, I think you’re great, I think you’re sweet, and you’re smart, and I love you. But you will always be the guy who peed on me.

Name: joey
Lines: How many times do I have to tell you! Ya, turn and sliiiide! Y'know, turn and slide.

Lines: Yesss!!

Lines: Who’s Chip?

Name: monica
Lines: Shhh!

Lines: Let it go!!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey!

Lines: Umm, when were you gonna tell me that you’re going out with Chip Matthews?

Lines: Okay, that doesn’t help me, because we went to the same high school.

Name: monica
Lines: You went to one where you were popular, and you got to ride off Chip’s motorcycle, and wear his letterman jacket. I went to one where I wore a band uniform they had to have specially made.

Name: monica

Name: monica
Lines: Back then, I thought that I would never, ever get the chance to go out with a Chip Matthews, and now he’s-he’s called me up and asked me out. And the fat girl inside of me really wants to go. I-I owe her this. I never let her eat.

Lines: Oh, you go out with him.
