Name: chandler
Lines: [to Kathy] Goodnight.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, uh, yeah... I just knew that sometimes when you're writing, you... you don't always know the exact time.

Name: chandler
Lines: Uh, the book?

Name: chandler
Lines: What do you mean?

Name: chandler
Lines: Uhl..ell. By the way, in case you missed that, that sound was, \Uhl

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, yeah, he's my... he's my best friend.

Name: chandler
Lines: Goodnight.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, that coupon expires, you know.

Name: monica
Lines: Hi. Uh, you... you don't know me, I'm Monica Geller... Ross's sister.

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah. Anyway, he told me about your apartment. And, um, I couldn't sleep, thinking about it. So, uh, would it be okay if I cleaned it?

Name: monica
Lines: No?

Name: chandler
Lines: I just walked in the bathroom and saw Kathy naked! It was like torture!

Name: ross
Lines: Y'know if we ever go to war and you’re captured, you’re in for a big surprise.

Name: chandler
Lines: It just keeps getting worse and worse! Y'know? I mean it’s bad enough that I’m in love with my roommates girlfriend—which by the way, I think she knows. Because every time we’re in the room together there’s this weird like energy between us. And call me crazy, but I think she likes me too. And now I have seen her naked. I mean at least when I’ve seen her with clothes on, I could imagine her body was like covered in boles or something. But there are no boles, she’s smooth! Smooth!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wow! Could everyone totally see up his robe?

Name: joey
Lines: Great! All right, so I’ll call you later.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey-Hey-Hey! Who was that?

Name: joey
Lines: That would be Casey. We’re going out tonight.

Name: chandler
Lines: Goin’ out, huh? Wow! Wow!  So things didn’t work out with Kathy, huh? Bummer.

Name: joey
Lines: No, things are fine with Kathy. I’m having a late dinner with her tonight, right after my early dinner with Casey.

Name: chandler
Lines: What?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah-yeah. And the craziest thing is that I just ate a whole pizza by myself!

Name: chandler
Lines: Wait! You’re going out with Kathy!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah. Why are you getting so upset?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I’m upset—for you. I mean, having sex with an endless line of beautiful women must be very unfulfilling for you.

Name: joey
Lines: What is the big deal? It’s not like we’re exclusive.

Name: chandler
Lines: Look, Joey, Kathy is clearly not fulfilling your emotional needs. But Casey, I mean granted I only saw the back of her head, but I got this sense that she’s-she’s smart, and funny, and gets you.

Name: joey
Lines: You got all that from the back of her head?

Name: chandler
Lines: All right look, I think it’s time for you to settle down. Y'know? Make a choice, pick a lane.

Name: joey
Lines: Who’s Elaine?

Name: phoebe
Lines: \Little

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, you could just go uh, \greatest of ease…  BAH-bah-bha-bhannn.\" Then go right into it."

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, ooh, I like that! Yeah. Wait! How do you know about ‘bah-bah-bha-bhan?’

Name: ross
Lines: Well umm, y’know, I used to play.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh yeah, that’s right, the keyboards, huh?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, just a little in high school, but then I really got into it in college. I mean that’s-that’s when I really found my sound.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh God! Orange juice just came out of my nose, but it was totally worth it. Oh my God, I completely forgot about your sound.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: He used to lock himself in the basement for hours. No one was every allowed to hear, \The Sound.\"

Name: phoebe
Lines: I wanna hear \The Sound.\"

Name: ross
Lines: Really? No. I mean, nah, I haven’t played in so long, and-and, well it’s-it’s really personal stuff, y’know?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Come on, play that funky music white boy.

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah!

Name: ross
Lines: No, you guys, I mean my keyboards are all the way up in—No, yeah, okay.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, guys.

Name: chandler
Lines: All right! Bring it on, you…

Name: ross
Lines: Here we go.  Y’know, umm, you should-you should think of umm, my work as wordless sound poems. That’s what I’m…

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh my God! Play!

Name: monica
Lines: Boy, that was-that was, umm… terrific.

Name: chandler
Lines: Really, bitchin’!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wow, it was so—wow!

Name: ross
Lines: Really?! I mean, really?!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, I mean, you should play in public!

Name: ross
Lines: Wow! Thanks, you guys. That’s uh—ohhh, I wanna, I wanna play you another piece! Umm! Uh-oh! I left my uh, helicopter sounds on another disk. I’ll be right back! Okay?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh God bless my dad sound proofing the basement!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, I can’t believe I ever let him touch me with those fingers.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What are you guys talking about, I loved it! It was soo moving. Oh, plus it’s just, it’s so different from the stuff you usually hear.

Name: chandler
Lines: You mean like, music?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I know what you’re thinkin’! Yes, yes, your breasts are just as firm and juicy.

Name: chandler
Lines: Come in!

Name: chandler
Lines: Uh yes, but uh, I just watch it for the articles.

Name: chandler
Lines: No-no, he’s not back yet, but he’ll be here any minute. So uh, come on in. Have a seat. Bow or stern?

Name: chandler
Lines: I like it in the stern.  Hello.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, it’s me. Listen Casey and I were on our way back and had a little car trouble.

Name: chandler
Lines: What happened?

Name: joey
Lines: We broke down on the Parkway, so I have to walk back and get some transmission fluid. And hey, listen could you please tell Kathy that I’ll be there as soon as I can.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why can’t you tell her?

Name: joey
Lines: ‘Cause I only have one quarter, and I think my time is about to—

Name: chandler
Lines: Joey! Joey!!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah?

Name: chandler
Lines: I thought your time ran out.

Name: joey
Lines: Me too, but I guess I do have a couple of more—

Name: chandler
Lines: Uhh, that was Joey. He’s running a little late, he says he’s sorry.

Name: chandler
Lines: So I guess it’s just uh, you and me then.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I think it is!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, I had an appointment to get my haircut…

Name: chandler
Lines: …and then it got canceled.

Name: chandler
Lines: Really?! You do that?

Name: chandler
Lines: Dog grooming huh? Okay, just don’t make my tail too poofy.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, thanks. I grow it myself.  Y’know who also has great hair is Joey!

Name: chandler
Lines: What-what ‘cha doin’?

Name: chandler
Lines: ‘Kay.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hello!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey dude, it’s me.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey it’s Joey!

Name: joey
Lines: Listen uh, I’m really sorry, it looks like I’m gonna be stuck here for a while. I got the transmission fluid, but when I went to put it in the car, the transmission wasn’t there!

Name: chandler
Lines: What?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, it must’ve fallen out a few blocks back. I just figured we hit a dog.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: joey
Lines: Listen uh, could you put Kathy on, I wanna apologize.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh yeah man.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah. Yes! Yeah.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh.

Name: chandler
Lines: No-no-no-no, this is bad! It’s bad! This is bad!

Name: chandler
Lines: Wait the uh, the kiss or the situation?

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay!

Name: chandler
Lines: Ooh! Yes! Okay! Here’s what we do, we-we forget it happened.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, we-we swallow our feelings. Even if it means we’re unhappy forever. Sound good?

Name: chandler
Lines: I have to; he’s my best friend, and you’re seeing him.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh-no-no-no! Don’t! Don’t! See-see, you’re getting me confused, I’m starting to urn.

Name: chandler
Lines: I-I think we have too.

Name: chandler
Lines: Bye.  Are you still out there?

Name: ross
Lines: Emphatic time-time-time…

Name: monica
Lines: Y'know, there’s a Starbucks about three blocks down.

Name: phoebe
Lines: It’s so inspired! Look at him! Look at him go!

Name: ross
Lines: Thank you guys-guys-guys…

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, aren’t you up next?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh no, I’m not playing tonight.

Name: rachel
Lines: Why not?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can’t follow Ross! It’d be like those bicycle ridding chimps that followed The Beetles. No.

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe, Ross sucks!

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe, the place has emptied because of him.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God, he’s not even appreciated in his own time. I would give anything to not be appreciated in my own time!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay. Umm, Phoebe, you suck too.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, Phoebe you’re… awful!

Name: phoebe
Lines: You guys. You suck too.

Name: joey
Lines: Aww man! I can’t believe I locked myself out again!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hang on buddy!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh my God! What happened here? Did you do all this?

Name: chandler
Lines: I sure did.

Name: joey
Lines: Why?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I just thought it’d make me feel good to do something nice for my friend.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, you’re amazing.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh no-no-no. This is amazing.

Name: joey
Lines: A TV as if it appears from nowhere! That’s the dream! Man, how did you afford this stuff?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, y’know I’m 29. I mean who needs a savings account.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, you are the best friends anyone has ever had.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, I don’t know.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh-no-no-no, you are! You do this, you give me the great advice, and hey listen, I was thinking about what you said yesterday about focusing on one woman, I’m gonna do that.

Name: chandler
Lines: You mean with Casey.

Name: joey
Lines: No-no-no, I think I’m gonna see how things go with Kathy. She’s pretty cool.

Name: chandler
Lines: Or Casey.

Name: joey
Lines: No-no, Kathy.

Name: chandler
Lines: Could be Casey.

Name: joey
Lines: No. No, Kathy.

Name: chandler
Lines: Consider Casey.

Name: joey
Lines: Y’know what I think? I think somebody’s got a little crush on Casey. How ‘bout I fix you two up? What do you think?

Name: chandler
Lines: That all the pieces of my life are falling right into place!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey! You were really great! You were really, really great!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, thanks, thanks. So Monica tells me that uh, you don’t want to play anymore because me and y'know my talent. Is that true?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, kinda. Yeah. Yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: Pheebs…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I-I can’t—I mean y’know I was trying to be really y'know okay and upbeat about it, I just—I feel so dwarfed by your musical gift. I…

Name: ross
Lines: See but, Pheebs that-that is the exact opposite intent of my music. Y’know my music is-is meant to inspire, and if it bothers you this much, then I… I won’t play anymore.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh no. No-no-no, don’t do that! How could I live with myself if I knew I was depriving the world of your music.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, okay.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey Chandler! Saw the new furniture. Very nice.

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah! Joey has the best boyfriend ever!

Name: chandler
Lines: I kissed Kathy.

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: monica
Lines: Are you serious?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Does Joey know?

Name: chandler
Lines: No. Is there anyway, anyway you think he’ll understand this?

Name: monica
Lines: You obviously haven’t screwed over a lot of your friends.  Which we all appreciate.

Name: ross
Lines: No the-the sad thing is, if you had told him how you felt before you kissed her, knowing Joey, he probably just would’ve just stepped aside.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, don’t say that! Don’t say that. That’s not true. Is it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I think maybe, yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: He loves you.

Name: chandler
Lines: Then why didn’t you tell me to do that?!!

Name: ross
Lines: Well, I said-I said something to Phoebe.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah! No, that’s right. And I thought it was a really good idea.

Name: rachel
Lines: I know, I remember that!

Name: monica
Lines: I remember you did.

Name: chandler
Lines: God!!  What am I gonna do?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, Chandler, you’re gonna have to tell him.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why?! Why do I have to tell him?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Because you do.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I know.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, would it be okay if I wrote a song about this.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! Samboucha Margarita?

Name: chandler
Lines: Is that a real thing?

Name: joey
Lines: Well, we only had samboucha, so it is now.

Name: chandler
Lines: Listen ah, Joe, I-I need to, I need to talk to you about something.

Name: joey
Lines: What’s up?

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s-it’s about Kathy. Umm, uh, I like her. I like her a lot actually.

Name: joey
Lines: You do?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, you’re timing couldn’t be better. She’s not my girlfriend anymore.

Name: chandler
Lines: What?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, she broke up with me.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh uh, when?

Name: joey
Lines: Just now, after acting class. At first I thought she was doing some kind of scene, that’s why I let people watch.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh man, I am so sorry. Are, are you okay?

Name: joey
Lines: Well, I’ve been better. But, I’m all right. So you like her huh?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes, but I-I uh, don’t have too.

Name: joey
Lines: No-no-no, no it’s uh, it’s okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah. You know why? ‘Cause you came to me first.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I thought that would be the best thing to do.

Name: joey
Lines: But hey, listen just so you know, you might have you’re work cut out for you. ‘Cause when I talked to her, I kinda got the feeling that she’s into some other guy. So…

Name: chandler
Lines: See uh, that’s-that’s actually what I wanted to talk to you about. I-I think I know who the other guy is.

Name: joey
Lines: Who?

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s me. I’m the other guy.

Name: joey
Lines: What?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I mean when you were late last night, Kathy and I got to talking, and one thing to another and…

Name: joey
Lines: And what?! Did you sleep with her?!

Name: chandler
Lines: No! No! No! I just kissed her.

Name: joey
Lines: What?!! That’s even worse!!

Name: chandler
Lines: How is that worse?!

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t know! But it’s the same!

Name: chandler
Lines: Look, I’m sorry! But there’s nothing I can do, I think I’m in love with her!

Name: joey
Lines: Who cares?! You went behind my back! I would never do that to you!

Name: chandler
Lines: You’re right, I have no excuses! I was totally over the line.

Name: joey
Lines: Over the line?! You-you’re-you’re so far past the line, that you-you can’t even see the line! The line is a dot to you!

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes. Yes! Right! And I feel horrible. You have to believe me!

Name: joey
Lines: Is that why you bought all this stuff?!  Well, y’know what I will not watch your TV, I will not listen to your stereo, and there’s a cinnamon raisin loaf in the new bread maker that I’m not gonna eat! You know why?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Probably because…

Name: joey
Lines: Because it’s all tainted with your betrayal. From now on this apartment is empty for me! And I’m not happy about you either.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God, he’s lost it. He’s totally lost it.

Name: monica
Lines: What?

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe, his music could not get any worse. There are rats in the basement that are hanging themselves.

Name: ross
Lines: Thank you, thanks.  would you, can you finish my set?

Name: phoebe
Lines: After that? Yeah! No, I mean if I can help.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, like I could lose it.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: I played bad on purpose guys.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, so you were trying to play bad this whole time.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah—no, just that last song.

Name: joey
Lines: Hello.

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Name: joey
Lines: Hello.

Name: chandler
Lines: Look I never should have kissed your girlfriend, but I’m…

Name: joey
Lines: Stop callin’!!

Name: joey
Lines: All right!

Name: chandler
Lines: Aww, turkey! Aww, giving thanks! Aww!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Look everyone, it’s the spirit of Thanksgiving!

Name: rachel
Lines: So are things with you and Joey any better?

Name: chandler
Lines: They couldn’t be worse. I spent eight hours calling him last night, just trying to get him to talk to me.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh wow, eight hours? So you could probably really use one of those plug-in telephone headsets huh?

Name: ross
Lines: Should we all expect Christmas gifts that can be stolen from your office?

Name: rachel
Lines: You shouldn’t.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Speaking of Christmas, umm since Monica and I are starting a new business and have like no money, umm, this year maybe we could do secret Santa, and then we each only buy one gift. And-and there’s the added mystery of who gets who.

Name: ross
Lines: Who gets whom.  I don’t know why I do that.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, I’m gonna take a nap, turkey makes me sleepy.

Name: monica
Lines: We haven’t eaten yet!

Name: rachel
Lines: I know, but all that work you’re doing to get it ready, I just…

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, by any chance did either of pick uh Rachel for your secret Santa, ‘cause I wanna trade for her.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I picked her! Oh thank God you want her! Ooh!

Name: chandler
Lines: Wow! Why do you want to get rid of her so badly?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Because she exchanges every gift she ever gets, it’s like impossible to get her something she likes. Come on, let’s trade!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh that’s not true! That’s not true! I got her that backpack and she loved it! I remember how much she was crying the day when that big dog ran off with it…  Her initials…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ohh.

Name: monica
Lines: Well, maybe you could give to somebody else. Ooh, like Ross Geller.

Name: chandler
Lines: Op, y'know what though, it’s kind’ve a girlie briefcase.

Name: monica
Lines: Who cares? He works in a museum!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, what time is it? The big game is about to start!

Name: phoebe
Lines: You don’t have to do that, Ross and Joey aren’t here, you can watch the parade if you want.

Name: chandler
Lines: Thanks.

Name: monica
Lines: What is wrong with this freezer?!  Ow! Ow!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: God, what happened?!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God, ice just got in my eye!

Name: rachel
Lines: People are trying to sleep in here!

Name: chandler
Lines: Monica got ice in her eye, and it hurts.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Open it up, let me see.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, y’know what, I can’t, it really kills.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well maybe you should put some ice on it.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ooh, God it looks bad.

Name: rachel
Lines: Honey, maybe we should take you to a doctor.

Name: monica
Lines: No, my eye doctor is Richard! I can’t go to him when I don’t have a boyfriend!

Name: chandler
Lines: He’s really picky about his patients.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Honey, you’ve got to go. What’s his office number?

Name: monica
Lines: Like I remember his office number!  Speed dial 7.

Name: phoebe
Lines: He’s out of town, but does she want to see the on-call doctor?

Name: monica
Lines: Yes!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes! She’s very excited about that.

Name: phoebe
Lines: This is so cool, ‘til Monica gets back, it’s like I’m head chef and I get to make all the decisions.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey-hey, I thought she told you to follow the recipe exactly!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, get out of my kitchen!

Name: chandler
Lines: I mean yeah, he gave me the finger while doing it.

Name: phoebe
Lines: All right I… I gotta call my mom and ask her a left handed cooking question.

Name: ross
Lines: So listen ah, I picked Monica for secret Santa, but I’m already getting her something for Chanukah, I was wondering if you wanna switch.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh y’know what, I was already trying to trade for ah, well, you.

Name: ross
Lines: Really?! Wow! That’s-that’s so nice, what are you gonna get me?

Name: chandler
Lines: I don’t know R.G., I was thinking something girlie for your office.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, well maybe Phoebe will switch with me.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh no-no-no, you don’t want to do that, then you’re gonna get stuck with Rachel and she exchanges every gift she ever gets.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, that’s not true! I’ve got her lots of stuff she never took back.

Name: chandler
Lines: Like?

Name: ross
Lines: Like uh, that gold necklace I got her last year.

Name: chandler
Lines: When was the last time you saw her wear it?

Name: ross
Lines: Well, she wore it all Christmas day, and then uh…

Name: chandler
Lines: Big dog?

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: ross
Lines: What are you doing?

Name: joey
Lines: I’m sending back all this stuff that Chandler bought out of guilt.

Name: ross
Lines: Everything? Even the TV?

Name: joey
Lines: No! I’m putting that in my room.

Name: ross
Lines: Listen, Joey, I know what he did was wrong but don’t you think you could at least hear the guy out?

Name: joey
Lines: Back when you and Rachel were together, if Chandler had kissed her, would you hear him out?

Name: ross
Lines: That’s a good point. So uh, how long are you gonna punish him?

Name: joey
Lines: Five years.

Name: ross
Lines: You’ve sentenced him?!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! Don’t do the crime if you can’t do the time.

Name: ross
Lines: Joey, the guy’s your best friend.

Name: joey
Lines: No, was my best friend. Anyway, I don’t know why you’re pushing for him so hard. With him out of the way as my best friend, there’s a spot open.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, who? Me?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah!

Name: ross
Lines: Wow! I’m honored! And y’know what I’m gonna do as my first act as your best friend?

Name: joey
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: I’m gonna get you to talk to Chandler.

Name: joey
Lines: All right. But if you weren’t my best friend.

Name: chandler
Lines: I walk into a room and he won’t even talk to me, he just mumbles something in Italian. And I know he only knows the bad words.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey Gunther, have you uh, have you seen Chandler?

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey Joe.

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God! How cute is the on-call doctor?

Name: rachel
Lines: Ooh, so cute, that I’m thinking about jamming this pen in my eye.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh no-no-no, not Dr. Burke. Dr. Burke is out of town. The-the on-call doctor will see me now.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey! I’m sorry! That— where are you going?

Name: joey
Lines: My folks.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, uh, when-when are you coming back?

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t know. I might stay there for a few days while I look for an apartment.

Name: chandler
Lines: What?!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, y’know at first I thought we could talk about this y’know, work it out, but uh, seeing you two together I don’t think I…

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, look, what do you want me to say? Do you want me to say that I’ll stop seeing her?

Name: joey
Lines: Look, it’s not about her. Okay? But seeing you two together just reminds me of what you did. And I don’t want to live with some one who doesn’t know what it is to be a friend. So, I’ll see ya.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, look, I know what it is to be a friend, I just-I just screwed up!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah! You did! And that’s why I’m leaving.

Name: chandler
Lines: All right look, if you’re not gonna stay for me, then at least stay for them! Okay, they have had a very difficult year! What with the robbery and all!

Name: joey
Lines: When that guy was robbing us, and I was locked in the entertainment unit for like six hours, you know what I was doing in there all that time? I was thinking about how I let you down!

Name: chandler
Lines: What?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah! But if would’ve know what kind of friend you were gonna turn out to be, I wouldn’t have worried about it so much! See you around!

Name: chandler
Lines: All right, wait! Come on! Just wait one second! There has to be something that I can do! Something! If we still had that entertainment unit I would get in it for six hours and think about how I let you down.  What?

Name: joey
Lines: We’ve got a box.

Name: monica
Lines: I was probably waiting for it to open.

Name: monica
Lines: You look great too.

Name: monica
Lines: So how does it look?

Name: monica
Lines: Like a pirate?!

Name: monica
Lines: Umm, so how long have you been working with your dad?  Come on, one of us had to mention him.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh. Big family dinner tonight?

Name: monica
Lines: No way!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh.

Name: monica
Lines: So you made her walk the plank? Aye, matie?

Name: monica
Lines: I know.

Lines: He’s coming here for Thanksgiving!

Name: rachel
Lines: I know, it’s sick.

Name: monica
Lines: Why is it sick?

Name: rachel
Lines: Because it’s Richard’s son! It’s like inviting Greek tragedy over for dinner!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, come on, Phoebe, you understand don’t you?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I can see where I’d be your best shot but, no. I’m sorry, but I think it’s twisted.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: joey
Lines: What’s twisted?

Name: monica
Lines: Me going out with Richard’s son.

Name: joey
Lines: Ewwwww!! Ew! Ew! Ew!

Name: chandler
Lines: Sounds like a really bad idea to me.

Name: rachel
Lines: Is he okay in there?

Name: joey
Lines: He’s fine!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, y'know, Mon, if things wrong out between you and Richard’s son, you’d be able to tell your kids, that you slept with their grandfather.

Name: monica
Lines: Fine! Judge all you want to but,

Name: rachel
Lines: So now, what exactly is the point of the box?

Name: joey
Lines: Chandler?

Name: chandler
Lines: The meaning of the box is three fold. One , it hurts!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh hey! Hey uh, you remember the necklace I gave you last year? Can I see it?

Name: rachel
Lines: Why?

Name: ross
Lines: I just wanna check something.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: ross
Lines: Now, we’ll see.

Name: chandler
Lines: Air hole! Air hole!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Here it is! I love it. I wear it all the time.

Name: ross
Lines: The necklace I got you was gold, this one is silver.

Name: rachel
Lines: Huh, well maybe it uh, it changed.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh my God! You actually exchanged it!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well isn’t it better that I exchanged it for something that I enjoy and that I can get a lot of use out of?

Name: ross
Lines: What did you get?

Name: rachel
Lines: Credit.

Name: monica
Lines: Hi, Tim.

Name: monica
Lines: Thank you. Come meet my friends. This is uh, Phoebe.

Name: monica
Lines: And Joey.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: monica
Lines: My brother, Ross.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey.

Name: monica
Lines: And Rachel.  And that’s Chandler.

Name: chandler
Lines: How do ya do.

Name: monica
Lines: Umm, well, he’s…

Name: joey
Lines: He’s doin’ some thinkin’!

Name: chandler
Lines: What happened? What happened?!

Name: joey
Lines: You kissed my girlfriend!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ooh, I like those sunglasses.

Name: ross
Lines: Like ‘em, like ‘em? Or, I’d like to get store credit for that amount like ‘em?

Name: rachel
Lines: NA

Name: monica
Lines: All right everybody, this turkey is ready!

Name: monica
Lines: Here, let me show you. Okay, the towels are hanging next to the sink, and umm, you can use the fancy soap.

Name: rachel
Lines: Fancy soap? I thought we were savin’ that for the Pope!

Name: monica
Lines: See he’s nice. Right?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, but Monica, do you actually want to be in a relationship where you can actually use the phrase, \That’s not how your dad used to do it.\"

Name: monica
Lines: I saved you a seat.

Name: rachel
Lines: Sick-sick-sick-sick.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, I’ll get it.

Name: chandler
Lines: Gotcha!

Name: joey
Lines: That doesn’t sound like thinking to me!

Name: chandler
Lines: Sorry!

Name: joey
Lines: Y’know I don’t think you should be talking at all in there! I think you’ve got to much thinking to do to be talking and making jokes!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, okay, you got it!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross, can you pass me the yams?

Name: ross
Lines: Sure! Oh, and Joey’s got the mashed potatoes if you want to exchange them.

Name: rachel
Lines: Would you stop?! What is the matter with you?!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh-ho-ho, we’ve got company.

Name: ross
Lines: There’s nothing the matter with me. See, I’m not completely devoid of sentiment, see I have feelings.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, fine.

Name: chandler
Lines: You can’t tell, but I’m trying to break the tension by mooning you guys!

Name: joey
Lines: All right, look! If this is just a big joke to you, then forget about it, all right?! This means something to me! And if it doesn’t mean anything to you, then you should get out of there, otherwise you’re just an idiot in a box!

Name: chandler
Lines: You’re right, and I’m sorry! This means a lot to me! I want you to be my friend again! I swear, I won’t say another word tonight.

Name: joey
Lines: So are you gonna start taking this thing seriously?

Name: chandler
Lines: Absolutely!

Name: joey
Lines: That sounds like another word to me! Are you gonna take this seriously?  Okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Don’t say that I have no sentiment!  This is from the museum from the first time we… were together. Okay, maybe I exchange gifts sometimes, but I keep the things that matter!

Name: ross
Lines: I don’t know what to say, I’m sorry. Though, you’re not supposed to take these.  It’s like a million years old, we, we actually, we had people looking for that.

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: monica
Lines: Thank you.

Name: monica
Lines: Y’know all my friends think this is weird.

Name: monica
Lines: I know! I mean it’s like me and your dad, that’s a totally separate thing.

Name: monica
Lines: We’re just two people who find each other very attractive. Right?

Name: monica
Lines: Nothing. Nothing.

Name: monica
Lines: No-no-no that was good, it was, that was uh, that was a goood kiss…

Name: monica
Lines: Don’t say it!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah!

Name: monica
Lines: I know!

Name: joey
Lines: I’ll get it.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: That’s okay. Chandler’s the one I’m mad at.

Name: joey
Lines: In the box.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, he-he can’t talk right now.

Name: phoebe
Lines: He’s just trying to show Joey how much he means to him.

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey, had reasons.

Name: phoebe
Lines: They were threefold.

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: What?!

Name: joey
Lines: He can still catch her! Come on, get out of there!  Get out of there!

Name: chandler
Lines: So?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, we’re gonna be fine! Get out!

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, you did some real good thinkin’ in there.

Name: chandler
Lines: Man, this is…

Name: joey
Lines: Now go! ‘Cause you can still catch her! And Merry Christmas from you’re secret Santa!

Name: joey
Lines: All right, who got Chandler? ‘Cause I uh, need to trade.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, he sees her!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, he’s catching up to her!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, she sees him! Oh, they’re hugging!

Name: ross
Lines: He’s taking her purse!

Name: joey
Lines: Uhh, that’s not them. I’m gonna go call the police.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, there they are!

Name: phoebe
Lines: All right, get a room.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay!

Name: monica
Lines: Come on, no peeking!

Name: chandler
Lines: Our eyes are closed and we’re about to cross the street. Very good.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okayyyyy, open up!

Name: ross
Lines: What did you want to show us? Because all I can see is this bitchin' van!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, it’s for our catering business!

Name: joey
Lines: I think I know that girl.

Name: monica
Lines: All right, umm, we’re not gonna really keep it this way though.

Name: rachel
Lines: No?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, we’re gonna paint over the sword, and replace it with a baguette.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh!

Name: phoebe
Lines: And also, we don’t know what to do with this.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh yeah, I definitely know her.

Name: monica
Lines: Remember that guy from cooking school I told you about that put cilantro with everything?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh sure, Cilantro Larry.

Name: monica
Lines: Well, I’m gonna fill in for him as food critic for the Chelsea Reporter.

Name: monica
Lines: Wow, Monica! What an amazing opportunity to influence… dozens of people.

Name: phoebe
Lines: How could you say yes, what about our catering business?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh no-no-no, it’s only one night a week, and plus I get to take all of you out for a lot of free dinners.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, in that case— That was me hopping on board.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh.

Lines: Hey, you guys! Hey, Ross, quick question for ya. Are you ready to party?

Name: ross
Lines: I don’t know, I could maybe go out for a couple of beers, but there’s this thing about bumblebees on The Discovery Channel that I was planning to watch.

Lines: No-no, I don’t think you heard me. Are you ready to party?!

Name: ross

Lines: Kathy’s with her parents, I have nothing to do, so tomorrow we are partying with Gandolf dude!

Name: ross
Lines: Dude, we are sooo gonna party!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wow! Okay, dude alert! And who is this guy?

Name: ross
Lines: Mike \Gandolf\" Ganderson

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m gonna call and get off work tomorrow!

Name: ross
Lines: I’m gonna call after you!

Name: chandler
Lines: This is gonna be soo cool, dude, we never party anymore!

Name: monica
Lines: All right, were you guys smoking something in the back of our van?

Name: joey
Lines: Really. And what do you mean you never have fun anymore? You have fun with me, remember that time we saw those strippers and you paid me 50 bucks to eat that book?

Name: ross
Lines: Joey, you are gonna love this guy. Gandolf is like the party wizard!

Name: joey
Lines: Well, why do you call him Gandolf?

Name: ross
Lines: Gandolf the wizard.  Hello! Didn’t you read Lord of the Rings in high school?

Name: joey
Lines: No, I had sex in high school.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, uh, Joanna I was wondering if I could ask you something. There’s an opening for an assistant buyer in Junior Miss…

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, actually, I meant for me. The hiring committee is meeting people all day and…

Name: rachel
Lines: God, I am so glad you don’t have a problem with this, because if you did, I wouldn’t even consider applying.

Name: rachel
Lines: And that’s I’m so glad… there’s no problem.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh! That’s great!

Name: rachel
Lines: Really?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, I, umm…

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh man! I am so excited—I may vomit!

Name: joey
Lines: Will you calm down, he’s just a human guy.

Name: chandler
Lines: Look you don’t understand, Gandolf is amazing. Y’know you’re never know what’s gonna end up happening, you go out for a couple of beers and end up on a fishing boat to Nova Scotia!

Name: joey
Lines: Really?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh yeah, it’s beautiful country up there.

Lines: Hey! Okay! I got my passport, fresh socks, and a snake bite kit!

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s not gonna be exactly like last time.

Name: chandler
Lines: Whoa-wh-wh-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa!

Lines: I have an audition, but I’ll definitely hook up with you later. Where are you gonna be around noon?

Name: joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Name: ross
Lines: What happened?

Lines: He’s not gonna make it, he’s stuck in Chicago.

Lines: Ohh, man! Chicago, is sooo lucky!

Lines: Stupid, useless Canadian money!

Name: rachel
Lines: Thank you.

Lines: Well, they uh, they-they do more than that.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes, Joanna really has been an incredible mentor to me.

Name: rachel
Lines: I-I-I of course, I have more responsibilities than that.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes, I realize that…

Name: rachel
Lines: I love working with designers!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey! My first review is out!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ohh! Oh, the Chelsea Reporter, ohh, this used to keep me so warm.

Name: monica
Lines: All right, look at my on the back page.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, okay!  Wow! You really laid into this place.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, they don’t pay me a penny a word to make friends.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ooh, I gotta go. I found a guy that who could fix up the van for catering.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh! Do you need me to go with you?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No-no, it’s okay. But are we sure we don’t want the waterbed?

Name: monica
Lines: Haven’t we made this decision?

Lines: Yeah, all right.

Name: monica
Lines: Bye!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Bye!

Name: monica
Lines: Who is it?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God, oh my God.  Call me on the phone!

Name: monica
Lines: Look, I-I’m never gonna let you up so you may as well just go away.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey, do you need to get in? Here you go.

Name: monica
Lines: No! Phoebe!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey, Monica!

Name: monica
Lines: I couldn’t eat it! I had five friends who couldn’t eat it, and one of them eats books.

Name: monica
Lines: The waiter carried the breadsticks in his pants!

Name: monica
Lines: All right, that I’ll retract. But I stand by my review, I know food and that wasn’t it. You’re marinara sauce tasted like tomato juice! You should serve it with vodka and a piece of celery.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God! You own an Italian restaurant and you think that tastes good?! Where are you even from?

Name: monica
Lines: Hand me those tomatoes, I’m gonna show you what it should taste like! Come on, hand me them.

Name: rachel
Lines: Umm, Joanna? I wanna talk about that interview.

Name: rachel
Lines: No! It didn’t! That’s what I want to talk to you about.  I may cry, but they are not tears of sadness or of anger, but just of me having this discussion with you.

Name: rachel
Lines: There’s nobody here!

Name: rachel
Lines: Do you want me to quit?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well of those things that you said in the interview, I mean if you believe any of them, I must not be a very good assistant. Y’know what? I am just gonna pack up my desk,

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: rachel
Lines: My drinking?

Name: rachel
Lines: Said what? Exactly.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God!! Ohh, that is it! I’m leaving! You are just a horrible person!

Name: rachel
Lines: Say more things like that.

Name: rachel
Lines: I’d need an expense account.

Name: rachel
Lines: And an assistant.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! What are you guys doing here? I thought you’d be out partying with Gandel-worf.

Name: ross
Lines: It’s Gandolf, and he’s not coming.

Name: joey
Lines: So you’ve been sittin’ around here all mornin’?

Name: ross
Lines: No! I balanced my checkbook.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, and I-I gave first names to all of the foosball players.

Name: ross
Lines: I can’t believe he didn’t come!

Name: joey
Lines: So what if he didn’t come! We can still go out and party ourselves!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh-no, y’know with Gandolf we’d be out all night!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah! We’d meet, we’d meet total strangers, and hang out with them!

Name: joey
Lines: Well, we could do that!

Name: ross
Lines: There’s other stuff too.

Name: joey
Lines: We’ll do it all, and better! Look, after tonight, Gandolf will want to party with us, dude! Come on!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah!!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah!!

Name: ross
Lines: It’s not like we don’t know how to party!!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah! All right? Let’s go!

Name: chandler
Lines: And may-maybe we could end up on a boat again?

Name: chandler
Lines: All right!!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey-hey-hey, when uh, when were we on a boat?

Name: chandler
Lines: Remember that really cold morning, you woke up and those dogs were licking your face?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, those were seals, man.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey Mon, little question for ya! How do you think this suit will look on an assistant buyer?

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, the owner of Allesandro’s came over to yell at me, but instead I made him some sauce, and he offered me the job as head chef!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God!! You just ruined the thing I was practicing the whole way home, but I’m soo happy!

Name: monica
Lines: Can you believe it? I finally get to run my own kitchen!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh, you’ve waited soo long.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey, Pheebs, quick question for ya.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: How do you think this suit would look on an assistant buyer at Bloomingdale’s?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I don’t know, it would totally depend on her coloring and…  You got the job!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes!!!

Name: monica
Lines: You got the job?! Why didn’t you tell me?

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh, it’s gonna be so great! I’m gonna get to help decide what we sell, I’m gonna have an office with walls and everything.  I’m gonna have walls!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, is this the day of good news or what? I got us a job! The wedding reception.

Name: monica
Lines: Ohh! Umm, Phoebe, I kinda need to talk to you about that.  Umm, well I-I-I think it might be time for me to take a step back from catering.

Name: phoebe
Lines: But we’ve only had one job.

Name: monica
Lines: I know, but now we have this second one and it just, it feels like it’s snowballing, y’know?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah! What are you saying?

Name: monica
Lines: I got offered the head chef job at Allesandro’s.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?

Name: monica
Lines: It’s okay, ‘cause y'know what? You don’t really need me for the business.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You’re the cook! With out you it’s just me driving up to people’s houses with empty trays and asking for money!

Name: monica
Lines: All right. But umm, I-I-I’ll pay you back all the money you invested, and you can keep the van.

Name: phoebe
Lines: For what? I can’t believe this! I gotta get out of here.

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe, wait a minute!

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m an assistant buyer!!

Name: joey
Lines: All right, so we’ll get a little coffee, and get energized, and we’ll head back out.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, all right.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay.

Name: joey
Lines: So, we’re having fun, right?

Name: joey
Lines: We don’t need that wizard guy. We hit a couple of clubs, talked to some strangers, and uh, after this, we’ll head down to the docks and see about that boat thing.

Name: ross
Lines: I’m kinda beat.

Name: chandler
Lines: Actually, me too.

Name: joey
Lines: Are you serious?!

Name: joey
Lines: Thank God! I’m exhausted!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, but uh, I don’t want to be up too late, so uh, I’ll have a decaf.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, me too.

Name: chandler
Lines: Actually, can I get some hot water with a little lemon? I think I strained my voice screaming in there. Does it have to be so loud?

Name: joey
Lines: I can’t hear a word you’re saying, my ears are ringing so bad.

Name: ross
Lines: I’m just glad I brought that extra pair of socks, y’know? I used them as mittens, I didn’t want to touch a thing in that last place.

Name: ross
Lines: How sad are we?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, I know.

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know what? We’re not sad, we’re not sad, we’re just not 21 anymore. Y’know? I’m 29 years old, damnit! And I want to sit in a comfortable chair, and watch television and go to bed at a reasonable hour!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah! And I like to hang out in a quiet place where I can talk to my friends.

Name: ross
Lines: And so what if I like to go home, throw on some Kenny G, and take a bath!

Name: joey
Lines: We’re 29, we’re not women.

Name: monica
Lines: Ohh, here you are. Y’know, I’m-I’m glad you decided to hear me out.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, I’m hearing.

Name: monica
Lines: I’ve been doing a lot of thinking. A lot! And umm, well, I came up with a whole bunch of businesses you can do with your van. Okay umm, you could be flower delivery person.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?!

Name: monica
Lines: Or! A bakery delivery person.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I wa-I wa-I wa…

Name: monica
Lines: Pizza?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Monica!

Name: monica
Lines: All right, I’ve got a whole bunch of uh-uh, stuff in this area, but umm, I’m getting the feeling that you don’t want to deliver.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay. I’m guessing that if you don’t want to deliver, you probably don’t want to pick stuff up either.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No.

Name: monica
Lines: Y’know what, let’s do the catering business.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Really?! Are you sure?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah, y'know I-I made a commitment to you. Y’know what, it’d be, it’d be fun.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh! It will be fun! Ohh! Yay! Oh! Okay, ooh, let’s plan the wedding reception.  Y’know what, I want you to take the chef job.

Name: monica
Lines: Really?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah. That’s what you really want. Yeah, I don’t want to be the reason you’re unhappy, that would just make me unhappy, and I really don’t want to be the reason I’m unhappy.

Name: monica
Lines: Thank you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Besides, it might be kinda fun to form the new A-Team.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, hi Mrs. Lynch! Is Joanna in already?

Name: rachel
Lines: Heard what?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! How?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! Oh, I cannot believe it!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, God. Oh, God.  Oh God.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes, so close. Mrs. Lynch, I know that this is an emotional and difficult time, for all of us. But by any chance did Joanna send any paperwork your way before… it happened.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes-yes, just a few seconds and she’d still be with us—nothing about an assistant buyer?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, Sophie, I guess you didn’t hear about Joanna…

Name: monica
Lines: Umm, I just wanna say, uh  Are you gonna kill me?

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: ross
Lines: I’m sorry I’m late, did I miss anything?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Joey stuffing 15 Oreos in his mouth.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Where were you?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, on a date. Yeah, I met this girl on the train going to a museum upstate.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, yeah! How did you meet her?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, which museum?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, answer his.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, it was just me and her at the back of the train, and I sat near the door, so she’d have to pass by me if she wanted to switch cars. She was totally at my mercy.

Name: chandler
Lines: Were you so late because you were burring this woman?

Name: ross
Lines: No, I’m getting back down ‘cause she lives in Poughkeepsie. She seems really great, but she’s like totally great, but she lives two and a half hours away.

Name: chandler
Lines: How can she be great if she’s from Poughkeepsie?  That joke would’ve killed in Albany.

Name: joey
Lines: Done! I did it! Heh, who’s stupid now?

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, look at this!  They’re lighting the big Christmas tree tonight.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Umm, that paper’s two weeks old.

Name: chandler
Lines: All right, who keeps leaving old newspapers in the trash?! I really wanted to take Kathy to this, I can’t believe I missed it.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey, y’know, at least you have somebody to miss that stuff with! I hate being alone this time of year! Next thing you know it’ll be Valentine’s Day, then my birthday, then bang!—before you know it, they’re lighting that damn tree again. Ohh, I want somebody!  I mean, it doesn’t even have to be a big relationship, y’know, just like a fling would be great.

Name: chandler
Lines: Really?! I didn’t think girls ever just wanted a fling.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, believe me, it’s been a long time since I’ve been flung.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, I know what I’m giving you for Christmas.

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know what? There’s some nice guys at my office, do you want me to set you up?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah! Wait a minute, it’s been a long time that I’ve been single. How come you never offered this before?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I have a girlfriend, I’m-I’m happy. So, I no longer feel the need to go out of my way to stop others from being happy.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay! No accountants. Oh, and no one from like legal. I don’t like guys with boring jobs.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh and Ross was like what? A lion tamer?

Name: phoebe
Lines: What’s wrong Mon?

Name: monica
Lines: Ohh, everybody at the restaurant still hates me.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh.

Name: monica
Lines: I thought I was making headway, everyone was smiling at me all day, I get off work and I find out that they wrote this

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey, maybe they meant to write, ‘Quiet, bitch.’

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey, honey! What’s the matter?  Fine, I was just trying to be nice! Whoa!

Name: monica
Lines: I mean I have not been picked on this much since kindergarten and they had to bring in someone from junior high to do the see-saw with me.

Name: joey
Lines: Ohhh!

Name: monica
Lines: I mean they’re trying to do everything they can to make me quit, and if there were any other job, I would. But this is something I’ve been waiting for my whole life.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, wait a minute, you’re the boss! Why don’t you just yell at them? Or, fire them?

Name: monica
Lines: I would love too, but I can’t! I mean I just can’t, you know that I’m not good at confrontation.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, you know what you can do? I remember reading about this director, I think it was Orson Wells, who at the beginning of the movie would hire somebody, just so he could fire them in front of everybody. Then they would all know, who’s boss.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, Mon! I’m not doing anything, why don’t you fire me?

Name: monica
Lines: That’s a good idea! Wait, do you know how to waiter?

Name: joey
Lines: Good enough to get fired.

Name: monica
Lines: All right, you’re hired!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! That must be why I got fired last week! Does this Orson Wells guy direct Burger King commercials?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes.

Name: chandler
Lines: I say, Drew! Are you seeing anybody right now?  Og-ee-op, I’m not asking for me, I’m… I mean… No, I’m-I’m not gay, I’m not asking you out. I’m not-I’m not-I’m not gay!

Name: chandler
Lines: See my friend-my friend, Rachel, she wants to be set up.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, y’know what, that might be okay even if it was just kind of a fling, that might be all right with Rachel.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, by the way, that is her full name.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh well, that’s uh, a little later than I uh, generally care to stay, but sure!

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I don’t really know what that is, but let’s!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey! You guys, I’m writing a holiday song for everyone. Do you want to hear it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Happy Chanukah, Monica! May your Christmas be snowy, Joey! Happy New Year, Chandler and Ross. Spin the draddle, Rachel!

Name: rachel
Lines: Pheebs, that’s great!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, yay!

Name: rachel
Lines: But y’know umm, Rachel doesn’t rhyme with draddle.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I know but it’s so hard! Nothing rhymes with your stupid name!

Name: joey
Lines: What are you talking about? Lots of things rhyme with Rachel. Bagel. Mail. Jail. Bail. Able. May-pole.

Name: phoebe
Lines: All good, thanks.  Do you maybe have a nickname have like a nickname that’s easier to rhyme?

Name: monica
Lines: Didn’t your dad used to call you Pumpkin?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh yeah!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Pumpkin? Yeah. But did he ever call you like, Budolph?

Name: chandler
Lines: Hello, children!

Name: chandler
Lines: Have I got the 50 guys for you!

Name: rachel
Lines: Really?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh yeah, I just showed this a picture of you and guys were throwing themselves at me! They’re buying me drinks! They’re giving me stuff!  Knicks tonight?

Name: joey
Lines: Sure! Where are the seats?

Name: chandler
Lines: Wherever! I’ve got like 20!

Name: rachel
Lines: So, will I like any of these guys?

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know what, I’m gonna uh, play the field just a little more.

Name: rachel
Lines: Chandler!

Name: chandler
Lines: Guys are signing over their 401-K’s to me?

Name: phoebe
Lines: You work with robots!!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, there’s this one guy, Patrick, I think you’re gonna like him, he’s really nice, he’s funny, he’s a swimmer.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh, I like swimmer’s bodies!

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes, and his father invented that magnetic strip on the back of credit cards.

Name: rachel
Lines: Op, I like credit cards!

Name: chandler
Lines: See, I’m not bad at this fixing up thing, huh?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, so what does he do?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, he works in the Fine Foods division.

Name: rachel
Lines: Your company has a fine foods division?

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s a big company, I don’t—if you—I…

Name: joey
Lines: Now, wait a second! You make food and robots?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No! No, the robots just work for them.

Name: monica
Lines: All right, I’m gonna go to work. Does anybody have a problem with that?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, lady, I do! I got a problem with that!

Name: monica
Lines: You want a problem? I’ll give you a problem!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, what are you gonna do? You’re gonna fire me?

Name: monica
Lines: You bet your ass, I’m gonna fire you! Thank you.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, wow! I should get going. I-I got a date tonight.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh yeah! With who?

Name: ross
Lines: You know that girl I told you about who lives up in Poughkeepsie?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: Not her. Yeah, this is someone else I meet, and I-I can’t decide between the two of them. Y’know the one from Poughkeepsie, even though she’s a two hour train ride away, is really pretty, really smart, and-and a lot of fun. But this other girl, well, she lives right uptown. Y’know she’s, well she’s-she’s just as pretty, I guess she’s smart, she’s not fun.

Name: phoebe
Lines: If she’s no fun, why do you want to date her at all?

Name: ross
Lines: Well, I-I want to give her another chance, y’know? She lives so close. And, at the end of the date, the other time, she-she said something that was—if she was kidding was very funny. On the other hand, if she wasn’t kidding, she’s not fun, she’s stupid, and kind of a racist.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, man!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey! Ooh, how was your first day working at the restaurant?

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, what happened to your fancy chef’s jacket?

Name: monica
Lines: They baked it. I can’t take this anymore. I’m gonna call a meeting tonight, I’m gonna fire you tonight.

Name: joey
Lines: You got it! Oh-oh!

Name: monica
Lines: What are you doing?!

Name: joey
Lines: It’s still a tiny bit on fire there.

Name: monica
Lines: Thanks.  I think you got it!

Name: rachel
Lines: Chandler!! You have the best taste in men!

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, like father, like son.

Name: rachel
Lines: Patrick and I had such a great time last night! I mean I think this could maybe turn into something serious.

Name: chandler
Lines: Really?! I-I thought you weren’t looking for something serious? I thought you were looking for some kind of a fling.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, y'know, possibly.  You didn’t tell him that, though? Right?

Name: chandler
Lines: Ummmmmmmm, no.

Name: rachel
Lines: You told this guy that I was looking for a fling?! You don’t tell the guy that!

Name: chandler
Lines: Why not?! I’d be thrilled if I heard that some hot girl was just looking to get—oh I see.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, between you telling him that I wanted to have a fling and me putting out on the first date—oh, he’s so gonna get the wrong idea.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, Joey, could you pass the cheese?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah. Listen uh, I’d prefer it if you didn’t call me Joey. Since I don’t know anyone here, I thought it’d be cool to try out a cool work nickname.

Name: joey
Lines: There’s like-there’s like 300 bucks in this one!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay. Could the waiters gather around to hear tonight’s specials? Okay, first there is a Chilean Sea Bass prepared with a Mango relish on a bag—Why is nobody writing these down?

Name: monica
Lines: Because your all gonna make up fake specials and make me cook them like you did the other night?

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, forget the specials for a minute. Umm, all right here’s the thing, for the last two weeks I have umm,  tried really hard to create a positive atmosphere…

Name: monica
Lines: Hey new guy! I said, does anybody have a problem with that?!

Name: joey
Lines: No ma’am.

Name: monica
Lines: What the hell happened?!

Name: joey
Lines: I am so-so-so sorry. I was gonna do it! Really! But I was standing there with 327 dollars in one hand and 238 dollars in the other hand, and I was thinking, \Wow! It’s been a long time since I had…  327 + 238 dollars!\"

Name: monica
Lines: Joey, we had a deal. That-that’s why you’re here! I’ve got to fire you!

Name: joey
Lines: And I gotta pay rent! Look, how-how about this? You don’t fire me, instead I stay here, I gain their trust, and they’ll start listening to all the nice things I’ve been saying about you.

Name: monica
Lines: What kinda things have you been saying?

Name: joey
Lines: Well nothing yet, they really hate you and I want to fit in.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Happy, happy Chanukah, Chandler and Monica. Very merry…

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, y’know, y’know what Pheebs?

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m not Jewish, so…

Name: phoebe
Lines: So! Ross doesn’t really decorate his tree with floss, but you don’t hear him complaining do you? God!

Name: chandler
Lines: Bad dream?

Name: ross
Lines: I wasn’t sleeping.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh yeah, then uh, what was Phoebe’s song about?

Name: ross
Lines: The one with the cat. I gotta go, I’ve got another date.

Name: phoebe
Lines: So, did you pick one yet?

Name: ross
Lines: No, it turns out that the one from uptown was making a joke. But it was a different joke than I thought—it wasn’t that funny. So I’m still torn.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well look, you don’t really like the one from uptown and you’re too exhausted from dating the one up in Poughkeepsie, so I say you just end them both. Okay? You take a train up to Poughkeepsie and break up with her, and on your way back you break up with uptown. And then by the time you get home tonight, you’re done!

Name: ross
Lines: Y’know, you’re right. Thank you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Umm, well I had a similar problem when I lived in Prague.

Name: chandler
Lines: Prague?

Name: phoebe
Lines: There’s sooo much you don’t know.

Name: rachel
Lines: Chandler! Patrick just uh, ended things with me. Did you or did you not tell him that I was looking for a serious relationship?

Name: chandler
Lines: I did! I absolutely did!

Name: rachel
Lines: You idiot!!

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m sure you’re right, but why?

Name: rachel
Lines: You don’t tell a guy that you’re looking for a serious relationship! You don’t tell the guy that! Now you scared him away!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, man. I’m sorry, I’m so-so sorry.

Name: rachel
Lines: Y’know, you should never be allowed to talk to people!

Name: chandler
Lines: I know! I know!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh! See just I’m right back where I started! Aww, this sucks! Being alone, sucks!

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, y’know, you’re-you’re gonna meet somebody! You’re a great catch! Y’know when I was telling all those guys about you, I didn’t have to lie once.

Name: rachel
Lines: Really?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah! You graduated Magma Ku Laude, right?

Name: rachel
Lines: No.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, it doesn’t matter.  Hey, y’know what, I’ve got two tickets to tonight’s Rangers game, you wanna come with me?

Name: rachel
Lines: Cute guys in little shorts? Sure.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, actually it’s a hockey team, so it’s angry Canadians with no teeth.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well that sounds fun too.

Name: chandler
Lines: Have you ever been with a woman?

Name: rachel
Lines: What?! Chandler, what is the matter with you?!

Name: chandler
Lines: So there is no good time to ask that question.

Name: monica
Lines: I need more swordfish.  Can you get me some more swordfish?

Name: monica
Lines: You did a minute ago!

Name: monica
Lines: Fine!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay! Very funny! Somebody let me out please?! Come on, I’m cold!

Name: monica
Lines: That’s not funny.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m a good person. And I’m a good chef, and I don’t deserve to have marinara sauce all over me! Y’know what, if you want me to quit this bad, then all you have to do is…

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! Chef Geller! Y’know that little speech you made the other day? Well I got a problem with it!

Name: monica
Lines: You do?

Name: joey
Lines: You bet I do! I just ah, wasn’t listening then, that’s all.

Name: monica
Lines: Well if you want a problem? I’ll give you a problem!

Name: joey
Lines: What are you gonna do? You’re gonna fire me?

Name: monica
Lines: You bet your ass I’m gonna fire you! Get out of my kitchen! Get out!!  All right! Anybody else got a problem? How ‘bout you Chuckles? You think this is funny now?

Name: monica
Lines: How about if I dance around all covered in sauce? Huh? You think it’s funny now?

Name: monica
Lines: Good! Now, take those salads to table 4,  And you! Get a haircut!

Name: ross
Lines: NA

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: Are we really in Montreal?!

Name: ross
Lines: Coffee sounds great.  Wait, so, so you live in Montreal?

Name: joey
Lines: Well I guess I should’ve thought about my wife and kids before I talked back to chef Geller!

Name: monica
Lines: Thanks.

Name: joey
Lines: Yep! Looks like it’s gonna be a leeeeean Christmas at the Dragon house this year.

Name: monica
Lines: Enough!

Name: joey
Lines: Lean-lean-lean!

Name: phoebe
Lines: \Went to the store

Name: rachel
Lines: What the hell is that?!!

Name: monica
Lines: Boy, you are really not a morning person.

Name: rachel
Lines: Get up! Get up! Get up! God damn it! Get up, get up, get up, get up, get up!!

Name: rachel
Lines: What is that noise?

Name: chandler
Lines: You!

Name: joey
Lines: It’s the chick! She’s…going through some changes.

Name: monica
Lines: What kind of changes?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well the vet seems to think that’s she’s becoming a rooster.  We’re getting a second opinion.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, what are you doing shopping at eight in the morning?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, I’ve been up since six. Thanks to somebody’s dumb-ass rooster.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You guys you really should get rid of those animals. They shouldn’t be living in an apartment.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah! Especially not with all of these knives and cookbooks around…

Name: phoebe
Lines: All right. I’m gonna go to the fertility doctor and um, see if I’m ready to have Frank and Alice’s embryo transferred into my uterus.

Name: ross
Lines: Now, how will they know if you’re ready?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, they’re just gonna umm, look to see if my endometria layer is thick.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, I can uh, check that for ya.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay everyone, think thick.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hi! Wish me luck!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, good luck.

Name: joey
Lines: Good luck.  And I’m still right!

Name: monica
Lines: That is sooo not true!

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: joey
Lines: She’s mad because I know today’s her laundry day and that means she’s wearing her old lady underpants.

Name: chandler
Lines: I can check that for ya.

Name: monica
Lines: I just—I can’t believe that you think that you and Chandler know me and Rachel better than we know you.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well… we-we do. You can only eat Tic Tacks in even numbers.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, what’s that about?

Name: chandler
Lines: And you… Ross, I believe, if you check Rachel’s bag you will find a half-eaten box of cookies in there.

Name: ross
Lines: These are not.

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m so not impressed. Everybody snacks when they shop.

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh yeah? Ross, how many items left in that bag?

Name: ross
Lines: Five.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, ten bucks says that we can name every item in that bag.

Name: rachel
Lines: How many guesses do you get?

Name: joey
Lines: Six.

Name: ross
Lines: Challenge extended.

Name: monica
Lines: Deal!

Name: ross
Lines: Challenge excepted.

Name: joey
Lines: All right, we’ll start with…apples.

Name: ross
Lines: We’ll be starting with apples.

Name: chandler
Lines: Stop that now!

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes!

Name: joey
Lines: Okay. Uhh, tortilla chips, yogurt.

Name: chandler
Lines: Diet soda.

Name: ross
Lines: Yes. Yes. Yes.

Name: chandler
Lines: Orange juice.

Name: rachel
Lines: No! There’s no orange juice in there! We win!!

Name: monica
Lines: Ha-ha!

Name: ross
Lines: They have another guess.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, well, we won that one.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, the last thing…

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh-oh, oh, oh-oh!

Name: joey
Lines: No-no, not for like another two weeks.

Name: chandler
Lines: I got it! Scotch… tape.

Name: ross
Lines: How did you know she would buy scotch tape?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, we used there’s up last night making scary faces.

Name: monica
Lines: Aww, man!

Name: chandler
Lines: All right! Ten buck! Fork it over! Cough it up! Pay the piper! Gimme it.

Name: monica
Lines: That does not mean you know us better, I-I want a rematch.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, and none of these stupid grocery questions, real personal questions.

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah! And the winner gets a hundred bucks.

Name: joey
Lines: Serious?

Name: monica
Lines: Are you scared?

Name: joey
Lines: No! All right, who-who makes up the questions?

Name: monica
Lines: Ross will do it.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh sure, \Ross will do it!\" It’s not like he has a job

Name: rachel
Lines: Fine! We’ll ask Phoebe.

Name: ross
Lines: No-no-no, I-I wanna play.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh! I knew it! I knew it! I felt really thick this morning.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Embryossss? As in, \More than one?\"

Name: phoebe
Lines: Five? Okay, where am I giving birth, a hospital or a big box under the stairs?

Name: phoebe
Lines: That’s it! 25 percent? That means that’s it’s like 75 percent chance of no baby at all!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, well y’know what, don’t worry you guys, ‘cause I’m-I’m gonna do this as many times as it takes to get it right.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Whoa!! That—okay, that’s a lot of pressure on me and my uterus.  So, well okay, so is there—is maybe is there something that I can do y’know just to like help make sure I get pregnant?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wow! You guys really don’t know anything!

Name: monica
Lines: You guys! Do you realize that any minute now, Phoebe can be pregnant?

Name: joey
Lines: Huh.

Name: rachel
Lines: I know! I know, it’s such a huge, life-altering thing.

Name: joey
Lines: I know.

Name: ross
Lines: The test is ready.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, each team will answer ten questions. The first team that answers the most questions wins. Okay, the categories are, Fears and Pet Peeves, Ancient History, Literature, and It’s All Relative. Now, the coin toss to see who goes first.  Okay, somebody call it this time.

Name: rachel
Lines: Tails!

Name: ross
Lines: It’s heads.  Gentlemen, pick your category.

Name: chandler
Lines: Fears and Pet Peeves.

Name: ross
Lines: What is Monica’s biggest pet peeve?

Name: joey
Lines: Animals dressed as humans.

Name: ross
Lines: That’s correct. Ladies?

Name: monica
Lines: Same category?

Name: ross
Lines: According to Chandler, what phenomenon scares the bejeezus out of him?

Name: monica
Lines: Michael Flatley, Lord of the Dance!

Name: ross
Lines: That is correct.

Name: joey
Lines: The Irish gig guy?!

Name: chandler
Lines: His legs flail about as if independent of his body!

Name: ross
Lines: Gentlemen, you’re pick.

Name: joey
Lines: It’s All Relative.

Name: ross
Lines: Monica and I have a grandmother who died, you both went to her funeral, name that grandmother!

Name: joey
Lines: Nana?

Name: chandler
Lines: She has a real name.

Name: joey
Lines: Althea!

Name: chandler
Lines: Althea?! What are you doing?!

Name: joey
Lines: I took a shot.

Name: chandler
Lines: You're shooting with Althea?!

Name: ross
Lines: Althea is correct.

Name: chandler
Lines: Nice shooting!

Name: rachel
Lines: We’ll take Literature!!

Name: ross
Lines: Every week, the TV Guide comes to Chandler and Joey’s apartment. What name appears on the address label?

Name: rachel
Lines: Chandler gets it! It’s Chandler Bing!

Name: monica
Lines: No!!

Name: ross
Lines: I’m afraid the TV Guide comes to Chinandolor Bong.

Name: monica
Lines: I knew that! Rachel! Use you’re head!

Name: chandler
Lines: Actually, it’s Miss Chinandolor Bong.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hello, tiny embryos. Well, I’m-I’m Phoebe Buffay, hi! I’m-I’m-I’m hoping to be your uterus for the next nine months. You should know, that we’re doing this for Frank and Alice, who you know, you’ve been there! Umm, y’know they want you so much, so when you guys get in there, really grab on. Okay, and-and I promise that I’ll keep you safe and warm until you’re ready to have them take you home, so… Oh! And also, umm next time you see me, I’m screaming, don’t worry, that’s what’s supposed to happen.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh.  Good luck.

Name: ross
Lines: All right, the score is nine to eight in favor of the guys. Ladies if you miss this the game is theirs, pick your category.

Name: rachel
Lines: It’s All Relative!!

Name: ross
Lines: You don’t have to shout everything.

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m sorry!

Name: ross
Lines: Ooh. What is the name of Chandler’s father’s Las Vegas all-male burlesque?

Name: monica
Lines: Viva Las Gaygas!

Name: chandler
Lines: Unfortunately that is correct.

Name: ross
Lines: All right, we have a tie. Luckily, I have prepared for such an event.  The Lightning Round!

Name: ross
Lines: Thirty seconds, all the questions you can answer.

Name: monica
Lines: You guys are dead, I am so good at lighting rounds.

Name: chandler
Lines: I majored in lightning rounds. All right, we’re gonna destroy you.

Name: monica
Lines: Huh, wanna bet?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I’m so confused as to what we’ve been doing so far…

Name: monica
Lines: How about we play for more money, say 150?

Name: ross

Lines: Sure I can, standard shotgun rules, I’m sight of the room and I called it.

Name: monica
Lines: Man, I feel like I’m coming down with something.

Name: joey
Lines: What?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah.  I bet you can’t guess what color my tonsils are? I’ll bet the apartment!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, I would never bet this apartment. It’s too nice.

Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey—ooh Pheebs, are they in there?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Umm, yeah, uh-huh, they’re implanted.

Name: monica
Lines: How do you feel?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, freaked. ‘Cause it turns out that the odds are really sucky. And! This is Frank and Alice’s like only shot. Like, they are literally putting all of their eggs in my basket.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, but I bet it works.

Name: monica
Lines: Really?! How much?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: All right, I’m gonna go take a pregnancy test, right now.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh wow! You can tell this soon.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well the doctor says it takes a couple days, but my body’s always been a little faster than Western medicine.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! I can’t believe you guys are actually think you’re moving in here!

Name: chandler
Lines: Well believe it baby!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well I-I-I’m not moving.

Name: joey
Lines: What?!

Name: rachel
Lines: No, it was a stupid bet! We were just playing a game!

Name: joey
Lines: You can’t just ignore the bet! It’s a bet! You bet and you bet and if you lose, you lose the bet!

Name: monica
Lines: Look Rach, we have to move. I mean if they had lost, we would’ve made them get rid of the birds. Right?

Name: rachel
Lines: Noooo.

Name: monica
Lines: All right, look, I hate this as much as you, but if it makes you feel better, it’s all your fault.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?!

Name: monica
Lines: Chinadolor Bong, come on, we steal that TV Guide every week!

Name: chandler
Lines: I knew it!

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t care, I’m not going anywhere.

Name: chandler
Lines: Cool, girl roommate.

Name: monica
Lines: Well?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Nope, not knocked up yet.

Name: monica
Lines: It’s only been a couple of hours, so just give it some time.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, all right. Meanwhile, I’m gonna do whatever I can to help this so, I’m just gonna y’know, lie it your chair,  Y'know? Yeah, good, I’m let gravity y’know, do its jobs.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, Rach, can you give me a hand with this box?

Name: rachel
Lines: No! Put that box down! We are not going anywhere! This is my apartment and I like it! This is a girl’s apartment! That is a boy’s apartment, it’s dirty and it smells. This is pretty. It’s-it’s so pretty! And look, and it’s-it’s purple! And I’m telling you, you with the steady hand, I am not moving, and now I have got the steady hand.

Name: monica
Lines: I’ll take care of it.

Name: rachel
Lines: That’s right! You do what the hand says!

Name: rachel
Lines: How did it go?

Name: monica
Lines: I lost our mattresses.

Name: phoebe
Lines: \Are you in there little fetus?"

Name: monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh. Oh.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, don’t mix those up, you could really ruin that lollipop.

Name: phoebe
Lines: All right, I will. No, I will. But umm, y’know just remember that it’s still really early, okay so, if it says that I’m not pregnant, that doesn’t mean that I’m not gonna get pregnant, okay and, and just please, just so I don’t go completely nuts, just try not put all your hopes on this.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Great.

Name: rachel
Lines: Y’know what, you are mean boys, who are just being mean!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, don’t get mad at us! No one forced you to raise the stakes!

Name: rachel
Lines: That is not true. She did! She forced me!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, we would still be living here if hadn’t gotten the question wrong!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well it stupid, unfair question!

Name: ross
Lines: Don’t blame the questions!

Name: chandler
Lines: Would you all stop yelling in our apartment! You are ruining moving day for us!

Name: rachel
Lines: Will you stop calling it your apartment!

Name: joey
Lines: But it is our apartment!

Name: rachel
Lines: No it’s not!

Name: phoebe
Lines: You guys! You guys! You’re gonna have a baby! They’re gonna have a baby!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, but this can’t be good for the baby.

Name: monica
Lines: I can’t find garbage bags!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, I think I saw some in here.

Name: monica
Lines: What is it?!

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t know! But maybe if we keep that drawer shut, it’ll die.

Name: monica
Lines: I can’t believe we’re living here!

Name: chandler
Lines: What?! What-what is it?!

Name: joey
Lines: Did you see the size of the closets?!

Name: chandler
Lines: I can’t believe we live here!

Name: rachel
Lines: What the hell is that?!!

Name: monica
Lines: Boy, you are really not a morning person.

Name: rachel
Lines: Get up! Get up! Get up! God damn it! Get up, get up, get up, get up, get up!!

Name: rachel

Lines: You!

Lines: It’s the chick! She’s…going through some changes.

Name: monica

Lines: Well the vet seems to think that’s she’s becoming a rooster.  We’re getting a second opinion.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Lines: Hey, what are you doing shopping at eight in the morning?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, I’ve been up since six. Thanks to somebody’s dumb-ass rooster.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah! Especially not with all of these knives and cookbooks around…

Lines: Now, how will they know if you’re ready?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, they’re just gonna umm, look to see if my endometria layer is thick.

Lines: Oh, I can uh, check that for ya.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay everyone, think thick.

Lines: Hi! Wish me luck!

Lines: Good luck.  And I’m still right!

Lines: That is sooo not true!

Name: joey
Lines: Thanks.

Lines: Okay, wait. All right, that’s it, okay, I’m out of here. I am not going to be embarrassed anymore!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey! I just spoke to your dad, and you know what? He seems to think we’ll be able to find a new place for the wedding.

Name: ross
Lines: Whoa-whoa-what? You found a place?

Name: ross
Lines: She said what?

Name: ross
Lines: Postpone it? Emily, do you think Monica realises how much our parents spent on this wedding? Do you my sister’s teeny-tiny little brain comprehends that people took time out of their lives to fly thousands of miles to be here, huh?  This isn’t right.

Name: ross
Lines: I can’t ask people to do that? Would you ask people to do that?

Name: ross
Lines: The only thing I understand is; postponing it is not an option. This is when we’re getting married.

Name: ross
Lines: No. I’m saying it’s now.

Lines: Hey!

Lines: Hi.

Name: phoebe

Name: rachel

Okay? And you’re going to remember all of the bad things about him. All right? Really focus on his flaws.

And then you run your hands through his hair, but eew-oh gross it’s some kind of grease, it’s—uck! Hah?

Lines: Oh.  Sorry!

We dreamed about the perfect wedding, and the perfect place, with the perfect four-tiered wedding cake  Thanks. But the most important part is that we had the perfect guy who understood just how important all that other stuff was.

Lines: Sorry.

Lines: Sorry.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Eeeee-

Lines: Argh-argh!!  Ooh, soft. Is this mink?

Lines: So basically, this is a getting-rid-of-everything-Rachel-ever-used sale.

Name: ross
Lines: Touched. Used. Sat on. Sleep on.

Do you always like it? No! Do you do it? Yes! Because it's not all laughing, happy, candy in the sky, drinking coffee at Central Perk all the time! It's real life, okay? It's what grown-ups do!
