Lines: Tonight? You-you didn't say it was going to be at nighttime.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey! Oh, I'm so glad you're home, I thought tonight we could finally organize these photos!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh, thank God! Finally!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, I've broken them down into categories. Okay, we have uh, we got holidays, birthdays, candids, y'know… And then what I've done is I've cross-referenced them by subject. Right? So if you're looking up, oh let's say birthdays and dogs, you get Photo 152. See?

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh, it's me and La Poo! Wow! I miss that dog.

Name: monica
Lines: You can also find him under umm, dog and dead.

Name: rachel
Lines: Great! Thanks!

Name: monica
Lines: All right, hand me that other box of photos; that's the very last one.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oops. Sorry! Well, good thing you number all of them, huh?

Name: monica
Lines: I hadn't! Photo 152 was a prototype.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohhhh. Honey, honey, honey, it's okay, it's okay honey. I'm gonna fix you a drink, huh? Maybe a margarita?

Name: ross
Lines: Ross has the blender! Ugh, everything's just falling apart!

Name: rachel
Lines: No honey, it's okay! Listen, I'll got to Ross's and get the blender, you get all the margarita stuff ready.

Name: monica
Lines: All right, he's keys are in the drawer. Y'know what? I also need some cash.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, you want me to stop at the ATM?

Name: monica
Lines: Nah, while you're at Ross's if you see any lying around…

Name: rachel
Lines: What?!

Name: monica
Lines: What?! I-I-I don't, I don't do that!

Name: ross
Lines: That was so cool man, the way you leaned on that guy.

Name: chandler
Lines: It is starting to get dark out there.

Name: ross
Lines: He told you everything! I mean you totally cracked him!

Name: chandler
Lines: But it is officially nighttime.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh hey, Gary, want me to grab the berry for ya?

Name: ross
Lines: It's the—Chandler!!

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, I got it! This place makes the best sandwich in the world!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh-ho, yeah!

Name: joey
Lines: Yep!

Name: joey
Lines: Even though my tax dollars paid for this car.

Name: chandler
Lines: Your tax dollars?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: Wow! That sandwich really does smell good.

Name: joey
Lines: Did I say you could smell it?!

Name: chandler
Lines: I can't smell your sandwich?

Name: joey
Lines: Half the taste is in the smell! You-you're sucking up all the tastiness!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, I'll give them back.  Look! What is so great about that sandwich?

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, imagine the best sex you've ever had.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: joey
Lines: Are you thinking about Monica?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, what's that like?

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh please don't be from a real dinosaur! Please! Please! Please! Please! Please! Please! Please! Please!

Name: monica
Lines: Rach! It's me! Pick up!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey! What's up?!

Name: monica
Lines: I need a few more things to make the margaritas. Uhh, I need some salt, some margarita mix, and tequila.

Name: rachel
Lines: So all we have is ice?

Name: monica
Lines: See if he has ice.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh. Oh!

Name: ross
Lines: So where are we going next?

Name: chandler
Lines: Sur-surprise him? We're not, we're not gonna make anybody mad are we?

Name: joey
Lines: Come on man!  Listen so uh, are you gonna squeeze the perps shoes a little bit before he lawyers up?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, no one talks like that!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh what? Like your Mr. Cop!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, I'm more cop than you two!

Name: chandler
Lines: How do you figure that?

Name: ross
Lines: Hello! I'm in the front seat, okay? I'm Gary's partner!

Name: chandler
Lines: Y'know, when you say partner it doesn't sound cop. It, it sounds gay.

Name: ross
Lines: Umm, jealous!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, no problem.

Name: ross
Lines: Sorry! Sorry! Oh,  Hey Gary, who am I? Phone home!

Name: chandler
Lines: Look at Officer Ross riding back here with the visitors.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, what's up with that Serpico?

Name: monica
Lines: Nooo!

Name: rachel
Lines: I know!

Name: monica
Lines: Well thank God you were here! I mean, we have to erase that!

Name: rachel
Lines: What?! We can't do that!

Name: monica
Lines: We have too! I mean what if Ross's hears that and then calls her back and then they get back together? Is that what you want? Ross back with that controlling, neurotic, crazy Emily? The Emily that wouldn't let him see you?

Name: rachel
Lines: Noo! Oh no! No! God no! He should not get back together with her. I know that! You know that! Even Ross knows that! But that still doesn’t give us the right to erase his message!

Name: monica
Lines: I'm his sister, okay? I love him! I don't want to see him get hurt! Come on! Doesn’t that give me the right to control him—help him?

Name: rachel
Lines: I don't think he's the one who needs help.

Name: monica
Lines: No, look, she's obviously unstable, okay? I mean she's thinking about running out on her wedding day.  Okay, fine, all right, but that's y'know, it's different! Although it did involve a lot of the same people.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ugh!

Name: monica
Lines: Y'know what, this is obviously some kind of twisted joke she's trying to play on him.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, you are crazy! I'm sorry, but she sounded generally upset! I mean, listen!

Name: rachel
Lines: Noooooooo!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, y'know, we-we're safe right? I mean nothing bad can go down!

Name: ross
Lines: What is it?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, hurry up. I want to sign that.

Name: ross
Lines: What? What? What? What is it?

Name: joey
Lines: Is everything okay?

Name: chandler
Lines: What's going on?

Name: joey
Lines: You okay man?

Name: ross
Lines: Uh-huh. Thank Joey!

Name: chandler
Lines: Uh, HELLO!!

Name: joey
Lines: Hi.

Name: monica
Lines: All right, I guess we should go.

Name: rachel
Lines: No, wait. Wait.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh yeah right!

Name: rachel
Lines: No, Monica! Monica! We have to fix this!

Name: monica
Lines: There's nothing we can do. You erased the message!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah well unless we tell him.

Name: monica
Lines: Well, if you're gonna be totally rational about this, I can't argue with you! All right? Fine, if you wanna tell him, tell him. I just don't want to be a part of it.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, maybe that's Emily calling back to leave the exact same message.

Name: ross
Lines: NA

Name: monica
Lines: Wow! Play that message for Emily and this whole problem goes away!

Name: rachel
Lines: Right?

Name: phoebe
Lines: John Glenn is here?!

Name: ross
Lines: Pheebs, we had the most incredible night! Okay, so, we're in the car…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hi!

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, okay, so we're in the car. Right? And bang! A shot was fired. And Joey with no regard for his own safety throws himself on me!

Name: phoebe
Lines: My God, Joey!

Name: chandler
Lines: It was a car backfire!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, but-but he didn't know that!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, I didn't know that.

Name: ross
Lines: And it could've just as easily have been a bullet.

Name: chandler
Lines: Who jumps at loud noises!

Name: ross
Lines: Wow! I could've died tonight.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah! If the car that backfired had run over you! Y'know what, I think I'll go home before Ross starts rambling about his newfound respect for life.

Name: ross
Lines: I do have a newfound respect for life.

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah! Sure! Yep!  Oh, y'know what? If I heard a shot right now, I'd throw my body on you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Bye!

Name: joey
Lines: Cut it out Ross! I hate to have to save your life and kick your ass in the same day!

Name: joey
Lines: Dude! How come you took off?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, I just went for a walk, around the living room. Whatever…

Name: joey
Lines: Is something wrong?

Name: chandler
Lines: No. No I'm just tired. Y'know, from-from the walk.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: You dove in front of Ross! Ross!

Name: joey
Lines: That's what this is about! Oh my God, you hate Ross!

Name: chandler
Lines: I do not hate Ross!

Name: joey
Lines: Of course you do! I saved him! You're mad at me! It all adds up! You want Ross out of the picture.

Name: chandler
Lines: What picture?

Name: joey
Lines: I don't know, but I don't like what I'm hearing!

Name: chandler
Lines: Look I'm very glad that you saved Ross from the car backfire, but y'know, it could've been a bullet and you y'know, you didn't try to save me!

Name: joey
Lines: Ohh, you're upset because you think I chose Ross over you! No! I…knew…you could take care of yourself. Y'know, I mean Ross, he need help. He's not street like us!

Name: chandler
Lines: When it comes down to it, you would risk your life for Ross before you would for me. That's the bottom line.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, no, not exactly! All right, look, I, I wasn't trying to save Ross. Okay? My sandwich was next to Ross. All right? I was, I was trying to save my sandwich.

Name: chandler
Lines: From a bullet!

Name: joey
Lines: I know it doesn't make much sense…

Name: chandler
Lines: Much sense?!

Name: joey
Lines: Look Chandler, it was instinct! Okay? I just went for it!

Name: chandler
Lines: So you risked your life, for a sandwich!

Name: joey
Lines: I know it sounds crazy, but Chandler this is  the greatest sandwich in the world!

Name: chandler
Lines: So you didn't uh, choose Ross before me.

Name: joey
Lines: No! I would never do that! You-you're like my brother!

Name: chandler
Lines: Really?!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah! In fact, to prove how much you mean to me,  here.

Name: chandler
Lines: Thanks.

Name: joey
Lines: No, eh, oh-oi, easy, it's not a hot dog!

Name: joey
Lines: How good is that?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh-oi-ho, yeah!

Name: joey
Lines: See?

Name: chandler
Lines: Hm-hmm.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh-whoa-hey, dude, what are you doing?!

Name: chandler
Lines: I thought you were showing me how much you mean to me.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah. With a bite!  Gee-e-e-eez!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey! Hi!

Name: ross
Lines: Rach, what uh, what are you doing here?

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey! Y'know what? You are in our apartment all the time! Okay? This is, this is just a drop in the bucket mister!

Name: ross
Lines: Y'know, it-it doesn't matter. The important thing is that you're here. You're my friend, and you're here. Oh!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, just a little scared. What's going on Ross?

Name: ross
Lines: The most amazing thing happened tonight. I thought my number was up. I had an actual near death experience!

Name: rachel
Lines: What?! What? What happened?!

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, okay, we were on the ride along with Gary, right?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah!

Name: ross
Lines: And somebody took a shot at me!

Name: rachel
Lines: Really?!

Name: ross
Lines: No, a car backfired, but  I thought somebody was taking a shot at me. And Rach, I…I survived! And I was filled with this-this great respect for life. Y'know? I-I want to experience every moment. I want to seize every opportunity. I-I am seeing everything so-so clearly now.

Name: rachel
Lines: Because a car backfired?

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, why are you here?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, I-I-I don't know how this fits into your whole \seizing\" thing but um

Name: ross
Lines: You talked to her?

Name: rachel
Lines: No, she left a message.  something wrong with your machine.

Name: ross
Lines: Well, okay, what-what did she say?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, uh something about having second thoughts about the wedding and did you guys make a mistake breaking up and uh, she wants you to call her.

Name: ross
Lines: Wow!

Name: rachel
Lines: Now, that-that was a good thing that I told you, right?

Name: ross
Lines: Huh? Yeah! Yes, of course!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. Thank you! Thank you! Because—I'm sorry, all right. Because y'know what? She didn't want me—not important. The point is, I was right. Your decision. Okay? I was right.  Your decision.

Name: ross
Lines: Right. I guess, I guess I should call Emily.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, no, that's not the right decision. That's not, that's not right, no Ross-Ross, come on! I mean, that woman made you miserable! Okay, Ross, do you really want to get back into that?

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, look, yesterday I would've even considered calling her back, but my ex-wife calls on the same day I have a near death experience. I mean, that-that has got to mean something!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ugh, Ross! That was not a near death experience! That was barely an experience!

Name: ross
Lines: You weren't there! Okay, maybe this is something that I-I'm supposed to seize! Y'know?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, y'know what? Maybe, this is not about seizing stuff. Maybe this is about escaping stuff.

Name: ross
Lines: Huh.

Name: rachel
Lines: I mean, look-look today you escaped  death, y'know? And maybe this is a chance for you to escape getting back together with Emily?

Name: ross
Lines: That does make sense. Because I do wanna seize some opportunity, but I-I really don't wanna see or talk to her.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, there you go!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah. Maybe today is just, close call day.

Name: rachel
Lines: Close call day.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, thanks Rach.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh, honey no problem. Okay.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh wait-wait-wait! The message is blinking. Maybe you didn't erase it.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh yeah, no that's-that's an old message, nobody needs to hear that.

Name: rachel
Lines: No.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey umm, was-was Monica here?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, I want my money back.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, uh you-you probably need that for stamps, right?

Name: ross
Lines: Hey Pheebs, has Gary ever been shot at for real?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes. Once. Yeah, a little. He kinda did it to himself. It's not really a good story.

Name: ross
Lines: I wonder how I would react under fire, y'know? And not backfire but-but heavy fire, like I was in a war or something.

Name: monica
Lines: Man, I would be great in a war! I mean, I really, I think I would make a fantastic military leader. I mean I know I would make General way before any of you guys.

Name: chandler
Lines: Before or after you were shot by your own troops?

Name: ross
Lines: I know where Joey would be. He would be down in the foxhole protecting all of us.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes, if the foxhole was lined with sandwiches.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, hero sandwiches.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well you all know that I'm a pacifist so I'm not interested in war in any way.  Not you Joey.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I'm fine, thanks.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, see, I can't pull of baby-doll can I?

Name: monica
Lines: No. I think we learned that from the sugarlips incident. I'm gonna get some tea.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hiya doin' pumpkin?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Nope.

Name: monica
Lines: So it looks like it's going really well for you two, huh?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: monica
Lines: I think that is so great! When are you gonna ask her?

Name: monica
Lines: I swear, I promise. I promise. Oh my God, I'm so excited! {And I just can't hide it! I'm about to lose control and I think I like it! Sorry, just couldn't resist it.} All right, listen let me tell you, do not get her flowers. Okay? Because y'know, she cries when they die, and there's the whole funeral…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay. Bye!

Name: phoebe
Lines: So, what movie should we see?

Name: monica
Lines: Gary's gonna ask you to move in with him!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?! Really?!

Name: monica
Lines: He just told me at the counter. He made me promise not to tell, but I couldn't hold it in any longer!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can't believe this!

Name: chandler
Lines: Right, because it's fast. Because, it's so fast. It's fast!

Name: monica
Lines: Relax! It's Phoebe! Not you!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh! Good for you Pheebs, way to go!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, but it is fast. Isn't it?

Name: monica
Lines: Ohhhh!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, I like him a lot but I don't think I'm ready for this!

Name: chandler
Lines: So, what are you gonna do?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I don't know. I'll just handle it—I'll ask you to talk to him!

Name: chandler
Lines: Me?! Why me?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Because you are so afraid of commitment! You talk to him, make him scared like you! Make him a…man!

Name: chandler
Lines: I'll try, but I'm not sure what good it would do, y'know? Because I'm a lot less afraid of commitment than I used to be.

Name: monica
Lines: That is so sweet!

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Lines: Hey Ross, is uh, is Staten Island really an island?

Name: ross
Lines: Uh-huh, that's why they call it Staten Island.

Name: joey
Lines: Ohhh. I thought it was like Long Island.

Name: ross
Lines: Also an island.

Lines: Hey, what time is it?

Lines: Wow! You realize that we've been throwing this ball, without dropping it, for like an hour?

Name: ross
Lines: Are you serious?!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah. I realized it about a half-hour ago but I didn't want to say anything 'cause I didn't want to jinx it.

Name: ross
Lines: Wow! We are pretty good at this! Hey! We totally forgot about lunch!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, I-I, I think that's the first time I ever missed a meal!  Yeah, my pants are a little loose!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey, you guys…

Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Is Monica here?

Name: rachel
Lines: All right listen umm, I just bought something I'm not sure she's gonna like it, and it's gonna seem a little crazy, but this is something that I wanted since I was a little girl.

Name: ross
Lines: You bought Shawn Cassidy!

Name: rachel
Lines: Noo! I wish! Okay, you ready?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay!  Check it out!

Name: ross
Lines: What-what is it?!

Name: joey
Lines: What the hell is that?!!

Name: rachel
Lines: It's a, it's a cat!

Name: joey
Lines: That, is not a cat! {I have to agree with Joey on this one.}

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes it is!

Name: ross
Lines: Why is it inside out?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Excuse me! But this is a purebred, show-quality Sphinx cat!

Name: ross
Lines: How much did you pay for that?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, it was a little extravagant, but I a pretty good deal.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah? How much?

Name: rachel
Lines: A thousand bucks.

Name: ross
Lines: ON A CAT??!!!!

Name: joey
Lines: It's not a cat!

Name: rachel
Lines: All right listen ball boys! My grandmother had one of these when I was a little girl and it was the sweetest thing! I mean it was so cute, it would sit in my lap and purr all day long, and I would drag a shoestring on the ground and he would chase it!

Name: ross
Lines: Free cats do that too, y'know. {Which reminds me, if I might get a little political here, support your local animal shelter. Pet shops are not the place to buy dogs and cats from, you get a much better deal from the shelter, plus they probably won't die on you in a week and a half. If you want a leash, go to the pet shop. If you want the dog for that leash, go to the shelter and save it's life. Now back to regularly scheduled programming.}

Name: joey
Lines: It's not a cat!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ugh! Look you guys, I'm really excited about this! Okay? I don't care what you think! I'm gonna go set up a little litter box for Mrs. Whiskerson.  Well, what am I gonna call her? Fluffy?!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, you wanna get something to eat or uh, do you wanna see how long we can throw this ball back and forth? Huh?

Name: joey
Lines: Uhh, the ball thing.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah?

Name: joey
Lines: Hey Ross, wouldn't it be great if we could go two straight hours without dropping it?!

Name: ross
Lines: Uhh, yeah it would! Let's do it!

Name: joey
Lines: Okay!

Name: joey
Lines: Uh-oh.

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: joey
Lines: I have to pee. And Rachel's in the bathroom!

Name: joey
Lines: Man, I didn't think we were gonna make it!

Name: ross
Lines: I know!  Don't switch hands, okay?

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey ladies! What are you in here for?

Name: chandler
Lines: Gary, I'm here to report a crime.

Name: chandler
Lines: It is a crime that you and I don't spend more time together.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I heard that you thinking about asking Phoebe to move in with you and I thought maybe, we should have a talk. Man to uh, me.

Name: chandler
Lines: Uh, are you crazy? Are you insane? If you live with Phoebe, you two are gonna be y'know, live-living together!

Name: chandler
Lines: You mean scared.

Name: chandler
Lines: Scared? Happy?

Name: chandler
Lines: I am trying to open your eyes, my man! Don't you see, if you lived with Phoebe she's always gonna be there. You're gonna get home, she's there. You go to bed, she's there. You wake up and oh yes, she's there!

Name: chandler
Lines: Were you're parents happy, or something?

Name: chandler
Lines: Wow, y'know when you say it, it doesn't sound so scary.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I think I do! Y'know what? You move in with her! You move in with her right now! Maybe I should in with Monica!

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, you're right about that.

Name: ross
Lines: …now when they found the remains of the Mesozoic Mastodon they discovered what appeared to be the remains of a Paleozoic Amphibian in its jaws! How did it get there?!

Name: joey
Lines: Maybe this should be more of a quiet game.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey guys!

Name: joey
Lines: Hi!

Name: monica
Lines: Joey, I left my watch on the counter last night.  It was right here, where is it?

Name: joey
Lines: I don't know.

Name: monica
Lines: All right, come on, I'm-I'm late for work!

Name: ross
Lines: How do you know? You don't have a watch.

Name: monica
Lines: Guys, could you please just stop throwing the ball for one minute and just help me find it!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, I don't know…. Yeah, can't do it.

Name: monica
Lines: What?!

Name: ross
Lines: Monica, whatever you do, do not drop that ball!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, we haven't dropped it in…

Name: ross

Name: monica
Lines: Really?!

Lines: NA

Lines: Hey Rach!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey.

Lines: Check it out! Almost 3 hours without droppin' it!

Lines: Oh, wow! Congratulations, that's quite a waste of time.

Name: monica
Lines: Rach?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah?

Lines: You have scratches all over you, what happened?

Lines: Well, it's my cat.

Name: monica
Lines: What?!

Lines: Oh yeah, I got a cat.

Lines: I don't want a cat!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, don't worry, it's not a cat.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: You guys this cat is nothing like my grandmother's cat. I mean, it's not sweet, it's not cute, I even dragged that little string on the ground, and it just flipped out and scratched the hell out of me. And I swear, I know this sounds crazy, but every time this cat hisses at me I know it's saying, \Rachel!\"

Lines: Doesn't sound as crazy as paying a thousand dollars for a cat.

Lines: What?! You paid a thousand dollars for a cat when you owe me 300!!

Lines: Well, I was gonna let you play with it.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hi!

Lines: Hmm, did you talk to Gary about the moving in thing?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes I did, and I think you should do it.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?!

Name: chandler
Lines: He's a great guy, y'know? And he loves you a lot, you are a very lucky lady.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You are useless! Freaking out about commitment is the one thing you can do! The one thing! And you can't even do that right! God!

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m sorry.  If you ask me, I'd move in with him.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ohh!! God!  Get out of here, good for nothing.

Lines: Oh Ross, come on! This is not, this is not a marriage!! This is the world’s worst hangover! Ross, listen, if you do not get this annulment, I will!

Name: ross
Lines: All right. All right, I’ll do it.

Name: rachel
Lines: Thank you.  Hey-hey umm, uh, is there, is there any such thing as an annulment shower?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, okay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: And I have your name and the fact that you’re a drifter, so the ball’s pretty much in your court.

Name: joey
Lines: Come on Pheebs! I can’t take this anymore! Let-let me make it up to you. Huh?  Ground control to Major Tom. Commencing countdown, engines on. Take your protein pills and put your helmet on!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Stop it! Stop it no! That’s not fair! Y’know I can’t resist that beautiful voice!

Name: joey
Lines: Pheebs, I am so sorry! I know I promised you a fun road trip with your friend and I didn’t deliver. But-but-but now I know that you think being awake is an important part of friendship! So, so, so I will strive to-to stay awake for as long as I know you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You can still sleep at night and stuff.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, thank you. So, can we play 20 Questions now? I’ve got a really good one! I’ve been thinking about it since Kansas.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay. Is it a kind of hot sandwich?

Name: joey
Lines: Yes.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Is it a meatball sub?

Name: joey
Lines: That is incredible! You are the master!

Name: rachel
Lines: Huh, that’s funny. You look like you’re gonna be the…

Name: monica
Lines: No, don’t say it! Don’t even think it!

Name: rachel
Lines: All right. Okay Chandler, enjoy your handful.

Name: chandler
Lines: All right, should we just, should we just get married? Y’know? I mean should we just do it? All the signs are telling us to do it.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m sick of the signs! It’s too fast, I’m happy the way things are!

Name: chandler
Lines: Me too!

Name: monica
Lines: I don’t want things to change! Do you?

Name: chandler
Lines: No!

Name: monica
Lines: All right then, then nothing changes! Everything is great! Everything stays the same! And you go unpack because it’s been three days and it’s driving me insane!

Name: chandler
Lines: Jeez, relax! It’s not like we’re mar-ah-ah!!

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know I was thinking, what if I uh, unpack here?

Name: monica
Lines: Then all your stuff would be here.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, what if all my stuff was here?

Name: monica
Lines: Then you’d be going back and forth all the time, I mean it doesn’t make any sense.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay. What if we lived together and you understand what I’m saying?

Name: monica
Lines: Live together? There have been no signs for that.

Name: chandler
Lines: Me asking is kind of a sign.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay!!!!!

Name: monica
Lines: Yes! Okay! Okay! Wait-wait-wait!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Here’s your key

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh thanks.

Name: monica
Lines: Here’s your key. All right, you have to christen it! Now, go out and come back in!

Name: chandler
Lines: The door hasn’t been locked in five years, but okay!  Ready?!

Name: monica
Lines: Ready!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, a little problem. The key broke in the lock and I can’t get in!

Name: monica
Lines: Wait! Oh my God! I can’t get out!

Name: chandler
Lines: This is not a sign!

Name: monica
Lines: No, it’s not a sign! It’s a very old key!

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s an old key!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God it’s old!

Name: chandler
Lines: I love you!

Name: monica
Lines: I love you!

Name: chandler
Lines: Are you hugging the door right now.

Name: monica
Lines: No.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah-yeah, me neither.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey, so did everything go all right with the annulment?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, yeah, no problems. It’s all taken care of.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross, thank you. Hey, do you guys wanna go see a movie?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh yeah, why not?

Name: rachel
Lines: Pheebs?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No thanks, I’ve already seen one.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, umm, I’m gonna get my sweater.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay.  You uh, you wanna hear something weird?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Always.

Name: ross
Lines: I didn’t get the annulment.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?!

Name: ross
Lines: We’re still married! Don’t tell Rachel. See you later.

Name: joey
Lines: What are you doing?

Name: chandler
Lines: The key’s stuck in the lock.

Name: joey
Lines: I can fix it. Hold on.

Name: chandler
Lines: It still doesn’t work.

Name: joey
Lines: I’m not finished.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh.

Name: chandler
Lines: Nice job Joe! You’re quite the craftsmen.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey, so did everything go okay with the annulment?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, yeah, no problems. It’s all taken care of.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross, thank you. Hey, do you guys wanna go see a movie?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh yeah, why not?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, umm, I’m gonna get my sweater.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay.  You uh, you wanna hear something weird?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Always.

Name: ross
Lines: I didn’t get the annulment.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?!

Name: ross
Lines: We’re still married! Don’t tell Rachel. See you later.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, do you have any gum?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh? Yeah! Sure!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wait! Wait! Hi! Listen, Ross can I just talk to you for just a second?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh but Phoebe, we’re gonna be late for the movie.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, there’s a cab! Taxi!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, we’re, we’re actually just gonna walk ‘cause it’s right up there at the Angelica.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, the Angelica!! Go! Go!  You didn’t get the annulment?!!

Name: ross
Lines: I know.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ross?!

Name: ross
Lines: Well, I tried! But when I got to my lawyer’s office all I could hear was, \Three divorces. Three divorces!\" Look

Name: phoebe
Lines: Don’t be worried about that! Your tombstone can say whatever you want it to say! It could say, Ross Geller, Good at Marriage! Y’know? Mine’s gonna say Phoebe Buffay, Buried Alive.

Name: ross
Lines: Look, all I know is I-I can’t have another failed marriage!

Name: phoebe
Lines: So okay what? You’re gonna be married to a girl who doesn’t even know about it?!—Op, woman! Sorry.

Name: ross
Lines: Well, okay so, I don’t have it all worked out quite yet. Just don’t say anything to Rachel, please?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Rachel is one of my closest friends.  Although, being the only one who knows anything about this does makes me feel special. Okay!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, stop-stop! Phoebe?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey Rach!

Name: rachel
Lines: What was that?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Sorry, mix up. Hey, how was the movie?

Name: rachel
Lines: I haven’t seen it yet!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well then you’d better hurry! The Angelica! Go! Go!

Name: rachel
Lines: Noooooooo!!

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know when we move in together, can I get a gumball machine?

Name: monica
Lines: Of course! Joey wouldn’t let you have one?

Name: chandler
Lines: No. When it comes to sweets, he’s surprisingly strict.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, have you figured out a way to tell him you’re moving out?

Name: chandler
Lines: No, no, I keep trying, y’know? I can get out, \Joey

Name: monica
Lines: Y’know, I really have to tell Rachel, but I… We just have to get it over with! Y’know, the next time we see them we’re just gonna tell them. Okay? That’s it.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, so that’s this is gonna work now? You’re just gonna order me around all the time?

Name: monica
Lines: Pretty much.

Name: chandler
Lines: All right.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey Monica!

Name: monica
Lines: Hi!

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: monica
Lines: Joey, we have something to tell you.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh my God! You’re pregnant!

Name: chandler
Lines: No-o-o!  No-o-o! Look Joey, here’s the thing, Monica and I have decided to live together, here. So, I’m gonna be moving out man.

Name: joey
Lines: Wow!

Name: monica
Lines: Wait! Joey! Joey! Are you okay?!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, I gotta go! I got an acting job.  Like you’d believe that. This sucks!

Name: chandler
Lines: Look, I-I’m just gonna be right across the hall and I promise you, the minute Monica and I break up I’m moving right back in with you!

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: monica
Lines: Hey Pheebs!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, have you seen Rachel?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, why?

Name: monica
Lines: I have some pretty exciting news!

Name: phoebe
Lines: You’re pregnant!

Name: monica
Lines: No! Chandler and I are moving in together!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey! Hi!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: ross
Lines: What’s up?

Name: monica
Lines: Well umm, Chandler and I are moving in together.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh my God. Ohh, my little sister and my best friend…shaking up. Oh, that’s great. That’s great.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Guys, I’m happy too.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, come here!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wow! Big day huh? People moving in, people getting annulled…

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, I gotta go find Rachel but umm, if you guys see her could you please try to give her some really bad news so that mine doesn’t seem so bad?

Name: ross
Lines: Bye.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hmm, something bad to tell Rachel… Bad news for Rachel, what could that be?!

Name: ross
Lines: Could ya just, could ya just lay off, please? All right? My life is an embarrassment! I should go live under somebody’s stairs!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ross, it’s not that big a deal! So you’ll been divorced three times, you’ll still have a life, you’ll go on dates…

Name: ross
Lines: No! No, I won’t! I’ll be at the bottom of the dating barrel now. The only guys below me will be Four Divorce Guy uh, Murderer Guy, and-and, Geologists.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ross, you’re being ridiculous! Okay? You are cute and smart and sweet and that is much more important than three stupid divorces!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh yeah? Have you ever dated anyone who has been divorced three times?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Y’know that’s really fair. Y’know? Most guys who have been divorced three times are like 60. Ross, nobody cares about this except you! This-this embarrassment thing is all in your head! Here, I’ll show you! Come here.

Name: ross
Lines: What?! Why?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hi! Hi! Listen, my friend Ross is about to be divorced for the third time, but wouldn’t you date him?

Name: ross
Lines: And if you wait right here, I’ll go get Ross.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: monica
Lines: Ugh, I thought you were Rachel!

Name: chandler
Lines: What gave me away?

Name: monica
Lines: I just tell her, I have to get it over with. I told Ross and Phoebe and she’s the only one left!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, so that’s it, everybody knows! It’s official, we’re moving in together. No turning back. Are ya scared? Are ya?

Name: monica
Lines: No.

Name: chandler
Lines: Wow that was my scariest voice! You’re very brave.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ugh, the worse day! Y’know, you think you’re making progress at work and then your boss calls you Raquel.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey listen, for the first four years of my work everybody called me Sha-la-lap.  Seriously.

Name: rachel
Lines: I believe you. So, it was right in the middle of a staff meeting so of course no one else wants to correct her so everyone else is calling me Raquel! By the end of the day, the mailroom guys were calling me Rocky!

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I-I still think you’re very-very nice and very pretty…

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Name: monica
Lines: Have a seat.  Okay, listen umm, Chandler and I are going to live together, here.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! That’s so great! I’m so happy for you guys!

Name: monica
Lines: Really?!

Name: rachel
Lines: And that was so sweet of you to ask! Oh my God, the three of us are gonna have such a good time living together!

Name: monica
Lines: Yes, we are.

Name: rachel
Lines: And Chandler, you’re gonna have to watch those long showers you take in the morning because you know Raquel can’t be late.

Name: chandler
Lines: Rach…

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah, he’s gonna work on that.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh! This is so exciting! Oh God…  Come and knock on my door…

Name: monica
Lines: We’ll be waiting for you…

Name: ross
Lines: …once you know the stories, it’s not that bad. First marriage, wife’s hidden sexuality, not my fault. Second marriage, said the wrong name at the altar, a little my fault. Third marriage, well they really shouldn’t allow you to get married when you’re that drunk and have writing all over your face, Nevada’s fault.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, so what do you think ladies? Who wouldn’t be interested? Who wouldn’t want to date him?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, what about you?  Wouldn’t you want a date?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Whatever! What about you Meg?

Name: ross
Lines: What?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: NA

Name: ross
Lines: This is crazy! I mean, yes-yes Rachel is my good friend and I-I have loved her in the past, but now, she is just my wife! Phoebe, will you-will you help me out here?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, I thought you loved her when you-when you married her.

Name: ross
Lines: We were drunk! I would’ve married uh, Joey with that amount of alcohol!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey! You could do a lot worse than Joey Tribbiani!!

Name: ross
Lines: Look, I’m sorry, but you guys are wrong. I just don’t want to be divorced three times.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes, and now he’s using this three divorces reason because he wants to stay married to her because he loves her. I must say, \Well done!\" Bravo Meg."

Name: ross
Lines: —Nothing!!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, when are we gonna tell Rachel what is actually gonna happen?

Name: monica
Lines: Soon! I-I just couldn’t before. You saw how upset Joey got! I couldn’t do that to her, she’s my best friend!

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, Joey’s my best friend.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m not your best friend?

Name: chandler
Lines: You just said… Of course you’re my best friend. Would you please tell Rachel though?

Name: monica
Lines: All right, all right, at least I’m prepared.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey-hey!

Name: monica
Lines: These aren’t for you! Are you upset?

Name: chandler
Lines: I am now!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey roomie!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, bye!

Name: monica
Lines: Rach, there’s something uh, important I have to tell you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Are you pregnant?!

Name: monica
Lines: No! But, I’m throwing this shirt away! I think there was a little misunderstanding before.

Name: rachel
Lines: Um-hmm.

Name: monica
Lines: Umm, when I said that uh, that Chandler and I wanted to umm, live together we meant alone together.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! Oh, that’s funny, I can’t believe I did that.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh no sweetie, no! This is my fault, I wasn’t clear! I’m really sorry. And listen, you take as much time as you need to move out okay? There’s absolutely no rush.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay. Don’t you want a cookie?

Name: rachel
Lines: Sure?  Thanks.

Name: monica
Lines: Maybe, do you need a tissue?

Name: rachel
Lines: Monica, where did you get these?!

Name: monica
Lines: I made them!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ooh, good God, they’re so yummy!

Name: joey
Lines: God, it’s gonna so weird like when I come home and you’re not here. Y’know? No more Joey and Chan’s. No more J and C’s. \You wanna go over to Joey and Chandler’s?\" \"Can’t

Name: chandler
Lines: Look, I’m just gonna be across the hall, we can still do all the same stuff.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah but we won’t be able to like get up in the middle of the night and have those long talks about our feelings and the future.

Name: chandler
Lines: Not once did we do that.

Name: monica
Lines: Hi.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: Hi.

Name: monica
Lines: So I, I told Rachel it was just gonna be the two of us.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh yeah? Well, how’d she take it?

Name: monica
Lines: Really well. Yeah. Surprisingly well. Yeah, she didn’t cry. She wasn’t angry or sad.

Name: chandler
Lines: And you’re upset because you didn’t make your best friend cry?

Name: monica
Lines: I mean, all I’m asking for is just a little emotion! Is that too much to ask after six years?! I mean what? Are-are-are Rachel and I not as close as you guys?! I mean do we not have as much fun?! Don’t I deserve a few tears?!! I mean we-we told Joey, he cried his eyes out!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! I did not cry my eyes out!! Come on! It’s like the end of an era! No more J-man and Channie’s!!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, I gotta ask, who calls us that?!

Name: ross
Lines: Yes.

Name: ross
Lines: Yes, second in two years. Third overall.

Name: ross
Lines: Basically, Rachel and I were in Vegas and we got drunk…

Name: ross
Lines: Yes-yes-yes! But, I-I do not love her.

Name: ross
Lines: This was just a drunken mistake and I need to get it annulled.

Name: ross
Lines: I think just the annulment for today.

Name: ross
Lines: Easy.

Name: ross
Lines: No problem.

Name: ross
Lines: Ooh! There’s no way to do this without her? ‘Cause I kinda all ready told her uh, it was, it was already taken care of.

Name: ross
Lines: Uh-ha, what about someone who looks like Rachel?  I will think about the therapy.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey. So um, I was thinking that maybe we should start dividing up our stuff.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay!

Name: monica
Lines: Y’know, no point in dragging it out. Dragging out the long process of you moving out and us not living together anymore.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey Rach, what about this?  Huh? Who-who gets this? See, I don’t know if I want it because it might be y’know, too many memories!

Name: rachel
Lines: What the hell is that?

Name: monica
Lines: I don’t know.  Hey, Rachel, you want the big plate? I want you to have the big plate.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow! Mon, thanks! I love this plate!

Name: monica
Lines: Something to remember me by!

Name: rachel
Lines: Mon, honey you’re not dying. I’m just moving out. Y’know, I mean we’re gonna see each other all the time.

Name: monica
Lines: But still, it’s a big change. The end of an era, you might say!

Name: rachel
Lines: Are you okay? You’re not blinking.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m fine! I just, I’m thinking how much it’s an end of era.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, all right. But y’know I gotta say, I don’t, I don’t think six years counts as an era.

Name: monica
Lines: An era is defined as a significant period of time. Now, it was significant to me, maybe it wasn’t significant to you!

Name: rachel
Lines: What is the matter with you?!

Name: monica
Lines: What is the matter with you?!! Why aren’t you more upset?! Aren’t you gonna be sad that we’re not gonna be living together anymore?! I mean aren’t you gonna miss me at all?!

Name: rachel
Lines: All right, fine, but don’t get mad at me. It’s-it’s just a little hard to believe.

Name: monica
Lines: What’s hard to believe?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well y’know, it’s you guys. You-you do this kind of stuff! Y’know? I mean, you-you were gonna get married in Vegas and then you backed out! I guess I’m not upset because I don’t see you guys going through with it. I’m sorry.

Name: monica
Lines: Rachel, it’s going to happen. Chandler is gonna move in here.

Name: rachel
Lines: But I…

Name: monica
Lines: No-no, wait! Just let me finish, okay? This isn’t something that we just, we just impulsively decided in-in Vegas, this is something we both really want. And it is going to happen.

Name: rachel
Lines: It is? Really?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah, sweetie.

Name: rachel
Lines: I mean we’re not, we’re not gonna live together anymore?

Name: monica
Lines: No.

Name: rachel
Lines: What? Oh my God! I’m gonna miss you so much!

Name: monica
Lines: I’m gonna miss you!

Name: rachel
Lines: I mean it’s the end of an era!

Name: monica
Lines: I know!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, bye!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh no.

Name: phoebe
Lines: So? Did you get the annulment?

Name: ross
Lines: I couldn’t.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I knew it! Because you love Rachel.

Name: ross
Lines: It’s not that. Okay? Annulments are more complicated than I…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, complicated ‘cause of the love.

Name: ross
Lines: I… I do, I do not love Rachel. I’m gonna tell her right now about the whole thing so we can get this marriage annulled as fast as possible. Okay? Would I do that if I loved her?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I’ve never been more convinced of your love for her.

Name: ross
Lines: I do not have feelings for Rachel! Okay?!

Name: ross
Lines: Ohh, what’s wrong?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Monica and Chandler are really moving in here and I have to move out and everything is changing.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh my—Come here! Come here!  It’s okay. Everything’s gonna be okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Thank you.

Name: ross
Lines: Of course.

Name: joey
Lines: So, Ross and Rachel got married, Monica and Chandler almost got married, do you think you and I should hook up?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh we do, but not just yet.

Name: joey
Lines: Really?! Well, when?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay umm, well, first Chandler and Monica will get married and be filthy rich by the way. Yeah. But it won’t work out.

Name: joey
Lines: Wow.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I know. Then, I’m gonna marry Chandler for the money and you’ll marry Rachel and have the beautiful kids.

Name: joey
Lines: Great!

Name: phoebe
Lines: But then we ditch those two and that’s when we get married. We’ll have Chandler’s money and Rachel’s kids and getting custody will be easy because of Rachel’s drinking problem.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh-oh, what about Ross?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I don’t want to go into the whole thing, but umm, we have words and I kill him.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey! Check it out! This is unbelievable! Joey has been holding his breath for almost four minutes!

Name: joey
Lines: Dude! What are yo—you trying to kill me?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Pheebs, I wanna ask you something.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh, what?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well since I’m movin’ out and-and you’re so beautiful…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh!

Name: rachel
Lines: …how about I move in with you?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, that would be great but then what do we do about Denise?

Name: monica
Lines: Who’s Denise?

Name: phoebe
Lines: My roommate.

Name: rachel
Lines: You have a roommate?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes, Denise. Denise!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, what is with the secrecy Phoebe? Huh? And what about this Denise, is she cute?

Name: chandler
Lines: Pheebs, I don’t understand. How can you have a roommate that none of us know anything about?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Maybe because you never listen to anything that I say. I talk about her all the time! DENISE!!!!!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey Rach, listen I was thinkin’ uh, I’m gonna have an extra room over at my place…

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, that’s true.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, why don’t you move in with me? It’ll be great! We could stay up late, watch movies, and you know about Naked Thursday’s right?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, yeah I think I’m gonna find my own place.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey-hey! I thought Naked Thursday’s was just our thing man!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: So, what did Rachel say when you told her you were still married to her?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, that. Umm, she took it really well.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You didn’t tell her did you?

Name: ross
Lines: No.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Of course not, because you’re in love with her.

Name: ross
Lines: I am not in love with her. She was very upset about having to move out so I eh, didn’t tell her we were still married because she would only get more upset. I-I just comforted her, as a friend.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What do you mean, comforted her?

Name: ross
Lines: It’s nothing, I just gave her a hug.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ah-ha! A classic sign of love, the hug!

Name: ross
Lines: It’s also a sign of friendship.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, not in your case Lovey Loverson.

Name: ross
Lines: It was a hug!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, just tell me this, did you or did you not smell her hair?

Name: ross
Lines: S-s-smell her hair? What if I did?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ninety percent of a women’s pheromones come out the top of her head! That’s why, that’s why women are shorter. So that men will fall in love when they hug them!  Oh come on Ross, you’re a scientist.

Name: ross
Lines: I was hugging her as a friend. It’s not my fault her-her hair got in my face, she’s got a lot of it and it smells all-all uh…coconutty.  What?! Oh, that doesn’t mean I have feelings for Rachel! Maybe it means I have feelings for coconuts!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, whatever you say. But just be careful, all right? Rachel’s not in the same place you are.

Name: ross
Lines: If the place you are referring too is being in love, then she is in the same place as me because I am not in that place!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, I didn’t understand that, but y’know, maybe that’s ‘cause you were speaking the secret language of love!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!  Dude, some guy just called for you.

Name: chandler
Lines: Who was it?

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t know! How about, \Thanks for taking the message.\" Jeez!"

Name: monica
Lines: Okay listen, y’know when you move in Rachel’s room is gonna be empty, you wanna talk about what we want to do with it?

Name: chandler
Lines: Sure!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, I was thinking we should have a beautiful guest room, right? With a mahogany sleigh bed and bedside tables with flowers on them all the time! And we could have a roll top desk with comment cards on them so people could say how much they loved staying here!! Okay, whatever, I really haven’t thought about it that much.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I like that idea. Obviously! I was thinking maybe-maybe-maybe it could be a game room, y’know? I mean you can buy old arcade games like uh, like Space Invaders and Asteroids for $200, the real ones! The big-big ones!

Name: monica
Lines: No.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay so you mean no as in, \Gee Chandler

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, I’m sorry. Of course I mean that. Interesting idea, umm, talk about it, but no.

Name: chandler
Lines: So, that’s it?

Name: monica
Lines: I just don’t think arcade games go in the beautiful guest room. The beautiful guest room is gonna be filled with antiques.

Name: chandler
Lines: Which is why Asteroids is perfect! It’s the oldest game!

Name: monica
Lines: What do you have against the beautiful guest room?

Name: chandler
Lines: I don’t have anything against the beautiful guest room, especially since everybody we know lives about 30 seconds away!

Name: monica
Lines: Are you mocking me?

Name: chandler
Lines: No, I’m not mocking you,

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, what’s up?

Name: chandler
Lines: Nothing, Monica and I had a stupid fight.

Name: joey
Lines: But you’re still moving in together, right? Because my ad came out today.

Name: chandler
Lines: \Wanted. Female roommate

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah? I just figured y’know, after living with you it’d be an interesting change of pace to have a female roommate, y’know? Someone I can learn from, someone-someone who’s different than me. And what’s more different than me; a guy who’s not 19 than say a girl who is 19? Enh?  Not just a hat rack my friend!

Name: rachel
Lines: Pheebs, I have to ask you…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Shhhhhh! I’m swamped right now.

Name: rachel
Lines: You’re just staring into space.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Umm, I’m trying to move that pencil.

Name: rachel
Lines: This one?

Name: phoebe
Lines: It worked!

Name: rachel
Lines: Pheebs, this whole apartment thing is just a nightmare! Every place I can afford comes with a roommate who is a freak. I mean, look at this;  \Wanted. Female roommate

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wait, no, look at this!  \Two bedroom

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey.

Name: ross
Lines: Rach, uh, you still looking for a place?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah! Why?

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, there’s this guy, Warren, from the museum and he’s going on a dig for like two years and he’s got this great place he needs to sublet. So uh, you interested?

Name: rachel
Lines: That sounds great! I’d love to live at Warren’s!! I love Warren! Thank you!

Name: ross
Lines: Don’t thank me! If you wanna thank something, thank the volcano that erupted thousands of years ago, killing but perfectly preserving an entire civilization.  Here’s Warren’s number.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, this is great! I am gonna call him right now!  Oh, thank you!

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, you go grab it!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I saw it.

Name: ross
Lines: I don’t know what you’re talking about.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Umm, I’m talking about that which you already know but won’t admit. You love her again; you re-love her!

Name: ross
Lines: Look, I do not re-love her.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can’t believe you won’t just admit it!  Okay, just promise me that you won’t do anything stupid.

Name: ross
Lines: Look, we’re just friends now! Okay? Why would I do anything stupid?

Name: rachel
Lines: Ugh!!! Well, the apartment is already subletted! I mean, this is just hopeless. I’m never gonna find anything.

Name: ross
Lines: You can live with me.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?!

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! Are you serious?!

Name: ross
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: rachel
Lines: I would love to live with you Ross; that’s-that’s great! Thank you!

Name: ross
Lines: Well, I’m-I’m just glad I could, y’know, help you out.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wow! I’m-I’m so happy for you guys.  This is so-so, not stupid.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross-Ross, you have no idea what this means to me! I mean, I mean I was gonna be homeless. You just saved me! You’re my hero!

Name: ross
Lines: Hero, I uh, I don’t know—well, all right.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, I have to go tell Monica what a wonderful brother she has!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh please!  You’re gonna say things now, aren’t ya?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No. No, I won’t. But I should tell you this, this exact same thing happened to my roommate Denise. She moved in with a guy who was secretly married to her and he said he didn’t love her, but he really did, and it just blew up! And that’s how she ended up living with me!  Okay, that’s a lie.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hi.

Name: monica
Lines: Hi.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hi, listen, I’m sorry about before. I don’t need to have a game room. I mean when I was a kid I only played those games because I couldn’t get girls, and now I can ‘em—Now, I have you.  Not-not that I think that I have you or think of you as property in any sort of way, I see women…

Name: monica
Lines: Stop it Chandler.  I’m sorry too.

Name: chandler
Lines: Really?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah! Oh yes!

Name: chandler
Lines: Ohh.

Name: monica
Lines: Listen, we don’t have to make that a guest room, we can think of something to do with the room together.

Name: monica
Lines: Totally!

Name: chandler
Lines: We don’t have to come up with this now.

Lines: Oh good.

Lines: Hey, y’know what? Why don’t we think about changes we can make in the living room?

Name: monica

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I mean we’re gonna have to move around some furniture to make room for my chair.

Name: monica
Lines: You’re-you’re-you’re gonna bring the Barca Lounger over here?

Name: chandler
Lines: Is that a problem?

Name: monica
Lines: Well, it’s a set and they should probably stay together.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, that’s cool. Then I’ll just bring them both over.

Name: monica
Lines: See now-now you’re taking them away from their home.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, I get it. So, I get nothing! Nothing here is mine! Everything here is yours! I’ll get up in the morning put on your clothes, and head off to work!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah-yeah, y’know what? Yeah, that’s it-that’s it, everything will be mine! Nothing will be yours! That’s-that’s what I said! Oh come on, Chandler! I’m talking about the barca lounger! It just, it doesn’t match! Where is it gonna go?!

Name: chandler
Lines: In the game room!

Name: monica
Lines: Look it is not my fault that your chairs are incredibly ugly!

Name: chandler
Lines: All right! That’s fine! That’s fine! I won’t bring over the chairs! I won’t bring anything over! I wouldn’t want to ruin the ambiance over here at Grandma’s place!!

Name: joey
Lines: Everything on your application looks really good—Ohh! Just one last question umm, are you and your friends gonna be over here all the time like partying and hanging out?

Name: joey
Lines: Whoa!! Now look, don’t be just blurtin’ stuff out. I want you to really think about your answers. Okay?

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Lines: That thing was a hazard!  I’m very safety conscious.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey!

Lines: Hey! Oh listen, I was just clearing some space for your stuff.

Lines: Oh thanks, but listen, I was just at Monica’s and she and Chandler had a big fight and they’re not moving in.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay-okay! Two very good points, look I’ve known you both a long time, and I’ve never seen either of you one/millionth as happy as you’ve been since you’ve got together. Do you really want to throw that all away over a room? That is so silly. Now wh-what is more important, love or silliness?

Lines: You’re never gonna believe it uh, Monica and Chandler are moving in again. That’s great news right—I mean for them. Right?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh wow.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah but, on the bright side, we get to be roommates again.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah. Y’know umm, uh, umm, about that, umm, Ross I really appreciate your offer to let me move in and everything, but don’t you think it’s gonna be weird?

Name: rachel

Name: ross

Name: rachel

Name: ross

Name: rachel

Name: rachel

Name: chandler

Name: ross

Name: joey

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, it would be easier to move just right across the hall. Wait a minute, unless you’re thinking about Naked Wednesday’s.

Name: joey

Name: joey
Lines: Hi!

Name: joey
Lines: Come in. Thanks for comin’ back, umm, okay there have been a lot of people interested in the room, but I have narrowed it down and you are one of the finalists!

Name: joey
Lines: Okay now, before I make my final decision I uh, I just want to make sure our personalities match. Okay, so I made up a little test. Now, I’m gonna say a word and then you say the first thing that comes to mind.

Name: joey
Lines: Very good! Okay. G.

Name: joey
Lines: Excellent! Okay umm, doggy.

Name: joey
Lines: Ooh, sorry! No-no-no, so close though, but—bye-bye!

Name: ross

Name: phoebe

Name: ross

Name: phoebe
Lines: No!

Lines: Hey Rach, aren’t these candlesticks  mine?

Lines: No-no, I bought those.

Lines: Yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: I know! Anyway, they asked me to be a guest lecturer! I mean it’s temporary, but uh, if they like me it could lead to a full time job. How great would that look great on a mailbox, huh? \Professor Geller.\"

Lines: Ohh! Oh God!

Lines: Hey!

Lines: Did I, did I even treat?
