Lines: No, it was on the house, it was, it was a newlywed special.

Name: ross
Lines: That may be the most depressing thing I’ve heard in my life. I should probably get these to my lawyer’s office.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey, thanks Ross, for taking care of all of this.

Name: ross
Lines: Eh, no problem.

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m gonna need a copy of those.

Name: ross
Lines: Totally.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! Hey! Be careful around my Porsche!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! How you doin’?

Name: joey
Lines: I’d love to show ya, but I just tucked her in. She’s sleeping.

Name: chandler
Lines: Listen, I’m gonna be moving out so you will be in charge of paying the rent.

Name: joey
Lines: Right! And when is that due?

Name: chandler
Lines: First of the month.

Name: joey
Lines: And that’s every month?

Name: chandler
Lines: No, just the months you actually want to live here.

Name: joey
Lines: Ahhh.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, here is the phone bill.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh my God!!

Name: chandler
Lines: That’s our phone number. Now look, I know I kinda sprung this whole me moving out on thing, so why don’t I just—why don’t I just cover you for a while?

Name: joey
Lines: No-no! No way! Joey Tribbiani does not take charity…anymore.

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s not charity, Joe…

Name: joey
Lines: No! Forget it! Okay—I mean thanks, but I’m done taking money from you. All right, I can take of myself. Now, what’s next? Come on.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay uh, here’s the electric bill.

Name: joey
Lines: This is how much we pay for electric?!!!

Name: chandler
Lines: Uh, yeah.

Name: chandler
Lines: So, we’ll do the rest of the bills later then?

Name: phoebe
Lines: So is Joey going to have to give up the apartment?

Name: chandler
Lines: No, I hope not! I tried to offer him some money, but he wouldn’t take it.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, how much do you think he needs?

Name: chandler
Lines: I figure that $1,500 would cover him for a few months, y’know? But I have to trick him into taking it so I won’t hurt his pride.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Why don’t you hire him as an actor? You could have him dress up and put on little skits. Whatever you want.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well that would help the pride thing.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey! Wow! You look great! Wanna move in with me tomorrow?

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay!  So, what do you girls have planned for tonight?

Name: monica
Lines: Well, instead of being sad that tonight is my last night together with Rachel we thought we’d go out to dinner and celebrate the fact that Rachel is moving in with Phoebe.

Name: phoebe
Lines: And also, my birthday.

Name: monica
Lines: It’s not your birthday.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What a mean thing to say! I would never tell you it’s not your birthday!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey! So you guys have anything planned for the big last night?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, instead of just hanging out, we figure we’d do nothing.

Name: ross
Lines: Whoa-whoa-whoa, Knicks season opener tonight. I thought maybe you guys would come over and watch it.

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t know Ross, not if you’re gonna talk about how you gave up a career in basketball to become a paleontologist.

Name: ross
Lines: I did give up a career in basketball to become a paleontologist!

Name: rachel
Lines: Pheebs, I was wondering…

Name: monica
Lines: You’re not dressed yet?! We’re supposed to start having fun in 15 minutes!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well and clearly not a minute sooner.

Name: monica
Lines: Rachel, you are packed though right, I mean please tell me that you’re packed.

Name: rachel
Lines: Of course I packed! Monica relax! I just wanted to ask Phoebe her opinion on what I should wear tonight.

Name: phoebe
Lines: My God, I can’t get a minute of peace around this place.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God! Monica’s just gonna kill you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, yeah, I know.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, what you’re wearing is fine for that.

Name: monica
Lines: Rachel, I need to borrow—You’re not packed!!!! You’re not packed even a little bit!

Name: rachel
Lines: Surprise!!

Name: monica
Lines: What?

Name: rachel
Lines: No, no don’t get mad because look—this is what happened. So I-I started packing, then I realized, \What am I doing? I am lousy at packing!\" Right? But you love packing! So

Name: monica
Lines: I’ll be coordinator! Oh my God! I’m so sorry, I didn’t get you anything! Okay, look everybody has to help! Okay? You can help, can’t you Phoebe?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I have plans.

Name: monica
Lines: You’re plans were with us.

Name: phoebe
Lines: That’s right.

Name: monica
Lines: All right, Chandler can make boxes, Ross can wrap, and Joey can lift things. Now Phoebe, go tell the guys they have to help out!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay!  Oh my God, thank you!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hurry! Monica’s gonna make you pack! She’s got jobs for everyone! Now, it’s too late for me, but save your selves!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay! The movers will be here in 11 hours. Rachel has not packed. Now, everybody has to help! Chandler, we’re gonna start with…

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh nope, I-I have plans with Joey.

Name: monica
Lines: I thought you said you were going to do nothing.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes, but for the last time.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay fine, now Ross…

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, but-but I can’t do it.

Name: monica
Lines: Why not?

Name: joey
Lines: I’ve got Ben.

Name: ross
Lines: Because, because I’ve got Ben.

Name: monica
Lines: It’s almost 8 o’clock, it’s almost past his bedtime. Where-where is he?

Name: chandler
Lines: He’s at a dinner party.

Name: monica
Lines: Is he really coming? Because I can see right into your apartment!

Name: ross
Lines: Of course he is! What, do you think I’d just use my son as-as an excuse? What kind of father do you think I am?

Name: monica
Lines: All right, sorry.

Name: ross
Lines: I gotta go make a fake Ben.

Name: joey
Lines: Here it is! Our last pizzas together as roommates.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, I wish I’d know you were going to do that, I ordered Chinese.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh that’s okay. Hey, actually in a way it’s kinda nice. Me, bringing the food of my ancestors, you, the food of yours!

Name: chandler
Lines: Say, Joe, I had a strange idea of what we could do for our last night. What do you say we play a little uh, foosball for money?

Name: joey
Lines: What, are you crazy? You haven’t beaten me once since my injury plagued ’97 season. It would be easier if you just give me your money.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes it would. What do you say to $50?

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, you’re on.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, let’s play! The big game, Italy vs. China, apparently.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohhhhhh, look it’s the roller blades.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh God!

Name: rachel
Lines: You remember when we got these?

Name: monica
Lines: No.

Name: rachel
Lines: I guess you weren’t there.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You guys, we said we were gonna have fun! Come on, hey, remember the time…  You don’t remember?

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m sorry Pheebs, I guess I’m just really said that I’m leaving.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m gonna miss you so much.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, this doesn’t have to be so sad though. Y’know? Maybe instead of just thinking about how much you’re gonna miss each other, you should like think of the things you’re not gonna miss.

Name: monica
Lines: I don’t think there’s anything.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Come on, there’s gotta be something.

Name: monica
Lines: Nope, she’s perfect.

Name: rachel
Lines: I have one.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Good! Great! You can go first.

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh well, I guess I’m not gonna miss the fact that you’re never allowed to move the phone pen.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Good that’s a good one. Okay, Monica, anything? Y’know? Does Rachel move the phone pen?

Name: monica
Lines: Aw, sometimes. Always, actually.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, good. There you go. Doesn’t anyone feel better?

Name: monica
Lines: Not just the phone pen. I never get my messages.

Name: rachel
Lines: You get your messages!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah, well I don’t think it really counts if you have to read them off the back of your hand after you fall asleep on the couch.

Name: rachel
Lines: So-so, you missed a message from who? Chandler or your mom? Or Chandler? Or your mom?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Great! It worked! No one’s sad.

Name: joey
Lines: I gotta buy some food.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, give me a chance to win my money back. Okay? Sudden death, one goal, $1,000.

Name: joey
Lines: You serious?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh yes!

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, get ready to owe me!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, here we go. Ready?

Name: chandler
Lines: No! No! No! No——one can beat me.

Name: chandler
Lines: See? Now, that’s why only the little fake men are supposed to do all the kicking.

Name: monica
Lines: Hello?  See? Other people call me!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ooh, your brother. Score!

Name: monica
Lines: What’s up?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, I’m just over here with Ben. I thought we’d say hi.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, put him on!

Name: ross
Lines: Ben, say hi to Aunt Monica.  Oh, I guess he doesn’t feel like talking right now. He’s smiling though! Okay, talk to you later.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I think it was better when you guys were sad. Hey, uh, remember the roller blades?

Name: rachel
Lines: You know what else I’m not gonna miss? \I’m Monica. I wash the toilet 17 times a day. Even if people are on it!\"

Name: monica
Lines: \Hi I’m Rachel

Name: rachel
Lines: \I’m Monica

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey! I call her!

Name: monica
Lines: \Oh my God

Name: rachel
Lines: \Oh my God

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, we should get a move on if we wanna make those dinner reservations.

Name: chandler
Lines: Still broken?

Name: joey
Lines: This sucks man! The last night you’re here and I lose the two most important things in my life, the foosball table and $500.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, there are other ways of winning back your money, how about a little uh, a little Blackjack?

Name: joey
Lines: Nah, not my game.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, uh, how about, how about—y’know what? We could play a new game. A new game, it’s fun.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, what’s it called?

Name: chandler
Lines: Cups.

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t know how to play Cups.

Name: chandler
Lines: I’ll teach ya! Come on, come on, it’s really easy and really, really fun.

Name: joey
Lines: All right.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, here you go.  I have two queens, what do you have?

Name: joey
Lines: A two and a five.

Name: chandler
Lines: Ho-ho, you win! 50 dollars!

Name: joey
Lines: Really?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh yeah! Okay, let’s play again.  What do you got?

Name: joey
Lines: A four and a nine.

Name: chandler
Lines: You’re kidding right?

Name: joey
Lines: No. Why?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well that’s a full cup!

Name: joey
Lines: Damn! I am good at Cups!

Name: monica
Lines: I’m not talking to her!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, one of you has to take the first step! And it should be you, because she’s the one who’s leaving. It’s harder for her!

Name: monica
Lines: Well, maybe you’re right—She made fun of my phone pen!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I know, I took it hard too.

Name: monica
Lines: Listen Rachel, I feel really bad about—What are you doing?

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m unpacking!

Name: monica
Lines: What?!

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m not moving!  Is that picture straight?

Name: monica
Lines: It needs to go about 20 blocks to the left!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey, y’know what? You’re the one who wants to make this big change and move in with Chandler! You should be the one to go! Why should I have to leave?!

Name: monica
Lines: Because it’s my apartment!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well it’s mine too! What else you got?!

Name: monica
Lines: How about, you’re moving!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Look! This is ridiculous. We should be packing you!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey, how are you guys doing?

Name: rachel
Lines: Great! Monica’s moving!

Name: monica
Lines: I am not!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh really?! Then how come all your stuff is in this box?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, you guys. You guys I think I know what’s going on here. Okay, you guys… STOP!!  I know that, I know that you’re acting mad because you think that it’ll make it easier to leave. But deep down you’re still really sad. Deep-deep down.

Name: monica
Lines: No Phoebe I am mad!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, deep-deep-deep down!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, I’m just mad!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Then keep running.

Name: chandler
Lines: You win.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, what did you have?

Name: chandler
Lines: It doesn’t matter because nothing beats a three and a six. That my friend is D-Cup. Okay, now much have you won so far?

Name: joey
Lines: Uh,  wow, 700.

Name: chandler
Lines: Not 700 exactly?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: chandler
Lines: Double it!

Name: joey
Lines: What?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well you see in Cups, once you get $700, you have to double it.

Name: joey
Lines: Really?

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, I didn’t make up the rules. Now, after you receive the doubling bonus, you get uh, one card. Now that one card could be worth $100 bringing your total to 1,500.

Name: monica
Lines: Well, this is the last box of your clothes. I’m just gonna label it, \What were you thinking?\"

Name: rachel
Lines: Funny, because I was just gonna go across the hall and write that on Chandler.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey you guys, I don’t mean to make things worse, but umm, I don’t want to live with Rachel anymore.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You’re just so mean to each other! And I don’t want to end up like that with Rachel. I still like you!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, Phoebe that’s fine because I’m not moving.

Name: monica
Lines: Whoa-whoa-whoa, Phoebe you gotta take her! Y’know I-I-I said some really bad stuff about her, but y’know Rachel has some good qualities that make her a good roommate.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh really? Like what Monica?

Name: monica
Lines: Y’know she has 147,000 pairs of boots…

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh yeah, good start Mon.

Name: monica
Lines: She lets you borrow them.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah and you stretch ‘em out with your big old clown feet.

Name: monica
Lines: Do you wanna live outside?! Because it’s gettin’ cold!  She gets tons of catalogs and umm, she’ll fold down the pages of the things she thinks that I’d like.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What else?

Name: monica
Lines: When I take a shower, she leaves me little notes on the mirror.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, I do. I-I do, do that.

Name: phoebe
Lines: That’s nice. I like having things to read in the bathroom.

Name: monica
Lines: When I fall asleep on the couch after reading, she covers me over with a blanket.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well y’know, I don’t want you to be cold.

Name: monica
Lines: And when I told her that I was gonna be moving in with Chandler, she was really supportive.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, it’s gonna be fine.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay Rachel, I can’t wait to live with you! And you know what we should do? Bring Monica and then we could all live there together! We’ll have so much fun!!

Name: rachel
Lines: But honey, I think she’s moving in with Chandler.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh that’s right. You’re still set on that?

Name: monica
Lines: Kinda.  Oh my God!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, it’s a pumpkin. I’ll come pack.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: What’s wrong?

Name: joey
Lines: Ross and I were helping the girls pack, took a little break, I lost $1,500 to him in Cups!

Name: chandler
Lines: Wh-How did you lose at Cups?!

Name: joey
Lines: The same way you lost. I started out with a King and a Queen, bamn! Ross gets a 2 and a 3. Then I get a Jack and a King, boom! Ross gets a 4 and a 5! Ross was getting the Cup card, the D-Cup, the Sittin’ Down Bonus! Meanwhile, I didn’t even get half a cup! Nothin’!!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh man!!

Name: joey
Lines: And he never played before either! Y’know what I think? I think beginner’s luck, very important in Cups.

Name: chandler
Lines: All right, let’s play one more hand! One more!

Name: joey
Lines: No, no, no more! I cannot lose another dime! I’m serious this time! In-in fact, look, there’s a—I wanna give you something. And let me give it too you know before I pawn it for Cups money.  Now, I want you to have the big white dog as a kinda of a, y’know, thank you for being such a great roommate.

Name: chandler
Lines: I can’t take the big white dog! You love it!

Name: joey
Lines: It’s him, not it!

Name: chandler
Lines: No, but wait—what if I bought it from you, y’know? And your nice gesture would be giving it to me at a reasonable price, say  $1,500?

Name: joey
Lines: Wait a second, I see what you’re trying to do here! You-you’re trying to give me money again!

Name: chandler
Lines: When did I try to give you money?

Name: joey
Lines: Over there!  Before, with the bills! You tried to give some charity, I said \No

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m just trying to help you out! Okay? I wanna make sure that you’re okay.

Name: joey
Lines: I will be okay! Look Chandler, you gotta get it out of your head that I can’t take care of myself. Okay? Look, I’m not gonna miss you helping me out with money. The only thing that I’m gonna miss…is you. And now the dog.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey. Call me when you get there. Okay?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m really gonna miss you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh! I have your key. Here you go.

Name: monica
Lines: Thanks.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh God! This is silly, I’m gonna see you in a couple of hours!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: Bye house!

Name: rachel
Lines: Bye Mon.

Name: monica
Lines: Bye.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: monica
Lines: She really left.

Name: chandler
Lines: I know.

Name: monica
Lines: Thank you.

Name: chandler
Lines: No problem roomie.

Name: monica
Lines: Can I ask you a question?

Name: chandler
Lines: Sure!

Name: monica
Lines: What the hell is that dog doing here?!

Name: chandler
Lines: I invented the game of Cups as a way to give Joey money.

Name: ross
Lines: And now you want that money back.

Name: chandler
Lines: Exactly.

Name: ross
Lines: Chandler, what kind of an idiot do you take me for?

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s not a real game! I made it up!

Name: ross
Lines: I’m sorry you lost your money, but I won it fair and square.

Name: chandler
Lines: At a fake game!!

Name: ross
Lines: Now, if you wanna try to make some of it back, I’d be glad to play you for it. But I should warn you, I am very good at Cups.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay! Now I assume the Saucer card came up when you played last.

Name: ross
Lines: No.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hmm, let’s see if it comes up this time.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ready?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi...

Name: phoebe
Lines: it's...

Name: rachel
Lines: Rachel...

Name: phoebe
Lines: and…

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe’s...

Name: phoebe
Lines: please...

Name: rachel
Lines: leave...

Name: phoebe
Lines: leave…

Name: rachel
Lines: Wait, I-I just said \leave.\"

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I know because you have all the good words. What do I get? I get \it’s

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe, come on that's silly.

Name: phoebe
Lines: All right, so let's switch.

Name: rachel
Lines: No, I have all of the good words. OK, fine, fine, we can switch.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hi…

Name: rachel
Lines: Everybody…

Name: phoebe
Lines: It's…

Name: rachel
Lines: Rachel…

Name: phoebe
Lines: and…

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe’s…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Please...wait, how did you do that?

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, you're no ordinary roommate are you?

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe, come on can we finish this later? Cause I wanna go running before it gets dark. Oh! Why don't you come with me?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Really?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, it'll be fun. We'll run in the park. It'll be like our first y’know roommate bonding thing.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, let's go running!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah and there's really cute guys there.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Let's run towards them!

Name: rachel
Lines: OK!

Name: phoebe
Lines: All right, wait just one more second. Hi, it's Phoebe and Rachel's. Please leave a message, thanks!

Name: rachel
Lines: Now wait a minute. You just took all the words!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh. You've met your match Rachel Green.

Name: ross
Lines: So, I just finished this fascinating book. By the year 2030, there'll be computers that can carry out the same amount of functions as an actual human brain. So theoretically you could download your thoughts and memories into this computer and-and-and live forever as a machine.

Name: chandler
Lines: And I just realized I can sleep with my eyes open.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: monica
Lines: Honey, that's a great idea nailing the boxes to the floor!

Name: chandler
Lines: I didn't nail the boxes to the floor.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, So you can move them!

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes, and while I'm doing that, Ross has a great computer story for you.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey everybody! Uh, I'd like you to meet Janine. She's-she's gonna be my new roommate!

Name: ross
Lines: Hi!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, she's gonna live with me!

Name: monica
Lines: It's nice to meet you. Janine...?

Name: joey
Lines: I didn't know that! Well, what a pretty last name!

Name: chandler
Lines: So, uh, wh-where ya from?

Name: joey
Lines: From the land down under? I didn't know that either!

Name: ross
Lines: So uh, wha-uh, what do you do?

Name: joey
Lines: You're a dancer? She-she's a dancer!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, hey let me.

Name: monica
Lines: Joey, did you even interview this woman before you asked her to move in?

Name: joey
Lines: Of course I did.

Name: monica
Lines: Uh-huh, what exactly did you ask her?

Name: joey
Lines: \When can you move in?\"

Name: ross
Lines: Thank you for bringing her into our lives.

Name: chandler
Lines: Unbelievable

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, so you like her too Chandler?

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, look at all the boxes!

Name: joey
Lines: Ugh, I cannot wait to ask her out!

Name: monica
Lines: Wait a minute...Joey. Joey you can't ask her out, she's your roommate. It-it'll be way too complicated.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, yeah man don't do it. I mean if you date her, then-then-then I can't date her.

Name: chandler
Lines: All right, think about it. Now remember when you were going out with that girl Donna and you guys broke up. Remember how horrible it was when you guys bumped into each other at the supermarket?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh God, yeah.

Name: chandler
Lines: Now imagine you live at the supermarket.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay!

Name: chandler
Lines: No-no

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, Oh, you're right! I don't want that. I can't date her!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah and you better watch the flirting too, cause you know, in such close quarters, it could be trouble.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, that's gonna be tough Mon. I mean it's hard for me to be around an attractive woman and not flirt.

Name: monica
Lines: Hmm, well you're around me all the time and you don't flirt.

Name: joey
Lines: You a little sad about that sweetheart?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I have to tie my shoe, so you go ahead, I'll catch up.

Lines: Hmm-Hmm-Hmm.  Okay. I, uh, am from Long Island. I-I came to the city for college. Um, I, um, have a 5 year old son and in my spare time I like to read spy novels. But, but, let’s talk more about you. Hmm.

Name: joey
Lines: So what’s really neat. If you sear the stems of the flowers first in a frying pan, your arrangement will look fresh much longer.

Lines: Monica, could you excuse us for a second? I need to talk to the girl with the flowers.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay. Oh but Joey, come over later because I’m going to teach you to make a bird feeder out of just a pine cone and some peanut butter.

Name: joey
Lines: Ohh, I love birds.

Name: chandler
Lines: What is the matter with you ?!?

Name: joey
Lines: What?

Name: chandler
Lines: You’re arranging flowers!  You got dead flowers! You got a picture, a picture, of a baby dressed like flowers! This is not Joey!!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey. Hey look I am still Joey, okay. Flowers they’re just, you know, they’re nice to look at. And that happens to be a picture by a famous artist. Of a famous baby.

Name: chandler
Lines: You’re turning into a women.

Lines: No I’m not. Why would you say that? That’s just mean.

Lines: Now I’ve upset you? What did I say?

Name: joey

Lines: Now, she thinks that I made out with him and I did it to get her job.

Name: rachel
Lines: I did but she doesn’t think anyone would be stupid enough to confuse Kenny the copy guy with Ralph Lauren.

Name: phoebe

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ohh, sleep with Kenny.

Name: rachel

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ohh, yes it would.

Name: ross

Name: ross

Lines: Mmm-Hmm.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay..Okay.. Look. I’m sorry that I lied to you before. You were right. Ralph and I were an item but were not anymore.

Name: joey
Lines: I’m sorry but we’ve got to get rid of all this girlie stuff in here. I, uh, I got to be a man! Okay. The living room has to remain a guy place, okay? That’s just the way it has to be.

Name: joey
Lines: Great…Great…and thanks for being so understanding. I mean, I didn’t want to make a big deal out of this, you know.  You could, uh, put the picture of the famous baby in my room. I mean, if you want to.

Name: joey
Lines: And, uhh, maybe the watering can there.

Name: chandler
Lines: Sydney Portier? Hehheh.

Lines: Oh! That’s great, they haven’t seen the place since I moved in!

Lines: Because they don’t know we’re dating.

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Lines: Ye-ye, we go to yours!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey! Hey, Pheebs, check it out. Yeah, for my desert, I have chosen to make a traditional English truffle!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wow, that sounds great! And what are you making Monica, in case Rachel’s dessert is...[about to say “bad”] so good that I eat all of it. There’s none left for anybody else!

Name: monica
Lines: Nothing.

Name: rachel
Lines: Nothing?

Name: monica
Lines: No, sweetie, I-I trust you.

Name: rachel

Name: monica

Name: rachel

Name: monica

Name: joey

Name: ross

Lines: Well, this has been great!

Name: monica

Lines: Uh, some of her friends, yeah.

Name: rachel

Name: joey

Lines: You’re not gonna go anywhere, you said you were gonna eat here, and you’re gonna eat here!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, but-but it is, uh, it’s just like the first Thanksgiving, when the Indians and the Pilgrims uh, sat down to dinner.

Name: monica
Lines: Dad [kisses Jack], Mom [kisses Judy]. Look! Look who it is it’s Chandler!

Lines: Mr. and Mrs. Geller, you look wonderful, it is great to have you hear, let us take off your coats!

Lines: Rach, Rach, I just remembered. I had a dream about Mr. Geller last night.

Lines: Really?!

Name: phoebe
Lines:
Yeah, I dreamt that he saved me from a burning building and he was so brave and so strong! And it’s making me look at him totally differently. Y’know, I mean he used to be just, y’know “Jack Geller Monica and Ross’s dad” and now he’s he’s “Jack Geller, dream hunk.\",9.2
S06E09"

Name: monica
Lines: Y’know dad, Chandler is one of Ross’s very best friends!

Name: chandler
Lines: He’s the headliner of a gay burlesque show.

Lines: Look at it, isn’t it beautiful?

Name: rachel
Lines: It’s a truffle. It’s got all of these layers. First there’s a layer of ladyfingers, then a layer of jam, then custard, which I made from scratch, [Joey and Ross make impressed faces] then raspberries, more ladyfingers, then beef sauteed with peas and onions, [Joey and Ross look like something’s wrong.] then a little more custard, and then bananas, and then I just put some whipped cream on top!

Name: ross
Lines: W-What was the one right before bananas?

Name: rachel
Lines: The beef? Yeah, that was weird to me, too. But then, y’know, I thought “well, there’s mincemeat pie,” I mean that’s an English dessert, these people just put very strange things in their food, y’know. [To Joey] Oh! by the way, can I borrow some Rum from your place?

Lines: Oh, yes. Well it’s very beautiful. It’s cream-colored and tight [Realizes what he just said and looks worried. Monica and Ross also looked shocked. Judy and Jack give Chandler a very dirty look.] I don’t mean tight, I mean it’s not too tight, not that I was looking at-[giving up all hope, he puts his head into his hands.]

Name: chandler
Lines: What?! Why did you do that?

Lines: I don’t know, aheh, your’s was the first name that-that popped into my head, I’m I’m sorry. I-I didn’t think it would matter.

Name: ross

Name: chandler
Lines: What about all that “friends forever” stuff?

Name: ross
Lines: I don’t know, I-I was all high.

Name: monica
Lines: Mom and dad just sent me in here to find out if you  were trying to get Ross stoned!

Lines: Your parents caught Ross smoking pot in college and he blamed it on me!

Lines: Ross, I can’t believe you’d do that!

Name: chandler
Lines: The reason we haven’t told them we’re together is because they hate me, okay? So will you fix this?

Name: monica
Lines: You! It’s not like it’s a big deal! You-you don’t still do it or anything!

Lines: Dad, please don’t pick your teeth out here! Alright, and if you’re gonna put your feet up, why don’t you sit on the-

Name: joey
Lines: Dude, they’re not objects.

Lines: Just kiddin,’ I’ll talk to them, you distract Rach.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay...

Name: rachel
Lines: What’s up, Ross?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah!

Name: ross
Lines: And um...You look nice today.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh no. No Ross, don’t do this.

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: rachel
Lines: I just- I don’t think us getting back together is a good idea.

Name: ross
Lines: Eh?

Name: rachel
Lines: I thought this might happen today. Ross, I know the holidays can be rough. Y’know? And it’s probably really hard for you to be alone right now.

Name: ross
Lines: You’re alone.

Name: rachel
Lines: No, I-I live with Phoebe. I mean you’re [pity-tone] alone, alone. And I just-it’s just not the time for us. I’m sorry.

Name: ross
Lines: Ah well, can’t blame a guy for trying!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh and , okay?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I’m not gonna pay for those acting classes anymore.

Name: joey
Lines: Rachel, there you are! Come on, let’s serve that dessert already!

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey, you’re gonna have to stop rushing me, you know what? You don’t get any dessert.

Name: joey
Lines: Really?

Name: rachel
Lines: No, I’m just kidding I would never do that to you! Okay, everybody, it’s trifle time!

Lines: So, now, Rach, this is a traditional English trifle, isn’t it?

Name: rachel

Lines: Wow. So then did you make it with beef or Eggplant?

Lines: I can’t have any. You know I don’t eat meat.  Ohhh no.

Lines: Okay.

Lines: Well?

Lines: Mmmm! It’s good!

Lines: Really? How good?

Name: monica
Lines: It’s so good, that I feel really selfish about being the only one who’s eating it, that I think we should have everyone taste how good it is. Especially Ross.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, this is so good, that I’m gonna go enjoy it on the balcony so that I can enjoy the view whilst I enjoy my dessert.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m gonna go into the bathroom so I can look at it in the mirror, as I eat it.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, now what was that all about? Is it-does it not taste good? Let me try it.

Name: ross
Lines: Wha? No no! Ah!  All gone! So good! Maybe Chandler has some left.

Name: ross
Lines: It tastes like feet!

Name: joey
Lines: I like it.

Name: ross
Lines: Are you kidding?

Name: joey
Lines: What’s not to like? Custard? Good. Jam? Good. Meat? Gooooood.

Name: rachel
Lines: ...So a bird just grabbed it, and then tried to fly away with it and, and then just dropped it on the street?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes, but if it’s any consolation, before the bird dropped it, he seemed to enjoy it.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Rachel, come here.  Okay, I was just starting to take my Thanksgiving nap, and I had another dream about Jack.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, Phoebe, do I wanna hear this?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I dunno, let’s see! So, okay, I dreamt that we were gonna get married, and he left, becuz he had to go fight a fire. And, um, so okay, I went to a night club, and I saw him making out with a girl.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God, he dream-cheated on you!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, but then Jacques Cousteau came and he kicked his ass for betraying me! It was soo cool! Then, he took me diving and he introduced me to his pet seahorse, who, by the way, was totally coming on to me, and please, that is not gonna happen.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Five minutes ago, a line like that would’ve floored me. Now nothing. Well, not nothing, I am still a woman.

Name: monica
Lines: Ross? Let’s go.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh yeah, about telling Mom and Dad, I was thinking about maybe writing a letter.

Name: monica
Lines: Alright, you know what? That’s it. You’ve had your chance.

Name: ross
Lines: Wha-what?

Name: monica
Lines: Mom! Dad! Ross smoked pot in college!

Name: ross
Lines: You are such a tattletale! Mom, Dad, you remember that-that time you walked in my room and smelled marijuana?

Name: ross
Lines: Well I told you it was Chandler who was smoking the pot but it was me. I’m sorry.

Name: monica
Lines: And Dad, y’know that mailman that you got fired? He didn’t steal your Playboys! Ross did!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, well, Hurricane Gloria didn’t break the porch swing, Monica did!

Name: monica
Lines: Ross hasn’t worked at the museum for a year!

Name: ross
Lines: Monica and Chandler are living together!

Name: monica
Lines: Ross married Rachel in Vegas! And got divorced! Again!!!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I love Jacques Cousteau!

Name: rachel
Lines: I wasn’t supposed to put beef in the trifle!

Name: joey
Lines: I wanna gooooooo!

Name: ross
Lines: I-I uh, I got tricked into all those things!

Name: chandler
Lines: Thank you!

Name: chandler
Lines: I’ll talk to them!

Name: rachel
Lines: You guys! It was bananas, cream, and beef! I-I just cannot believe that you ate that so that I wouldn’t feel bad!

Name: monica
Lines: Well actually, I-I didn’t eat mine. It’s still in the bathroom.

Name: joey
Lines: No it isn’t, I ate that.

Name: joey
Lines: Nope, got it and I got yours  too.

Name: chandler
Lines: Let me ask you, why is everybody using these tiny lights nowadays? I remember when people used to use big lights.

Name: rachel
Lines: That’s a good story, Grandpa.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey

Name: ross
Lines: Wow, Monica’s letting other people help decorate her tree! Did someone get her drunk again or?

Name: monica
Lines: Having a perfectly decorated tree is not what Christmas is about. It’s about being with the people that you love.

Name: phoebe
Lines: That is nice and we’re done. TADA!

Name: chandler
Lines: I dunno what it is, it just doesn’t quite feel like Christmas to me.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, here.

Name: chandler
Lines: See now it feels like Christmas!

Name: ross
Lines: … and that’s the story of the dreidle. Now, some people trace the Christmas tree back to the Egyptians, who used to bring green palm branches into their huts on the shortest day of the year, symbolising life’s triumph over death. And that was like 4000 years ago.

Name: rachel
Lines: So, pretty much around the same time that you started telling this story.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey you guys.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey Joe what’s up?

Name: joey
Lines: I had to get out of the apartment. Janine is like stretching all over the place. Y’know, everywhere I look she’s like…

Name: chandler
Lines: I can see why that’s hard to resist.

Name: joey
Lines: I like her so much!

Name: monica
Lines: Aw, I’m sorry sweetie that she doesn’t feel the same way.

Name: joey
Lines: I know. And she’s so sweet. I just wanna feed her grapes and brush her hair.

Name: chandler
Lines: You are aware that she’s not a monkey, right?

Name: ross
Lines: I am so over Janine. I mean, yeah, at first I thought she was hot, but now she’s like OLD NEWS!

Name: ross
Lines: Hi Janine!

Name: monica
Lines: Hold it! Are you talking about Dick Clark’s New Year’s Rocking Eve?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God! We love that show! I mean Ross and I have been watching it since I can remember!

Name: chandler
Lines: Ah, you’re still just a little fat girl inside aren’t you?

Name: ross
Lines: You’re gonna be a party person! Those guys rock the most!

Name: joey
Lines: Totally! I would love to spend New Year’s with you.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, well you see how it works is, the part with Dick Clark in Times Square is actually live, but they tape some of the party stuff ahead of time. Yeah, not a lot of people know that.

Name: ross
Lines: Are you serious?

Name: monica
Lines: We are there!

Name: chandler
Lines: What, what are you laughing at?

Lines: Well, I used to date him, but you’re still going out with her!

Lines: Bye Janine!

Lines: Did she just ask me out on a date?

Name: chandler
Lines: I don’t think so.
