Lines: What are you talking about? She just invited him to the biggest party of the millennium!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, but she also invited you and Ross. Yeah, honey, I’m sorry, but I don’t think that was a romantic thing.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh. Maybe. But hey I know how I can find out. We’re going to a New Year’s Eve party, right? So at midnight, I can kiss her. And if she kisses me back, great! Y’know? But if she says ‘Dude, what the hell are you doing?’ I can say ‘It wasn’t me, it was New Years!’

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, that’s a lot better than Ross trying to kiss me in High School, and saying that he did it because he needed chapstick.

Name: ross
Lines: It was a dry day.

Name: monica
Lines: We are going to Dick Clark’s New Year’s Rocking Eve!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: joey
Lines: OK, listen I’ve been on sets before, so let me give you a little advice, alright? It’s a show, but we’re just dancing, OK? It’s no big deal. The important thing to remember – stay cool.

Name: ross
Lines: Got it!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh my God it’s just like I dreamed it!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, I have a question. When is this gonna air?

Name: joey
Lines: Ross! So when is it gonna air?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, you look in the kitchen, I will look in the back closet.

Name: chandler
Lines: I can save you time ladies, I’m right here.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, Chandler why don’t you take a walk? This doesn’t concern you.

Name: rachel
Lines: We are looking for our Christmas presents from Monica.

Name: chandler
Lines: What? That’s terrible!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No-no, we do it every year!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh well, that makes it not terrible.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, yeah, we never find them! She’s always best at us that wily minx.

Name: rachel
Lines: Don’t worry, we’re just gonna search here for an hour, them we’re gonna go over to Joey’s and search, OK?

Name: chandler
Lines: No not okay, you can’t look for Monica’s presents!

Name: phoebe
Lines: But we have to!

Name: chandler
Lines: No, you don’t have to, and you can’t because I live here too.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well then, you should look with us.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why?

Name: rachel
Lines: Chandler, aren’t you worried about what to get Monica for Christmas?

Name: chandler
Lines: No, I have a great idea for a present for her.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, that’s it?  A great idea!

Name: rachel
Lines: Chandler, that’s not enough. I mean what if she gets you a great present, two medium presents, and a bunch of little presents? And you’ve just gotten her one great present? I mean that’s just gonna make her feel bad. Why would you do that to her Chandler? Why? Why?

Name: chandler
Lines: If I help, we can find ‘em faster!

Name: rachel
Lines: That’s right!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ooh ooh, we have a live one!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, it’s a Macy’s bag!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ooh, who’s it for?

Name: rachel
Lines: Dear losers, do you really think I’d hide presents under the couch? P.S. Chandler, I knew they’d break you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-oh. She may be onto us.

Name: rachel
Lines: We are so gonna find them this year.

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know when you guys said you were gonna go across the hall and look, you don’t, you don’t do that every year do you?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: chandler
Lines: You don’t, like go into the back of my closet, and look under my gym bag or anything?

Name: chandler
Lines: Because that’s where Joey gave me some stuff to store that I’ve never seen before in my life! Okay, that did not just happen!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, here comes another camera.

Name: ross
Lines: Right. No biggie. Stay loose.

Name: ross
Lines: Why do they keep doing that?

Name: monica
Lines: If we wanna get on camera, I think we have to get up on one of those platforms. They’ve been taping those people up there all day.

Name: ross
Lines: Right.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, what’d you guys do to get up on there?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh yeah? Well when you learned how to dance did you forget how to put on underpants?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah!

Name: joey
Lines: Really?

Name: joey
Lines: What do you mean?

Name: joey
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: joey
Lines: No-no-no-no-no we came together!

Name: joey
Lines: No-no hey buddy, please let me dance with that girl, I really like her and I think I have a shot.

Name: chandler
Lines: I couldn't find anything at Joey--Hey-hey, oh hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, we found them. There were in the guest room closet behind some coats.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, and you have nothing to worry about 'cos they're all crap!

Name: chandler
Lines: Those are my gifts, I got them for you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ohhh. Thanks Chandler they're great!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well Chandler, what is this very weird, metal A Z thing?

Name: chandler
Lines: Those are book ends! That's a great gift!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, okay, I'm sorry, thank you for my azzz.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ha!

Name: chandler
Lines: Make sure you put all that stuff back in the closet, okay?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes, okay, oh, by the way, I just gotta say, I think it's really nice of you that even after you've moved, you still keep storing that stuff for Joey!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey-hey dancer girl! Can I go to the bathroom? I just..  Looking good Gellers!

Name: ross
Lines: We know!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, see that snippy guy over there? He’s the one who decides who gets up on the platform. We should go dance by him.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Excuse me, sir, would it help if I weren’t wearing underpants?

Name: ross
Lines: Monica!  Would it?

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! Tall guy! Hey, listen, I wanted to talk to you about that girl that you’re dancing with.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, yeah, okay. Uh, look buddy, I came with that girl, and I had this plan to kiss her at the new years countdown – I’m trying to win her over, so I was wondering if..

Name: joey
Lines: Oh come on man, you can dance with my partner, she’s real, uh, mellow!

Name: joey
Lines: Well, I was hoping after tonight that maybe I could you know…

Name: joey
Lines: Alright, alright, hey y’know fair is fair,

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, now you’re the one who wet his pants.

Name: monica
Lines: Man, this sucks! Y’know if Mom and Dad don’t see us on TV after we made them so jealous, I mean, who’s gonna be the losers then?

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, I know what’ll get us up on a platform!

Name: monica
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: The routine!

Name: monica
Lines: Ross, we haven’t done the routine since middle school.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, when the snippy guy sees the routine, he’ll wanna build us our own platform!

Name: monica
Lines: Was it really that good?

Name: ross
Lines: We got honourable mention in the brother/sister dance category! Look, it’s almost fake midnight, do we really have any other choice?

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, let’s do it. Mom and Dad are gonna be so faced!

Name: ross
Lines: So, do we really have to ask who’s going up on the platform next?

Name: monica
Lines: Yes!

Name: joey
Lines: Uh, take a look at the guy’s pants! I mean, I know you told us to show excitement, but don’t you think he went a little overboard?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, take a hike wetpants!

Name: ross
Lines: Can you believe this? We’re gonna be on the platform for the Millennium moment!

Name: monica
Lines: I know! Hey, you haven’t been practising the routine, have you?

Name: ross
Lines: No!

Name: monica
Lines: Me too!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, when the music starts up again, I was thinking of maybe goind into the robot, y’know?

Name: monica
Lines: Ross, I think we should stick to the routine, we don’t wanna look stupid!

Name: joey
Lines: No! Year! Happy No Year!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey! Look who I found!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, hey guys!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Y’know, birds have a very good sense of direction, and I thought maybe they could help us find where the presents are hidden.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes, if the presents are hidden south for the winter.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Or we could just follow your clever jokes – any ideas? No! Didn’t think so! Okay, c’mon guys, show us where the presents are!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, the duck seems to think that Monica got me garbage! Hmm, I wonder what I could get Monica that’s as good as garbage?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hmm, how about my azzz?

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey, this is hollow.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?

Name: rachel
Lines: This bench, it’s hollow! I can’t believe I never knew that!  Oh, the presents!!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, don’t look directly at them!

Name: chandler
Lines: What?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Alright, no, we could look at them!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, this one’s for me!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, this one’s for Chandler. Here.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh great!

Name: phoebe
Lines: And the big one’s for me!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ooh, let’s open them!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay! Okay! Okay!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hee hee!

Name: chandler
Lines: Wait, we can’t do this.

Name: chandler
Lines: I don’t wanna know what Monica got me. Y’know? I mean, look, I’m sure she worked really hard at getting you a present, and wanting to surprise me, and you guys are gonna ruin that, and I, look we have to put these back, this is not what Christmas is about.

Name: rachel
Lines: Whatever Linus, I’m opening mine.

Name: chandler
Lines: Nobody is opening anything ok? Look, I don’t know about you guys, but I wanna see the look on Monica’s face when I give her my present, and I’m sure she wants to see the look on my face when I get mine. So please, please, can we just, can we put them back?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Will you get us better gifts?

Name: chandler
Lines: Fine!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey guys! You found the presents? Chandler, you let them find the presents? Great! Do you know how long it took me to find you that water purifier?

Name: chandler
Lines: That’s what you got me?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh yes, I see what you mean. That look is priceless.

Name: joey
Lines: Home sweet home, huh? Nice to, uh, get back to reality. Plus we know how the New Year’s gonna go off. I guess there’s no reason for all that Y2K panic, y’know? Anyway, g’night!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, yoii. What was that for?

Name: joey
Lines: Really? In the moment, I really wanted to kiss you too. In the moment.

Name: joey
Lines: But only in the moment. So do ya wanna kiss again?

Name: joey
Lines: No.

Name: joey
Lines: Uh, yeah, okay. Except I sorta felt like I needed a couple of seconds to get ready.

Name: monica
Lines: We were on the platform, ready to dance the world into the new Millennium, and the guy yelled ‘CUT!’

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh, wait, so you guys are telling me you actually did the routine from eighth grade?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah. But of course we had to update it a little bit.  Hey, by the way, great thinking about catching me!

Name: rachel
Lines: ‘Cos I was gonna say there’s no way you could’ve done the end the way you guys did it back then!

Name: monica
Lines: What? We could do it!

Name: ross
Lines: I don’t know, I mean you were a lot bigger, I mean, stronger back then.

Name: monica
Lines: I can do it, okay? Come on, let’s go.

Name: monica
Lines: I can’t do it!

Name: chandler
Lines: Now you do that, you’re on TV.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: Listen, do you guys think I have a chance with Janine?

Name: monica
Lines: Honey, we have been through this before!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah. Don’t do this to yourself.

Name: phoebe
Lines: She’s made it pretty clear, it is not going to happen.

Name: joey
Lines: Well all right then, I guess I shouldn’t get to excited about the fact  that I just kissed her!

Name: monica
Lines: You serious?!

Name: chandler
Lines: That’s great!

Name: monica
Lines: Really?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah well, we’ll see.

Name: ross
Lines: You kissed her.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh we kissed it up real nice.

Name: chandler
Lines: So you kissed her, so what happened after that?

Name: joey
Lines: I came over here to tell you guys.

Name: chandler
Lines: So she’s just waiting over there for ya?

Name: joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, I’m all right, okay, but hey, could you just leave your lips?

Name: monica
Lines: Bye.

Name: joey
Lines: Have you kissed her yet? It’s awesome! I could do it forever! Y’know what? She-she kisses better than my mom cooks!

Name: monica
Lines: I am so glad you said cooks.

Name: rachel
Lines: I know.

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh-oh, Pottery Barn!  You can throw the rest away.

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m not your garbage man. I’m your mailman.

Name: rachel
Lines: Monica look! Look-look-look! Here is that table that I ordered.

Name: monica
Lines: You got it from Pottery Barn?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah! It’s an apothecary table. Does anyone even know what an apothecary is?

Name: chandler
Lines: A pharmacist.

Name: monica
Lines: Rach, Phoebe hates Pottery Barn.

Name: joey
Lines: I hate Pottery Barn too. They kicked me out of there just because I sat on a bed!

Name: chandler
Lines: You took off your pants and climbed under the sheets!

Name: joey
Lines: I was tired!

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe hates Pottery Barn?!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah, she hates all mass produced stuff. She thinks her furniture should have a history, a story behind it.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well this has story behind it! I mean they had to ship it all the way from the White Plains store.

Name: monica
Lines: It’s gotta be one of a kind. Y’know like umm, y’know uh, what’s that God awful ceramic fruit bowl she has on her counter?

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! I made that for her!

Name: chandler
Lines: You made pottery?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah! I made it of this fruit bowl I found in the garbage.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m telling—If you put that in her apartment you’ll never hear the end of it.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay fine! I’ll-I’ll just tell her it’s an antique apothecary table, she doesn’t have to know where it came from. Oh! Look at this little drawers! Oh look-look it says that it holds 300 CDs.

Name: chandler
Lines: Ahh, just like the apothecary tables of yore…

Name: chandler
Lines: …so then the farmer says, \That’s not a cow and you’re not milking it.\"

Name: monica
Lines: I am so glad you guys got together, Chandler and I are always looking for a couple to go out with and now we have one!

Name: chandler
Lines: Look at us, we’re a couple of couples!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah.

Name: joey
Lines: And Chandler I can’t believe I let you pay for this one.  Thanks man.

Name: monica
Lines: So do you guys gonna come over tomorrow? I’ll make that pasta thing I was telling you about.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, but hey look, at least let us bring the wine.

Name: monica
Lines: Joey, you don’t have too!

Name: joey
Lines: Nope-op! I insist!  You get the wine right?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah all right.  Okay, good night guys.

Name: joey
Lines: See ya tomorrow!

Name: monica
Lines: Tomorrow!

Name: joey
Lines: What?

Name: joey
Lines: What-what’s wrong with Monica and Chandler?

Name: joey
Lines: Blah?!

Name: joey
Lines: Uh, they’re like my best friends. Are you saying we can’t hang out with them? ‘Cause that would kinda be a problem.

Name: joey
Lines: I guess.

Name: joey
Lines: If you want, I’ll sell my friends and use the money to buy you presents.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ooh, what a great table! Where-where did you get it?

Name: rachel
Lines: Guess!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Umm, a flea market?

Name: rachel
Lines: Ha! See, I knew, I knew you’d get it on the first guess. Isn’t it cool! It’s an apothecary table.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wow! Oh you can just imagine that this is where  they kept all the stuff to make their potions.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh, yes.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Y’know? Ooh, you can almost smell the opium.

Name: rachel
Lines: Almost.

Name: phoebe
Lines: How much was it?

Name: rachel
Lines: It was only 500 bucks.

Name: phoebe
Lines: 500 bucks at a flea market?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, okay see I thought, I thought you meant how much was it when it was new, y’know like back then.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh no.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah no, I mean it was at a flea market, so it was y’know, it was like a dollar.

Name: phoebe
Lines: A dollar?

Name: rachel
Lines: And fifty. So it was like one and fifty dollars.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ohh, okay, they gave you the old time pricing.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, what period is it from?

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh, it’s from yore. Like the days of yore. Y’know?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes, yes I do. God, oh it’s just perfect! Wow! I bet it has a great story behind it too. Did they tell you anything? Like y’know where it was from or…

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes! That I know, this is from White Plains.

Name: phoebe
Lines: White Plains. Oh, it sounds like such a magical place.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey! We’re here!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh! Oh my God!

Name: ross
Lines: You like it?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh no!

Name: ross
Lines: It’s my new apothecary table!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross! Phoebe’s gonna be here any second, she cannot see this!

Name: ross
Lines: Well why not?! She’ll-she’ll love it! It’s the real thing! I got it at Pottery Barn.

Name: rachel
Lines: I know you did! I bought the same one! And if she sees your table she’s gonna know that I lied to her. I told her ours was an original.

Name: ross
Lines: Why did you do that?

Name: rachel
Lines: Because she hates Pottery Barn.

Name: ross
Lines: She hates Pottery Barn?!!

Name: rachel
Lines: I know! I know, she says it’s all mass-produced, nothing is authentic, and everyone winds up having the same stuff.  So come on, she’s gonna be here any second! Can we please just cover this up with something?! Please?

Name: ross
Lines: What? No! No! I am not gonna hide it from Phoebe—Ooh, although I did get some great Pottery Barn sheets!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ooo! Oh, I forgot they made sheets!

Name: ross
Lines: Uh, yeah! I still can’t believe she hates Pottery Barn!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross, get over it! It’s not like she hates you.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah but Pottery Barn! Y’know what I think? It’s just she-she’s weird. Y’know it’s because she’s a twin. Twins are weird.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross, she’s not weird, she just wants her stuff to be one of a kind.

Name: ross
Lines: Huh. Y’know what’s not one of a kind? A twin!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ooh, Phoebe’s here! Okay, let’s turn out all the lights and we’ll just watch the movie!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay. Hey—Ooh, cool sheets!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, you like it? You wanna know where I got it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Sure!

Name: rachel
Lines: He got it a flea market!

Name: phoebe
Lines: You bought your sheets at a flea market? Ross come on, you gotta loosen the purse strings a little.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: Hi!

Name: monica
Lines: The dinner will be ready in twenty minutes. This is so exciting.

Name: chandler
Lines: And here is the bottle of wine for you to bring over tonight.  You were also going to buy Monica flowers but you couldn’t afford it, because you paid dinner last night.

Name: joey
Lines: Thanks. Thanks, but uh actually it’s just gonna be me again tonight.

Name: monica
Lines: What happened to Janine?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, she’s uh-uh really sick.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh that’s too bad.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, she’s been in there all day , uh high fever, a nose problem… Phlegm! Phlegm! Phlegm-phlegm-phlegm!

Name: joey
Lines: ‘Kay!

Name: chandler
Lines: That’s funny, I saw no phlegm.

Name: joey
Lines: No-no, she really is sick!

Name: chandler
Lines: Then why-why is she going to a play?!

Name: joey
Lines: Uh, y’know, starve a fever, go to a play for a cold.

Name: monica
Lines: Joey! Why is Janine not coming over for dinner?!

Name: joey
Lines: Well uh, she didn’t want to hang out with you guys two nights in a row. I’m so sorry.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, why does she not want to hang out with us?!

Name: joey
Lines: Because she uh, she-she thinks that you are blah and that you, Monica, are too loud.

Name: monica
Lines: What?

Name: chandler
Lines: So she was just pretending to have a good time last night? She was lying to our faces?!

Name: monica
Lines: Ugh, I can not believe this! I mean, who is she to judge us? We could not have been nicer to her!

Name: chandler
Lines: And I am not blah, I am a hoot!

Name: joey
Lines: I know! I know! Come on, please-please you guys, don’t-don’t be mad. I’m sure she just, she just said that stuff because she was nervous and you guys are like my best friends! Y’know? And it was our first date! Plus, she’s really sick!

Name: chandler
Lines: No, you sh—No you said you made that up!!

Name: joey
Lines: I know, but don’t you think the sick thing is way better than the play thing?

Name: chandler
Lines: Eh, they’re both good. I generally just go with, Monica’s drunk again.

Name: joey
Lines: Come on you guys, come on please-please just give her another chance, huh? She’ll come around I promise.

Name: monica
Lines: Of course we will, come on we gotta make dinner.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: I do not like that woman!

Name: joey
Lines: I can hear you!

Name: monica
Lines: I am loud!

Name: rachel
Lines: That’s funny.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey Pheebs, could you please not put your feet up on my new……old sheet?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh sure!  Noo!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh!!

Name: ross
Lines: My apothecary table!!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Noooooo!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ross, where did you get this?!

Name: ross
Lines: I got it at Pottery Barn!! Okay?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God, Phoebe, Pottery Barn has ripped off the design of our antique!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wow! Oh my God, well if they’ve ripped off our table ours must be much more than one and fifty dollars!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh yes.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well this doesn’t even smell like opium.

Name: ross
Lines: Of course not, it smells like wine, which you spilled! And thanks for wrecking my sheet by the way.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh Ross, calm down, I’ll give you the 80 cents.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, one more time.

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler, would you like some more orange juice?

Name: chandler
Lines: Perfect decibel.

Name: monica
Lines: I know!!!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: So uh, what are you guys doing?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh nothing, we’re just talking. Y’know, blah-blah-blah.

Name: joey
Lines: Look, come on you guys, you said you were gonna try! All right look, I came over here to invite you guys to a movie with me and Janine.

Name: monica
Lines: Well, I’d like to but,  I’m not sure we have time to go.

Name: joey
Lines: Ha-ha, very funny—Look! I don’t know what to do! I really want you guys to get along. Just please come to the movie with us. I mean you owe me!

Name: monica
Lines: We owe you?!

Name: joey
Lines: That’s right! I helped you guys out a lot in the start of your relationship. Huh? I helped you guys sneak around for like six months, and I looked like an idiot! And I was humiliated. And I only made 200 dollars!

Name: monica
Lines: We didn’t give you any money!

Name: joey
Lines: You don’t think I know that!

Name: rachel
Lines: …see I can’t decide whether it would go better next to the new wicker dining chair, the Sahara desk, or the Parker console table.

Name: ross
Lines: Wow! I didn’t know that there was a Pottery Barn up here.

Name: rachel
Lines: I know, I know. I went a little crazy.

Name: ross
Lines: A little? Your place looks like page 72 of the catalogue. Oh look at that! The ornamental bird cage! Large!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh Ross no. Be careful, that is very old! Okay? Early Colonial bird merchants used to bring their birds to market in that.

Name: ross
Lines: Fascinating.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Another amazing find! Wow! Oh I bet this has a great story too!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh it does, it does! It is a room separating apparatus from Colonial times.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ah!

Name: ross
Lines: Hmm, a lot of this stuff is from Colonial times. Hey, what are some other time periods Rachel?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well there’s yore. And uh, y’know, yesteryear.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah no, I’m telling you Rachel has such a great eye for this stuff. Ross, y’know if you ever decide you need to redecorate—And I think that you should. You should, you should ask Rachel to help.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh honey he doesn’t need my help.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, come on! I think he’s ready to get rid of, what did you call it? The cheap knock-offs and dinosaur junk.

Name: ross
Lines: Really?!  Hey, y’know what? Since you have such a great sense of what I need, uh ooh, here’s-here’s 60 bucks, why don’t you take Phoebe down to that Colonial flea market of yours and get me some stuff.

Name: rachel
Lines: Y’know what? I don’t, I don’t think Phoebe really wants to come.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No! I do want to!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, she does want to.

Name: ross
Lines: She does want to.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah!

Name: rachel
Lines: Pheebs, I don’t know what to say. I guess the flea market was just better last time.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well at least I got these sheets for Ross.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uck, look at this! Pottery Barn, yuck!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, y’know what? Don’t look at it.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No! Look-look! There’s the coffee table they stole from us!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ugh, those bastards! Let’s go.

Name: phoebe
Lines: That fan kinda looks like ours. And the birdcage and the…wait a sec! This is our exact living room!

Name: rachel
Lines: No! No! No! No it’s not! No it’s not! Come on! Phoebe, ours is totally different! I mean we don’t have the…  We don’t have the…that lamp! And-and that screen is y’know, on the other side.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God. This is where you got all our stuff, Pottery Barn! Oh my God!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay! Okay-okay look—no I did, I just wanted this stuff and I know how you feel about Pottery Barn. Just… Come on don’t be mad.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No-no-no, but I am mad! I am mad! Because this stuff is everything that is wrong with the world! And it’s all sitting up in my living room and all I can think about is how I don’t have that lamp!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well then honey, buy the lamp! Hey, we have that 60 bucks from Ross.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can’t! I can’t! Unless… Well are you saying that-that you would move out if-if I didn’t buy that lamp?

Name: rachel
Lines: What?! No! I’m not gonna move out!

Name: phoebe
Lines: But are you saying that you would move out if I didn’t buy that lamp?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh. Yes! I would so move out!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay then I don’t have a choice! I have to buy that lamp!

Name: rachel
Lines: That’s right!

Name: phoebe
Lines: But at least the apothecary table is real.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, this-this-this was great. Didn’t everybody have a great time?

Name: chandler
Lines: That’s totally understandable.

Name: monica
Lines: Don’t worry about it.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh yeah!

Name: monica
Lines: Absolutely!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh well then, good night!

Name: monica
Lines: Good night!

Name: joey
Lines: See? Eh, wasn’t that fun?

Name: monica
Lines: I knew it!! Y’know, you’re not so quiet yourself, missy!

Name: chandler
Lines: And I’m blah? Listen, the only thing more boring than watching modern dance is having to listen to you talk about it,  \Oh Chandler

Name: monica
Lines: All right! You and me! Let’s go! Right now!

Name: joey
Lines: All right! All right! Enough! Enough! Enough!! Enough!

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know I think you can take her.

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: joey
Lines: All right, uh, we’ve got a little bit of a problem here. These people are my friends; you can’t treat them that way.

Name: joey
Lines: I know! I know! And I’m going to talk to them about it. They mean so much to me. They… They’re like my family. If you guys are gonna be fighting all the time, I-I… I don’t think we can be together. It just, it just can’t work. It can’t.  I’m very upset.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah! Yeah! That would be very helpful! Yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: What did I tell you about the hall?!

Name: monica
Lines: Well, I know that would make Joey happy, so, I would like that too.

Name: monica
Lines: Now come on.  Well, I’m glad we worked things out.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Bye.

Name: monica
Lines: Come on!

Name: monica
Lines: You’d better run!

Name: chandler
Lines: Did you hear that?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah uh, what am I gonna do?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I’m sorry man.  You wanna go watch?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: How ya doin’?

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey so, did uh, did she move out?

Name: joey
Lines: Pretty much, yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: I cannot believe you broke up with her just like that.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, when it’s not right, you know it.

Name: chandler
Lines: You okay?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah! Yeah. I’ll be all right.

Name: ross
Lines: Y’know what would cheer you up?

Name: joey
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: I’m giving this lecture on erosion theories tomorrow night, I think you should come.

Name: joey
Lines: You’re right! That did cheer me up!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, you’re not going to believe this. I made up a joke and sent it in to Playboy. They printed it!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I didn’t know Playboy prints jokes.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, they print jokes, interviews, hard-hitting journalism. It’s not just about the pictures.

Name: monica
Lines: That didn’t work on mom, it’s not going to work on us.

Name: ross
Lines: Here, check it out. It’s the first one, too.

Name: chandler
Lines: That is funny. It was also funny when I made it up.

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: chandler
Lines: I made that joke up.

Name: ross
Lines: Uh, oh-oh, no you didn’t. I did.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes, I did. I told it to Dan at work, and he said it was the funniest joke he’d ever heard.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, tell Dan, ‘Thanks.’

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m sorry, I was just reading the joke below it. Man, that one is funny.

Name: chandler
Lines: Monica, you remember me telling you that joke, right?

Name: monica
Lines: No.

Name: chandler
Lines: Seriously?

Name: monica
Lines: Well, you tell a lot of jokes!

Name: ross
Lines: Look, Chandler, it’s my joke. But, hey, if it makes you feel any better they don’t print the name, so it doesn’t really matter who gets credit, right?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I guess.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey guys.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, Joey, Playboy printed my joke.

Name: ross
Lines: No, it’s my joke, it’s mine. You can call them, they’ll tell you.

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s my joke.

Name: ross
Lines: It’s my joke.

Name: joey
Lines: Whoa-whoa-whoa. Jokes? You guys know they have naked chicks in there, right?

Name: chandler
Lines: Dude, you have got to turn on Behind the Music. The band Heart is having a really tough time, and I think they may break up.

Name: joey
Lines: Let’s go watch it at your place.

Name: chandler
Lines: Nah, Monica’s watching some cooking show. Come on, I don’t want to miss when they were skinny.

Name: joey
Lines: Chandler, Chandler, y’know what we should do? You and I should go out and get some new sunglasses.

Name: chandler
Lines: What? No, I want to watch this. . Did your cable go out?

Name: joey
Lines: No, that’s VH-1. I gotta tell you, the music these kids listen to today . . . It’s like a lotta noise to me. I don’t know…

Name: chandler
Lines: Joey, why is your cable out?

Name: joey
Lines: I uh, oh! Because, uh, I haven’t really paid the bill

Name: chandler
Lines: If you need money, will you please-please just let me loan you some money?

Name: joey
Lines: No, Chandler. Look, forget about it, okay? Look, I know things have been a little tight since Janine moved out. Oh, was she hot.

Name: chandler
Lines: Whoa ho.

Name: joey
Lines: I know! Yeah, but, look I can handle it. All right? Look, I can listen to the radio, huh? And Ross gave me this great book .

Name: chandler
Lines: All right, you want to see if the joke stealer will let us watch the show at his place?

Name: joey
Lines: Sure.

Name: chandler
Lines: Paid your phone bill?

Name: joey
Lines: Not so much.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey.

Name: monica
Lines: It’s only you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wh-wh-what are you doing?

Name: rachel
Lines: We are looking at a Playboy.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, I want to look too! . Yikes!

Name: monica
Lines: So do you think that these pictures—Are, are they trying to tell a story?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, yeah, sure. I mean, like in the case of this young woman, she has lost her clothes, so she rides naked on the horse, she’s crying out, ‘Where are they, where are they?’

Name: monica
Lines: Well, she’s not going to find them lying in the grass like that.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, yeah. Aw, remember the days when you used to go out to the barn, lift up your shirt, and bend over?

Name: rachel
Lines: You see, now, I would date this girl. She’s cute, she’s outdoorsy, you know, and she knows how to build a fire. I mean, that’s got to come in handy

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, I’ve got a question. If you had to pick one of us to date, who would it be?

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t know.

Name: monica
Lines: Me neither.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Rachel.

Name: monica
Lines: What?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I don’t know.  Me neither.

Name: joey
Lines: You forget how many great songs Heart had.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: You know, Barracuda was the first song I learned to play on the keyboard.

Name: chandler
Lines: So, you heard it, you repeated it, so that must mean you wrote it.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, you guys, with this joke. I gotta say, I know I cracked up, but I’m not even sure I got it.

Name: ross
Lines: What, you didn’t get it? The doctor is a monkey.

Name: chandler
Lines: And monkeys can’t write out prescriptions.

Name: chandler
Lines: You are not allowed to laugh at my joke.

Name: ross
Lines: Your joke? Well, I think ‘the Hef’ would disagree, which is why he sent me a check for one hundred ah-dollars.

Name: chandler
Lines: So, you stole my joke, and you stole my money.

Name: ross
Lines: Well, I was going to stick it in the ATM, but now I think I’ll show the sexy teller that I am a published writer.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, she is going to know that you stole the joke.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, what are you going to do, follow me down there?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah!

Name: ross
Lines: Well, I’m not going to go now anyway .

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay .

Name: joey
Lines: Ah, Gunther, I can’t pay for this right now because I’m not working, so I’ve had to cut down on some luxuries like uh, payin’ for stuff.

Name: joey
Lines: Uh, I don’t know. Ya see, it’s just, see I was a regular on a soap opera y’know? And to go from that to this, I just… Plus, I’d have to wait on all my friends.

Name: joey
Lines: What?!

Name: joey
Lines: Maybe I could be a waiter. Could I use the phone?

Name: monica
Lines: She picked Rachel. I mean, she tried to back out of it, but it was obvious. She picked Rachel.

Name: chandler
Lines: He took my joke, he took it.

Name: monica
Lines: It’s wrong. You know what else is wrong? Phoebe picking Rachel.

Name: chandler
Lines: You know who else picked Rachel? Ross, and you know what else Ross did? He stole my joke. You know what? I’m going to get a joke journal. Y’know? And document the date and time of every single one of my jokes.

Name: monica
Lines: That’s a good idea.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah!

Name: monica
Lines: Do you know what’s a bad idea?

Name: chandler
Lines: Picking Rachel.

Name: monica
Lines: That’s right.  Did you hear something?

Name: chandler
Lines: Maybe it’s the sound of Ross climbing into my brain and stealing my thoughts.

Name: monica
Lines: It’s coming from the living room.

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, you guys.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, don’t you guys look cute. You guys make such a cute couple.

Name: rachel
Lines: Monica, what are you doing?

Name: monica
Lines: Remember, when you picked Rachel over me? That was funny.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I guess it was kinda funny.

Name: monica
Lines: It wasn’t funny at all! Why would you do that? Why didn’t you pick me?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Fine. The reason that I was leaning a little bit more toward Rachel than you is just that you’re … just … kinda high maintenance—Okay let’s go to lunch!

Name: monica
Lines: That is completely untrue. You think I’m high maintenance? Okay, prove it. I want you to make a list and we’re going to go through it point by point!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, okay, you’re right. You’re easy-going. You’re just not as easy-going as Rachel. She’s just more flexible and-and mellow. That’s all.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, people are different.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ya, you know, Rachel … she’ll do whatever you want. Y’know, you can just walk all over her.

Name: rachel
Lines: What? Wait a minute. What are you saying, that I’m a pushover? I’m not a pushover.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, okay,  you’re not a pushover.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my … you think I’m a pushover. Well wait, watch this, you know what? You’re not invited to lunch. What do you think of that? I think that’s pretty strong, that’s what I think. Come on, Monica, let’s go to lunch.

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: I cannot believe her.

Name: monica
Lines: I know. Where do you wanna go eat?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, oh, I love that Japanese place.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m sick of Japanese. We’re not going there.

Name: rachel
Lines: All right, wherever you wanna go is cool.

Name: monica
Lines: All right.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, hey, Gunther, check this out.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey Ross, listen, you want anything to drink, ‘cause I’m heading up there.

Name: ross
Lines: Uh, yeah, I’ll take a coffee. Thanks, man.

Name: joey
Lines: Sure.  Coffee? ‘Cause I’m going up there.

Name: rachel
Lines: No.

Name: monica
Lines: No, thank you.

Name: joey
Lines: You guys need anything, ‘cause I’m heading up there.

Name: joey
Lines: You got it.

Name: monica
Lines: Joey, what are you doing?

Name: joey
Lines: Just being friendly.

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey, honey, I don’t think you’re supposed to go back there.

Name: joey
Lines: Nah, it’s okay. Right, Gunther?

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, but I don’t see you asking any other paying customers to put on aprons.

Name: monica
Lines: Joey, do you work here?

Name: joey
Lines: No.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah?

Name: monica
Lines: Joey, what’s going on. What didn’t you tell us you work here?

Name: joey
Lines: It’s kind of embarrassing, y’know. I mean, I was an actor and now I’m a waiter. It’s supposed to go in the other direction.

Name: chandler
Lines: So is your apron. You’re wearing it like a cape.

Name: joey
Lines: I mean, the job’s easy and the money’s good, you know? I guess I’m going to be hanging out here anyway. I might as well get paid for it, right? I just feel kind of weird serving you guys.

Name: rachel
Lines: Come on, Joey, I did it and it was fine.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, why would it be weird? Hey, Joey, can I get some coffee?

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, I guess it doesn’t seem that weird.

Name: ross
Lines: Seriously, I-I asked you before and you still haven’t gotten it.

Name: joey
Lines: See, now it’s weird again.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, you know what? This is great. Finally, I have someone I can pass on my wisdom too. Let me tell you about a couple of things I learned while working at the coffeehouse. First of all, the customer is always right.  And if anyone is ever rude to you? Sneeze muffin.

Name: joey
Lines: Thanks, Rach. Look, you guys are just terrific. Y’know? Now, how about clearing out of here so I can get some new customers. It’s all about turnover.

Name: ross
Lines: Joey, seriously, can I get my coffee?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, I’m sorry, Ross. I’ll get it for you right now. And since I made you wait, I’ll toss in a free muffin.

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe. We would like to talk to you for a second.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: So, maybe I am a little high maintenance. And maybe Rachel is a little bit of a pushover. But you know what we decided you are?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes, we are very sorry to tell you this, but you, Phoebe, are flaky.

Name: monica
Lines: Hah!

Name: phoebe
Lines: That true, I am flaky.

Name: rachel
Lines: So, what, you’re just, you’re just okay with being flaky?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, totally.

Name: monica
Lines: Well, then, I’m okay with being high maintenance.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, and I am okay with being a pushover.

Name: phoebe
Lines: That’s great. Good for you guys.

Name: monica
Lines: I am not high maintenance!

Name: rachel
Lines: I am not a pushover!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Who said you were?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, I’m flaky. I’ll say anything.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, Gunther. Can you uh, can you cover for me? I just got an audition.

Name: joey
Lines: Really?! I like your natural color. Come on man, it’s a great part. Look, check it out. I’m the lead guy’s best friend and I wait for him in this bar and save his seat. Listen-listen. ‘I’m sorry, that seat’s saved.’

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, maybe he’s not his best friend, but …

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, man, I could totally get that part. ‘I’m sorry, that seat is taken.’

Name: joey
Lines: No, no, I didn’t mean you. But, you believed me, huh?

Name: joey
Lines: So, you’d hire me, right?

Name: joey
Lines: Exactly! All right, everybody, listen up. The coffeehouse is going to be closed for about an hour.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, it’s for the kids. To keep the kids off drugs. It’s a very important issue in this month’s Playboy. I’m sure you all read about it.

Name: ross
Lines: It’s my joke.

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s my joke.

Name: ross
Lines: Y’know, I don’t think we’re going to settle this.

Name: chandler
Lines: Let’s have Monica decide.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah!

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey Mon.

Name: chandler
Lines: Mon, get out here!

Name: ross
Lines: Monica!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, okay. You have to help us decide whose joke this is.

Name: monica
Lines: Why do I have to decide?

Name: chandler
Lines: Because you’re the only one that can be fair.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: I can’t be fair. You’re my boyfriend.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, but I’m your brother. We’re family. That’s the most important thing in the world.

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m your only chance to have a baby. Okay, let’s go.

Name: ross
Lines: We’ll each tell you how we came up with the joke and then you decide which one of us is telling the truth—me.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, Chandler, you go first.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, I thought of the joke two months ago at lunch with Steve.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, wait, is he the guy I met at Christmas?

Name: chandler
Lines: Can I finish my story?!

Name: monica
Lines: Do you want me to pick you?!

Name: ross
Lines: See, I would never snap at you like that.

Name: monica
Lines: Continue.

Name: chandler
Lines: So Steve said he had to go to the doctor. And Steve’s doctor’s name is Doctor Muppy. So I said, ‘Doctor Monkey?’ And that is how the whole Doctor Monkey thing came up.

Name: ross
Lines: Are you kidding? Okay, look. I-I studied evolution. Remember, evolution? Monkey into man? Plus, I’m a doctor, and I had a monkey. I’m Doctor Monkey!

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m not arguing with that.

Name: monica
Lines: All right, I’ve heard enough. I’ve made my decision.

Name: monica
Lines: You are both idiots. The joke is not funny, and it’s offensive to women, and doctors, and monkeys! You shouldn’t be arguing over who gets credit, you should be arguing over who gets blamed for inflicting this horrible joke upon the world! Now let it go! The joke sucks!

Name: ross
Lines: It’s your joke.

Name: chandler
Lines: Is not.

Name: monica
Lines: Hi, Chandler. There you are.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hi, oh hi.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, it’s Phoebe and Rachel. Um, why don’t you tell them what you were telling me earlier about me not being high maintenance?

Name: chandler
Lines: —generosity of spirit.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow, you know what? That is the best fake speech I think I’ve ever heard.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Really? I’ve heard better.

Name: monica
Lines: Wait, wait, he came up with that himself. Tell them, Chandler.

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m out of words. Should I just say the whole thing again?

Name: monica
Lines: Look, I am not high maintenance. I am not. Chandler!

Name: chandler
Lines: You’re a little high maintenance.

Name: monica
Lines: Ahhh! You are on my list.

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m sorry. You’re not easy-going, but you’re passionate, and that’s good. And when you get upset about the little things, I think that I’m pretty good about making you feel better about that. And that’s good too. So, they can say that you’re high maintenance, but it’s okay, because I like … maintaining you.

Name: monica
Lines: . All right you’re off my list.

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe, it’s okay that you don’t want me to be your girlfriend because I have the best boyfriend.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Y’know, suddenly I find you very attractive.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, buddy boy, how’d the audition go?

Name: joey
Lines: Not good, no. I didn’t get the part, and I lost my job here, so …

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wow! That is a bad audition.

Name: rachel
Lines: How-how did you lose your job here?

Name: joey
Lines: Well, I had the audition but Gunther said I had to stay here and be in charge so he could go get his hair dyed. So, I went anyway, and then he fired me.

Name: rachel
Lines: He left work in the middle of the day to do a personal errand and left you in charge when you’ve been working here two days? That’s not, that’s not right.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, what are ya gonna do?

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey, you can’t let him get away with that. Ya know what, I’m not going to let him get away with that. I’m going to say something to him—No, I really shouldn’t say anything—No, I should say something to him.  Gunther, I want you to give Joey his job back. That is really not fair that you have to fire him…

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: rachel
Lines: That’s right, he can have his job back. I’m glad we got that all straightened out. There you go, Joey, you got your job back.

Name: joey
Lines: That’s great. Thanks Rach.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, pretty nice, huh? Now who’s a pushover?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Rach, you’re in my seat.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, I’m sorry.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey, I never got to hear who you guys would pick to be your girlfriend.

Name: monica
Lines: I pick you, Phoebe.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, yeah. Definitely you, Pheebs.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, well, I kinda thought.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey. Oh, I have a question. If-if-if one of you had to pick one of the other two guys to go out with, who would you pick?

Name: ross
Lines: No way.

Name: joey

Name: ross
Lines: What’s up?

Name: chandler
Lines: I can’t figure out what to make Monica.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, why don’t you make her one of your little jokes.

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m going crazy! Okay? Do you have any thing around here that looks homemade?

Name: ross
Lines: Y’know what? She’d-she’d love this.  Uh, it’s an exact replica of Apollo 8. I made it in the sixth grade.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I guess I could use that. I could say that your love sends me to the moon.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah-yeah, except Apollo 8 didn’t actually land on the moon. But you-you-you could write that umm, your love lets me orbit the moon twice and return safely.

Name: chandler
Lines: Wait a minute, I can’t give this to her.

Name: ross
Lines: Why not?

Name: chandler
Lines: Because it says \Captain Ross\" on the side and \"I hate Monica\" on the bottom."

Name: ross
Lines: Oh.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ahhhhh, salmon skin roll.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay. Okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey! Hi! You uh, ready to exchange gifts?

Name: monica
Lines: Sure! Okay, you go first.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, come here! Come here.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay!

Name: chandler
Lines: Now, it’s not wrapped because I just, just finished it.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: But I made you a tape of what I think are all romantic songs.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, what a great gift! Is The Way You Look Tonight on it?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Maybe we’ll have to listen and see!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, I love it! Thank you so much!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, you ready to open yours?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s a sock bunny.

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah-yeah, you remember how I call you bunny?

Name: chandler
Lines: Not really.

Name: monica
Lines: Well, I did one time, and-and I want to start doing it more. See that’s what this is about.

Name: chandler
Lines: I see. Y’know umm, Phoebe makes sock bunnies.

Name: monica
Lines: No! No, she doesn’t. Uh Phoebe, what she makes—that’s uh—they’re sock rabbits. They are completely different—Okay! Okay! Okay! I didn’t make it! I’m sorry! I totally forgot about tonight and the fact that we’re supposed to make the presents!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, it’s okay. I don’t…

Name: monica
Lines: No-no, it’s not okay! It’s not! I mean you were just… You’re so incredible! You went through all this time and effort to make this tape for me! Y’know I’m just gonna—I, I am gonna make this up to you! I will! I-I am going to cook anything you want in here

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Name: chandler
Lines: Wow!  You are way to young to have seen that!

Name: monica
Lines: Oops!  Y’know, your birthday is in a month-and-a-half, what do you say I forget to get you a present for that too?

Name: chandler
Lines: You are totally and completely 100% forgiven.

Name: monica
Lines: We have got to wash that!

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah!

Name: monica
Lines: Do you remember that jacket that you love so much, that you thought was too expensive?

Name: chandler
Lines: You have done enough!

Name: monica
Lines: I wanna wake up early and go get it for you!

Name: chandler
Lines: No you don’t—get it in black, not brown.

Name: monica
Lines: Oop, your cake is ready!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oop!

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, it’s like that old saying, have some sex, eat some cake.

Name: monica
Lines: Who the hell are you?!

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: joey
Lines: Look, I got to apologize on the behalf of Carl.

Name: chandler
Lines: Who the hell is Carl?!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, did I not mention? Carl is a guy I hired to be my identical twin for a medical research project.

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know sometimes the good ideas are just right in front of you, aren’t they?

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, I know it sounds crazy, but I think it might work. Y’know? The only problem is, Carl’s acting is…

Name: monica
Lines: The only problem!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, he’s the reason I didn’t get that big Minute Maid commercial a couple of years ago remember? We were supposed to be brothers, but he messed it up.

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: phoebe
Lines: Pat Sajak?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yep!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Alex Trebek?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, of course!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Chuck Woolery?

Name: rachel
Lines: Definitely! Phoebe, you will not find a single game show host, who’s ass I cannot kick.

Name: rachel
Lines: Say it!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Say we are unagi!

Name: ross
Lines: It’s not something you are! It’s something you have!

Name: rachel
Lines: Say it!

Name: ross
Lines: Y’know what? I can easily get out of this, but there is a chance you can get very, very hurt!

Name: joey
Lines: All right Carl, we’re next. Now remember, what is not gonna be?

Name: joey
Lines: That’s right! And what are you not gonna do?

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: joey
Lines: That’s us.

Name: joey
Lines: That’s right, $2,000.

Name: joey
Lines: Damnit Carl!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh my good God.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey! Continuing the countdown of your favorite meals. Tonight, No. 3, macaroni and cheese with cut up hot dogs.

Name: chandler
Lines: Look, you have done enough! Okay? You have to stop this now.

Name: monica
Lines: I will! But not tonight. For dinner music, I thought we could listen to that tape you made me.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, the mixed tape.

Name: monica
Lines: The Way You Look Tonight is on here! Dance with me?

Name: monica
Lines: You are just the sweetest.

Name: chandler
Lines: No! You’re the sweetest!

Name: ross
Lines: It’s a great class.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, yeah, I was watching.  Umm, hey, a couple of questions though. Umm, about that-that-that last move where the woman tripped you and then pinned you to the floor, what-what-what-what would you do next?

Name: ross
Lines: No. No-no. No. What would you do next?

Name: ross
Lines: Yes that’s right.

Name: ross
Lines: I tired attacking two women, did not work.

Name: ross
Lines: No, I mean it’s okay, I mean, they’re-they’re my friends. In fact, I-I-I was married to one of them.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, no! No-no! No, I tired! But I couldn’t. That’s why I’m here. Maybe we could attack them together?  That-that’s a no.

Name: chandler
Lines: I am so, so, so, so sorry!

Name: monica
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: chandler
Lines: And I will cook anything you want in here

Name: monica
Lines: And, are you kiddin’ me?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Come on Monica, it’s our Valentine’s Day. Please? Please-please, please?

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: So, are we going in there?

Name: monica
Lines: I am!!

Name: ross
Lines: Ah-ha, nowhere to run!

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t like sitting up here! I’m just gonna over…

Name: phoebe
Lines: No Rachel! They got here first!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Why is Ross doing that?

Name: ross
Lines: DANGER!!!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! Why is he jumping on those women!

Name: phoebe
Lines: We should help him!

Name: rachel
Lines: I… Well, I don’t think they need any help.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey! I just got uh, my teacher evaluations! Check out what this one student wrote, \I loved Dr. Geller’s class. Mind blowing lectures! Dr. Geller

Name: chandler
Lines: Ahh, Hotties of the Paleontology Department, there’s a big selling calendar, eh?

Name: rachel
Lines: Who wrote it?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, I wish I knew, but the evaluations are all anonymous.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh hey, do you still have their final exams?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, ‘cause you can just match the evaluation to the exam with the same handwriting and boom, there’s your admirer.

Name: chandler
Lines: A hot girl’s at stake and all of the sudden he’s Rain Man.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, wait a minute, wait a minute, why are we so sure that this is a girl?

Name: ross
Lines: It’s a girl! Anyway, it wou—it wouldn’t matter. Okay? Because I’m a teacher and she’s a student.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, is that against the rules?

Name: ross
Lines: No, but it is frowned upon.

Name: chandler
Lines: I see.

Name: ross
Lines: Besides, there’s a big age difference.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, well think of it like this, when you’re 90…

Name: ross
Lines: I know when I’m 90 she’ll be like 80 and it won’t seem like such a big difference.

Name: joey
Lines: No that’s not what I was going to say at all. No, what I was going to say is when you’re 90 you’ll still have the memory of what it was like to be with a 20-year-old.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey Chandler! Y’know that girl you went to college with who-who became a movie director?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh yeah, Dana Keystone. She was in my Movement class.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What’s a Movement class?

Name: monica
Lines: It’s Chandler’s way of pretending he didn’t take mime.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh well listen, anyway she’s directing the new Al Pacino movie. You gotta get me an audition!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, I don’t know man. I haven’t talked to her in like ten years.

Name: joey
Lines: No-no-no, please-please Chandler I-I-I would owe you so much!

Name: chandler
Lines: You do owe me so much. You owe me three thousand, four hundred…

Name: joey
Lines: Hey-hey dude, why are you changing the subject? Why? Will you make the call or what?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh okay, I’ll-I’ll try.

Name: joey
Lines: All right! Thanks! You’re the best! Now listen, the last day of auditions is Thursday. Okay? So I gotta get in there by Thursday. Okay? Just remember Thursday. Thursday. Can you remember Thursday?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah so, Tuesday?

Name: joey
Lines: Thursday! Look if you need help remembering think of like this, the third day. All right? Monday, one day. Tuesday, two day. Wednesday, when? Huh? What day? Thursday! The third day! Okay?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Thank you.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey Mon? I’m gonna check my messages.

Name: chandler
Lines: You just thought of that in there?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah sure, nature called, she wanted to see who else did.

Name: rachel
Lines: Great, someone is in our apartment. Call the cops!

Name: monica
Lines: You’re on the phone!

Name: rachel
Lines: That was the fire department, there was a fire at our place!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God! How bad was it?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, he didn’t say, but it was a fire. I’m guessing not very good. Come on, we gotta go!

Name: monica
Lines: Come on!

Name: chandler
Lines: What are you smiling about? What is so funny?

Name: joey
Lines: The part I want to audition for is a fireman, this is so meant to be!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh thank you. Thanks very much.

Name: ross
Lines: That was you?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh I, I don’t-I don’t think that would be the best idea.

Name: ross
Lines: What time?

Name: ross
Lines: Gotcha.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh! So-so seriously, what time?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Coming through!  No! Right! Coming through!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh well, it’s not so bad.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh!

Name: rachel
Lines: My God!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey buddy, do you think I can borrow your uniform this Thursday?

Name: monica
Lines: Joey! He’s working!  You would look good in that.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, how bad is it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, it’s bad. It’s really bad. The only thing in there that isn’t burned is an ass. Which I do not remember buying!

Name: chandler
Lines: How’s your room Rach?

Name: rachel
Lines: Everything’s ruined. My bed. My clothes. Look at my favorite blue sweater.

Name: monica
Lines: Isn’t that mine?

Name: rachel
Lines: Fine! I’m sorry for your loss!

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow! Oh-okay, look pal, I am not in the mood to be hit on right now! But if you give me your number I will call you some other time.

Name: monica
Lines: Yes, they can stay with us.

Name: chandler
Lines: Have you figured out what started the fire Mr. Fireman?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, not usually. But yeah, I could use one right now.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes! I do! All the time! I love them! Oh my God! I did it! It’s me! It’s me! I burned down the house! I burned down the house!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay Phoebe calm down, there’s no need to place blame. Okay?  I warned her about those candles.

Name: chandler
Lines: God, it’s great to catch up! I can’t believe how long it’s been!

Name: joey
Lines: Chandler, is that…

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh that’s great! Good for you.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey-hey listen…

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay! So yeah, maybe we can get together umm…  What?!

Name: joey
Lines: When you’re off the phone, do you wanna get a pizza?

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Name: joey
Lines: Hey listen, so when’s-when’s my audition? I mean I know it’s Thursday, but what time?

Name: chandler
Lines: Hi.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: We didn’t get to the audition. I’m gonna take her to coffee and then we’ll do it then.

Name: joey
Lines: Ah-ha!

Name: monica
Lines: Wow! So, now you’re going on a date with this girl?

Name: chandler
Lines: Honey, it is not a date! I haven’t talked to her in ten years! You can’t just call up somebody you haven’t talked to in ten years and ask them for a favor. There are rules, y’know? You gotta, you got to put in some time.

Name: monica
Lines: You’re right, I’m sorry. It’s not like you’re y’know, going out with an ex-girlfriend.

Name: chandler
Lines: No, we only went out once.

Name: monica
Lines: You dated her!

Name: chandler
Lines: Not once!

Name: monica
Lines: All right, well why don’t I go out with an ex-boyfriend and do Joey a favor?!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, you wanna do Joey a favor, maybe you go out with Joey.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh that’s great, my friend Joey’s in the movie business.

Name: chandler
Lines: My friend’s name is Joey.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I’ve always hated that Howie.

Name: chandler
Lines: The nerve huh?

Name: chandler
Lines: Refill?

Name: monica
Lines: Now, this is last minute so I want to apologize for the mess. Okay?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! It sure didn’t look this way when I lived here.

Name: monica
Lines: I know! Now look, there’s only one problem though. There’s only room for one, so I guess one of you will have to stay at Joey’s.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, since the fire was kinda my fault I guess  you should get to stay here.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey! Hey-hey, now this was no one’s fault Pheebs. Okay? It was an accident.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well no, it was my fault so you should get the nice room.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay!

Name: monica
Lines: So Rach! You’re the first guest at Hotel Monica! Umm, you’ll just have to tell me how you like your eggs in the morning. And I thought I would bring them to you, y’know, in bed. Oh, you have been through so much.

Name: rachel
Lines: I have.

Name: joey
Lines: This right here is where I keep the pizza.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What’s that smell?

Name: joey
Lines: I know!

Name: ross
Lines: What? Of course I did! You uh, you sat next to Sleepy Sleeperson.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh uh, I had trouble remembering everyone’s name, so I-I kinda came up with nicknames. Like the guy on the other side of you was Smelly von Brownshirt.

Name: ross
Lines: Umm, no. No.

Name: ross
Lines: Umm, it’s Cutie McPretty.

Name: ross
Lines: Listen, I gotta tell ya, I-I’m having a great time! Y’know how before you said it might be weird, the whole student teacher thing, and to be frank I thought it would be too, but it’s not. I mean it’s not at all.

Name: ross
Lines: Burt!

Name: phoebe
Lines: So did you sleep well last night?

Name: rachel
Lines: I did.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah?

Name: rachel
Lines: I did, Monica was so sweet she left a little mint on my pillow.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Y’know what Joey left on my pillow?

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Gum!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah I know, it was my candle. My candle!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I don’t use a curling iron.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, don’t look at me! My hair’s straight! Straight! Straight! Straight!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh.

Name: joey
Lines: This is where I keep the pizza.

Name: monica
Lines: Now there you go! I wouldn’t want my best guest to strain her eyes!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Thanks Monica!

Name: monica
Lines: Does that smell bother you?

Name: phoebe
Lines: What the smell from Joey’s? No, I can hardly smell it over here.

Name: monica
Lines: Well you let me know if you can, because y’know I can bake a pie to cover it.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can smell it a little, bake the pie.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Hello?  It’s for you. It’s the fire inspector.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh!  Really?!

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: ross
Lines: We had such a great time! She’s-she’s incredible! I thought the-the age difference might be a problem, but it wasn’t. It wasn’t at all. Elizabeth is very mature for her age.  A concept lost on some people!

Name: monica
Lines: So it’s okay to date a student.

Name: ross
Lines: Well, not really. I mean technically it’s-it’s not against the rules or anything, but it is frowned upon. Especially by that professor we ran into last night, Judgey von Holierthanthou.

Name: monica
Lines: Well Ross, you be careful now. You don’t want to get a reputation as y’know Professor McNailshisstudents.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah. What-what should I do?

Name: joey
Lines: Well Ross, it seems pretty clear. I mean what’s more important? What people think or how you feel, huh? Ross, you gotta follow your heart.

Name: monica
Lines: Joey that is so sweet.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey-hey-hey! So, how did it go with Dana? Any reason I should leave a block of time open say Thursday?

Name: chandler
Lines: I couldn’t do it.

Name: joey
Lines: You couldn’t do it?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, relax I just need more time. We’re going to dinner tonight.

Name: monica
Lines: What?! You’re going out with her again!

Name: ross
Lines: Going out with who?

Name: chandler
Lines: Uh, Dana Keystone from college.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh yeah! Wasn’t she uh…

Name: chandler
Lines: No, that was Dana Caplin.

Name: monica
Lines: Joey! You didn’t even know her!

Name: joey
Lines: Ah whatever!

Name: chandler
Lines: Great story again! The yarns that you weave! Woo-hoo-hoo!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh no-no-no! Stay! Stay! Because you-you should you-you-you should stay!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh no-no-no, that’s not—No-no-no!

Name: chandler
Lines: No-no—Really?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, it just hurts so bad. I uh…

Name: chandler
Lines: Well maybe there is one thing you can do.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I umm, I mean this is just off the top of my head now, umm but I have this friend. This actor friend and he would kill me if he thought I was doing this umm, but umm would it be possible for him to get an audition for your movie say on Thursday?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, the heart wants what it wants. I’ll see you later.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey! How’s it goin’?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, not much has changed in the last five minutes.

Name: monica
Lines: Yes it has! I made cookies!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh that’s all right. I’m still full from your homemade potato chips.

Name: monica
Lines: But you should eat them now because they’re hot from the oven.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh-ho! But not in here! Can’t eat ‘em in bed, remember? No crumbies!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, I’ll be out in a second.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay!

Name: monica
Lines: What are you doing?

Name: phoebe
Lines: That doesn’t lock does it?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, Joey! Sorry!

Name: joey
Lines: No that’s all right. Don’t worry about it.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh but look! That’s gonna leave a stain!

Name: joey
Lines: Rach! Hey! It’s fine! You’re at Joey’s!

Name: rachel
Lines: Really?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah! Look!

Name: rachel
Lines: I’ve never lived like this before.

Name: joey
Lines: I know.

Name: joey
Lines: All right, don’t waste it, I mean its still food.

Name: ross
Lines: What do you want to do now? Huh? You wanna go get a drink?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, you have some studying to do?

Name: ross
Lines: Y’know I remember when uh, when I was in college, we used to…

Name: ross
Lines: Nothing, I’m-I’m just, I’m so comfortable with you!

Name: ross
Lines: What? No! Of course, of course I do! Are-are they gone?

Name: ross
Lines: What?! No! No! Wait! You’re right, this is stupid. Who cares what people think? I mean, I mean we like each other right? There’s nothing wrong with that. Come on.  Burt? Lydia? Mel? This is Elizabeth.

Name: ross
Lines: That’s right Lydia, Elizabeth here is a student and uh, we’re dating. And you may frown upon that, but we’re not gonna hide it anymore.

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: Really? Its not just frowned upon?

Name: rachel
Lines: I love it at Joey’s!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, here you go.

Name: chandler
Lines: Ni-hi-ice!

Name: rachel
Lines: Thanks!

Name: chandler
Lines: So, you busy Thursday?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, very funny. I don’t know if you remember, but my audition was supposed to be Thursday.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay. Okay.  What are you gonna do to me if you get the part?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey! Hi!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Listen umm, yeah okay, I need to talk to you!

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Now I know that they said that the umm, the hair straightener started the fire but I think I’m partly at fault. You see, I didn’t, I didn’t tell you but umm, but I-I had recently refilled the tissues and so y’know let’s just face it, that’s just kindling! So I think it’s better that I stay at Joey’s.

Name: rachel
Lines: No, no-no-no. Phoebe, this was my fault and besides y’know what? I’m fine here.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay. Oh umm, Chandler, Monica is looking for you.

Name: chandler
Lines: Really?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah she said something about crumbies.

Name: chandler
Lines: No! No! No! I was so careful!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, you have to switch with me! Monica is driving me crazy!

Name: joey
Lines: That’s right, all the ladies want to stay at Joey’s.

Name: rachel
Lines: No! No! Phoebe, come on! I don’t want to switch! Please come on! I can throw wet paper towels here!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No but at Monica’s you can eat cookies over the sink!

Name: rachel
Lines: I know. I’m sorry.

Name: phoebe
Lines: All right fine! This looks like so much fun.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: phoebe
Lines: God, what a mess.

Name: ross
Lines: Wow! It actually is in the handbook. I can’t date you or have a hot plate in my office. I can’t believe we have to stop seeing each other.

Name: ross
Lines: I know, I know I really like you too. But we-we can’t date. It’s against the rules. It’s forbidden.

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: Really?

Name: ross
Lines: Well I-I-I don’t care how hot it is it’s-it’s uh, it’s wrong.

Name: ross
Lines: No! No! It’s wrong! It’s-it’s-it’s naughty. It’s taboo.

Name: ross
Lines: Let’s also get a hot plate!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
