Name: phoebe
Lines: And all of the sudden his hands weren't the problem anymore.

Name: monica
Lines: Was it...

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, Boy Scouts could've camped under it!

Name: ross
Lines: You ate my sandwich?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh-oh really?

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: You-you-you-you  threw my sandwich away!

Name: ross
Lines: MY SANDWICH?!!!

Name: ross
Lines: MY SANDWICH!!!!!!

Name: joey
Lines: I want this part so much! Y’know? If I don’t get this part I’m never gonna eat Macaroni and Cheese again!—No, I didn’t say that! That’s a lie.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh come on guys, it’s not like I moved to Europe! I just moved across the hall! And we would have you over all the time if it weren’t for

Name: monica
Lines: Ahh! Aren’t you dressed yet?

Name: chandler
Lines: Am I naked again?!

Name: monica
Lines: We’re supposed to meet my parents in 15 minutes.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah okay, I was just talking to the guys. Just look at them I mean, is it okay if they come visit?

Name: monica
Lines: Wh?! What about my allergies?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh right, your allergies.

Name: joey
Lines: Yes!! Ha-ha!! All right! Hey! How cool would it be if you could watch like a real life-sized version of this? Huh? I mean how crazy would that be?

Name: chandler
Lines: As crazy as soccer?

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: chandler
Lines: You mean you didn’t get it from this?

Name: joey
Lines: The allergy guy got the part! Thanks!

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, maybe we can fix it y’know? Maybe we can send him some-some big-big flowers and scare him!

Name: joey
Lines: How could you do this to me Chandler?! This part could’ve turned my whole career around!

Name: chandler
Lines: I messed up. Okay? I’m sorry, I really messed up.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, you don’t even live here anymore! What are you doing answering my phone? I have my machine!

Name: chandler
Lines: Which I bought for ya. Taught ya how to use it. You thought it was a copier. Look, if there was anything I could do, I would do it. Okay? But everybody’s allowed one mistake, right?

Name: chandler
Lines: You know he coulda gotten me a VCR, he coulda gotten me a set of golf clubs, but no, he has to get me the woman repeller!  The eyesore from the Liberace house of crap!

Name: phoebe
Lines: It's not that bad.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, yeah, easy for you to say, you don't have to walk around sporting some reject from the Mr. T collection. [Joey walks in behind Chandler]

Name: phoebe
Lines: Chandler, Chandler.

Name: chandler
Lines: I pity the fool who puts on my jewelry, I do, I do. I pity the fool that. . . [turns around and sees Joey] Hi!

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I mean when you were late last night, Kathy and I got to talking, and one thing to another and…

Name: joey
Lines: And what?! Did you sleep with her?!

Name: chandler
Lines: No! No! No! I just kissed her.

Name: joey
Lines: What?!! That’s even worse!!

Name: chandler
Lines: How is that worse?!

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t know! But it’s the same!

Name: chandler
Lines: You’re right, I have no excuses! I was totally over the line.

Name: joey
Lines: Over the line?! You-you’re-you’re so far past the line, that you-you can’t even see the line! The line is a dot to you!

Name: chandler
Lines: Look, I’m not saying that you should magically forgive me! But you’re not perfect! You’ve made some errors in judgment too!

Name: joey
Lines: Name one!

Name: chandler
Lines: What happened?!!

Name: joey
Lines: Awww, man! He promised he wouldn’t take the chairs!!

Name: chandler
Lines: What the hell happened?!! How were you locked in?!! And where the hell is all of our stuff?!!

Name: joey
Lines: Well, this guy came by to look at the unit and-and he said he didn’t think big enough to fit a grown man!

Name: chandler
Lines: So--You got in voluntarily?!

Name: joey
Lines: I was tryin’ to make a sale!! Oh, man, if I ever run into that guy again, do you know what I’m gonna do?

Name: chandler
Lines: BEND OVER?!!!

Name: chandler
Lines: Ok, now, remember, no trading. You get the pretty one, I get the mess.

Name: chandler
Lines: ...And what did you bring?

Name: chandler
Lines: Janice?

Name: chandler
Lines: Janice?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Joey's tailor...took advantage of me.

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: joey
Lines: No way!  I've been going to the guy for 12 years.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh come on!  He said he was going to do my inseam, and he ran his hand up my leg, and then, there was definite...

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: chandler
Lines: Cupping.

Name: joey
Lines: That's how they do pants!  Ross, will you tell him? Isn't that how they measure pants?

Name: ross
Lines: Yes, yes it is. In prison!

Name: joey
Lines: I said name one!

Name: chandler
Lines: I can’t believe I did this! What an idiot!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, stop beating yourself up! People make mistakes! These things happen! There aren’t any message you’ve forgotten to give me are there?  Apparently you’re not very good at it! I…

Name: chandler
Lines: Do you think he’ll ever forgive me?

Name: rachel
Lines: Of course he will! But Chandler the most important thing is you forgive yourself!

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know what? I-I kinda have.

Name: rachel
Lines: Already? That’s pretty bad what you did.

Name: monica
Lines: Y’know what? He will forgive you. And I like to bring a pad with me when I go answer the phone just in case…  Okay…

Name: chandler
Lines: You didn’t see how mad he was, y’know?

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m sure he will forgive you. Look, we have all been there! Y’know, you fight, you make up, it’s just the way it works.

Name: ross
Lines: It took two people to break up this relationship!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah! You and that girl from that copy place, which yesterday you took full responsibility for!!

Name: ross
Lines: I didn’t know what I was taking full responsibility for! Okay?! I didn’t finish the whole letter!

Name: rachel
Lines: What?!!

Name: ross
Lines: I fell asleep!

Name: rachel
Lines: You fell asleep?!

Name: ross
Lines: It was 5:30 in the morning, and you had rambled on for 18 pages. Front and back!!  Oh-oh-oh, and by the way, Y-O-U-apostrophe-R-E means ‘you are,’ Y-O-U-R means ‘your!’

Name: rachel
Lines: Y'know I can’t believe I even thought about getting back together again! We are so over!!

Name: ross
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: And hey! Just so you know, it’s not that common! It doesn’t happen to every guy! And it is a big deal!!

Name: chandler
Lines: I KNEW IT!!!!

Name: monica
Lines: You had no right to go out with him.

Name: rachel
Lines: That is the most ridiculous...

Name: monica
Lines: You sold me out.

Name: rachel
Lines: I did not sell you out.

Name: monica
Lines: Yes you did.  You absolutely sold me...

Name: rachel
Lines: Would you let me talk. [flicks Monica on the forehead]

Name: monica
Lines: Did you just flick me?

Name: rachel
Lines: OK, well, you wouldn't let me finish and I was jus- [Monica flicks her back] Ow. That hurt [flicks Monica]

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh!  All right.  Now, let's not do this!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Happy thoughts!  Happy thoughts!

Name: phoebe
Lines: OK, now I'm gonna kick some ass.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I know!  I know!  I know!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Alright, now I will let go if you both stop.

Name: rachel
Lines: Fine!

Name: monica
Lines: Fine!

Name: phoebe
Lines: There we go.You know what, if we were in prison, you guys would be, like, my bitches.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, buddy-boy. Here it is. You hide my clothes, I'm wearing everything you own.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: joey
Lines: Look at me! I'm Chandler! Could I be wearing any more clothes? Maybe if I wasn't going commando...

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah. Whew, it's hot with all of this stuff on. I ah, I better not do any, I don't know, lunges.

Name: chandler
Lines: Joey? Got you a Joey Special, two pizzas! Joe?  By dog not flowers.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: Please tell me you got the message!

Name: joey
Lines: What message?

Name: chandler
Lines: The actor playing Mac couldn’t do it, they needed to see you at 2 o’clock.

Name: joey
Lines: What?! It’s 6 o’clock!

Name: chandler
Lines: Du-du-I wrote it, I wrote it on the board! I wrote it on the board, then I went all over New York City looking for ya! I went to Ross’s! I went to the coffeehouse! I went to any place that they made sandwiches!

Name: joey
Lines: I can’t believe this Chandler!

Name: chandler
Lines: Sorry! I-I-I don’t know what to say.

Name: joey
Lines: Well you-you-you-you might say congratulations! I saw the board! I went to the audition! I got the part!!

Name: chandler
Lines: Is that supposed to be funny! I was really worried over here!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, well I’m uh…

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know, sometimes that fake out thing is just mean!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh wow! Okay man, I’m sorry. I did not mean to make you feel bad.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well that’s good. Because you didn’t! And I’m incredibly happy for ya!!

Name: joey
Lines: That’s mean! You really had me going there!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, we could do this all day.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, you’re right. Okay look, listen, let’s talk about what a huge star I’m gonna be!

Name: chandler
Lines: You are gonna be a huge star! I’m gonna hug ya!

Name: joey
Lines: You hug me!

Name: chandler
Lines: All right!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, do we do this too much?

Name: chandler
Lines: I think so. Yeah, get off me.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: joey
Lines: Come on C.H.E.E.S.E., I’m not leaving without you! Try routing your backup source through your primary CPU.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can’t! My circuits are fried! They’re fried I tell you!!

Name: joey
Lines: Wow!  Well then I’ll just have to carry you.

Name: ross
Lines: That’ll be a neat trick, when you’re,  when you’re dead!

Name: joey
Lines: Ross, you don’t have to yell.

Name: ross
Lines: There was just an explosion, okay? My hearing would be impaired.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I thought you were excellent! In fact for a minute there I was like, \Ooh

Name: ross
Lines: Thank you! And I have to say that first scene when you meet Mac…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh my God. I mean…

Name: joey
Lines: Y’know what? I think that’s enough for today. Thanks for your help!

Name: phoebe
Lines: He’s holding us back.

Name: ross
Lines: Totally.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, Chandler!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: And your horoscope says, \On the fifth a special someone is going to give you a gift.\"

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: Op, but the twelfth brings a lover’s spat.

Name: monica
Lines: You are going to make a joke about my special present! Why would you do that?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, wait and on the nineteenth a secret crush announces itself.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey guys!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! It’s Joey Tribbiani of Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E.!!!!!!!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh that’s right. It’s your first day! So are you psyched to fight fake crime with your robot sidekick?

Name: joey
Lines: Am I psyched? The lead in my own TV series? I’ve dreamed about this for years! Why have I not been preparing?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No! Joey, you’re going to be great!

Name: joey
Lines: But I got to act with a robot Pheebs, and-and I don’t know anything about technology! I can’t even use Chandler’s computer except to find porn! And-and that’s only ‘cause it’s right there when you turn it on!

Name: monica
Lines: I think our lover’s spat will start a little early this month.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I’ll be waiting.

Name: chandler
Lines: Are you judging them by their covers? Because you’re really not supposed to do that.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, I’m just deciding which one to use—I’m gonna start writing another book!

Name: rachel
Lines: Be-because the last one was such a big seller?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, if you must know I have written 14 books. And as I am the only one who has read them, I can tell you that they all have been very well received.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: ross
Lines: What are you guys doing later?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, Rachel and I have appointments to get our hair cut.

Name: rachel
Lines: We do?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I want to see what he wants first.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: ross
Lines: I just found out that Elizabeth’s dad wants to meet me.

Name: chandler
Lines: Wait a minute, hold the phone! You’re not Elizabeth’s dad?!

Name: ross
Lines: Come on guys, I-I really want this guy to like me. It-it would really help me out if you guys were here to make me look good.

Name: ross
Lines: Thanks!

Name: monica
Lines: We know how tough those parent/teacher conferences can be.

Name: joey
Lines: Wow! Huh?  Mac Macaveli, Private Investigator!

Name: joey
Lines: Okay. Hey uh, when do I get to meet the robot?

Name: joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh wow! He’s so lifelike!  Unbelievable! (He starts tugging on the guy’s ears.

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: joey
Lines: Okay. Sorry about that… Uh, so where’s C.H.E.E.S.E.?

Name: joey
Lines: This is like the temporary robot, right?

Name: joey
Lines: Well, I-I just, I just it was going to be like a really cool robot, y’know? Like the terminator or uh, when I first saw you.

Name: joey
Lines: I’m sorry, it just—I don’t know it doesn’t really look like it can do anything.

Name: ross
Lines: It-it’s great to meet you Paul.

Name: ross
Lines: Of course, of course, Mr. Stevens.

Name: ross
Lines: Eh-wh—Excuse me?

Name: ross
Lines: That’s funny. Umm….  It’s not funny.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay. I can, I can see that. Umm, but I think if you give me umm, one chance I can, I can change your mind.

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: This is—you—

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, umm I want you to know that I have never done anything like this before. I mean, I mean I’ve been in um, relationships in general, uh but I have never done it with a student—I mean I not—not it! I mean, I mean I don’t—We haven’t done it. Uh, I mean, I mean, we’ve-we’ve-we’ve done stuff.  Okay, okay, a joke, a joke—lighten the mood. Umm, two guys go into a bar. One of them is Irish.

Name: ross
Lines: And the Irish guy wins the joke!

Name: monica
Lines: Ross!!

Name: chandler
Lines: Ross!

Name: monica
Lines: How crazy that we’d run into you!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh God, thank you!  Umm, uh, Mr. Stevens I’d like you to meet my friends uh, this is Phoebe, Monica, and Chandler.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You’re Elizabeth’s father, huh? I can see now where she gets her rugged handsomeness.

Name: monica
Lines: Is-is-is there a-a Mrs. Stevens?

Name: chandler
Lines: There’s a Mr. Bing!

Name: ross
Lines: Okay umm, why don’t we all take a seat, y’know? And uh, and I’ll get us all some uh some coffees—

Name: monica
Lines: Y’know, it is so strange seeing Ross here this time of day, ‘cause usually he’s got the children’s hospital.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah. Not looking for dates.

Name: monica
Lines: And he’s a great brother!

Name: monica
Lines: Ohh!

Name: chandler
Lines: But uh Ross, Ross is a great guy! I was roommates with him in college. Uh, funny story…  You’re roommate in college died didn’t he?

Name: ross
Lines: So I hope you guys were finding something to talk about.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes, we were just…

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi, I’m sorry I’m late but I am ready, ready to talk you up! When does Liz’s father get here?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh! Ross is sooo great!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey honey, you got the kind with the little girl, you said we were gonna to get the kind with the baby.

Name: monica
Lines: No, you said the baby creeps you out.

Name: chandler
Lines: No, the little girl creeps me out.

Name: monica
Lines: You said the baby.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why would the baby creep me out?

Name: monica
Lines: Why would the little girl creep you out?

Name: phoebe
Lines: You guys, I’m sorry, could you please talk a little slower?

Name: chandler
Lines: This is going in your book?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, it’s about relationships. Y’know? The traps, the pitfalls, what not to do, keep going. This stuff is great!

Name: monica
Lines: What?! Excuse me!

Name: phoebe
Lines: And how none of it matters when the people really love each other.  And how people will believe anything you tell them as long as it’s a compliment.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh hi!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh! Well let’s look for them.  Oh-oh-hey! Are these them?

Name: rachel
Lines: All right!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh good.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, wait! Sorry, Mr. Paul? Mr. Paul?

Name: rachel
Lines: Paul. Umm, I just wanted you to know that Ross really is a great guy.

Name: rachel
Lines: You just don’t look old enough to have a twenty-year-old daughter.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh. We?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh no! Yes! Of course, I know that! I just—I meant y’know are you still a ‘We’ or are you just ‘You?’

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh. So you raised her all on your own?

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh.  Ooh!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: monica
Lines: How was your first day?

Name: joey
Lines: Pretty great! Except I did get a little attitude from the robot.

Name: chandler
Lines: Damn those robots, they’re supposed to be our faithful servants!

Name: joey
Lines: Anyway, it wasn’t the robot, it was the guy who controls him. Yeah, he doesn’t like me. He had C.H.E.E.S.E. knock over the sandwich right when I was reaching for one! Ohh!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, why don’t you just get him fired?

Name: joey
Lines: I may have to, I hate to do it, but I’m the star! Y’know? There’s a limit to how many sandwiches I can eat off the floor.  Joey Tribbiani.

Name: joey
Lines: Wow!

Name: joey
Lines: I’m the lead in Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E.!!

Name: ross
Lines: Joey?!

Name: rachel
Lines: I was just getting him to like you.

Name: ross
Lines: Joey?! Joey!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross, Joey is not here.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, I’ll just wait for him in here!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross, it’s okay. You can come out.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh! Oh my God! I didn’t even see you!

Name: rachel
Lines: Bye!

Name: ross
Lines: What-what-what the—how da-how did-what the-how did-what?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, y’know he lost his keys so he was looking for them…

Name: ross
Lines: In your mouth?!

Name: rachel
Lines: No! Downstairs! And we got to talking y’know, for like two hours, and I really liked him so I invited him up here for a cup of coffee.

Name: ross
Lines: You were at the coffeehouse!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross, what’s the big deal? So I kissed the guy!

Name: ross
Lines: He is my girlfriend’s father, okay? It’s-it’s, it’s weird!

Name: rachel
Lines: Wh—You dated my sister!

Name: ross
Lines: That was different!

Name: rachel
Lines: What? Why?!

Name: ross
Lines: This is weird for me!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross look, look this is good for you. Okay? Let’s face it, so far the guy’s not lovin’ ya! But I can turn that around! I got the inside track! We can all go out to dinner, y’know? And I can talk you up! Ross, the guy is a very, very successful lawyer!

Name: ross
Lines: How is that important?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh it’s important!

Name: joey
Lines: Apparently, there’s like a million guys out there that can play Mac, and there’s only this one robot and this one guy who controls it! I didn’t know he could get me fired! What am I going to do?

Name: monica
Lines: Well y’know Joey, you’re a pretty charming guy.

Name: joey
Lines: Thanks, but I kinda have a problem to deal with here.

Name: monica
Lines: No sweetie, you’ve got to win over the guy that controls C.H.E.E.S.E.! You’ve got to kiss some serious robot ass!

Name: joey
Lines: That’s not a bad idea. Yeah. Okay, but if I got to turn on the charm tomorrow I’m not wasting anymore of it over here with you guys.

Name: chandler
Lines: So do you think uh, Joey’s more charming than me?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah! That’s why I’m sleeping with him on the side.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, you wish.

Name: phoebe
Lines: \You wish.\"

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe, stop writing about us!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I’m not writing about you! I’m writing about other people.

Name: chandler
Lines: Who?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Marcia and Chester.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay fine! Fine! Then you know what, I’ll just write about Phyllis! Hmm!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hmm.

Name: monica
Lines: Phyllis is sitting in a chair.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I see what you’re doing!

Name: monica
Lines: Phyllis sees what I’m doing.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh-oh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ooh, I have tasted my own medicine and it is bitter!

Name: joey
Lines: Morning! Hey, how’s my favorite genius and my little robot buddy?!

Name: joey
Lines: Okay!

Name: rachel
Lines: So it seemed that my prom date had stood me up, so Ross selflessly, offered to take me.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow! I definitely did not see that one backfiring! I’m gonna go to the bathroom.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, take your time.

Name: ross
Lines: Just-just so you know I was a freshman and she was a senior. So it wasn’t as bad as-as…

Name: ross
Lines: Not all bad.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah. You know what? I know what you mean; I do that too.

Name: ross
Lines: No! No! Not—I don’t mean I-I see her as a twelve-year-old girl! I mean I-I have a son, who’s umm six and I still think of him as a baby.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, well my-my ex-wife and I share custody of Ben and umm, uh, and just so you know, Carol and I are on excellent terms as I’m sure you are with your wife!  It’s unbelievable!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh we were, but that was just a , I mean that was just a big drunken mistake.

Name: ross
Lines: You’re back.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh! Whoops! I’m sorry, you were talking about Emily!

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler, we said we would meet at the coffeehouse at six.

Name: chandler
Lines: We said seven!

Name: monica
Lines: We said six!

Name: chandler
Lines: The only way that I said six would be if the seven’s, let meet at seven, not at six.

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah and if I had seven, maybe I would’ve said something like this, \Wow! My boyfriend’s such a wise ass—seven!\"

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hi!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh my good God.

Name: monica
Lines: Ugh!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I know what time you said.

Name: chandler
Lines: What?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well actually, I know what time Chester and Marcia said.

Name: monica
Lines: What time?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Quite an interesting turn of events, suddenly it’s my book to the rescue, huh?  Ooh, very interesting. Yeah, well this certainly clears things up.

Name: chandler
Lines: What does it say?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I will tell you as soon as you thank me for writing my book.

Name: chandler
Lines: Thank you for writing your book. Its-its uh, great book and you are the queen of everything.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Thanks! So are you.

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Name: phoebe
Lines: Marcia and Chester are planning on seeing a movie on Sunday night. Marcia thinks they’re supposed to meet at six, Chester thinks it’s at seven.

Name: chandler
Lines: So you knew we were gonna miss the movie!

Name: phoebe
Lines: That’s right.

Name: monica
Lines: Inside of telling us you decided to write in your stupid book!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Marcia and Chester are mad at Phyllis.

Name: joey
Lines: I can’t believe I’m going to lose this job!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh I’m so sorry man! Is there anything I can do?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah! Help me get this mini-fridge past the security guard.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah? Well, I don’t want to talk to you Wayne! I hate you! You ruined my life! Oh, Chandler, Wayne. Wayne, Chandler.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hi, how are ya?

Name: joey
Lines: Why should I help you?!

Name: chandler
Lines: The reason he just said.

Name: joey
Lines: What do you need?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah?

Name: joey
Lines: What are you in love with her or something?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I’ve been there my friend.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh wow Wayne, it’s not really something you can teach y’know? It’s pretty much something you’re born with if you——You-you can teach it! I’ll show you right how to do it.

Name: rachel
Lines: I mean if you think about it, I mean Ross did learn something from each marriage.

Name: rachel
Lines: Now wait a minute that’s not fair. He was married to me a hell of a lot longer than he was married to Emily, he just didn’t tell me.

Name: ross
Lines: Y’know what? I-I-I… I-I have had enough of this! Y’know, I-I-I care a great deal about your daughter and I have treated her with nothing but respect! So if-if you’ve got a problem with me, frankly…

Name: ross
Lines: God no!

Name: ross
Lines: Well if it doesn’t matter to her, it doesn’t matter to me!  Still not yelling!

Name: ross
Lines: That’s okay, I’m not so crazy about myself right now either.

Name: ross
Lines: Uh yeah, I guess—Yeah! I guess so.

Name: ross
Lines: Ohhh! Kids!

Name: rachel
Lines: Wait-wait-wait, I just thought of another story about how nice Ross is!

Name: ross
Lines: That’s okay Rach, we’re not liking Ross right now.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh! I’ve got a lot of those too!

Name: joey
Lines: Well, it turns out you were right C.H.E.E.S.E.

Name: joey
Lines: You got it! And the rabbi’s beard, 100% horsehair. Nice catch C.H.E.E.S.E.!  Wayne! Wayne!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hi, you guys.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: monica
Lines: Hi!

Name: rachel
Lines: What’s the matter?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well it’s just—it’s one of those situations that I just hate. Y’know? A massage client gave me three tickets to the Helmet-Pelts exhibit at the Morgan Chase museum.

Name: joey
Lines: Now you’re thinking you gotta sleep with him.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No! No! It’s just that he gave me three tickets and there are six of us!

Name: chandler
Lines: I’ll give up my ticket.

Name: joey
Lines: Me too.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay that’s so generous!

Name: chandler
Lines: And I think Ross is generous too.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Great! Okay then it’s just us girls!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: So what-what is the exhibit.

Name: phoebe
Lines: It’s mostly just photographs of lesbian love scenes interspersed with video games and free sandwiches.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh man!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey Ross listen Chandler got you out of going to the lesbian sandwich museum this weekend!

Name: ross
Lines: Thanks? But I have plans; Elizabeth and I are going out of town.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh that’s great!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: I mean think about all the money that you’re gonna make!

Name: ross
Lines: Why? What?

Name: monica
Lines: Well, her father pays you for baby-sitting right?

Name: ross
Lines: No, no, that’s funny. But maybe it’s time to move on, let it go, y’know? Stop it! Besides, Rachel is going out with Elizabeth’s father, so ah, he’s much older than she is. Looks like I’m not the only one interested in fossils, huh?

Name: rachel
Lines: I mean Ross all that does is remind us that you are interested in fossils.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, okay. Uh, well uh, Rachel is going to need to yell sweet nothings  in his ear.

Name: chandler
Lines: Ross.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, come on you guys; that’s funny! Y’know? Because he’s need—he’s got like a hearing aide y’know, ‘cause-‘cause y’know, ‘cause he’s all old, and…

Name: ross
Lines: Really? That okay, that’s great.

Name: ross
Lines: All right look, I-I realize it upsets you.

Name: ross
Lines: But, Elizabeth and I are-are both adults and so I don’t think there’s really anything you can do about it.

Name: ross
Lines: Ohh! A man with a plan!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, this is so exciting! You get your picture back up on the wall of fame! Eek!

Name: joey
Lines: I know. It was so cool when I was up there before. Me and Jim Belushi would just be crackin’ up about something… Then I get fired off of Days Of Our Lives and he takes me down. Now he’s just laughing at me. Look at him, that smug Belushi bastard, I’ll…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah I know; we’d be great together!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! So I’m back.

Name: joey
Lines: Joey Tribbiani! From the wall!  Huh? Okay eh-ah-anyway, I’m ready to go back up on the wall I’m the star of a new TV show.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh well, it’s not on TV yet.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, fine, I will bring you a tape, huh?

Name: phoebe
Lines: So umm, now do you have any of Matt Lauer’s clothes here? Maybe? Just ones that haven’t been cleaned yet?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, I love museums!

Name: rachel
Lines: Umm.

Name: monica
Lines: Soakin’ up all the culture.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: Where do you want to start?

Name: rachel
Lines: Ooh, the gift shop!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey, and then lunch.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, wait yes, but I can’t eat too much. Paul is taking me out to dinner tonight, he said he has a big surprise planned.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh wow. What, do you think maybe he’s gonna tell you that he’s gay?

Name: rachel
Lines: What?! No! Why?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No reason! That would just be a really big surprise, right?

Name: rachel
Lines: I didn’t know you could get married here.

Name: monica
Lines: This would be a beautiful place to get married, yeah, but I wouldn’t put the aisle there and I would never have the ceremony there!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh sorry didn’t mean to interrupt. It’s just such a beautiful space; do you do a lot of weddings here?

Name: rachel
Lines: Monica, you should totally put your name down on the list

Name: monica
Lines: What?! Are you crazy?! I’m not getting married! I’m not even engaged.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, but there’s a two-year wait. And then what if you get engaged in two years and then you got to wait another two years for this place. That’s four years. Chandler’s not gonna wait that long. He’s gonna find somebody else, y’know? Someone, someone who did put their name on the list.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah hon, it can’t hurt to put your name down! I mean in if two years if you’re not engaged you just don’t use it.

Name: monica
Lines: Well, I mean I guess there is no harm in putting my name down.

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m gonna do it too!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Me too!

Name: rachel
Lines: Really? Who would, who would you marry?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I don’t know, I don’t have anyone right now. Y’know?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh Pheebs.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Don’t feel too sorry for me. At least my boyfriend isn’t gay.

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe, that stuff is…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Don’t even get me started on yours!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! So, did you watch the tape of my show?

Name: joey
Lines: All right, let’s get me back up there!

Name: joey
Lines: What—But you saw the show!

Name: joey
Lines: Dry cleaners?

Name: joey
Lines: Okay! Okay, look! You-you-you got Harrison Ford up there!

Name: joey
Lines: Okay well that may be true. But, in-in okay, Air Force One the Russians were terrorists! And evil! And plus he kills a bunch of them! That-that-that’s offensive to Russians.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh you should, it’s great.

Name: ross
Lines: This place is really beautiful!

Name: ross
Lines: Wow! The only thing I got from my Grandmother was her eyes. I mean not-not her actual eyeballs, but, but people say that my eyes—Do-do you want to make out?

Name: ross
Lines: Ehh, I was just, I was just thinking about your father.

Name: ross
Lines: No. No-no uh, he just, he just really freaked me out before.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: Ohh. Oh, protection. Yeah-no, yeah-no, that-that-that I forgot.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh no! Hey-hey, I’m the guy! I’ll get it.

Name: ross
Lines: No.

Name: ross
Lines: A little bit.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay.

Name: ross
Lines: Ohh, okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God, what a great surprise! This is such a beautiful house.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah we are.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes, the groom—No! Not the groom!!

Name: rachel
Lines: It’s so secluded up here.

Name: rachel
Lines: I feel like we’re the only two people in the world.

Name: rachel
Lines: No-no! Big bear! Big bear outside! I think I-I—would you—actually, would you go check on that?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, okay. Would-would you get me a Diet Coke?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.  What?! What are you doing here?!

Name: ross
Lines: What are you doing here?!

Name: rachel
Lines: I came with Paul!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, I recognize the ankles!

Name: rachel
Lines: Get up!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ahh. Thank you!

Name: rachel
Lines: Op, ice. I need ice.

Name: rachel
Lines: Thank you.

Name: ross
Lines: You and your ice.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ugh! Get out! Get out! Go! Come on!

Name: ross
Lines: Did you really hear a bear?

Name: rachel
Lines: Go-go!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh, thank you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, she-she ob-obviously saw the tire tracks that were leading up to the closed garage.

Name: rachel
Lines: Did-did you come up here to work on that term paper or something?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, why do y’know go in that room  and do your homework?

Name: rachel
Lines: That’s your, that’s your dad’s bedroom.  That’s your dad’s bedroom!

Name: rachel
Lines: Whoa, that Diet Coke just went straight to my head! Woo!

Name: monica
Lines: Hi, honey.

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Name: monica
Lines: What? I-I bought groceries, I was gonna make you dinner!

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Name: monica
Lines: Oh no!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh please, he didn’t hear it! He didn’t hear it!!

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Name: joey
Lines: Uh yeah, where-where’s the guy who decides who’s pictures go up on the wall?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, you’re kidding me! All-all right, well make sure you tell him that Joey Tribbiani stopped by to drop off all of these clothes. Okay? I’m an actor; I’m kinda getting my picture up there on the wall.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh really? Well, maybe you and I go out for drinks?

Name: rachel
Lines: Really? Okay. Okay, I-I’ll go upstairs.  If-if you get me something from the car.

Name: rachel
Lines: Surprise me.

Name: rachel
Lines: So you’re gonna be in the car, I will be upstairs, and that’s where everybody’s gonna be!

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah?

Name: monica
Lines: Have you seen Chandler?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No! Why?

Name: monica
Lines: The woman from the museum called and said that there was a cancellation and that we could move up our wedding and Chandler heard!  I know! How bad is this?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well for the regular guy, it’s bad, but Chandler, Oh dear God!

Name: monica
Lines: I know! I know! And he totally freaked out and I can’t find him anywhere!

Name: phoebe
Lines: What are you gonna do?

Name: monica
Lines: Well, I’m never gonna listen to you again, that’s for sure!  \Y’know

Name: phoebe
Lines: Rachel said that!

Name: monica
Lines: Well Rachel’s not here!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh! Here it is!

Name: joey
Lines: I didn’t do that! Who would’ve done that?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, maybe ask this guy.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, what did he do?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Joey!

Name: joey
Lines: Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa, I-I—Hey! I did not go out with your wife!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, we should go.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: Elizabeth!  I’ll meet you at the front door. Just tell them you’re going home, okay?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh wait-wait-wait!! No! Don’t go in there! Don’t go in there! I need another soda!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God Ross! What in heaven’s name are you doing here?

Name: ross
Lines: And that is why we cannot see each other anymore.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, please-please Paul, just let me explain…

Name: ross
Lines: All right, fine! Fine! Have me fired! But uh, I want you to know that you and I are not all that different. I mean, I too am a neat guy.

Name: ross
Lines: And I too am just a love machine.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m so sorry. Please, stop freaking out.

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m not freaking out. Why would I be freaking out? A woman named Heldi called and said we were getting married, but that happens everyday.

Name: monica
Lines: Honey, we were at this beautiful place, and I-I-I just put our names down for fun! I mean, what’s the harm in that?

Name: chandler
Lines: Right here!

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler, please don’t think I was trying to pressure you. Phoebe and Rachel…

Name: chandler
Lines: Phoebe and Rachel! So the people that knew about our wedding before me were you, Phoebe and Rachel, Heldi, and apparently some band called Starlight Magic 7 who are available by the way!

Name: monica
Lines: It was a mistake. Please don’t take this to mean anything, because it doesn’t.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Really?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes, if it really doesn’t mean anything, because you know that I’m just not ready…

Name: monica
Lines: I know! I know.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m gonna go tell Joey that

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey, did she buy it?

Name: chandler
Lines: Totally.

Name: phoebe
Lines: So did Heldi show you the place?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, it’s beautiful.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can’t believe you’re gonna ask Monica to marry you!

Name: chandler
Lines: I know.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey Gunther.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh uh, well I just came in for a cup of coffee to go.

Name: joey
Lines: No! No, I quit a long time ago.  Did I forget to you that one? I’m sorry.

Name: joey
Lines: Great!

Name: chandler
Lines: Pheebs, can you help me pick out an engagement ring for Monica? I can’t figure this out! It’s so hard! Should I get her a  Tiffany cut or a Princess cut or a—ah-ah! Paper cut!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Now, have you told anyone else?

Name: chandler
Lines: No, I don’t want to tell anybody else because I don’t want Monica to find out.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You told me.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, it’s because I trust you, you’re one of my best friends, and you walked in on me when I was looking at ring brochures.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah well, once again not knocking pays off. I only wish you hadn’t been on the toilet.

Name: chandler
Lines: Me too.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey! So Chandler, wanna go to the coffeehouse?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh all right.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, coffeehouse.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh perfect, we were just gonna see if you wanted to go.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh well, we don’t because we got…the…other pl-place.

Name: ross
Lines: How rude.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, I’m sorry. You wanna bite?

Name: phoebe
Lines: So how are things going with Paul?

Name: rachel
Lines: Good. Although y’know, he-he’s a private guy. Y’know, I wish I could get him to open up a little bit, share some feelings.

Name: phoebe
Lines: That’s easy! You just have to think of him as a-as a jar of pickles that won’t open.

Name: rachel
Lines: So what are you saying; I should run him under hot water and bang his head against a table?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No that’s what you do when you want to get the truth out of someone.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Watch this.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hi Paul!

Name: phoebe
Lines: So how are things going with you?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: ross
Lines: Hi!

Name: ross
Lines: Great to see you!

Name: ross
Lines: How you doing?

Name: ross
Lines: Okay! You take care!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey Pheebs, what-what was the deal with you and Chandler blowing us off before?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah! That was so weird, huh?

Name: ross
Lines: Phoebe, why’d you do it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I didn’t do it! It was Chandler! He’s… He’s mad at you!

Name: ross
Lines: What?! Why?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Please, I think you know why.

Name: ross
Lines: I can’t think of anything.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Come on Ross, you’re a paleontologist, dig a little deeper.

Name: ross
Lines: Wait a minute, is it because Joey and I didn’t invite him to that Knicks game a couple of weeks ago?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Do you think that’s something that he’d be mad at you for?

Name: ross
Lines: I guess it could.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well then I think that’s it.

Name: ross
Lines: Well, if he’s angry, he really shouldn’t just cover it up. I-I wish he would just tell me the truth.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, if that’s what you want you then you really should run his head under hot water and bang his head against a table.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah that’s great. But first, wait, talk to me, talk to me. Tell me about your day.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. Hey, what are you thinking? What are you thinking right now?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah that’s great Paul, but y’know I wanna know what——Wow, those are really great! I just wanna know what, what is behind this-this strong, silent exterior. Y’know they say that still waters run deep and I wanna swim in yours.

Name: rachel
Lines: No Paul, I don’t know anything about you! Y’know, like-like your childhood! Tell me about your childhood!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, well then how about puberty! Come on, that’s always a painful time! Y’know your friends invite you to a slumber party and then they stick your hand in warm water while you’re sleeping so that you pee in your sleeping bag.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, you’re lucky you never met that bitch Sharon Majesky. Anyway, umm… The rest of you life, y’know? Any regrets?

Name: rachel
Lines: All right Paul, I’m not asking for a lot here. Okay? Just give me something. Anything!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: All right.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hm-mmm.

Name: rachel
Lines: That’s-that’s great! See? I already feel like I know you a little better! Thank you. Okay, come on. Now we can go eat. Let’s go.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah. Yeah, I-I-I see the scare. Listen, Paul, I think this is really great that-that y’know, you shared your feelings. It’s really, it’s beautiful, but umm, what do you say we go share some food?

Name: rachel
Lines: What?! Wait! What are you talking about?! You love their Kung Pao Chicken!

Name: rachel
Lines: My God, I’m sorry! I’m sorry! I didn’t mean to do that! I wouldn’t do that!

Name: chandler
Lines: Nothin! This is the nine millionth ring store we’ve been too and I can’t find the perfect ring!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, so maybe you don’t get her a ring. Maybe you-maybe you do something different. Y’know? Maybe you get her an engagement bracelet, y’know? Or an engagement tiara? Or—ooh! An engagement Revolutionary War musket! (Picks one up from the display in the corner.

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know, I’m so glad I picked you to help me with this.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Huh? Can you just imagine getting down on one knee and handing her this gorgeous piece of weaponry?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I’m gonna stick with the ring.  I like this one! Sir? Uh, kind sir? Can I see this one?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wait a minute, no, this is, this is the reason you brought me. Okay? I know how to haggle. So let me handle this from here on out.

Name: chandler
Lines: Uh-uh, yes. I would like to see that ring please.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Or not, whatever.

Name: chandler
Lines: Sir, can I ask you to umm, could you…hold out that ring and ask me to marry you?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh my God that’s it, that’s the ring! How much is it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Chandler, I-I will handle this!  How much is it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: We will give you $10.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes! Yes, but I can only pay $8,000.

Name: phoebe
Lines: We stand firm at $10.

Name: chandler
Lines: Uh, credit card.  Okay, I’ll go get it. You guard the ring.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.  Listen, I’m sorry about before. Do you have anything her for $10.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I’ll give you $1 for them.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, remember how Chandler and Phoebe blew us off yesterday?

Name: joey
Lines: No.

Name: ross
Lines: Remember? You-you were eating pizza.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay. Well, apparently Chandler’s angry at us for not getting him a ticket to that Knicks game a couple of weeks ago.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, we’re supposed to just get him a ticket?! That guy is always mooching off of us!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah! Anyway, I-I still think we should try to patch things up, y’know? Like uh, maybe we could get him to get tickets to another Knicks game and invite him.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh wow that’s a great idea! And I still have his credit card.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey-hey-hey-ho-ho, I got this one. Here you go.  Y’know I gotta tell ya, sometimes I just—I don’t get Chandler. Y’know, me and him do stuff all the time without you and you don’t get all upset.

Name: ross
Lines: All the time?

Name: joey
Lines: All the time!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! Oh my God!!

Name: monica
Lines: Still crying?

Name: rachel
Lines: Like a little girl. I know. I know. I know. This is all my fault; I wanted him to open up. But God, I didn’t know that I was gonna unleash this-this weepy, clingy, moist monster!

Name: monica
Lines: Y’know, I only know of two surefire ways to shut a man up. And one of them is sex.

Name: rachel
Lines: What’s the other one?

Name: monica
Lines: I don’t know, I’ve never had to use the other one. I’m just saying y’know, if we’re having sex, he’s not gonna be talking.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh that’s right. You’re the talker.  Anyway uh, great idea! Umm, I gotta go to the store; I told him that I would buy him some more tissues.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, we have some…

Name: rachel
Lines: No you don’t!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay umm, I’d also like to try on the tiara.  What do you think, too much?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay. Then, take the tiara back and let me hold the musket again.  Something’s missing. It’s not… Okay oh, let me see the ring my friend picked out.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God!!

Name: chandler
Lines: No. How are ya Paul?

Name: chandler
Lines: No, did he hug you?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, you can see my dad in Vegas kissing other dads.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah?

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m a little busy here Paul.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, a quick one. Come on hug it out.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: Whoa-whoa-hey-hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: Do you have my credit card?

Name: joey
Lines: Yes, it’s in my… In…in my pocket.  My back pocket! My back pocket!

Name: chandler
Lines: Thank God!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh hey listen I got us tickets to a Knicks game tonight.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, I can’t go.

Name: joey
Lines: Come on! It’ll be fun! Me, you, and Ross, and… Paul probably…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Chandler, I found the perfect ring.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, that’s uh, that’s pretty nice but I’m gonna go with the one I picked first.

Lines: Oh God…  Why don’t they put chairs back here?!

Name: monica
Lines: What the… Yes you’re too late! Where was all this three years ago?!

Name: monica
Lines: What were you doing in Africa?

Name: monica
Lines: Ohhh! What are you doing to me?! Oh look, I-I… I’m sorry but umm, this-this-this-this is not going to happen.

Name: monica
Lines: Well he is! Yeah, I mean marriage is all he talks about! My goodness, in fact, I’m the one that’s making him wait!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah!

Name: monica
Lines: Why? Because of the government.

Name: rachel
Lines: Isn’t it incredible?! Monica and Chandler, gettin’ married.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I know, they’re gonna be so happy together.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh… I mean two best friends falling in love, how often does that happen?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Not that often!

Name: rachel
Lines: No! I’m so happy for them!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Me too! So happy for them!

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m so happy and not at all jealous.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh no! No God, definitely not jealous!

Name: rachel
Lines: I mean I’m probably 98% happy, maybe 2% jealous. And I mean what’s 2%? That’s nothing.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Totally. I’m like 90/10.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah me too.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey uh, have you guys scene Chandler?

Name: rachel
Lines: Wh—no, but y’know who did stop in here looking for ya, Tennille.

Name: monica
Lines: So that marriage stuff that you were saying yesterday, you don’t really believe that do you?

Name: chandler
Lines: Sure I do. In fact, I think the whole concept of marriage is unnatural. I mean look at pigs. Let’s take a second here and look at pigs. Okay pigs don’t mate for life. I mean a pig can have like a hundred sexual partners in a lifetime, and that’s just an ordinary pig not even a pig that’s good at sports!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah, but that’s pigs not people!

Name: chandler
Lines: If marriage worked, I’d be all for it. But do you know what the divorce rate in this country is? 97%.

Name: monica
Lines: Wait a minute. Are you honestly telling me that-that you may never want to get married?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, never say never but y’know probably uh yeah, never.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God! Then-then-then what are we even doing?! What is this?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! What is all this pressure?! Is this some new kind of strategy? Why don’t you put down your copy of ‘The Rules’ huh mantrap?!

Name: monica
Lines: Y’know what?! I gotta go! Ugh!

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s okay, I got a plan.

Name: rachel
Lines: We’re gonna find love!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Definitely!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, I’m pretty confident about that. That’s what makes it so easy for me to be 80% happy for Monica and Chandler! It would be nice to have a little guarantee though.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What do you mean?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well y’know, some people make deals with a friend, like if neither of them are married by the time they’re 40, they marry each other.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You mean a backup?

Name: rachel
Lines: Exactly!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, yeah I got that.

Name: rachel
Lines: You do?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hm-mmm.

Name: rachel
Lines: Who?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Joey.

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah!

Name: rachel
Lines: Are you serious?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I locked him years ago!

Name: rachel
Lines: Wh… So… If neither of you are married by the time you’re 40, you’re gonna marry Joey.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yep, we shook on it. Yeah but believe me that is not how he wanted to seal the deal.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, seriously?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ohh, yeah. I think his exact words were…

Name: rachel
Lines: Charming.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well hey, it’s just a backup.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey Monica!

Name: monica
Lines: Have you seen Rachel? Or a mirror?

Name: joey
Lines: This is for my boat, pretty cool huh?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah, it’s great.

Name: joey
Lines: Whoa-whoa, what’s the matter?! Talk to the captain!

Name: monica
Lines: I’m just having one of those days where you realize you’re in a dead-end relationship!

Name: joey
Lines: Chandler giving you a hard time huh?

Name: monica
Lines: It’s not like I want to get married tomorrow! It’s just that I-I’d like to believe that I’m in a relationship that’s actually going somewhere, that I’m not just wasting my time!

Name: joey
Lines: Well, you know Chandler.

Name: monica
Lines: No I don’t know Chandler! Not anymore! It’s like it’s like something’s changed.

Name: joey
Lines: Maybe you changed?

Name: monica
Lines: I didn’t change!

Name: joey
Lines: Maybe that’s the problem.

Name: monica
Lines: What?!

Name: joey
Lines: Chandler is a complex fellow, one who is unlikely to take a wife.

Name: monica
Lines: Is that some kind of boat talk?

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t know!  I haven’t totally decided how to talk on my boat yet.

Name: monica
Lines: What does he think? Does he think I’m just gonna wait around for nothing?

Name: joey
Lines: Monica face it, Chandler is against marriage. And-and always will be!

Name: monica
Lines: Well there’s some people who do want to marry me.

Name: joey
Lines: There are?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah! Richard!

Name: joey
Lines: R-R-Richard said he wants to marry you?!  And-and Chandler’s tellin’ ya how much he hates marriage?!

Name: monica
Lines: That’s right.

Name: joey
Lines: Chandler loves marriage!!

Name: monica
Lines: You just told me that he hates marriage! That-that he’s a-a complex fellow who’s unlikely to take a wife! That-that he’s against marriage and always will be!

Name: joey
Lines: You got that from what I said?!

Name: ross
Lines: What happened you guys?

Name: ross
Lines: Rach!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey you!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, come on in.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh thank you. Hey y’know, I’m so sorry to hear about you and Elizabeth.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, thanks. Yeah, I really thought we’d be able to make it work, but uh, I guess it just wasn’t meant to be.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, love. It’s a tricky business isn’t it?

Name: ross
Lines: I guess so.

Name: rachel
Lines: So what do you say we make a pact? If you and I are both single by the time we’re 40, we get married. I mean, we know each other, we like each other, and we’ve-we’ve already slept together so y’know there’ll be no surprises there! You know what I mean? No like, \What’s that?!\"

Name: ross
Lines: Right. Ohh! You-you want me to be your backup.

Name: rachel
Lines: Exactly.

Name: ross
Lines: Ohh, yeah I already have one.

Name: rachel
Lines: What? Who?

Name: ross
Lines: Phoebe.

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe?! Wait a—but-but she just, she said that Joey was her backup.

Name: ross
Lines: Ohh, I don’t think so.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross! I just had a conversation with her, and she said that she and Joey made a deal!

Name: ross
Lines: That’s impossible! I mean we have had a deal for years! We-we-we shook on it, although believe me she wanted to do a lot more than that.

Name: joey
Lines: Where the hell have you been?!

Name: chandler
Lines: I was making a coconut phone with the professor.

Name: joey
Lines: Richard told Monica he wants to marry her!

Name: chandler
Lines: What?!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah! Yeah, I’ve been trying to find ya to tell to stop messing with her and maybe I would have if these  damn boat shoes wouldn’t keep flying off!

Name: chandler
Lines: My—Oh my God!

Name: joey
Lines: I know! They suck!!

Name: chandler
Lines: He’s not supposed to ask my girlfriend to marry him! I’m supposed to do that!

Name: joey
Lines: I know!

Name: chandler
Lines: Well what… Y’know what I’m gonna do? I’m gonna go over there; I’m gonna kick his ass!  Will you help me?!

Name: joey
Lines: Look, Chandler I don’t think us getting our asses kicked is a solution. Okay? Just go and find Monica!

Name: chandler
Lines: You’re right.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.  I’m just going to propose!

Name: joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay great.

Name: joey
Lines: Dude-dude-dude!

Name: chandler
Lines: What?!

Name: joey
Lines: Let me know about that coconut phone, it might great for the boat.

Name: monica
Lines: Hi.

Name: monica
Lines: I don’t know why I’m here.

Name: monica
Lines: I don’t know.

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler is such an idiot!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah, I’ll have a scotch…

Name: monica
Lines: Still smoking cigars?

Name: monica
Lines: No that’s, that’s okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Uh yeah, I-I actually I thought about you a couple months ago.

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah but it was because I-I had an eye exam and I don’t like my new eye doctor.

Name: monica
Lines: Edward Nevski?

Name: monica
Lines: No.

Name: monica
Lines: But getting over was the hardest thing that I’ve ever had to do. And I never let myself think about you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe! You picked Joey and Ross?! You can not have two backups!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Of course I can! It’s just good sense to backup your backup! Look, I’ve already lost Chandler!

Name: rachel
Lines: What?!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: Phoebe! We’re both  your backup?!

Name: ross
Lines: Phoebe, how could you do this to me?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I don’t—Look I don’t know what you’re complaining about now? You were both aware of the situation!

Name: joey
Lines: No we weren’t!

Name: ross
Lines: I was not!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, this kind of back talk is not gonna fly when we’re married!

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe you can’t have both of them! You have to pick one!

Name: joey
Lines: Pick me!!

Name: ross
Lines: No! Pick me! I don’t want to end up an old maid!

Name: phoebe
Lines: All right well let’s see, Ross is a good father, but Joey has a boat—This is hard!

Name: joey
Lines: This is crazy! Hey look, I wanna switch to Rachel!

Name: ross
Lines: Ooh, I wanna switch to Rachel too!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No wait! Just—Okay—Just wait! You guys! Wait you guys! Don’t make any rash decisions, okay? Just remember my promise, when we get married, three times a week.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh God, Phoebe!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I’m talking about massages.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, y’know what?! I know-I know how to settle this! All right here, this is what we’re gonna do! I’m gonna write Joey on one napkin  and we are going to pick one! And that person is going to be our backup! Okay?

Name: joey
Lines: Okay that’s fair.

Name: ross
Lines: All right.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Good!

Name: rachel
Lines: Pick one.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Left!  Thank you.

Name: rachel
Lines: You’re welcome.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ross!

Name: rachel
Lines: We should just switch.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah absolutely!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: I missed you-you ugly, flat faced old freak!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh!  Him.

Name: monica
Lines: I missed this apartment! Now, this is a grown-up’s apartment! Y’know, I-I should be with a grown-up, do you know what I mean?!

Name: monica
Lines: Y’know, let’s face it, I’m not a kid anymore! I-I need to be with someone who-who wants the same things that I do! I mean coming to my place of work and telling me that you love me, I want that! Talking about pig sex over lunch, I don’t want that!

Name: monica
Lines: Fair? Please don’t even talk to me about fair! Fair would’ve been you wanting to marry me back then! Or fair would’ve been Chandler wanting to marry me now! Believe me, nothing about this is fair! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing! Nothing!

Name: monica
Lines: Nothing.  I don’t kn—Umm. I don’t know. Umm…

Name: monica
Lines: Y’know, I-I… I have to figure…some st—Y’know, some stuff before I can…

Name: chandler
Lines: Where is she? I’m not scared of you!

Name: chandler
Lines: Scotch on the rocks, with a twist, on a coaster? Ha-ha, Monica! Monica!

Name: chandler
Lines: Well where did she go?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh my God, I can’t believe this! Y’know, I thought…I thought you were a good guy.

Name: chandler
Lines: Nothing happened? Nothing? So you didn’t tell my girlfriend that you love her?

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know what? I can’t believe this! Do you know what you did? My girlfriend is out there thinking things over! You made my girlfriend think!!

Name: chandler
Lines: And what does she have to think about? I love her!

Name: chandler
Lines: But I am willing to offer her all those things. This was just a plan, y’know? A way to throw her off course so that when I offered her all these things, she’d be surprised!

Name: chandler
Lines: It was working until you showed up, you big tree! I mean, this isn’t fair. You had your chance with her! You had your chance and you blew it! And this is my chance and I am not going to blow it because we are meant for each other! And this is all just been one stupid mistake!  I was gonna propose tonight.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah I even  Did you get a ring?

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know Richard…you are a good guy.

Name: joey
Lines: Dude!

Name: chandler
Lines: I can’t talk to you now, I gotta find Monica!

Name: joey
Lines: She’s gone.

Name: chandler
Lines: What?

Name: joey
Lines: She’s gone. She had a bag and she left.

Name: chandler
Lines: What are you talking about?

Name: joey
Lines: She was all crying. She-she said you guys want different things, and that and that she needed time to think.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well why didn’t you stop her?! Why didn’t you just tell her it was a plan?!

Name: joey
Lines: I-I did! I told her everything, Chandler! But she wouldn’t believe me.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well where… Where did she go?

Name: joey
Lines: To her parent’s I think and she said you shouldn’t call her. But if I were you I would.

Name: chandler
Lines: I can’t believe I ruined this.

Name: joey
Lines: I am so sorry man.

Name: monica
Lines: You wanted it to be a surprise.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh my God.

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler… In all my life… I never thought I would be so lucky.  As to…fall in love with my best…my best… There’s a reason why girls don’t do this!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay!  Monica, will you marry me?

Name: monica
Lines: Yes.

Name: monica
Lines: I knew you were likely to take a wife!

Name: joey
Lines: Can we come it yet?! We’re dying out here!

Name: monica
Lines: Come in! Come in!  We’re engaged!!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohhh, this is the least jealous I’ve ever been!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh no wait no, this is wrong! Ross isn’t here!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh…

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh hell, he’s done this three times! He knows what its about!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, what’s going on?

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: ross
Lines: I found a note on my door, \Come to Monica’s quick

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah I’ll take that.

Name: ross
Lines: What’s up?

Name: chandler
Lines: Monica and I are engaged.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh my God.  Congratulations.

Name: chandler
Lines: Thanks.

Name: ross
Lines: Where is she?

Name: monica
Lines: I’m engaged!!!!!! I’m engaged!!!!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, she’s been out there for twenty minutes, I’m surprised you didn’t hear her on the way over.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, I thought it was just a kid yelling, \I’m gay! I’m gay!\" Can I bring her in?"

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh no, let her stay out there. It’s sweet.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m getting married!!!! I’m gonna be a bride!!!!  Come on, apartment 20! Apartment 20!

Name: chandler
Lines: You bolt the door. I’ll be in the closet.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay! Wait-wait-wait! Shhh!  Our special night. I mean it just wouldn’t be my—our-our night, if you all weren’t here to celebrate with me—us—Damnit!

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s okay, I want this to be your night too.  To Monica.

Name: monica
Lines: Awww, come on—wait—stop it. Okay, to Monica.

Name: chandler
Lines: To Monica!

Name: phoebe
Lines: So have you decided on a band for the wedding? Because, y’know, I’m kinda musical.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah Pheebs, honey, she just got engaged a couple of hours ago. I doubt she’s even had time to…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well speaking of chiming in, remember the time you burned down my apartment?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, you’re on your own.

Name: monica
Lines: Y’know what we should do? We should all get dressed up and go to have champagne at The Plaza.

Name: joey
Lines: But I-I-I can’t stay too long, I gotta get up early for a commercial audition tomorrow and I gotta look good. I’m supposed to be playing a 19-year-old.  What?

Name: chandler
Lines: So when you said, \Get up early

Name: joey
Lines: You guys don’t think I look 19?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, 19! We thought you said 90!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay everybody, let’s go! Let’s go!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, is uh the rest of my candy bar around here?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh honey no, you ate it all.

Name: joey
Lines: I was afraid of that.

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: chandler
Lines: Know what I mean?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah, but I don’t think we have time.

Name: chandler
Lines: There’s gonna be a wedding. You’re gonna be the bride. Two hundred people are going to be looking at you in a clean white dress.

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler! It happens to lots of guys! You-you-you were probably tired, you had a lot of champagne, don’t worry about it!

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Name: phoebe
Lines: Check it out. Okay, I can play this when the guests are coming in. Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe!

Name: phoebe
Lines: If you would’ve let me finish, it goes on to say that he’s probably not gay.

Name: chandler
Lines: Sure, you guys don’t have this problem, you’re made of wood.  Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: You look great!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, thanks.

Name: chandler
Lines: You okay over there?

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t know, y’know? I feel a little umm… No, y’know what? Nevermind, I’m gonna be fine.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, don’t worry about it I mean you probably were tired, you had a lot of champagne, it happens to everybody.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi!

Name: ross
Lines: Wow! Happy Monica’s night!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well thank you, you too.

Name: ross
Lines: Thanks.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey, do you believe this? Do you believe they are actually getting married?

Name: ross
Lines: Well sure. But I get married all the time so…

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh…

Name: ross
Lines: You okay?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, I guess. I-I… I mean, do-do you think we’re ever gonna have that?

Name: ross
Lines: You mean, we—you and me?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh no-no-no-no-no, no, no! We, you with someone and me with someone.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh good, you scared me for a minute.

Name: rachel
Lines: Shake it off.

Name: ross
Lines: I mean—no, it’s just ‘cause, it’s just ’cause you and I were like a nightmare.  No, but there was some good times.

Name: rachel
Lines: No, absolutely. Y’know like it was umm…

Name: ross
Lines: Surely you can think of something good.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, just give me a minute!  Oh well, yes, I can think of one good thing.

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well you uh, you were always really good at the uh, at the uh the stuff.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah? I was good at the stuff huh?

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh-hmm, uh-hmm, yeah, yeah, I really liked your hands.

Name: ross
Lines: My hands?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah?

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: ross
Lines: Way to go guys. Y’know, you-you were really good at the stuff too.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, I know. Hey, y’know what we never did?  We uh, we never had bonus night!

Name: ross
Lines: A what?

Name: rachel
Lines: Y’know, bonus night. Y’know, when two people break up but they get back together for just one night.

Name: ross
Lines: One night, just-just sex. No strings attached?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah-yeah, we never had that,

Name: ross
Lines: No.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, this is getting a little crazy. I mean, I’m-I’m sure it would be amazing but I…gotta say I really-really don’t think it would be a good idea. Y’know? I really, really…don’t.

Name: joey
Lines: ‘Sup? ‘Sup dude?

Name: chandler
Lines: Take whatever you want, just please don’t hurt me.

Name: joey
Lines: So you’re playing a little Playstation, huh? That’s whack! Playstation is whack! ‘Sup with the whack Playstation, ‘sup?! Huh? Come on, am I 19 or what?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes, on a scale from 1 to 10, 10 being the dumbest a person can look, you are definitely 19.

Name: joey
Lines: Come on man, really how old?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Young! You’re a man-child okay?! Now go get changed because everybody’s ready and please, oh please, keep my underwear!

Name: joey
Lines: Wow thanks!

Name: chandler
Lines: Joe?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah!

Name: chandler
Lines: Uhh, you’ve had a lot of sex right?

Name: joey
Lines: When? Today? Some, not a lot.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, it’s just the reason that I’m asking is because I kind of eh, uh, I was unable to—I mean I really wanted too, but I couldn’t…. There huh—hmm, there-there was an incident.

Name: joey
Lines: Don’t worry about that man, that happens.

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s happened to you?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah! Once.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, what’d you do?

Name: joey
Lines: I did it anyway.

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe! Come on! Let’s go!  Why aren’t you dressed yet?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I’m sorry, but I just wrote the best dance song for your wedding. Check this out.

Name: monica
Lines: No, Phoebe, I’ll tell you what, if you get ready now I’ll let you play it at the wedding.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Really?! Oh that’s so exciting! Thank you! Thanks Mon! Oh but Mon, if you touch my guitar again I’ll have to pound on you for a little bit.

Name: monica
Lines: Fair enough, now go get ready!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: I’ll get everybody else  I’m sorry, uh apparently I’ve opened the door to the past.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, Monica. Mon, uh what-what you just saw…

Name: monica
Lines: Can I ask you just a little question, huh? Why tonight?

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: monica
Lines: See, I’ve been waiting my whole life to be engaged, and unlike some people I’m only planning on doing this once. So, uh y’know, maybe this is selfish and I’m sorry about it, but I was kinda hoping tonight could just be about that.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh honey, but it is just about…

Name: ross
Lines: It is! It is!

Name: monica
Lines: No it’s not! No! No! Now it’s about you and Ross getting back together!

Name: rachel
Lines: What?!

Name: monica
Lines: See yeah umm, you kinda stole my thunder!

Name: ross
Lines: Okay! Ho-ho! We did not steal your thunder because we are not getting back together!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah. No. And you know what? Nobody even saw!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah!

Name: monica
Lines: That’s true.

Name: rachel
Lines: Honey I swear it we just kissed.

Name: ross
Lines: It was just a kiss.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You guys kissed!!!!! What does this mean?!! Are you, are you getting back together?! Can I sing at your wedding?

Name: monica
Lines: Thunder being stolen!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay come on Phoebe, it’s nothing! Monica, come on!

Name: ross
Lines: Look let’s not make a big deal out of this! It was a one time thing. It doesn’t even matter!
