Lines: Yeah! Ohh, I’ve been waitin’ so long to get on that body!

Name: joey
Lines: This body?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah that’s right! Come on Joey; sex me up!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey-hey, you’re startin’ to sound like the butcher’s wife there in-in chapter seven.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, come on now, don’t keep me waiting. Get those clothes off! But, I would keep that helmet on because you’re in for a rough ride!

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t want to, I’m scared.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, you guys!

Name: chandler
Lines: So, what do you think?

Name: ross
Lines: About what?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, what?

Name: joey
Lines: What?

Name: chandler
Lines: Are you kidding? Okay, I’ll give you a hint; I’ll give you a hint.

Name: joey
Lines: Eyes! No, no. Your eyes! No. Chandler’s eyes!

Name: chandler
Lines: I got glasses!

Name: ross
Lines: Well, you-you’ve always had glasses.

Name: chandler
Lines: No I didn’t!

Name: ross
Lines: Are you sure?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah-yeah, did-didn’t you use to have a pair? They were really round, burgundy, and they made you look kind of umm…

Name: joey
Lines: Feminine.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes!

Name: chandler
Lines: No!

Name: monica
Lines: Sweetie, I think the glasses look great. They make you look really sexy.

Name: chandler
Lines: Really?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah!

Name: chandler
Lines: You didn’t think I used to wear glasses, right?

Name: monica
Lines: Of course!

Name: phoebe
Lines: So what do you guys want for an engagement present?

Name: chandler
Lines: That’s okay Pheebs, we’re not having a party or anything, so you don’t have to get us…

Name: monica
Lines: If someone wants to give us a present, we don’t want to deprive them of that joy.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, y’know what you should get ‘em? One of those little uh, portable CD players.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, I already have one.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Not unless someone borrowed it and left it at the gynecologist.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, and-and-and by someone, she means Joey.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, I know I what I want!

Name: chandler
Lines: What we want honey.

Name: monica
Lines: No, you don’t want this. I want to have your grandmother’s cookie recipe.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You mean the chocolate chip cookie recipe?

Name: monica
Lines: Uh-huh, yeah.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You mean the one that my grandmother made me swear on her deathbed that I would never let out of our family?

Name: chandler
Lines: Dying people say the craziest things.

Name: monica
Lines: I wanted it for years! I was gonna make cookies for my children.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Break my heart—Oh, all right.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay. I’m gonna be the mom that makes the world’s best chocolate chip cookies.

Name: chandler
Lines: Our kids are gonna be fat aren’t they.

Name: joey
Lines: Ahoy!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey! How’s the boat?!

Name: joey
Lines: Great! I’m finally getting into this sailing stuff.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, so you finally took it out of the marina huh?

Name: joey
Lines: Why would I do that? It took three guys to get the thing in there!

Name: phoebe
Lines: If you don’t sail your boat, what do you do on it?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, it’s great! It’s a great place to just kinda, sit, hang around, drink a few beers, eat some chips.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, it’s good that you finally have a place to do that.

Name: rachel
Lines: Y’know Joey, I could teach you to sail if you want.

Name: joey
Lines: You could?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah! I’ve been sailing my whole life. When I was fifteen my dad bought me my own boat.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Your own boat?

Name: rachel
Lines: What?! What?! He was trying to cheer me up! My pony was sick.

Name: chandler
Lines: Do you know what I was thinkin’?

Name: monica
Lines: What?

Name: chandler
Lines: Nothing, I just like to go like this.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey Chandler, what are you doing tonight?

Name: chandler
Lines: Uh why, do you have a lecture?

Name: ross
Lines: No, why?

Name: chandler
Lines: Then free as a bird. What’s up?

Name: ross
Lines: My dad wanted to know if you wanted to play racquetball with us.

Name: monica
Lines: Wow! That’s great! Dad must really like you, he doesn’t ask just anyone to play.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah and he didn’t really ask for you, he asked for Chancy, I assumed he meant you.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, did-did you correct him?

Name: ross
Lines: No, I-I thought it would be more fun this way.

Name: monica
Lines: This is so cool, maybe this is something you can do every week.

Name: ross
Lines: Or you can sit with him on the front porch and make sure no one steals the trash cans. He does that every week too.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, just so you know, you-you have to let him win.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: He hates to lose.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh no problem, maybe I’ll play with my left hand.

Name: ross
Lines: You’re not a lefty?

Name: chandler
Lines: Does anybody know me?!

Name: monica
Lines: What’s wrong Phoebe?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I just went to my old apartment to get you the-the cookie recipe and the stupid fire burned it up!

Name: monica
Lines: No!! Why didn’t you make a copy and-and keep it in a fireproof box and keep it at least a hundred yards from the original?!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Because I’m normal! That was the one legacy my grandmother left me, and I know you wanted it as an engagement present.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, we have to get you an engagement present?

Name: chandler
Lines: Don’t worry about it Pheebs.

Name: ross
Lines: No one got me an engagement present.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, here I wish you health and happiness.

Name: chandler
Lines: An old cookie?

Name: monica
Lines: This is what happens when you don’t register for gifts!

Name: phoebe
Lines: See no-no, I made a batch and I froze it, and this is the only one left.

Name: chandler
Lines: We can’t accept this.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Why not?

Name: chandler
Lines: ‘Cause it’s gross.

Name: monica
Lines: No! Wait! I think I can figure out the recipe from this cookie! I do stuff like this at work all the time.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Really?!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah! I bet I can do it.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, we owe you a present.

Name: ross
Lines: Two! I’ve been engaged twice!

Name: joey
Lines: Who names his boat Coast Guard anyway?

Name: rachel
Lines: That is the Coast Guard.

Name: joey
Lines: What are they doing out here? The coast’s all the way over there.

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey, just ignore the boats all right? We’re not finished with the lesson yet.

Name: joey
Lines: All right.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, I’m just gonna go over the basic points just one more time, are you ready?

Name: joey
Lines: Come on Rach, not again. I got it! Okay? Let’s start sailing, and I want to go over there  Yo-ho-ho!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, okay. Is that what you want to do? You wanna go over and give a little shout out to the old, hot chickas? Okay, let’s do that Sailor Joe. Quick question though,  what’s this called?

Name: joey
Lines: Uh, boat rope.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wrong! How do you get the mainsail up?

Name: joey
Lines: Uhh, rub it?

Name: rachel
Lines: No. What do you do if I say we are coming about?

Name: joey
Lines: I’d say, come again. No-no, wait I-I-I know this one, I know this one, uh…

Name: rachel
Lines: Time’s up, now your dead.

Name: joey
Lines: And deaf!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, you just go on and make your little jokey-jokes, but if you do not know what you are doing out at sea you will die at sea. Am I getting through to you sailor?!

Name: joey
Lines: Yes.

Name: rachel
Lines: Don’t just say yes! This isn’t a game, Joey you can really get hurt out here. Okay, so do you want to pay attention or do you want to die?!

Name: joey
Lines: I want to make a ship to shore call to Chandler.

Name: monica
Lines: All right, I definitely taste nutmeg.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You do?

Name: monica
Lines: You don’t?  Well, that’s the difference between a professional and a layman.

Name: phoebe
Lines: That and arrogance.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey! How was sailing?

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t want to talk about it. Y’know, you could’ve at least saved me a whole cookie.

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can’t believe that! Now the only thing left of my grandmother’s legacy is this crumb.  I wish you a long and happy marriage.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey! How was it?

Name: ross
Lines: Well I had a great time! Umm, Chancy on the other hand…

Name: chandler
Lines: I will tell the story! It was going great. I let him win. We were bonding. He even said I could call him dad.

Name: ross
Lines: And what did he ask you not to call him?

Name: chandler
Lines: Daddy. All right look, here’s the story.  So I take off my glasses and that’s when in happened.

Name: chandler
Lines: Guys?

Name: ross
Lines: Over here.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God Chandler! I can’t believe it!

Name: chandler
Lines: I know.

Name: monica
Lines: You gave my father a lap dance!

Name: chandler
Lines: Why do they put so much steam in there?!

Name: ross
Lines: ‘Cause otherwise they’d have to call it the room room.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why? Okay? Why? Wh-wh-why did that have to happen?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Come on, it’s not that big a deal!

Name: chandler
Lines: Not that big a deal? There…there was touching of things.

Name: ross
Lines: Now, I know you wanted to bond with my dad, but did you really have to bond to that part?

Name: monica
Lines: Listen, I’m sure that dad doesn’t care. He probably thought this was funny; he’ll be telling this story for years!

Name: chandler
Lines: I don’t want him to tell this story for years.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, but he will. He still tells the story how Monica tried to escape from fat camp.

Name: monica
Lines: I wasn’t escaping.

Name: ross
Lines: Then how did you get caught in the barbed wire?

Name: monica
Lines: I was trying to help out a squirrel.

Name: ross
Lines: You were trying to eat it!

Name: chandler
Lines: If that is your father calling to tell this story then the marriage is off!

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: chandler
Lines: All right, I’m off to see your dad.

Name: ross
Lines: Whoa-whoa, aren’t you a little over dressed?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, and-and you better make sure he tips you this time.

Name: chandler
Lines: Look, I figured I would try to convince him not to tell the story anymore, and I figure the best way to do that is face to face—And by face I don’t mean his lap. And by face, I don’t mean my ass.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey are you getting Monica and Chandler an engagement present?

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t know. Y’know, they didn’t get us anything.

Name: ross
Lines: Thank you!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well hello! So, when are we gettin’ back out on the water matey?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh uh, I don’t know the boat way to say this, but uh never!

Name: rachel
Lines: Why not?

Name: joey
Lines: Because! You’re mean on the boat!

Name: rachel
Lines: What? I was just trying to teach you.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, lesson learned! Rachel is mean!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeeeeeep… Yep-yep-yep-yep-yep. I remember when she took out on her dad’s boat she wouldn’t let me help at all.

Name: rachel
Lines: Excuse me, I wanted you to help, but you couldn’t move your arms because you were wearing three life jackets.

Name: ross
Lines: You have to respect the sea!

Name: rachel
Lines: Look Joey, I’m sorry if-if you thought that was mean, but I gotta tell ya something. That was not mean. Okay, my father is mean. He used to yell at me all the time on the boat, I mean it was horrible. I was just being a good teacher.

Name: joey
Lines: Does a good teacher say, \Put down the beer pinhead!?\"

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, does a good student drink seven beers during his first lesson?

Name: joey
Lines: Six and a half! You knocked that last one out of my hand! Remember?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, I didn’t want you to get hit by the boom!

Name: joey
Lines: Well it hit me anyway! And it would’ve hurt a lot less if I had finished that last beer.

Name: rachel
Lines: All right, y’know what? I-I’m sorry. I will try to tone it down and uh stop yelling.

Name: joey
Lines: You won’t boss me around anymore?

Name: rachel
Lines: I won’t boss you around.

Name: joey
Lines: And you’ll be nice?

Name: rachel
Lines: And, I’ll be nice.

Name: joey
Lines: And you’ll be topless?

Name: rachel
Lines: And—Joey!

Name: joey
Lines: Do you want me to learn?!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, here’s batch 22. Ohh, maybe these’ll taste a little like your grandmother’s. This has a little bit of orange peel, but no nutmeg.

Name: ross
Lines: Let’s give it a shot.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay. Man, I have not made this many cookies since I was in the ninth grade.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, what was that for? Like a bake sale?

Name: monica
Lines: No, just a Friday night.

Name: ross
Lines: Ohh, these are pretty good.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, but not as good as batch 17.

Name: ross
Lines: Which one was that?

Name: monica
Lines: The ones we had right after you almost threw up.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh yeah! Batch 17 was good. I did not like batch 16.  I’m okay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Are there anymore from the good batch? ‘Cause we could just work off of those.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, ooh yeah, I think there is one from batch 17 left, uh…

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay Joey honey, you’re doing really good! All right, now I’m just gonna need you to step to the port side.  Remember? Remember how we talked about the port side?

Name: joey
Lines: Ohh yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: Right?

Name: joey
Lines: Nope.

Name: rachel
Lines: It’s left sweetie, but that’s okay sweetie, that’s a tough one.

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t know why you just don’t say left.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, go to the left.  The left!

Name: joey
Lines: Huh?

Name: rachel
Lines: NA

Name: joey
Lines: Okay! Okay, you’re yelling again! See that?

Name: rachel
Lines: No! No-no, no-no-no, very quiet, said with love, no yelling.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, y’know what? Since I’m here, I think I’m gonna have me a little beer on the port side.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay Joey, we’re luffing a little bit, so could you tighten up the cunningham?

Name: joey
Lines: Uh, wow, you just said a bunch of stuff I didn’t know there.

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey, come on! We just went over this!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, y’know, when we did that was when that bird was flying overhead with the fish in his mouth. Did you see it? It was gross!

Name: rachel
Lines: No! All right?! I did not see the bird! I did not see the fish! I did not see the piece of Styrofoam that was shaped like Mike Tyson! I did not, because I was trying to teach you how to sail a boat! Which obviously is an impossible thing to do!

Name: joey
Lines: All right that’s it! You’re yelling and I don’t see you taking your top off! I quit!

Name: rachel
Lines: What do you mean you quit?! You can’t quit!

Name: joey
Lines: Why not?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Because you’re not finished yet and I won’t have it! Greens do not quit!

Name: joey
Lines: Greens? I’m a Tribbiani! And Tribbianis quit!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God, wait did I—I just said Greens don’t quit didn’t I?  Did I just say Greens don’t quit?!

Name: joey
Lines: Yes! Yes! You did and you’re still yelling at me!

Name: rachel
Lines: No! No! No! I’m not yelling at you, I’m just yelling near you. Oh God Joey, ohh I’m my father. Oh my God, this is horrible! I’ve been trying so hard not to be my mother I did not see this comin’. Oh, Joey, I’m sorry. I’m so sorry. I just wanted you to learn.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, hey I did learn.

Name: rachel
Lines: Really?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah! Come on.

Name: rachel
Lines: Awww…

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, it’s okay. I know what a mainsail is.  I know, I know to duck when the boom comes across. I-I know port is right.

Name: rachel
Lines: Left.

Name: joey
Lines: Damnit!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Y’know, I bet it would actually make my grandmother very happy to know that we’re trying to figure out her recipe. I bet she’s l-l-lookin’ up at us and smiling right now.

Name: ross
Lines: Looking up?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh yeah—No, she was really nice to me, but she’s in hell for sure.

Name: monica
Lines: Well, I’ve tried everything. I give up. I guess I’m not gonna be the mom who makes the world’s best chocolate cookies. I do make the best duck confit with broccoli rabe.  Kids love that right.

Name: ross
Lines: Aww, Pheeb, come on isn’t there any relative that would have the recipe? What about, what about your sister?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh no-no, no, I made a promise to myself that the next time I would talk to Ursula would be over my dead body. And that’s not happening ‘til October 15th, 2032.

Name: ross
Lines: That’s the day you’re gonna die? See—darnit, I’ve got shuffleboard that day.

Name: phoebe
Lines: That’s what you think.

Name: monica
Lines: Well, I mean what about friends of your grandmother’s? Wouldn’t they have the recipe?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, y’know I may have relatives in France who would know. My grandmother said she got the recipe from her grandmother, Nesele Tolouse.

Name: monica
Lines: What was her name?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Nesele Toulouse.

Name: monica
Lines: Nestle Tollhouse?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, you Americans always butcher the French language.

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ohh.

Name: monica
Lines: I cannot believe that I just spent the last two days trying to figure out the recipe and it was in my cupboard the whole time!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I know! You see it is stuff like this which is why  you’re burning in hell!!

Name: chandler
Lines: So you understand, I’d feel a lot more comfortable if you didn’t tell people what happened. Y’know, I’m a little…I’m a little embarrassed about it.

Name: chandler
Lines: What did you do when they found out?

Name: chandler
Lines: So I guess we wear swimsuits in here!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well Joey, I hate to admit it, your way of sailing is a lot more fun.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, yeah. Hey, why don’t you give a pull on that rope?

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh we’re not sailing.

Name: joey
Lines: Just pull on it.

Name: rachel
Lines: All right.  Sandwiches!

Name: joey
Lines: What else?

Name: rachel
Lines: Here you go.

Name: joey
Lines: Thank you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh wow!

Name: joey
Lines: What are you doing?

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh, sorry.

Name: joey
Lines: What you—don’t hold it like that! You’re lettin’ all the good stuff fall out.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh whoops.

Name: joey
Lines: Careful! You’re wasting good pastrami!  Oh my God! I’m my dad!

Name: joey
Lines: So, what did you guys think?

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s your mommy. It’s your mommy.

Name: ross
Lines: Ohhhh…

Name: rachel
Lines: That’s nice.

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: Well that was umm…Okay.

Name: ross
Lines: It wasn’t the best.

Name: chandler
Lines: That was one of the worse things ever. And not just on TV.

Name: monica
Lines: Wh-what are we gonna tell him?

Name: ross
Lines: Well, the lighting was okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh no you don’t! You got lighting last time, lighting is mine!

Name: monica
Lines: And I have costumes.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh great! That means I’m stuck with, \So

Name: rachel
Lines: What are you gonna do Pheebs?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I don’t know. I don’t know. I can’t lie to him again. Oh no I—no! I’m just gonna press my breasts up against him.

Name: chandler
Lines: And say nothing?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh, yeah that’s right.

Name: joey
Lines: It wasn’t that good.

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe, do you think that your favorite animal says much about you?

Name: phoebe
Lines: What? You mean behind my back?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh! Hi you guys, oh my God! You’ll never gonna believe happened to me today! I am sitting in my office and…

Name: joey
Lines: You guys! You guys! You’re not gonna believe what my agent just told me!

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey! Kinda in the middle of a story here!

Name: joey
Lines: Ooh, sorry. Sorry. You finish, go.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, so anyway I’m sittin’ in my office and guess who walks in.

Name: joey
Lines: I’m gonna be on two TV shows!

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, you weren’t finished?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah! Guess who walks into my office is the end of my story.  Ralph Lauren walked into my office!

Name: joey
Lines: Uh Rach, if you’re gonna start another story, at least let me finish mine.

Name: rachel
Lines: It’s the same story.

Name: joey
Lines: Wow, it’s really long.

Name: rachel
Lines: Anyway, Ralph just came in to tell me that he’s so happy with my work that he wants me to be the new merchandising manager for polo retail.

Name: monica
Lines: Still get a discount on wedding dresses?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah!

Name: monica
Lines: I’m so happy for you!

Name: joey
Lines: Well, these really are the days of our lives.

Name: monica
Lines: What?!

Name: joey
Lines: Well, since you ask. They want me back on Days of Our Lives!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh God!

Name: rachel
Lines: I got—I get a big pay raise!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh hey!

Name: joey
Lines: I’ll be playing Drake Remoray’s twin brother, Stryker!

Name: monica
Lines: Oooh!

Name: rachel
Lines: I get to hire my own assistant!

Name: joey
Lines: Well—I got a head rush from standing up to fast right there.

Name: rachel
Lines: And you were at this job for four years?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, well this is all very impressive Hilda, um I just have one last question for you. Uh, how did I do? Was this okay?

Name: rachel
Lines: I’ve never interviewed anyone before. I’ve actually never had anyone work for me before. Although when I was a kid, we did have a maid, but this is-this isn’t the same thing.

Name: rachel
Lines: No. Yeah, and I know that. All right, well thank you so much for coming in it was nice to meet you.

Name: rachel
Lines: All right.  I’m a total pro!

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow! H-umm! Hi! Yes, uh I’m sorry the models are actually down the hall.

Name: rachel
Lines: Really?!  Okay well then, all right, well just have a seat there. Umm, so what’s—what is—what’s your name?

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh-huh, go on.

Name: rachel
Lines: That’s your whole name, okay of course it is! Okay, well let’s-let’s just have a look-see here.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh come on, what are you talking about? You’ve got three years painting houses. Two whole summers at T.G.I. Friday’s, come on!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, hold on just a second.  I’m sorry, it’s for human resources, everybody has to do it. Could you just stand up please?

Name: chandler
Lines: No-no-no-no.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Anyway, I should go. Okay, bye.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey sweetie.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hi sweetie. So, what was with all the whispering?

Name: monica
Lines: I can’t tell you. It’s a secret.

Name: chandler
Lines: Secret? Married people aren’t supposed to have secrets between one another. We have too much love and respect for one another.

Name: monica
Lines: Awww.  But still no.

Name: chandler
Lines: No I’m serious, we should tell each other everything. I do not have any secrets from you.

Name: monica
Lines: Really? Okay, so why don’t you tell me what happened to Ross Junior year at Disneyland?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh no-no, I can’t do that.

Name: monica
Lines: If you tell me, I’ll tell you what Phoebe said.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica

Lines: Okay! Okay! Umm, Webster’s Dictionary defines marriage as…  Okay!! Forget that! That sucks!! Okay, never mind! Forget it! Umm, umm, okay, uh… I met, I-I met, I met Monica when we were just a couple of six year olds and I became friends with Chandler when he was 25, although he seemed like a six year old.

Name: rachel
Lines: Thank you. Thank you very much. Umm, I’ve known them separately and I’ve known them together and-and to know them as a couple is to know that you are truly in the presence of love. So I would like to raise my glass  to Monica and Chandler and the beautiful adventure they are about to embark upon together. I can think of no two people better prepared for the journey.

Lines: You-you-you didn’t know that.  Well, I guess my work here is done!

Lines: All right, well first of all I would like to say that you both performed very well. Okay? You should be proud of yourselves. And-and I would also like to say that in this competition there are no losers. Well, except for Rachel—Damnit!

Lines: Look you have to realize I don’t think of you as a thin, beautiful woman.  See this is one of things that I can apologize for later! Look, what I mean is you’re Monica! Okay? And I am in love with Monica.

Name: monica
Lines: Keep going.

Name: chandler
Lines: So you can balloon up or you can shrink down and I will still love you.

Lines: Even if I shrink down to two inches tall?

Name: chandler
Lines: I’d carry you around in my pocket.

Name: monica
Lines: I love you.

Lines: Skidmark’s still got a way with the ladies.

Lines: Hi Pheebs.

Lines: Hi!

Lines: Yeah. Yeah, and y’know you-you deserve to win. And-and y’know I was thinking about it, if-if you’re Monica’s maid of honor that means I get to be yours.

Lines: Yeah! Oh, umm when-when Monica and Chandler got engaged I started putting some stuff together, y’know just in case…

Lines: Ohh.

Lines: Come on! So she comes to the wedding! I mean it won’t be so bad.

Name: chandler
Lines: What do you think she’s just gonna sit there quietly? You don’t think she’s gonna want to make a toast? You don’t think she’s gonna want to grab the microphone and sing Part-time Lover?!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God, she’s not gonna like the chicken that night either is she?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know what? It’s gonna be okay. Y’know what? She’s probably not gonna even want to come.

Name: monica
Lines: Really?

Name: chandler
Lines: No! That was a lie! See how easy that was?

Name: monica
Lines: So-so you would’ve just lied?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes!!

Name: monica
Lines: Would it really have been that easy?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes!!!

Name: monica
Lines: Good, so do it Saturday night because we’re going to dinner with her and Clark.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! What’s up?

Name: joey
Lines: Hey-hey, who’s your friend?  Hey!!

Name: joey
Lines: Erin! Still here!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, we ended up spending the day together and had such a great time!

Name: joey
Lines: Why wouldn’t ya? Erin is great! Then-then there’s you guys.

Name: rachel
Lines: I know!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah. I’ll uh, I’ll call ya.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh and I’ll call ya too!

Name: phoebe
Lines: And call me!

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, good to see you again.

Name: joey
Lines: Bye-bye.

Name: rachel
Lines: Bye!

Name: joey
Lines: So, system kinda broke down huh?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh Joey, I’m sorry I just couldn’t tell her all those things you wanted me to tell her. And y’know we got to talking and I…

Name: phoebe
Lines: We want you to marry her!

Name: joey
Lines: What?!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: She is so amazing! You have no idea.

Name: joey
Lines: No idea? Who do you think brought her here?

Name: rachel
Lines: Cupid.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Joey, she’s so cool. She speaks four languages.

Name: joey
Lines: Man, do you know what guys want!

Name: rachel
Lines: Look Joey, come on she’s so perfect for you! I mean she’s sweet, she-she likes baseball, and she-she had two beers at lunch.

Name: joey
Lines: My beers?! Look you guys, she’s a very nice girl. Okay? We had a good time, but I just—I don’t see it going anywhere.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, but you always say that.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, maybe if you gave this girl a chance it would go somewhere.

Name: joey
Lines: Look I’m sorry you guys, I-I just don’t think so.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Whatever.

Name: rachel
Lines: Fine.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, don’t start judging me!  Huh? And you, you’re the one having the affair with the guy who keeps the pigeons on the roof!

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Secret affair!

Name: ross
Lines: People are doing it in front of my book!

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m sorry?

Name: ross
Lines: My doctoral dissertation is in the library at school, I went to see it, and there were students makin’ babies right in the middle of the Paleontology section!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! Did you get to see anything good?

Name: ross
Lines: Let me ask you something, at your school was there a like uh a place on campus where students went to uh, fool around.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, there was. It was—there the corner of the library where-where all these dusty books that nobody ever read—Yes, there was.

Name: ross
Lines: Great! Because people kept showing up, I think it’s like uh-a thing!

Name: joey
Lines: Now hold on a second, fifth floor against that back wall?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh for cryin’ out loud!

Name: joey
Lines: All right, so we should go catch our movie.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well now what’s the rush?

Name: joey
Lines: I like to see the previews.  The candy.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh. Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well look who’s here!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: Erin.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi! Well, we were just about to take off and see a movie. Oh no!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh Phoebe, we forgot that party we have to go to.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh no.

Name: joey
Lines: What party?

Name: joey
Lines: Who’s birthday party?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, and how is Allison?

Name: rachel
Lines: Wait a minute! Why don’t you guys do something?!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, look how that worked out.

Name: ross
Lines: Excuse me. Hi, I’m a professor here. Do you know the Paleontology section, fifth floor, stack 437?

Name: ross
Lines: No! No!! No! Can I speak to someone in charge please?!

Name: ross
Lines: Hi, I was wondering if it is possible to increase security in the Paleontology section? See I-I wrote a book up there and instead of reading it people are-are-are well, rolling around in front of it.

Name: ross
Lines: Well, fine. Fine! If-if I’m the only person with any appreciation of the sanctity of the written word, I’ll go up there and defend it myself!  And don’t you follow me!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: How did it go with Erin?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, unbelievable! We had the best time!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yay!! Oh so, you’re not, you’re not mad at us anymore?

Name: joey
Lines: No! No! No! You guys were totally right! This is so much better than the first time we went out. Y’know? That was so awkward, we were really nervous.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Didn’t you sleep together?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah that really calms me down. And! We have so much in common! She loves sandwiches, sports, although she is a Met fan, not much of an issue now but if were ever to have kids, well that’s a…

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, please don’t get married before I do.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: He might still show up.

Name: monica
Lines: Is that all?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well actually uh, there was something we wanted to tell you about the wedding. Um, it’s going to be a small ceremony. Uh, tiny! We’re not even sure why we’re having it.

Name: monica
Lines: It’s actually going to be just family.

Name: joey
Lines: How can you say that?! The Mets have no closer!

Name: joey
Lines: What about Game 1 of the Series?

Name: joey
Lines: You shut up!  I’ll be right back.

Name: rachel
Lines: So how’s it goin’ with Joey?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay? Wait okay, tell-tell me that you like him, please? I mean tell me that you like him.

Name: rachel
Lines: But you said that you liked him! I mean what happened?! Did ya just change your mind?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Then change it back!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No spark? Didn’t you sleep together?

Name: rachel
Lines: Ugh, tramp!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Does Joey have any idea?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, you mean like that you’re kind of a loner.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, and maybe that you’re a real

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh well, I guess Italian isn’t one of the four languages you speak.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! You wanna go?

Name: joey
Lines: Okay. See you guys later.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, see ya.

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow. Well, I guess it was Cupid who brought her here.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, just a regular old flying dwarf.

Name: ross
Lines: Yes? Yes?! How can I help you?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh-oh, you’re-you’re fellow scholars. What exactly were you looking for, hmm? Perhaps,  perhaps Dr. Chester Stock’s musings on the Smiledon Californicus?

Name: ross
Lines: Ah… Ah…Get out of here!  Uh, meeting someone? Or-or are you just here to brush up on Marion’s views on evolution?

Name: ross
Lines: I find Marion’s views far to progressionist.

Name: ross
Lines: I’m a professor here uh, Ross…Geller.

Name: ross
Lines: Yes! You’re the person who checked out my book?!

Name: ross
Lines: Well I uh, I skipped forth grade.

Name: ross
Lines: I am very…very sorry.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi!

Name: phoebe
Lines: So how was, how was your date?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, it was great! I mean we walked all around the village. We went to this ice cream place, split a milkshake, 70/30 but still… And guess what, I’m thinking about taking her upstate to one of those bed and breakfasts.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh really? She said she wants to go away with you?

Name: joey
Lines: No-no-no-no-no! It’s a surprise, but it’s gonna be tricky thought because she said she was gonna be pretty busy at work for a while.

Name: rachel
Lines: Jo-Joey, look honey we-we need to talk okay? Umm, I kinda got the feeling from her today that uh, she’s not lookin’ for a serious relationship.

Name: joey
Lines: Where are you gettin’ this?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, she told me. She said she’s kinda a loner.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh. Oh.

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey…

Name: joey
Lines: No hey Rach, it’s cool okay? Y’know I’m a loner too!  Right?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey Joey, y’know what? You are way to good for her.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah and honey I promise next time that I will just say good-bye and tell ‘em you’re not looking for a relationship.

Name: joey
Lines: No! No. Don’t do that, just next time make sure she really likes me.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well that too.  Joey?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah?

Name: rachel
Lines: Do you want some pancakes?

Name: joey
Lines: Finally!

Name: monica
Lines: What are we gonna do?

Name: chandler
Lines: I say we go with Careless Whisper.

Name: chandler
Lines: Did she see us yet? Did she see us?

Name: monica
Lines: Janice, what umm, what are you doing here?

Name: monica
Lines: Our kids are gonna call her Aunt Janice aren’t they?

Name: chandler
Lines: Aren’t you just a tinsy bit curious?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah, in-in-in the bathroom.

Name: monica
Lines: We’ll just…we’ll just let her stay.

Name: chandler
Lines: No-no-no-no, if we let her stay, she will stay forever!

Name: monica
Lines: Kinda like your Barca lounger.

Name: chandler
Lines: Is that what you’re thinking about right now?

Name: monica
Lines: I never stop thinking about it.

Name: chandler
Lines: Janice, I’m sorry but umm, you can’t stay here tonight.

Name: chandler
Lines: Honestly? Our apartment is a hotbed for electromagnetic activity. Now Monica and I have been immunized, but sadly you have not.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God! Oh my God! You have to go!

Name: monica
Lines: Because Chandler still has feelings for you!

Name: chandler
Lines: Say again?

Name: monica
Lines: That’s right. That’s right. And that is why you can’t stay here tonight. And probably why you shouldn’t come to the wedding.

Name: chandler
Lines: Feelings, such strong feelings.

Name: monica
Lines: I mean, I realize that his feelings may never completely go away, but you can.

Name: ross
Lines: —Okay, see you later.

Name: chandler
Lines: I just wanted to show Monica your book.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey everybody! Happy Thanksgiving!

Name: chandler
Lines: No, no, no. No-no-no.

Name: ross
Lines: What, are we keeping Thanksgiving a secret this year?

Name: chandler
Lines: No, we're playing this game I learned at work. You have to name all the states in six minutes.

Name: ross
Lines: What? That's like insanely easy!

Name: chandler
Lines: Now, that's a lot harder than it sounds. You always forget at least one, or in some cases... fourteen .

Name: monica
Lines: It's a stupid game and I wasn't playing against other people, so technically I didn't lose.

Name: ross
Lines: What? You forgot fourteen states?

Name: monica
Lines: Nobody cares about the Dakotas.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, okay, time's up!

Name: rachel
Lines: All right, I got 48.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh that's not bad, Pheebs?

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, so Rachel's got 48 and Phoebe has the lead in…vegetables, Joey?

Name: joey
Lines: Say hello to the new champ of Chandler's dumb states game.

Name: ross
Lines: Wow, how many have you got?

Name: joey
Lines: Fifty-six!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! How is New England not a state? Huh? They have a sports-team!

Name: chandler
Lines: Does South Oregon have a sports-team?  There you go.

Name: rachel
Lines: How come we have one extra place setting?

Name: monica
Lines: 'Cause you invited your assistant.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, right. Sorry. But Tag's not coming; his girlfriend came into town, so he's spending Thanksgiving with her.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh! Why didn't you tell me? I made him his own individual sweet potato stuffed pumpkin.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, I was going to, but then I figured, you know... you're food is so delicious and perfect, you can never have too many of those pumpkin things.

Name: monica
Lines: Now you think I wouldn't enjoy that, because it is so fake,  but I still do.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Regular Celery!

Name: ross
Lines: Done! With time a-to-spare.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oooh that may be a New World's record

Name: ross
Lines: You know, I hate to lecture you guys, but it's kinda disgraceful, that a group of well-educated adults and Joey can't name all the states. Did you ever see a map, or one of those round, colorful things called \a globe?\" Hmm?"

Name: chandler
Lines: Uh, Magellan? You got 46 states.

Name: ross
Lines: What? That's impossible.

Name: joey
Lines: 46. Wow! Who's well educated now, Mr. I-forgot-ten-states?

Name: monica
Lines: All right, I'm out of oven space. I'm gonna turn on Joey's. Please, watch him! Do not let Joey eat any of the food!

Name: chandler
Lines: I am only one man!  Okay Ross, time is up!

Name: ross
Lines: No, just give me another minute.

Name: chandler
Lines: Look Ross, if you don't know them by now, you will never know them, okay? That is the beauty of this game. It makes you want to kill yourself.

Name: ross
Lines: This-this is crazy! I can do this! All right, uhh, I bet I can get all 50 before dinner.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, but if you can't…no dinner!

Name: ross
Lines: You're on!

Name: joey
Lines: All right. Don't look at my list, Ross, 'cause there's a lot on there that you don't have.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, did you guys know, that your oven doesn't work?

Name: joey
Lines: But the drawer full of take-out menus is okay, right?

Name: monica
Lines: Ross, I'm gonna use yours, okay?

Name: ross
Lines: Pshhshhh!

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler? Can you give me a hand?

Name: chandler
Lines: Sure, and Joey; do not let Ross look at any of the maps or the globe in your apartment.

Name: joey
Lines: Don't worry, Chandler, it's not a globe of the United States.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey you guys I'm gonna go out and take a walk.

Name: ross
Lines: Phoebe, why is your bag moving?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, it's not!

Name: rachel
Lines: Seriously, it's moving!

Name: joey
Lines: What the hell is in there?

Name: phoebe
Lines: It's just my knitting that's all!  Yes! I knit this. I'm very good.

Name: monica
Lines: Ross’s apartment is nice! How come we don't hang out here more often?

Name: chandler
Lines: I don't know. Maybe it's because it smells a little weird. It's like old pumpkins or something.

Name: monica
Lines: That's my pie!

Name: chandler
Lines: Which smells delicious!

Name: monica
Lines: Uh-oh! Uh-oh!

Name: chandler
Lines: What?

Name: monica
Lines: We left Joey alone with the food!  Yep! Yep, I knew it! There he is... feeding stuffing to a dog!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hi Geller-Bing residence. How can I help?

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe, why is there a dog in our apartment?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I'm sorry, who's this?

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe, there's a dog sitting on my couch!

Name: chandler
Lines: Tell her, I'm allergic, and I will sue!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, there's no dog here?

Name: monica
Lines: Yes there is! He's black and white and shaggy and [Cut to Monica’s apartment] he's sitting next to Rachel and licking Rachel's hand.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my god! Where are you?

Name: monica
Lines: I'll be right there!

Name: phoebe
Lines: They're here already? How are they doing this?

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi Tag! What are you doing here?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, sure! Come in!  Well, what-what happened to your girlfriend?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, I'm sorry.

Name: ross
Lines: Ohio!! Thank you!

Name: chandler
Lines: Huh! Where is the dog?!

Name: ross
Lines: What dog? There-there's no dog here.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah that dog left!

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe! Phoebe, open up!

Name: phoebe
Lines: There's no dog in here.

Name: chandler
Lines: Phoebe, we can hear the dog barking!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No that's just me coughing!  Oh, good, there you are! Listen, um, I have a dog in my room.

Name: chandler
Lines: What is it doing here?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, I'm watching it for some friends who went out of town. Wait.  Hello, my name is Clunkers. May I please stay with you nice people?

Name: monica
Lines: Oooh, I wish she could stay here, but Chandler is allergic!

Name: chandler
Lines: Extremely allergic, okay? If I'm anywhere near a dog for more than 5 minutes, my throat will just close up!

Name: phoebe
Lines: That's odd, 'cause this dog's been living here for the past 3 days

Name: chandler
Lines: Really?

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler, if that dog's been here that long, and you haven't had a reaction, maybe you're not allergic to this dog?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, it still has to go, right?

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, it's um…

Name: joey
Lines: Don't do it!

Name: monica
Lines: Don't do what?

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, I hate dogs.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Are you crazy?

Name: ross
Lines: Are you out of your mind?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Why?

Name: joey
Lines: Told ya.

Name: chandler
Lines: They are needy, they are jumpy, and you can't tell what they are thinking, and that scares me a little bit.

Name: ross
Lines: Right, they are scary.  Ahh, she just ate a treat out of my hand!!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Wait a minute. Do you not like all dogs? I mean, not even puppies?

Name: chandler
Lines: Is there a puppy here?

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, you are new!

Name: joey
Lines: Look, Chandler, I told you, never tell anyone about this dog thing. It's like Ross not likin’ ice cream.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You don't like ice cream?

Name: ross
Lines: It's too cold.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, it's just that dogs make me a little uncomfortable.

Name: ross
Lines: It hurts my teeth.

Name: chandler
Lines: And I don't wanna say this, I don't you guys to hate me, but uh, I don't think, I can be around that dog anymore. Okay, so either the dog goes, or I go.  Oh my god!!

Name: ross
Lines: How can I not get this? I'm a college professor; I got 1450 on my S.A.T.s.

Name: ross
Lines: Damn, I forgot you were here.

Name: phoebe
Lines: All right. We're gonna take Clunkers to Ross’s. We'll be back in a minute.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, wait before you guys go, can I just ask you a question?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: When a guy breaks up with his girlfriend, what is an appropriate amount of time to wait before you make a move?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, I'd say about a month.

Name: monica
Lines: Really? I'd say 3 to 4.

Name: joey
Lines: Half hour.

Name: rachel
Lines: Interesting.

Name: monica
Lines: When it's your assistant, I would say never.

Name: joey
Lines: All right, Rach, the big question is, does he like you? All right? Because if he doesn't like you, this is all a moo-point.

Name: rachel
Lines: Huh. A moo-point?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, it's like a cow's opinion. It just doesn't matter. It's moo.

Name: rachel
Lines: Have I been living with him for too long, or did that all just make sense?

Name: monica
Lines: Please, don't listen to Joey, okay. Would you look at him? He-he’s obviously depressed. He's away from his family; he's spending Thanksgiving with strangers.   What he needs right now is for you to be his friend.

Name: rachel
Lines: You're right, I'm sorry. Thank you. Okay, that's what I'm gonna do.

Name: joey
Lines: Fine! Take their advice. No one ever listens to me. When the package is this pretty, no one cares what's inside.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: How are you holding up?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah? I'm sorry about your girlfriend.

Name: rachel
Lines: So were you guys together a long time?

Name: rachel
Lines: Now that she broke up with you?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah. Hmmmm.

Name: rachel
Lines: No…Yeah, all the time, constantly. It's terrifying. But you know that I figure it…it has to work out.

Name: rachel
Lines: Because, uh—it has to.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, I know, I do. I really do.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, what is a boss for? Hug it out!

Name: joey
Lines: All right, he likes you back! Huh? Told ya, you should go for it!

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh, yeah, well, see, he… Joey knows, that I'm-I'm very insecure about my back and, and…you're hugging me, so obviously you are not repulsed by it, yeah!

Name: rachel
Lines: No?  All right, here's the truth um, Joey said what he said, because um, I'm attracted to you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, I admit it. I have a crush on you, and uh, and, and I know that's crazy because we work together, and-and nothing could ever happen, and the last thing I want to do is-is to freak you out or make you feel uncomfortable. Which is why it would be really great if you said something right about now.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, that's gonna take them a minute. Do you have anything else you wanna get off your chest?

Name: rachel
Lines: NA

Name: monica
Lines: Okay Phoebe, we should probably go back now.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Please don't leave me, I'll be lonely.

Name: monica
Lines: Stop it. Stop! Okay let's go. We can be strong.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my god! Did you hear that? She said Monica!  Oooh, I can't leave her!

Name: phoebe
Lines: You know if you want, we can sneak the dog back in and Chandler wouldn't even know.

Name: monica
Lines: That's not gonna work.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I've had that dog there for three days and Chandler had no idea. He's not so smart.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey! I didn't know either.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, but you kinda knew that something was going on, didn't you?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah, I knew.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Where's Chandler?

Name: chandler
Lines: Here I am.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wash your hands!!!

Name: chandler
Lines: How did you…know?

Name: ross
Lines: Hey! What's she doing back here?

Name: monica
Lines: Relax, Ross. She's not made of ice cream!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey look, Phoebe. I, uh, I laid out the states geographically...

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, no, we don't really have time for this right now. Okay, we have to keep Chandler away from my bedroom.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, but, but look what I'm...

Name: phoebe
Lines: See, this is exactly what we do not have time for.

Name: chandler
Lines: Where's Monica?

Name: ross
Lines: Um, in Phoebe's room. You can't go in there.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why not?

Name: ross
Lines: Monica's crying. She's very upset about this whole Clunkers thing.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I, I should go in there.

Name: ross
Lines: No. No, no. She doesn't want to see you right now.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why not?

Name: ross
Lines: Because you sent away the dog!

Name: chandler
Lines: This is ridiculous.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, is it? Is it? Look, when Monica and I were kids, we had a dog named Rover. And, uh, one day, my dad decides, he doesn't like dogs. So Monica and her friend…Phyllis…take away the dog. And that was the last time we ever saw him. Don't you see? This is just like that. Only with a few details changed.

Name: joey
Lines: What's the matter?

Name: chandler
Lines: Monica's all upset, because I sent Clunkers away.

Name: joey
Lines: So? Bring the dog back, you're a hero.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I can be a hero, I could do that. I could, I could do... I, w-w-what if, what if it attacks me?

Name: joey
Lines: Chandler, it's like a big gerbil.

Name: chandler
Lines: And that doesn't scare you?

Name: joey
Lines: Ross, you need some help?

Name: ross
Lines: From you?  Yes, please!

Name: joey

Lines: Okay, but you cannot tell him... but look whose back!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi!

Lines: Oh No-no-no-no-no-no-no! He went over to Ross' to bring the dog back here!

Name: monica
Lines: Hi, honey.

Name: chandler
Lines: Please, please, please, don't be mad at me.

Name: monica
Lines: What? Why, why would...

Name: phoebe
Lines: Shh, wait and see. Maybe we will, maybe we won't.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, I went over to Ross' apartment to bring back Clunkers. Y’know, for you, and…

Name: phoebe
Lines: We have good news, look whose back!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi!

Name: chandler
Lines: Clunkers?! Oh my god!

Name: monica
Lines: That's right, she came back all by herself.

Name: phoebe
Lines: It's a Thanksgiving miracle!

Name: chandler
Lines: It is so good to see you!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, she came all the way back from Ross' building. Oh, the things she must have seen! And then she climbed up the fire escape and she tapped on the window with her teeny little paw and then we ran to let her in… I went to far, didn't I? When should I have stopped?

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, maybe this is so hard, because there aren't 50 states. Let me tell you something, I have 49 states, and there are no more! I-I think, I should be able to eat something.

Name: chandler
Lines: It's up to you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, hi! How are you doing?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh.

Name: ross
Lines: Tag? Y-You're going?  Uh we didn't, uh we didn't get the chance to talk. Uh, so, where did you say you're from again?

Name: ross
Lines: Ah, what good are you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Look, um, I think we should talk about what happened on the terrace.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ah, I-I never should have said what I said. It—y’know what? It just doesn't matter how I feel. I mean we work together, so nothing could really ever happen between us, and what I would love is just to go to work on Monday, and-and never talk about this again, okay? Big day Monday lots to do. So, we're okay?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, god, I know it, that I freaked you out.

Name: rachel
Lines: Really?

Lines: Okay. Okay.

Name: ross

Lines: Oh yeah, I remember mine! Ohh, it was my sixth birthday, my dad took me to the park, I got it, and…it bent.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Lines: I never had a bike of my own.

Name: ross
Lines: What?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, we didn’t have a lot of money. But the girl across the street had the best bike! It was pink and it had rainbow colored tassels hanging off the handle grips, and-and-and a bell and this big, white wicker basket with those plastic daisies stuck on.

Lines: That sounds like my first bike.  My dad gave me his old one.

Lines: Ohh.

Lines: Did the girl ever let you ride it?

She was making candy so she could try to get to know all of you, and I’ll bet that not one of you can tell me her name! Am I right?

Name: chandler
Lines: Thank you Gunther, put it there.  Thank you.

Name: joey
Lines: Thank you.  Hey Pheebs!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: Here.  Now I only owe you $49.50.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey Pheebs!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: If you wanna give Joey a Christmas present that disrupts the entire building, why not get him something a little bit more subtle, like a wrecking ball, or a vile of small pox to release in the hallway?

Name: monica
Lines: It's not just the drum noise. Every five minutes, Joey throws his sticks in the air, and I have to hear, \Oh my eye! Oh god

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes, thank you. You see, this is how normal people are supposed to react to drums.

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe, you got Joey drums to annoy Rachel, so she wouldn't wanna live there anymore?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Maybe on some level.

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey, y’know that you could just not throw the sticks up in the air.

Name: joey
Lines: What is Rock 'n' Roll about that?

Name: phoebe
Lines: NA

Name: joey
Lines: Oh wait, before you tell me what it is!  Okay, what is it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: It's a…tarantula!  Oh! God! Rachel, look, I'm sorry. What was I thinking giving Joey this big, gross, scary spider in such a poorly constructed cage?

Name: rachel
Lines: What are you talking about? I love them!  Yeah, I had a tarantula when I was a kid. But it-it died, because my cat ate it. And then, then my cat died. But Joey, isn't this cool?

Name: joey
Lines: Is it on me? I feel, I feel like it's on me! I got, hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, isn't that adorable? Joey is afraid of the tarantula.

Name: phoebe
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: What? Wait-wait a minute, what? Phoebe, what's the matter?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Our apartment is ready.

Name: rachel
Lines: And that makes you angry because…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Because you would rather live here with Joey.

Name: rachel
Lines: Where did you get that?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Monica and Chandler said that you were having so much fun here. And apparently no amount of drums or tarantulas is gonna change that.

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hm?

Name: rachel
Lines: Did you get all this stuff for Joey to try and drive me out of the apartment? Honey, if you wanted to do that, you might as well just gotten him a fish, you know how fish freaked me out!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Fish!

Name: rachel
Lines: It wouldn't have mattered anyway, Phoebe, you and I are, are gonna live together, we're roommates; that's the deal.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes, but I wanted you to want to live with me, but okay, if you're having so much fun over here…

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, it's so much more fun with you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: We did have fun, didn't we?

Name: rachel
Lines: We did!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, anyway, they say, if we want, we can see it tonight.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, I would love to!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yay, okay!

Name: rachel
Lines: Good, good, good, good, good.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Great, all right, okay, and Monica ask me to make the drumming stop.

Name: rachel
Lines: Done!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: ross
Lines: No, these are my pants.

Name: ross
Lines: Well, uh, do you have a Santa-outfit left?

Name: ross
Lines: Okay look, do-do, you have anything Christmassy? I promised my son, and I really don't want to disappoint him, um, come on, I…uh, you gotta have something.

Name: ross
Lines: I'm the holiday armadillo! I'm a friend of Santa's and he sent me here to wish you  a Merry Christmas!

Name: monica
Lines: What happened to Santa, Holiday Armadillo?

Name: ross
Lines: Santa was unavailable so close to Christmas.

Name: monica
Lines: Wow, come in, have a seat. You must be exhausted coming all the way from…Texas.

Name: ross
Lines: That's right, Ben. I'm Santa's representative for all the southern states. And Mexico! But, Santa sent me here to give you these presents, Ben.  Maybe the Lady will help me with these presents.

Name: ross
Lines: You're welcome, Ben. Merry Christmas, ooh, and Happy Hanukkah!

Name: ross
Lines: You are? Me, too!

Name: monica
Lines: Because Armadillos also wandered in the desert?

Name: ross
Lines: Ooh, hey Ben, what if the Holiday Armadillo told you all about the festival of lights?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah!

Name: monica
Lines: Come on Ben.

Name: ross
Lines: Years and years ago there were these people called the Maccabees...

Name: chandler
Lines: Ho, ho, ho! Merry Christmas!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: ross
Lines: What are you doing here, Santa?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I'm here to see my old buddy Ben. What are you doing here, weird…turtle-man?

Name: ross
Lines: I'm the Holiday Armadillo, your part-Jewish friend. You sent me here to give Ben some presents. Remember?

Name: chandler
Lines: What?

Name: chandler
Lines: You bet I did, Ben, put it there!  Ho, ho, ho!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay Ben, why don't you come open some more presents, and Santa, the Armadillo, and I have a little talk in the kitchen? There's a sentence, I never thought I'd say.

Name: ross
Lines: What are you doing?

Name: chandler
Lines: You called everyone and said you were having trouble finding a Santa costume, so I borrowed one from a guy at work!

Name: ross
Lines: Thank you, but, but you gotta leave.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why?

Name: ross
Lines: Because, I'm finally getting him excited about Hanukkah, and, and you're-you’re wrecking it.

Name: chandler
Lines: But I didn't get to shape my belly like a bowl full of jelly.

Name: ross
Lines: I'm sorry, Chandler but this, this is really important to me.

Name: chandler
Lines: Fine, I'll give the suit back.

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: chandler
Lines: Santa? Really?

Name: monica
Lines: Yes, is that okay?

Name: chandler
Lines: Did your Dad ever dress up like Santa?

Name: monica
Lines: No.

Name: chandler
Lines: Then it's okay!

Name: ross
Lines: Okay Ben, Santa has to go. Say good-bye!

Name: chandler
Lines: Because, if Santa and the Holiday…Armadillo?  ...are ever in the same room for too long the universe will implode. Merry Christmas!

Name: ross
Lines: Fine, I-I give up. Santa, Santa can stay.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I'll stay, but only because I wanna hear about Hanukkah. Ben, will you sit here with Santa and learn about Hanukkah?

Name: ross
Lines: All right, it's time for the story of Hanukkah. Years and years ago, there were these people called the Maccabees.

Name: joey
Lines: Merry Christmas!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh wow! Look at this place!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, this is terrible. Oh, they’ve made so many changes I can’t even feel my grandmother’s presence anymore—Ooh! New sconces!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, remember uh, remember how you told me that your grandmother put up that wall to make that into two bedrooms?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah?

Name: rachel
Lines: And remember how you always said you were afraid the landlord would find out and then tear it down?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah?

Name: rachel
Lines: Do you really not know where I’m going with this?  It left! It’s one huge room!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh no!  Oh! Wow!!!

Name: rachel
Lines: See?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, I guess we’ll just have to put the wall back up.

Name: rachel
Lines: You can’t, because of the new skylight!

Name: phoebe
Lines: There’s a skylight?!  Wow!!

Name: rachel
Lines: So what should we do? Should we start looking for a new place?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Y’know I’m-I’m sensing that um, my grandmother would not be comfortable with that.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh yeah? Startin’ to feel her again there are we?

Name: phoebe
Lines: A little bit, yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: Pheebs is your grandmother maybe saying that you should live here alone?

Name: phoebe
Lines: You heard her too?! You have the gift!

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe, it’s okay. I like living with Joey.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Are you sure?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh please, I hate packing, it’s closer to work, and we do have fun. Although, I’m really gonna miss living with you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh me too.

Name: rachel
Lines: I know.  Oh-oh, wait did you hear that-hear that? Listen, I’m gettin’ something from your grandmother, she said that since you get to keep the one bedroom apartment you should give Rachel the purple chair?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, I do not hear that.

Name: ross
Lines: …and the miracle was that that little bit of oil that should’ve just lasted just one day, burned for…

Name: ross
Lines: That’s right, and that’s why we celebrate Hanukkah today. The end.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah?

Name: chandler
Lines: My favorite part was when Superman flew all the Jews out of Egypt.

Name: ross
Lines: The Armadillo was actually not so thrilled about that part! Okay Ben, it’s time to light the Hanukkah candles!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow! It looks like the Easter Bunny’s funeral in here.

Name: ross
Lines: Come on, come on, we’re-we’re-we’re lighting the candles!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, I understand why Superman is here, but why is there a porcupine at the Easter Bunny’s funeral?

Name: rachel
Lines: I got it!

Name: joey
Lines: Is it back in the cage?

Name: rachel
Lines: Its back in cage!

Name: joey
Lines: Cage closed?

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey, would you just come out here and stop being such a baby!

Name: chandler
Lines: Ohh. Mmm.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, you have got to try this cheesecake.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, y’know I'm not that much of a sweet tooth. I—

Name: chandler
Lines: It was at the front door. When I got home. Somebody sent it to us.

Name: rachel
Lines: Chandler, this is not addressed to you. This is addressed to Mrs. Braverman downstairs.  Thief.

Name: chandler
Lines: I—no! I didn't read the box before I opened it. And you can't return a box after you've opened the box.

Name: rachel
Lines: Why, why not?

Name: chandler
Lines: Because it's too delicious.

Name: rachel
Lines: Chandler, you stole this cheesecake. That is wrong.

Name: chandler
Lines: No-no-no! It is going to be okay, because Mrs. Braverman is gonna send away for a free one and that way we all win! The only losers are the big cheesecake conglomerate,  I feel terrible, I’m a horrible, horrible, horrible person.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, I’m sorry what?

Name: joey
Lines: All right, I should get going, big day a work. Y’know I’m in a coma? Today, they do this test on me and it turns out I’m not brain dead.

Name: chandler
Lines: So…

Name: joey
Lines: Ah-ah-ah Mr. Smartie Pants, it’s just not my character that’s not brain dead. Hey, so Pheebs, we still on for tonight?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Absolutely!

Name: joey
Lines: I’ll see you at 8:00.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, what’s at 8:00?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, I have dinner plans with Joey. We get together about once a month to discuss the rest of you guys.

Name: ross
Lines: Wow, did not know that! May I say how lovely you look today?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Duly noted.

Name: ross
Lines: Thanks.  Oh! So for tomorrow, do you want to rent a car and drive down together or what?

Name: monica
Lines: What are you talking about?

Name: ross
Lines: Cousin Frannie’s wedding, its tomorrow night.

Name: monica
Lines: You were invited?!

Name: ross
Lines: No.

Name: monica
Lines: My God, I can’t believe this! I mean I knew that mom and dad were invited, but I thought that was it! I mean from the ages 7 to 9 Frannie and I were inseparable!

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, maybe since the age of 9, Frannie’s made some new friends.

Name: ross
Lines: Well l-look okay, it’s probably just a mistake. Let me call Aunt Sheryl okay? Maybe you are invited and the invitation just got lost in the mail.

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah, well you call her and tell her that y’know when we were kids her precious little Frannie tried to undress me several times, okay? And if I hadn’t have stopped her, there probably wouldn’t even be a wedding to go too.

Name: ross
Lines: Y’know, she tried to undress me too.

Name: chandler
Lines: I used to undress my cousin Glenn.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Joseph Francis Tribbiani are you home yet?!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Umm, I think he’s still out. What’s wrong?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, I’ll tell you Rachel Karen Green, I had plans with Joey tonight and he left me this note.

Name: rachel
Lines: Big Daddy?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh that’s a nickname we were trying out.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, y’know what nickname never caught on? The Ross-A-Tron!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh! Here’s Joseph Francis!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh-Wha-Ho! What are you middle naming me for?! I left you a note!

Name: phoebe
Lines: So what?! That doesn’t give you the right to ditch me!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, you can cancel plans with friends if there is the possibility for sex!

Name: ross
Lines: Phoebe he’s right, that is the rule.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I don’t accept this rule. When me make plans, I expect you to show up. Okay, I can’t just be a way to kill time ‘til you meet someone better! Y’know boyfriends and girlfriends come and go, but this  is for life!

Name: joey
Lines: Wow! I’m so sorry; I had no idea it would bother you this much.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, it does.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, can I-can I make it up to you? Huh? I’m sorry.  How about uh, dinner tomorrow night?! I’ll pay for myself!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, you wore me down.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey Joe, while you’re over there how about another beer for the Ross-A-Tron?

Name: joey
Lines: The Ross—Is that back?!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi!

Name: chandler
Lines: Another cheesecake came! They delivered it to the wrong address again!

Name: rachel
Lines: So just bring it back downstairs, what’s the problem?

Name: chandler
Lines: I can’t seem to say goodbye.

Name: rachel
Lines: Are you serious?! Chandler, we ate an entire cheesecake two days ago and you want more?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well I’ve forgotten what it tastes like okay?!

Name: rachel
Lines: It was cheesecake. It was fine. It had a buttery, crumbly, graham cracker crust, with a very rich yet light, cream cheese filling…  Wow! My whole mouth just filled with saliva!

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know what? Forget it! We are just hungry! We have not had lunch! We are just light-headed! So let us go out and have lunch and forget about the cheesecake.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah and we’ll drop it off downstairs so that we’re not tempted.

Name: chandler
Lines: Good idea. Where do you want to go to lunch?

Name: rachel
Lines: Momma’s Little Bakery, Chicago, Illinois.

Name: joey
Lines: Awww! Mel Torme died.

Name: monica
Lines: Joey, that paper’s like a year old!

Name: joey
Lines: Aw! Does that mean the Sam Goody’s sale is over?!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey.

Name: ross
Lines: So I finally heard back from Aunt Sheryl and apparently it wasn’t a mistake. Ahh, there’s-there’s limited seating in the hall.

Name: monica
Lines: Limited seating?!  I am just one tiny person!

Name: ross
Lines: Well yeah, but she doesn’t know that. I mean, the last time she saw you-you would’ve turned one of those little wedding chairs into kindling.

Name: monica
Lines: Limited seating! Oh, that is such a lame excuse! That’s not the reason she’s not inviting me!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh what’s the big deal?! I wasn’t even invited to the ceremony, just the reception. And-and y’know what? If it makes you feel any better, Joan and I will just make an appearance and then, and then we’ll-we’ll leave early as a sign of protest.

Name: monica
Lines: Joan?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, Joan Tedeski my date. She’s an assistant professor in the Linguistics department. Tall, very beautiful, and despite what some people say, not broad backed!

Name: monica
Lines: Wait a minute, you got Ross Gellar and guest?! I wasn’t invited and you got \and guest?!\"

Name: joey
Lines: Uh-uh, excuse me, I do have to interrupt on Ross’s behalf. I-I think the rule applies here y’know, since she has a chance to get on broad back…

Name: ross
Lines: Not broad backed!

Name: monica
Lines: Wait a minute, y’know, you’re bringing me!

Name: ross
Lines: What? I can’t cancel on Joan!

Name: monica
Lines: Why not?!

Name: ross
Lines: Bec—Did you not hear me?! She’s an assistant professor in the Linguistics department, okay? They’re wild! Why do you want to come anyway?

Name: monica
Lines: Because! She’s my cousin. I mean, we grew up together! We’re family y’know? Well that’s important to me.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, all right, I’ll take you. I’ll go call Joan.

Name: joey
Lines: Aww that’s nice. Family should be there, huh? This is her wedding, happiest day of her life.

Name: monica
Lines: We’ll see.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, thank you for lunch.

Name: rachel
Lines: What? Wait a minute, I didn’t pay, I thought you paid!

Name: chandler
Lines: So apparently we just don’t pay for food anymore.  Do you see what I see?

Name: rachel
Lines: NA

Name: chandler
Lines: Mrs. Braverman must be out.

Name: rachel
Lines: She could be out of town. Maybe she’ll be gone for months.

Name: chandler
Lines: By then, the cheesecake may have gone bad. We don’t want her to come back to bad cheesecake.

Name: rachel
Lines: No that could kill her.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, we don’t want that.

Name: rachel
Lines: No so we’re protecting her.

Name: chandler
Lines: But we should take it.

Name: rachel
Lines: But we should move quick.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why?

Name: rachel
Lines: Because I think I just heard her moving around in there.

Name: chandler
Lines: Go! Go! Go! Go! Go! Go! Go! Go! Go! Go!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God! That’s David!

Name: monica
Lines: David who?

Name: phoebe
Lines: David the scientist guy, David that I was in love with, David who went to Russia and broke my heart David!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, you say someone’s name enough, they turn around.

Name: phoebe
Lines: David!  What-what are you doing here? Aren’t you supposed to be in Russia?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well… Yeah. You look great too. Did you get a haircut?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, of course I would want to see you. I…I think about you all the time.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Really?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes! Oh no!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can’t. I can’t believe I have plans, I can’t. Can you do it tomorrow night though?

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe, can I talk to you for a second?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: monica
Lines: What are you doing?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, I have plans with Joey tonight.

Name: monica
Lines: So! He’ll understand!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No he won’t. And that’s not even the point! Monica, I made a whole speech about you do not cancel plans with friends! And now y’know what? Just because, potentially, the love of my life comes back from Russia just for one night, I-I should change my beliefs?! I should change beliefs! No! No! No, if I don’t have my principles, I don’t have anything!

Name: monica
Lines: God, you are so strong.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Or! I should rush through dinner with Joey and I can meet David at 9:00!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! That is so good!

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m full, and yet I know if I stop eating this, I’ll regret it.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: What do you got there?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh it’s umm, it’s tofu cake. Do you want some?

Name: chandler
Lines: What are you doing tonight?

Name: joey
Lines: Huh? Uh…

Name: chandler
Lines: Dude! Dude!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh!  Sorry. Uh, I’ve got those plans with Phoebe, why?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh really? Uh, Monica said she had a date at 9:00.

Name: joey
Lines: What?! Tonight?!

Name: chandler
Lines: That’s what Monica said.

Name: joey
Lines: After she gave me that big speech?! She goes and makes a date with a guy on the same night she has plans with me? I think she’s trying to pull a fast one on Big Daddy!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh here, I think this is us.  Yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: Limited seating my ass. Let’s see who made the cut.  Hi!

Name: monica
Lines: I’m Monica Gellar. Who do you know the bride and groom?

Name: monica
Lines: Used to work with her. Used to! I’m a relative and I didn’t get invited! A blood relative! Blood!!

Name: ross
Lines: Stop saying, \Blood\" to strangers."

Name: monica
Lines: So, how about you huh? How do you know the happy couple?

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, you’re fine.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes! I will have the green salad, umm the house salad, and water’s fine.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, this slow roasted salmon, just how slow are we talkin’ here?

Name: joey
Lines: Ohh, then no. Maybe I should hear those specials again.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh Joey, we’ve heard the specials three times! Okay? There’s prime rib, mahi mahi, and a very special lobster ravioli.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh well, that changes everything!  Y’know what Pheebs?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Huh?

Name: joey
Lines: You were right before. I mean, friends are so important.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I’m very wise. I know.

Name: joey
Lines: Y’know-y’know what I really want?

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?

Name: joey
Lines: Is to have a long, long talk. Y’know? Get Joey out on the open road and really open him up.

Name: joey
Lines: Yes! I will have the lobster ravioli.

Name: phoebe
Lines: God Joey, this is taking forever!

Name: joey
Lines: What’s the rush? What?

Name: phoebe
Lines: W-w—I just—it’s that—I have—y’know I have-I have an appointment. And it’s very important.

Name: joey
Lines: Whoa-whoa, what is it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well… It’s a date.

Name: joey
Lines: A date?! No, no Pheebs you-you must be mistaken, because I know you wouldn’t schedule a date on the same night you have plans with a friend!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Come on Joey, don’t make me feel badly about this.

Name: joey
Lines: No, I’m gonna!! That’s right! Yeah, you made me feel really guilty about goin’ out with that girl! Like-like-like I did something terrible to you! And now Pheebs, you’re doing the same thing!

Name: phoebe
Lines: That—It’s not the same thing! This is totally different! This is with David! Remember David, the scientist guy? Okay, he’s very special to me.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, well my girl from the other night was special. She was a scientist too!

Name: phoebe
Lines: She was?

Name: joey
Lines: Well, she graduated from high school!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, whatever. Y’know what? I don’t have time have time to convince you because he’s only here for four hours, and I’m gonna go see him!

Name: joey
Lines: Fine!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah!

Name: joey
Lines: Fine!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah!

Name: joey
Lines: What are you still doin’ here?! I told you, lobster ravioli!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, I wouldn’t miss this.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, you’re such a gentleman.

Name: chandler
Lines: Are you eating the cheesecake without me?!

Name: rachel
Lines: NA

Name: chandler
Lines: I will give you a hundred dollars to whistle right now.  How can you eat the cheesecake without me?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, what are you going to do?! Are you gonna go run tell Monica?! Are you gonna tell Joey?! No! Because then you will have to tell them what we did! We are desert stealers! We are living outside the law!

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know what? I don’t trust you with this cake anymore! And I got it first, and I’m takin’ it back!

Name: rachel
Lines: What?! What?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh yes!

Name: rachel
Lines: Wait a minute!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh yes!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh no-no-no-no-no, no you don’t!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh yes! Oh yes!

Name: rachel
Lines: You think I trust you with it?! No! We’re gonna split it! You take half and I take half!

Name: chandler

Lines: Dad that won’t matter to her. Look, all my stuff is safe and dry and all her is-is, is growing new stuff! See, this is exactly the kind of thing that makes her think you guys love me more than you love her.

Lines: Dad, dad I don’t want to hear about it.

Lines: Well, not right now. Okay look, Monica came here for some memories and damnit, we’re gonna give her some! Okay, grab…grab some empty boxes. Okay? We’ll-we’ll take stuff from mine and whatever we can pass off as hers we’ll-we’ll put ‘em in their.

Lines: Excuse me! Can you tell me where I can find Earl? He’s the supply manager around here.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Umm, look it, you-you can’t kill yourself.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No-no I can’t! I can’t let you do it!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Because it was fate that made me call you today!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No! Think about it okay? This isn’t even my regular job! Okay? And my first day on the job, you’re my first call! And-and somebody else might’ve hung up on you, but I wouldn’t do that because I know about this stuff. My mom killed herself.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes.

Name: phoebe

Name: phoebe

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh. Well umm, okay here’s a weird thing. My mother was also a supply manager.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Sure!  Umm, where are you from?

Lines: Oh my God! So was she! Oh, I’ve got-I’ve got goose bumps.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, y’know I’m wearing layers and it’s warm.

Name: phoebe
Lines: But if—no look, okay. These jerks might not care about you, but the universe does! And that says a lot!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Y’know, I don’t-I don’t think it’s you. This is a freaky place.  Oh no, it’s you.

Name: rachel
Lines: So, if I wanna have my kid when I’m 35, I don’t have to get pregnant until I’m 34. Which gives Prada four years to start making maternity clothes! Oh wait, but I do want to be married for a year before I get pregnant…

Name: rachel
Lines: No, so I don’t have to get married until I’m 33! That’s three years, that’s three whole years—Oh, wait a minute though. I’ll need a year and a half to plan the wedding, and I’d like to know the guy for a year, year and a half before we get engaged… Which means I need to meet the guy by the time I’m thirty.

Lines: Oh!

Lines: Umm…

Lines: Well said. And a uh good example of the fun I was referring to uhh, but I just think I’m past the point where I think I can y’know, just have fun.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, it is! But you’re just a kid! I mean you’re 25!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh God! Y’know what I wish? I wish you were six years older. Well actually, if I’m wishin’ for stuff, I actually wish I was six years younger.

Lines: Hey! How’d it go?

Name: rachel

Lines: NA
