Name: phoebe
Lines: What?!

Name: monica
Lines: I know you’re planning my surprise bridal shower.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well okay—Well don’t ruin it! Just play along at least!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay. Sorry.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! We have to throw her a shower?!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey! What did you decide to do about the movie?

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t know! It’s not like it’s porn! This is a serious, legitimate movie. Y’know? And the nudity is really important to the story.

Name: monica
Lines: That’s what you say about porn.

Name: joey
Lines: You’re right. Maybe I shouldn’t even go on the call back.

Name: monica
Lines: No! No you should! A lot of major actors do nude scenes! I mean the chance to star in a movie? Come on!

Name: joey
Lines: Well that’s true. And I am only naked in one scene. Plus it sounds really great. My character’s catholic and he falls in love with this Jewish girl. Who run away together and they get caught in this big rainstorm. So we go into this barn and undress each other and hold each other. It’s really sweet and-and tender.

Name: monica
Lines: Plus, everyone’s gonna see your thing.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well when can we have this shower?

Name: rachel
Lines: She has got so much going on we-we have only two options. We have Friday…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well that’s only two days away. What is the other option?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yesterday!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well if we make it yesterday, woo-hoo! We’re done!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God Phoebe, this is impossible! We can’t do this by Friday! We have to find a place. We have to invite people! We have to get food! There’s just too much to do! It’s impossible! We can’t do it! We cannot do it! We cannot do it!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Rachel, calm down!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. I’m sorry. You’re right, you’re right.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Just calm down woman!

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe, I already, I already did.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh okay. All right, then I need to calm down a little.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. Okay.  I think we can do this if we just get organized. All right? We have two days to plan this party. We just need to make fast decisions! Okay? All right, where are we gonna have it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh, here. What time?

Name: rachel
Lines: 4 o’clock. Food?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Finger sandwiches and tea.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ooh great! Very Monica.

Name: phoebe
Lines: And chili!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ah you went one too far. Uh, flowers or balloons?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Both!

Name: rachel
Lines: We’re paying for this y’know.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Neither.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. Umm, what should we do for the theme?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Lusts of the flesh.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I don’t know.  A cowboy theme?

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know I’m-I’m really glad we decided not to sleep together before the wedding.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh boy me too!

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know I was thinking if we had a…a big fight and uh we broke up for a few hours…

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah?

Name: chandler
Lines: Technically we could have sex again. What do you think, bossy and domineering?!

Name: monica
Lines: The wedding is off, sloppy and immature!

Name: chandler
Lines: That’s me! Come on!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.  But wait, we can’t. My Cousin Cassie is in the guest room, we’re supposed to have lunch.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well get rid of her, obsessive and shrill.

Name: monica
Lines: Shrill?! The wedding is back on!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hi! Nice to meet you!

Name: monica
Lines: So, are you ready to go?

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler!

Name: chandler
Lines: I’ll be right with you.

Name: monica
Lines: Cassie needs to stay at your place.

Name: ross
Lines: What—why?

Name: monica
Lines: Because Purvry Perverson over here can’t stop staring at her.

Name: ross
Lines: What?! Chandler she’s our cousin!

Name: chandler
Lines: I was not staring at her. Okay? I was just listening intently. It’s called being a good conversationalist. Watch.  Say something.

Name: monica
Lines: You were staring about eight inches south of there.

Name: ross
Lines: Fine, she can stay at my place. By the way, what-what does Cassie even look like now.

Name: monica
Lines: She looks exactly like Aunt Marilyn.

Name: chandler
Lines: Umm, so this Aunt Marilyn is-is-is-is she coming to the wedding?

Name: monica
Lines: Wafer thin ice!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, I’m back!

Name: joey
Lines: Uh so, will-will I be reading the same scene again?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh great! Y’know I would’ve been perfect for this part, but whatever! Y’know, thanks for making a bad decision and ruining your movie! Good day!

Name: joey
Lines: And scene! Huh? Wasn’t that fun? We did a little improv there. Yeah! Okay! So you-you-you-you were saying?

Name: joey
Lines: Wow! Sure! That’s great!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah! Yeah sure, just long as it’s handled tastefully and that barn is not too cold.

Name: joey
Lines: So…What?

Name: joey
Lines: Yes!

Name: joey
Lines: No. What?

Name: joey
Lines: Barmifsaed?

Name: monica
Lines: So to get this part you can’t be?

Name: joey
Lines: Nope.

Name: monica
Lines: But you are?

Name: joey
Lines: Yep.

Name: monica
Lines: But you told them you weren’t?

Name: joey
Lines: That’s right.

Name: monica
Lines: Wow! Wow! And it’s definitely all gone? There’s nothing there to work with?  What were you thinking?

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t know! I really want this part! And they tell you no matter what you get asked at an audition you say yes. Like if-if they want you to ride a horse, you tell ‘em you can! And just figure out how to do it later.

Name: monica
Lines: Joey! This is not like learning to ride a horse! This is like learning to…grow a turtleneck!

Name: joey
Lines: I kn-I know! I know! Okay? And apparently tomorrow when I go in to meet the director I have to take off my clothes so that they can see what my body looks like.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God, what are you gonna do?!

Name: joey
Lines: I just have to call my agent and tell her I can’t do the part.

Name: monica
Lines: Unless!

Name: joey
Lines: Unless what?

Name: monica
Lines: Well, this may sound crazy, but there maybe something we could fashion.

Name: joey
Lines: Like what?

Name: monica
Lines: Well I’m not sure yet, but umm of the top of my head I’m thinking double sided tape and some sort of luncheon meat.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey! I’ve got a great idea for party favors for the shower. Okay, we get some uh mahogany boxes and carve everyone’s names in them and inside is everyone’s individual birth stone.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. Okay. All right, you take care of that. And meanwhile, the party is tomorrow and we still don’t have a guest list.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay. Okay! Well okay, who do we know that’s coming? Me. Are you?

Name: monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey! What’s up Mon?

Name: monica
Lines: Well uh, I’m trying to make something for Joey. Do you mind if I raid your fridge?

Name: rachel
Lines: Have at it.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.  I hope that won’t work.

Name: rachel
Lines: Are you makin’ him a sandwich?

Name: monica
Lines: No it’s umm, more like a wrap. Okay so uh, I’m gonna go guys.

Name: monica
Lines: I guess you can get back to deciding on what to get me for a present!

Name: rachel
Lines: We have to get her a present?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay but look! Look at what I got! It’s her address book!  We have a guest list!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God you’re amazing! Did you just pull that out of her purse?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh, and a little seed money for the party.

Name: ross
Lines: Cassie?!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh. Oh, that’s right. So-so you did see me that day because it seemed like you didn’t.

Name: ross
Lines: It’s okay. Come, come on in.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh.

Name: ross
Lines: Uh-huh. Yeah I-I have a knack for impressions.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah—No!!

Name: ross
Lines: Cassie, how you-how you doin’ on that…hot dog.

Name: ross
Lines: Thank God.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh right. Right. Ooh, remember the time I uh, I pinned you down and tickled you ‘til you cried?  We’re probably too old to do that now.

Name: ross
Lines: Uh-huh! Uh-huh! And-and-and I’ll always remember that summer because that’s when I realized that we are related.

Name: ross
Lines: Well I’m, I’m a little slow.  Just as our children would be.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hi!

Name: phoebe
Lines: How are you?  Hi, thanks for coming.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Thank you.  Oh, it’s so nice to see you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.  Hey Rach?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Who the hell are all these people?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, I don’t know. I called all the people in Monica’s phone book and these are the only ones who could show up on 24 hours notice.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hmm, y’know there’s another word for people like that. Losers!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi! I’m Rachel. This is Phoebe. I’m the maid of honor. How do you know Monica?

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohhhh!

Name: rachel
Lines: That’s great!

Name: rachel
Lines: You didn’t tell her to come?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: You were supposed to tell her!

Name: rachel
Lines: No I wasn’t! You were supposed to tell her to come and I was supposed to bring the cake!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Fine, I’ll go call her.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes! And please tell her to bring a cake!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, we have a lot of options here, a number of prototypes for you to try on.

Name: joey
Lines: Wow! This looks great!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah! Okay, this one is a mushroom cap.

Name: joey
Lines: And-and-and-and-and the toothpicks?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, just until the glue dries.

Name: joey
Lines: Thank God!

Name: monica
Lines: Now, these are-are more realistic, but perishable.

Name: joey
Lines: Ah.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay?  Over here we have pink suede, which is nice. But umm, if it gets wet then you know it’s gonna shrink.

Name: joey
Lines: Well maybe we just take that one away.

Name: monica
Lines: I also, did a little something in fur. But umm, that’s really just for me.  Okay. So, why don’t you go into your room and try these on and we’ll see—get a better idea of what’s gonna work.

Name: joey
Lines: Thanks, you are such a good friend. And this is so weird.

Name: joey
Lines: Ow!

Name: monica
Lines: Toothpick?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: What are you trying on now?

Name: joey
Lines: The fruit roll up.

Name: monica
Lines: And?

Name: joey
Lines: Delicious.

Name: monica
Lines: Joey!

Name: joey
Lines: Wait a minute! Wait a minute! We have a winner!

Name: monica
Lines: What?! Which one?!

Name: joey
Lines: The Silly Putty! It’s not so silly anymore!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, I know that look. Forget it. I want it. She wants it. I’m going in.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, you really shouldn’t have said anything.

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe! Rachel! It’s Monica! I wonder what you could possibly need me for on such short notice!  Oh.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh Monica, we are so sorry.

Name: monica
Lines: For what?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well first, for forgetting to throw you a bridal shower.

Name: phoebe
Lines: And then for forgetting to invite you to it.

Name: monica
Lines: You al-you already had it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah. Well, we called everyone in your phone book and bunch of people came, but it took us so long to get you here that they-they had to leave.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, we wanted to throw you a big surprise and a great shower, and now you don’t have either.

Name: phoebe
Lines: We ruined everything.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ugh…

Name: monica
Lines: Well no wait a minute that’s not true! No, what did, that was really sweet. And it kinda works out for the best.

Name: rachel
Lines: What do you, what do you mean?

Name: monica
Lines: Well now, I get to spend my shower with the only people I really love! I mean, I get all those presents  without having to talk to people I don’t even like!

Name: rachel
Lines: Surprise…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Sur-surprise.

Name: rachel
Lines: …Monica.

Name: joey
Lines: And what’s cool is, the character is from Naples, right?

Name: joey
Lines: My whole family’s from Naples!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh! Hey right! Not a problem.  I tell ya, that has never happened before.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Cassie, are you finding everything okay in there?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh! No problem! I…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Say something! Say anything! Ask her out! She’s not your cousin!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey! Out of all of us, who do you think is gonna get married next?

Name: joey
Lines: Probably Monica and Chandler.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God, Melissa Warburton. I don’t think I have the energy for this.

Name: rachel
Lines: Melissa!

Name: rachel
Lines: Wh—

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh no-no, no! It’s good! It’s all good! I-I actually work at Ralph Lauren!

Name: rachel
Lines: I will not! I’m the divisional head of men’s sportswear!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh please…

Name: rachel
Lines: No.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh tomorrow, oh I don’t know. Um…

Name: rachel
Lines: Shut up.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, wow thanks!  Oh you’re in real estate!

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow! What do you do now?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey guys! Look who’s back! It’s Ray-ray!

Name: rachel
Lines: Shut up that was my friend Melissa from college.

Name: ross
Lines: She seems really, really fun!

Name: rachel
Lines: She’s actually very sweet and we used to be very close.

Name: monica
Lines: Wait a minute, she isn’t… She’s not the one who you…

Name: joey
Lines: Who you what? Who you what?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes.

Name: monica
Lines: Wow!

Name: joey
Lines: Wow? Wow what?! Wow what?! Who you—what?!!

Name: rachel
Lines: It’s not a big deal!

Name: monica
Lines: They were lovers.

Name: ross
Lines: What?!

Name: joey
Lines: What?!

Name: rachel
Lines: No we weren’t! It was nothing! It was one night, senior year we went to a party, had a lot of sangria and y’know, ended up…kissing for a bit.

Name: ross
Lines: So that’s two of my wives.

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh wow. Why don’t we just take me  These pins aren’t for playing are they?

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, the red ones are my guests and the blue ones are yours.

Name: chandler
Lines: This is so sad. I mean, I only have like ten pins.

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler, relax it’s not a contest.  Certainly not a close one.

Name: joey
Lines: Hello!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey Rach.

Name: rachel
Lines: Stop picturing it!!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, I think that’s it. The seating chart is done. This is our wedding. They all look like they’re having fun don’t they?

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, so where are my parents gonna be?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh!  you’re parents will be at home in Queens.

Name: joey
Lines: What they’re not invited?! Oh no, that’s terrible! They’re gonna be crushed!

Name: monica
Lines: Why would they think they’re invited?

Name: joey
Lines: You got me. I don’t…

Name: monica
Lines: Joey!

Name: joey
Lines: Well, I’m sorry. I thought parents were coming! Y’know? Your parents are comin’! Chandler’s parents are comin’! Ross’s parents are comin’!

Name: monica
Lines: Ross’s parents are my parents!

Name: joey
Lines: Well-well—see? Parents are comin’!

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know I think we should invite them.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh please, you just want more blue pins.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well this is just sad!

Name: monica
Lines: All right, all right. Maybe I can fit them in if I just do some rearranging. But uh, Rachel may actually have to sit at the bar!

Name: rachel
Lines: That is not a problem.

Name: joey
Lines: Maybe you’ll order a little sangria?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, get out of here!

Name: rachel
Lines: But these are the three that Monica pre-approved.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, thanks a lot for hookin’ me up Rach. I want you to know that I want you to attend our wedding as my guest.

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m Monica’s maid of honor. Okay? Don’t try to blue pin me!

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, what’s the deal with these? These-these look nice.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh they are nice. We-we custom-make tuxedos for celebrities and then when they’re done with them they just send ‘em back.

Name: chandler
Lines: You mean like for award shows?

Name: rachel
Lines: Some of them.

Name: chandler
Lines: You mean these tuxes have been down the red carpet with people yelling, \You are you wearing?! You look fabulous!\"

Name: rachel
Lines: Honey, might I suggest watching a little more ESPN and a little less E!?

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, who wore those?

Name: rachel
Lines: Umm, well let’s see uh, this one is Tom Brokaw.

Name: chandler
Lines: Not bad.

Name: rachel
Lines: This one is uh Paul O’Neil.

Name: chandler
Lines: Who’s that?

Name: rachel
Lines: He plays for the Yankees. Seriously, ESPN! Just once and a while, have it on in the background.  Ooh, this one was Pierce Brosnan!

Name: chandler
Lines: Pierce Brosnan?

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: chandler
Lines: Are you serious?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: chandler
Lines: 007?! This is James Bond’s tux?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, I have to get married in James Bond’s tux!

Name: rachel
Lines: It’s a pretty cool tux.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, it’s not just that, I would be England’s most powerful weapon. Jet setting heartbreaker on her majesty’s secret service. A man who fears no one; with a license to kill.  Would Monica let me wear this?

Name: joey
Lines: We should really learn how to play the real way.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I like our way. Oh!  Chess!

Name: joey
Lines: Nice move.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: So Joey I just hooked Ross and Chandler up with some tuxedos for the wedding, do you need one?

Name: joey
Lines: No, I’m performing the ceremony. I’m not wearing a tux.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, what are you going to wear?

Name: joey
Lines: Multi-colored robes! Ooh, and maybe a hat.

Name: rachel
Lines: Huh. Does Monica know about this?

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t think so.

Name: rachel
Lines: Can I please be there when you tell her?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey oh, Rach wait! Do you want to go to a movie tonight?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, y’know what? I can’t. I have to have dinner with that Melissa girl.

Name: joey
Lines: Can I come?! I won’t even talk! You’ll just hear the noise from my video camera.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What is this? What’s going on?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh good! Can I tell her?! Can I tell her?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, do you want to hear what actually happened or Joey’s lewd version?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Joey’s!

Name: joey
Lines: Okay…

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey, come on! I had this friend from college and I made the stupid mistake of telling Joey that one time…she and I y’know…kissed a little bit.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I’m sure that happened.

Name: rachel
Lines: It-it did!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Sure!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.  It happened!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, it was senior year in college. It was after the Sigma Chi luau and Melissa and I got very drunk! And we ended up kissing! For several minutes!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Which means she had a couple spritzers and a quick peck on the cheek.

Name: joey
Lines: Why are you taking this away from me?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, why is it so hard for you to believe?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay! I just—I didn’t know that you are a lesbian.

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m not saying that I’m a lesbian! I’m just saying that this happened!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, it just seems pretty wild and you’re so—y’know so…vanilla.

Name: rachel
Lines: Vanilla?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m not vanilla! I’ve done lots of crazy things! I mean I got-I got drunk and married in Vegas!

Name: phoebe
Lines: To Ross.

Name: rachel
Lines: All right, y’know what? If you don’t want to believe me about this, why don’t you just come with me to dinner tonight and she will tell you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay! All right! Yeah! ‘Cause I just can’t picture it.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh-ho, you should get inside my head.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey! Guess what I got for your wedding!

Name: chandler
Lines: A freakish thin date with a hanger for her head?

Name: ross
Lines: No. Rachel hooked me up with a tux! But not just any tux, Batman’s tux!

Name: chandler
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: That’s right! Made expressly for Val Kilmer and worn by him in the hit film…that Batman film he was in.

Name: chandler
Lines: You can’t wear that! I’m wearing the famous tux! James Bond’s tux!

Name: ross
Lines: So?

Name: chandler
Lines: So—If you wear that you’ll make mine less special.

Name: ross
Lines: Well, you need something to make this day special? Hello! You-you-you have the most special thing of all! You are marrying the woman you love.

Name: chandler
Lines: Please, don’t take away my cool thing. Please?! Pretty please?!

Name: ross
Lines: Pretty please? Not very uh, 007.

Name: chandler
Lines: Look, it’s my wedding day okay? If you were getting married I would never do anything to upset you.

Name: ross
Lines: When I got married you slept with my sister.

Name: chandler
Lines: That was pretty 007.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey. Oh good-good you’re here! All right, I figured it out. I’m gonna take two tables of eight, I’m gonna add your parents, and I’m gonna turn them into three tables of six. Okay? And I called the caterer; I added two extra meals, we are good to go!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, they’re not coming.

Name: monica
Lines: What?!

Name: joey
Lines: Somehow they got the idea that you only invited them because of me. They…feel a little unwanted.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh that’s too bad. It’s true, but too bad.

Name: joey
Lines: Look Mon, if you could just call my mom…

Name: monica
Lines: Oh Joey!

Name: joey
Lines: Come on! Look just-just tell—let her know that you really want them to be there. Let’s not forget, this is a woman that has sent you many lasagnas over the years.

Name: monica
Lines: No she hasn’t.

Name: joey
Lines: Is it her fault that some of them didn’t make it to you?

Name: monica
Lines: Well, what am I going to say?

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t know. Just uh, just tell ‘em it was a mix-up with the invitations, or—No-no-no! Blame it on the post office. They hate the post office. And the Irish! But I don’t think you can blame it on them so…

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh. Oh, that’s great!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Of course! Yeah, I was uh, umm Thigh Mega Tampon.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah! Y’know, we were really huge too, but then they had to shut us down when Regina Philange died of alcohol poisoning.

Name: rachel
Lines: Anyway, speaking of drinking too much. I was uh, tellin’ Phoebe about that one crazy night after the Sigma Chi luau where you and I uh, we made out.

Name: rachel
Lines: Remember?! We—come on both had the sarongs on, and we had the-the coconut bikini tops…

Name: rachel
Lines: …we went back the house and we got really silly and we…we made out.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Really?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Ross is Batman!

Name: monica
Lines: Well, he did manage to keep his identity secret for a long time.

Name: chandler
Lines: Rachel got Ross the tuxedo that Val Kilmer wore in Batman. Okay Batman is so much cooler than James Bond!

Lines: Oh damn!

Name: ross
Lines: Yes. Yes. Don’t worry. Everything’s fine. We’ll uh, we’ll see you tomorrow at the wedding.

Name: ross
Lines: Well then we’ll-we’ll see you the day after tomorrow.  What-what…what you guys doing here?!

Name: ross
Lines: Why?!

Name: ross
Lines: Gunther?!

Name: ross
Lines: What? Your-your list?

Name: ross
Lines: Yes! No-no! I know, I know what the list is! Mom! Look if you see Chandler, could you just let him know I’m looking for him?

Name: joey
Lines: What picture?!

Name: joey
Lines: You went through my personal property?

Name: joey
Lines: For two years!

Name: joey
Lines: Great scene yeah?

Name: joey
Lines: Thanks a lot.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, I’m-I’m not working tomorrow.

Name: joey
Lines: No! No! I can’t! You gotta get me out of it! I’ve got plans!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross said there’s still no word from Chandler.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh man.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh but he did say that they found the grandmother wandering down fifth avenue.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay. Well there’s one down.

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: phoebe
Lines: Y’know she might not even notice he’s gone.

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: God! Don’t—We can’t let her start getting ready! This is too awful! Oh God, but wait she’ll be in the gown and then he won’t show up and then she’s gonna have to take off the gown…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Shhh! Stop it! Stop it Rachel! You can’t do this here!

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m sorry. I’m sorry. It’s just…It’s just so sad!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, but you’ve got to pull yourself together! Monica can’t see you like this! Then she’ll know something’s wrong!

Name: rachel
Lines: I know. I know. Oh God.  There’s no tissue! Can you grab me some toilet paper?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah.  Oh, that’s gone too. This is Monica’s bathroom right?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No-no! I-I…I found one.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh thank you!  Can I have another one?

Name: phoebe
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh God I just can not imagine what is gonna happen if Chandler doesn’t show up!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh here’s a whole bunch.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, I mean she’s gonna be at the wedding waiting for him and people will be whispering, \Oh that poor girl.\" Y’know? Then she’ll have to come back here and live all alone."

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: phoebe
Lines: There was a pregnancy test in the garbage, and it’s positive. Monica’s pregnant.  So I guess she won’t be totally alone.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I know! Monica’s gonna have a baby! Hey, can this count as her something new?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey, do you think this is why Chandler took off?

Name: rachel
Lines: No, she had to have just taken that test because I took out the trash last night.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh God, this is turning into the worst wedding day ever! The bride is pregnant. The groom is missing. And I’m still holding this.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay Phoebe, we can not tell anyone about this.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Right.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, okay. Hey, wait. Do you know what kind of birth control she was using?

Name: rachel
Lines: No. Why?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Just for the future, this is hardly a commercial for it.

Name: rachel
Lines: Anything?

Name: ross
Lines: No! I talked to Joey on the set, he hasn’t heard from him. I-I-I talked to Chandler’s parents again!

Name: phoebe
Lines: You told them he was missing?

Name: ross
Lines: No! I made it seem like I was just calling to chat. Pretty sure, they both think I’m interested in them.

Name: rachel
Lines: All right, we’ve got to tell her he’s gone.

Name: ross
Lines: No! Hey! Hey! We can’t!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross, she’s gonna start getting ready soon!

Name: ross
Lines: Well, can’t you at least stall her a little? I’ll-I’ll go back to some of the places I went last night.

Name: rachel
Lines: All right, well how much time do you need?

Name: ross
Lines: Well how much time before she absolutely has to start getting ready?

Name: rachel
Lines: One hour.

Name: ross
Lines: Give me two.

Name: rachel
Lines: Then why do you ask?!

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, wish me luck.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay. I’m going with you.

Name: ross
Lines: Why?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ross, you’re tired. You’ve been looking all night. And clearly you suck at this.

Name: rachel
Lines: All right, I’ll see you guys later.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay. Wait, do you know how you’re going to stall her?

Name: rachel
Lines: I’ll figure something out.

Name: phoebe
Lines: All right. Good luck.

Name: rachel
Lines: Thanks.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey! Okay, so I thought we’d start with my make up and then do my hair.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay uh, but before you do that. I-I, I need you to talk to me.

Name: monica
Lines: About what?

Name: rachel
Lines: Umm… I’m never gonna getting married!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah you will! The right guy is just around the corner! Okay, are we done with that?

Name: rachel
Lines: No Monica! I’m serious! Oh, maybe I should just forget about it. Become a lesbian or something.

Name: monica
Lines: Any woman would be lucky to have ya.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well maybe it would make me feel better if I slept with Joey.

Name: monica
Lines: Rachel! You okay?

Name: joey
Lines: Excuse me, Aaron?  Hi! Umm, I have a little problem with the schedules. Originally, I wasn’t supposed to work today, and I have this wedding that I really have to be at. It’s my best friend’s, and I’m officiating so I really can’t work past four.

Name: joey
Lines: I’m having surgery!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, I-I just made up the stuff about the wedding because I didn’t want you to worry about me. But, I’m having surgery today.

Name: joey
Lines: Transplant.

Name: joey
Lines: Hair transplant.

Name: joey
Lines: It’s not on my head.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! You’re here! Great! Great! Great! Let’s get going buddy, we’ve got a scene to shoot!

Name: joey
Lines: Are you drunk?

Name: joey
Lines: Yes you are!

Name: ross
Lines: We are never gonna find him! He’s one guy in a huge city!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God! Is that him?

Name: ross
Lines: That is an old, Chinese woman!

Name: phoebe
Lines: He could be in disguise, y’know.

Name: ross
Lines: Aw, y’know…Y’know, maybe we’re-we’re just approaching this all wrong. If you’re Chandler and-and you wanna hide, where is the last place on Earth people would think you’d go?

Name: ross
Lines: So this is your office?

Name: chandler
Lines: How did you guys find me? I knew I should’ve hid at the gym!

Name: phoebe
Lines: What the hell are you doing?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Panicking! And using the Internet to try to prove that I’m related to Monica. How is she?

Name: ross
Lines: She’s fine. She doesn’t know you’re gone. And she doesn’t have to know, okay? Now come on, we’re going home.

Name: chandler
Lines: No! No! No! I can’t do that!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Why not?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Because if I go home, we’re gonna become the Bings! I can’t be the Bings!

Name: ross
Lines: What’s wrong with being the Bings?

Name: chandler
Lines: The Bings have horrible marriages! They yell. They fight. And they use the pool boy as a pawn in their sexual games!

Name: ross
Lines: Chandler, have you ever put on a black cocktail dress and asked me up to your hotel room?

Name: chandler
Lines: No.

Name: ross
Lines: Then you are neither of your parents!

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s not just their marriage! I mean, look at yours. Look at everybody’s! The only person that can make marriage work is Paul Newman! And I’ve met me; I am not Paul Newman. I don’t race cars! I don’t make popcorn! None of my proceeds go to charity.

Name: phoebe
Lines: But look Chandler, right now, no one has a lower opinion of you than I do. But I totally believe you can do this.

Name: chandler
Lines: I want to. I love her so much, but I’m afr…It’s too huge.

Name: ross
Lines: Y’know, okay. You’re right. It is huge. So why don’t we take it just a little bit at a time? Okay? Umm, forget getting married for a sec; just forget about it. Can you just come home and take a shower?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well yeah, but then…

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah—No-but-but-but-but! We’re just gonna go home and take a shower. Now, that’s not scary right?

Name: chandler
Lines: Depends on what you mean by we.

Name: rachel
Lines: The nights are the hardest.  But then the day comes! And that’s every bit as hard as the night. And then the night comes again…

Name: monica
Lines: The days and nights are hard! I get it! Okay? Look umm, Rachel I’m sorry! I have to start getting ready! I’m getting married today!

Name: rachel
Lines: I know. At dusk. That’s such a hard time for me.

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. But wait!

Name: monica
Lines: What?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Let’s go to lunch.

Name: monica
Lines: I can’t go to lunch!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Right.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh good God! I’ve fallen down!

Name: monica
Lines: What’s going on?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. All right.  Honey listen. When I tell you what I’m about to tell you, I need you to remember that we are all here for you and that we love you.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, you’re-you’re really freaking me out.

Name: rachel
Lines: We can’t find Chandler…—‘s vest. We can’t find Chandler’s vest.

Name: monica
Lines: How can that be?! Oh wait! Wait! Are you, are you serious?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Found the vest! I mean we’re gonna have to keep an eye on it, y’know make sure we don’t lose it again…

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh wow! Okay. Don’t scare me like that okay? I mean for a minute there I was like, \Oh my God! The worst has happened!\"

Name: joey
Lines: I would sooner die in this hellhole then see her back with you!

Name: joey
Lines: What?! He got me! Owwwwww!!!

Name: joey
Lines: Look, my best friends are getting married in like an hour. Okay? And I’m the minister. Please! Please! Can you pull it together?

Name: joey
Lines: Thank you. Thank you.

Name: joey
Lines: I would sooner die in this hellhole then see her back with you!

Name: phoebe
Lines: So-so you two were married huh? What happened? You just drift apart?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God Monica!

Name: monica
Lines: I wanna wear this everyday.

Name: rachel
Lines: You look so beautiful.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m so happy for me.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, we got him back. Everything’s fine.

Name: joey

Name: joey

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey! The wedding is in less than an hour!

Name: joey
Lines: I know! I’m sorry! The guy’s drunk, they won’t let me go until we get this.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! I’m gonna have to find another minister.

Name: joey
Lines: No! No, I’m the minister! All right, look-look, put ‘em both on the phone, I’ll marry them right now.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ugh! Joey, I have to go.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! Don’t you hang up on me! I’ll marry you and me right now! I have the power!

Name: chandler
Lines: No.

Name: ross
Lines: I’m telling you, just a little bit at a time.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah okay. Well, what’s the next little bit?

Name: ross
Lines: Getting married.  Okay. Okay. You can, you can do that too! Just like you’ve done everything else!

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah. You’re right. Hey I-I can do that.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, excuse me for a minute.

Name: ross
Lines: Wh—Hey—Whoa-whoa, where, where you going?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Ross, I am not gonna run away again! I just want to get a little fresh air.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh fresh air!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wait! Maybe, maybe you’re overreacting! You do that y’know.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well Phoebe, we gotta do something!  Well, y’know. I mean there’s no way Joey’s gonna make it in time. So I’m gonna through the hotel and see if there’s any other weddings going on.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay. Oh but don’t tell them Monica’s pregnant because, they frown on that.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Anastassakis/Papasifakis wedding, excellent! {It’s a good thing Jennifer Aniston is Greek, because she had to pronounce those names. Luckily for me, they were written on a sign.} Listen umm, I need you to perform another wedding. Can you do that?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah! Yeah. They’re…they’re-they’re my friends, uh, Monica Stephanopolus and uh, and Chandler Acidofolus.

Lines: Hi!  Hi. Has umm, anyone seen Chandler?

Name: ross

Name: ross
Lines: Chandler’s gone again!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God! Why would you play hide and seek with someone you know is a flight risk?!

Name: joey
Lines: Aaron! You gotta let me go. The guy’s hammered!

Name: joey
Lines: So I uh, I just talked to the director. That’s it, we’re done for the day.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah! You…you were wonderful.

Name: joey
Lines: So I got your car, it’s right outside.

Name: joey
Lines: That’s what you told me.

Name: joey
Lines: No-no-no! We gotta go! Come on!  Here we go.

Name: ross
Lines: There he is!!

Name: chandler

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey! Oh!

Name: ross
Lines: You’re not getting away this time mister! Unless you want that ass kicking we talked about!

Name: chandler
Lines: Ross!

Name: ross
Lines: Hiiii-Ya!!  I’m serious! You’re not walking out on my sister!

Name: chandler
Lines: That’s right! I’m not!

Name: ross
Lines: Then where the hell have you been?!

Name: chandler
Lines: I know about Monica.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You know?!

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I heard you and Rachel talking.

Name: ross

Name: chandler
Lines: You don’t know?

Name: ross
Lines: Know what—If somebody doesn’t tell me what’s going on right now…

Name: phoebe
Lines: What? You’ll hi-ya?

Name: chandler
Lines: Monica’s pregnant.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh my God. Oh my God! And you’re-you’re…you’re not freaking out?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well I was! Then I went down to the gift shop because I was out of cigarettes…

Name: chandler
Lines: Big picture please! So I was in the gift shop, and that’s when I uh, saw this.  Yeah, y’know what? I thought anything that can fit into this, can’t be scary.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well you obviously didn’t see Chucky 3.

Name: chandler
Lines: But come on, look at how cute and small this is! So I got it to give Monica so she’d know I was okay.

Name: ross
Lines: Dude.

Name: chandler
Lines: You look beautiful mom.

Name: chandler
Lines: Are you Joey?

Name: ross
Lines: Huh. This is nice.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: I’ve never walked down the aisle knowing it can’t end in divorce.

Name: monica
Lines: She’s right there.

Name: chandler
Lines: You look beautiful. Is this new?

Name: monica
Lines: Not now.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Who is this?

Name: chandler
Lines: He’s Greek Orthodox.

Name: rachel
Lines: As are you…

Name: joey
Lines: We are gathered here today, to join this man and this woman in the bonds of holy matrimony. I’ve known Monica and Chandler for a long time, and I can not imagine two people more perfect for each other. And now, as I’ve left my notes in my dressing room. We shall proceed to the vows. Monica?

Name: monica
Lines: He took off?

Name: rachel
Lines: Go on! Go on.

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler, for so long I…I wondered if I would ever find my prince, my soul mate. Then three years ago, at another wedding I turned to a friend for comfort. And in stead, I found everything that I’d ever been looking for my whole life. And now…here we are…with our future before us…and I only want to spend it with you, my prince, my soul mate, my friend. Unless you don’t want to. You go!

Name: joey
Lines: Chandler?

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Name: joey
Lines: You may not kiss the bride. So, I guess by the powers vested in my by the state of New York and the Internet guys, I now pronounce you husband and wife. Oh wait! Do you take each other?

Lines: I do.

Lines: I do.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah you do!

Lines: Rings?

Name: joey
Lines: Aw crap! Okay—uh…uh let’s-let’s do the rings.

Name: joey
Lines: We good? Yeah? Good? Once again, I pronounce you husband and wife.  Now kiss her again.

Lines: I love you. And I know about the baby.

Lines: Our baby.

Lines: We have a baby?

Lines: Uh-huh.

Lines: Oh uh-uh, no-no-no-no-uh-uh.

Lines: Ha-ha. Look—Come on, I don’t know what to do…or say.

Lines: Ha-ha-ha, very funny. Look, I don’t know what to do!

Lines: ‘Xcusa seniora, voulez-bere quakay—[Beep]—uck it!

Lines: When you were little you slept through-through the Grand Canyon.

Lines: Sorry, let’s go back! ‘Cause you’ve got more to say.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey Rach!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh yeah? Then how come I keep—

Lines: It was so wild! We told ‘em we were the Gunderson’s in 16…

Lines: Oh-ooh, and I brought Operation, but umm I lost the umm…  It’s making a noise.

Name: joey
Lines: Pheebs!

Lines: Ooh, Soap Opera Digest!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh! Ooh-ooh!

Name: monica
Lines: What are you doing?!

Name: joey
Lines: You’re still a tiny bit on fire there.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh geez! Okay! Thanks!

Lines: Well, it was good to see you too. Did you come down here to tell me that?

Name: chandler
Lines: What the fu——ck are you doing?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. Okay, see now the one with the feather boa? That’s Dr. Francis. She used to be a man. Oh look! There—

Name: rachel

Name: rachel
Lines: No-no Ph-Ph-Ph-Ph…

Lines: Mornin’

Lines: I mean what kind of an actor, what kind of an actor can’t even say, \Hmm

Name: ross
Lines: I think, subconsciously…

Lines: Nope, you lost me.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, the next situation is for Rachel. The wedding is about to start you walk into the back room and you find Monica taking a nap with Ross.

Lines: No! No! No!

Lines: Okay. Now—What is my first line?

Name: ross
Lines: Hi! We’re visiting!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yay!

Lines: You’re still a tiny bit on fire there!
