Lines: We found your test in the trash, if you’re not pregnant——It’s because I am.

Name: chandler
Lines: What?! What are you talking about?

Name: monica
Lines: What are you talking about?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes, I…I am with child.  And I didn’t want to say anything because it’s your day; I didn’t want to steal your thunder.

Name: monica
Lines: Wait a minute! So you told people I was pregnant?!  Does this look like a conversation that I want to remember?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Who’s the father?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can’t say.

Name: monica
Lines: Why?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Why not?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can’t say because he’s famous.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God, who is it?!

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe, come on, you have to tell us.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, okay. It’s James Brolin. James Brolin is the father of my baby.

Name: chandler
Lines: As in Barbara Streisand’s husband James Brolin?

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?! Well he never said that to me!

Name: phoebe
Lines: How about just the bridemaids?

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know I am the groom right? I was told it was kinda big deal.

Name: phoebe
Lines: It is.

Name: rachel
Lines: For you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, thank you for doing that. I just can’t deal with this just quite yet.

Name: phoebe
Lines: So instead you told me Monica was pregnant.

Name: rachel
Lines: You said that she was, I just didn’t disagree with you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Sneaky.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh!  Oh by the way?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-hmm.

Name: rachel
Lines: James Brolin?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, I know. I could only think of two names, him and Ed Begley Jr. and then I remembered he’s gay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ed Begley Jr. is not gay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Really?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Before we go out there I’ve got a present for ya.

Name: monica
Lines: Honey, I’m going to put my hand in your pocket!

Name: chandler
Lines: No?

Name: monica
Lines: No.

Name: chandler
Lines: I’ve been taking dancing lessons.

Name: monica
Lines: What?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, the last six weeks. I wanted this to be a moment you will never forget.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh that is so sweet!

Name: chandler
Lines: So? Would you care to join me in our first dance as husband and wife?

Name: monica
Lines: Yes.

Name: monica
Lines: What’s the matter?

Name: chandler
Lines: I don’t know, it’s these new shoes, they’re all slippery.

Name: monica
Lines: Well, are you going to be able to do this?

Name: chandler
Lines: Not well.

Name: monica
Lines: Well, the good news is, I don’t think anyone’s looking at us.

Name: phoebe
Lines: So, are you ready to talk about it?

Name: rachel
Lines: No.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Now?

Name: rachel
Lines: No!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, we’ll talk about something else then.

Name: rachel
Lines: Thank you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Who’s the father?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ugh! Look honey y’know what? I haven’t told him yet, so until I do I don’t think I should tell anybody else.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah. That’s fine. That’s fair. Is it Tag?

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, I’m sorry. I’ll stop.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Is it Ross? It’s Ross isn’t it—Oh my God, it’s Joey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Honey, stop it! I am not going to tell you until I tell him.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ah-hah! At least we know it’s a him.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh sweet Lord.

Name: joey
Lines: I’m sorry! Okay? I went down to the gift shop and it’s either this or a bathrobe! Look, what’s more important, the way I’m dressed or me being with you on your special day?

Name: monica
Lines: Honey, I’m not even going to pretend I was listening.

Name: ross
Lines: Hi. I’m uh, I’m Ross. I don’t, I don’t believe we’ve met. I’m Monica’s older brother.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh! Hello uh, Mona from her restaurant.  Mona, wow what a, what a beautiful name.

Name: ross
Lines: Aw come on, Mona Lisa?

Name: ross
Lines: Mona umm…Clickclocken. The famous botanist? Huh? Oh no she’s uh—well she’s dead now. No, supposedly she was once quite the hottie of the plant world.

Name: ross
Lines: Linda Clickclocken.  Oh, uh me too.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh guess what, Molly Gilbert you’ve just been bumped up to table one. And if it’s all right with you I’m gonna take your place at table six—Martin Clickclocken.

Name: joey
Lines: That’s better, now just bend your arms a little more. There you go. Okay, look straight ahead. Now this time I want you to really put your ass into it.

Name: chandler
Lines: Thank you.

Name: chandler
Lines: Bravo Dennis thanks for pleasing my mother so.

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t believe we’ve met, Joey Tribbiani.

Name: joey
Lines: Wow, I’ve admired your work for years. You-you’ve done some really amazing stuff.

Name: joey
Lines: Wow Dennis Phillips! That’s great! How did you guys meet?

Name: ross
Lines: Hey! Uh, I thought, I thought you were at table six.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh see, before you uh, when you showed it to me you-you held it that way  Hello.

Name: joey
Lines: Chandler. Will you see if your mom can give my resume to Dennis Phillips? ‘Cause if I can get in a Broadway show then I would’ve done it all, film, television, and theater. The only think left would be radio, and that’s just for ugly people.

Name: chandler
Lines: What size shoes do you wear?

Name: joey
Lines: Uh, eleven, eleven and a half.

Name: chandler
Lines: Great, because my shoes are giving me a little problem on the dance floor, can I borrow the boots from your costume?

Name: joey
Lines: Uh, I don’t even really know where I left those. Sorry.

Name: chandler
Lines: Those aren’t eleven and a half.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay fine! I’m a seven! All right, I have surprisingly small feet. But the rest of me is good, I’ll show ya!

Name: monica
Lines: Can you believe Phoebe got pregnant?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh y’know what honey? Let’s not talk about that right now?

Name: monica
Lines: This is so huge.

Name: rachel
Lines: Sure, but come on, as big as your wedding?

Name: monica
Lines: Of course not nothing is. Between me and you…

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: …in this day and age how dumb do you have to be to get pregnant?

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey! Y’know, sometimes you can do everything right, everyone can wear everything they’re supposed to wear, and one of those little guys just gets through!

Name: monica
Lines: How?

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t know! Maybe they have tools.

Name: monica
Lines: Well I-I talked to and uh, she’s definitely going to have this baby. Y’know, she said she was gonna raise it on her own.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, maybe that’s, maybe that’s really brave.

Name: monica
Lines: Maybe. I just hope she realizes how hard it’s gonna be.

Name: rachel
Lines: Maybe she hasn’t really thought it through that well.

Name: monica
Lines: Well, there’s a lot to think about. I mean, how is she, how is she going to handle this financially? How is she going to juggle work? Does she realize she’s not going to have a date again for the next eighteen years?

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t know.

Name: monica
Lines: Are you okay?

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh-hmm. I’m just thinking about Phoebe; poor knocked up Phoebe.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh yes! Thank you very much!  Oh that’s-that’s actually how the French drink it.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, I just got off the phone with my lover, James Brolin…

Name: monica
Lines: Oh really?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes, and apparently he is married to some singer, but he said he would leave her for me. And I said, \James

Name: monica
Lines: Rachel’s really the one who’s pregnant.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Why bother?

Name: monica
Lines: How do you feel?

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t know. I don’t know how I feel. This is all happening so fast. I have to make all these decisions that I don’t want to make.  Somebody just take this away from me!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Calm down. Maybe you’re not pregnant.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: When I got pregnant with the triplets, I took that test like three times just to make sure.

Name: monica
Lines: Yes! Maybe it’s a false positive. Are you sure you peed on the stick right?

Name: rachel
Lines: How many ways are there to do that?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I’m-I’m just saying, don’t freak out until you’re a hundred percent sure.

Name: rachel
Lines: All right, I’ll-I’ll take it again when I get home.

Name: monica
Lines: You-you gotta take it now. Come on, do it as a present to me.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. Thank you.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I’ll run out and get you one.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, you guys are so great.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, wait a minute! Who’s is the father?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh no, she won’t tell us.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, come on it’s my wedding! That can be my present.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wh—Hey, I just gave you peeing on a stick.

Name: phoebe
Lines: See? This is why you register.

Name: ross
Lines: It was the chair again! Okay? I’m not doing it! It what—look, I don’t—y’know what—eh-eh…  Hi.

Name: ross
Lines: Umm, would you like to dance?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh great!

Name: ross
Lines: I wasn’t farting!  Yes?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh umm, well uh, maybe-maybe later. Right now, I’m about to dance with this lady.

Name: ross
Lines: Uh, unless! Unless, uh this lady wouldn’t mind letting you go first.

Name: ross
Lines: Yes I-I am. In fact umm hey, why don’t we try it my special way? You can dance on my feet.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah? Hop on.  Is the pretty lady looking?

Name: ross
Lines: Keep dancing.

Name: chandler
Lines: And the world will never know.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! Did you talk to Dennis about me yet?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes, I told him how talented you were. I told him all about Days Of Our Lives.

Name: joey
Lines: No-no! No! No! You don’t tell a Broadway guy that! Now he just thinks I’m a soap actor.

Name: chandler
Lines: But you’re not just a soap actor. You are a soap actor with freakishly tiny feet.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: ross
Lines: No-no, thank you Miranda.

Name: ross
Lines: All right.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh-oh, were you, were you watching?

Name: ross
Lines: What? Of course you can! Hop on!

Name: ross
Lines: I am so gonna score.

Name: ross
Lines: I like your bow.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh! To the happy couple!

Name: ross
Lines: That was very nice Ashley.

Name: ross
Lines: No-no.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, you-you sure?  Okay. So what’s uh, what’s your name.

Name: ross
Lines: That’s, that’s pretty.  Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! What are you doing there Gert?

Name: ross
Lines: Okay.

Name: ross
Lines: I’m trying.

Name: ross
Lines: Maybe I should stand on your feet!

Name: joey
Lines: So did you uh, happen to catch my toast up there?

Name: joey
Lines: Well, I’d like to think there was something for everyone. Look, I know you’re casting for this new show…

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, see that’s where you’re wrong. Whatever it is I can do it. And if didn’t see it up there, just-just try me.

Name: joey
Lines: Well I’m not proud of this, but…

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, are you ready to get back on the dance floor?

Name: chandler
Lines: Did it turn into sand?

Name: monica
Lines: Ohh come on, I love this song! Come on, you’ll be fine.

Name: chandler
Lines: No. No, I won’t. Do you know why I took all those lessons? See, for the first time I didn’t want you to be embarrassed to be seen on the dance floor with some clumsy idiot.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh sweetie, you can never embarrass me.  There you go.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why?

Name: rachel
Lines: How much longer?

Name: phoebe
Lines: 30 seconds.

Name: rachel
Lines: 30 seconds, okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Rachel, I-I want you to know that, if it’s positive, we’re gonna…

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh I know. I know.

Name: phoebe
Lines: It’s time.

Name: monica
Lines: Go ahead Rach.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh wait! Y’know what? I can’t, I can’t look at it. I can’t. Somebody else tell me, somebody tell me.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Umm, it’s negative.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: phoebe
Lines: It’s negative.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh. Oh. Well there you go. Whew!  God.

Name: monica
Lines: Well… Well, great.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Here.

Name: rachel
Lines: Thanks.  How could I be upset over something I never had? It’s negative?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, it’s positive.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: It’s-it’s not negative, it’s positive.

Name: rachel
Lines: Are you sure?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well yeah, I lied before.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh God…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Now you know how you really feel about it.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh-oh, that’s a risky little game!

Name: monica
Lines: Are you really gonna do this?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah. I’m gonna have a baby. I’m gonna have a baby. I’m gonna have a baby!

Name: phoebe
Lines: With who?

Name: rachel
Lines: Ah, it’s still not the time.

Name: ross
Lines: I just didn’t see the fast song coming.

Name: joey
Lines: Shh. Shh. Don’t try to talk, we’ll get you up to your room, we’ll soak your feet, you’ll be okay.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, thank you.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: joey
Lines: Tell me about it, I feel like I’m holding down the fort all by myself.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: Wait a minute! No! I’m the nice one! I’m the one who danced with the kids all night! How…How small are your feet?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Listen y’know what sir? For the last time, I don’t care what the computer says, we did not take a bag of Mashuga nuts from the mini-bar and we did not watch Dr. Do-Me-A-Little!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh! Joey uh, were you in our room last night?

Name: joey
Lines: No.  I was told the name of the movie would not appear on the bill!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hi! We’re checking out of the bridal suite.

Name: monica
Lines: That’s right. I’m no longer a bride. I’ll never be a bride again. Now, I’m just someone’s wife!

Name: chandler
Lines: And I’m the happiest guy in the world!  Oh honey, come on don’t be upset. We still have so much to look forward to!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh yeah, right.

Name: chandler
Lines: We got the honeymoon.

Name: monica
Lines: That’s not ‘til Thursday.

Name: chandler
Lines: The wedding pictures?

Name: monica
Lines: They won’t be ready for weeks.

Name: chandler
Lines: Not the disposable cameras from the tables.

Name: monica
Lines: That’s true!  I knew I married you for a reason!

Name: chandler
Lines: I’ll tell you what, I will go get them developed and you can go home.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: What? What did you take a picture of?

Name: joey
Lines: Nothing! It was something.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay Ross has the cameras, has he checked out yet?

Name: rachel
Lines: Are you joking? Check out is not ‘til noon and he has a good  eleven minutes left.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh.

Name: monica
Lines: Ross has never checked out of a room a minute before he had to.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, one time, when we were dating, uh we got a late checkout, he got so excited it was the best sex we ever had. Until y’know, he screamed out Radisson at the end.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, well I’m gonna get Ross, get the cameras, and get them developed.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh thanks.  Champagne, strawberries…Oh my God! I can’t believe Chandler ordered porn on our wedding night!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, that’s sad. Mashuga nut?

Name: ross
Lines: Hi.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey.  Soaps? Shampoos? Are you really taking all this stuff?

Name: ross
Lines: Why not? It’s built into the price of the room.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah but you don’t need——What is this?

Name: ross
Lines: Thread!

Name: chandler
Lines: Score! Where are the disposable cameras?

Name: ross
Lines: What disposable cameras?

Name: chandler
Lines: The cameras? Remember last night I told you to take them?

Name: ross
Lines: No you didn’t.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes! Remember? Right before we cut the cake, I went up to you and I said…

Name: ross
Lines: Oh-oh yeah, you-you came up to me and asked if I could do you a favor, and my Uncle Murray came up to you and handed you a check. And then you said, \Why do they call it a check? Why not a Yugoslavian?\"  Yeah

Name: chandler
Lines: So you don’t have the cameras?!

Name: ross
Lines: No. Sorry man.

Name: chandler
Lines: So? What? What? They’re gone! Monica’s gonna freak!

Name: ross
Lines: Well, I’m sure they’re still somewhere here in the hotel. I’ll-I’ll help you look for them.

Name: chandler
Lines: Great.

Name: ross
Lines: In-in three minutes.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Are you gonna open the presents without Chandler?

Name: monica
Lines: No!  even crawled up into my lap. Oh come on, Chandler wouldn’t mind if I opened just one present! What do you think it is?

Name: phoebe
Lines: A little mirror that when you look into it you see yourself as an old woman.

Name: monica
Lines: A tiny salt shaker!!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ohhh! My God! For tiny salt!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh wow! Okay. Well that was fun.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh yeah.

Name: monica
Lines: Good. Okay, I’m just gonna wait for Chandler to open the rest of them.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Whew. Although y’know, this is part of a salt and pepper set. I mean… I guess y’know it may just count as a half a present. What do you think?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well I guess it’s okay to open one more if it’s part of a set. Y’know, it’s probably this one.

Name: monica
Lines: Or this one!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, how are you feelin’? Any morning sickness?

Name: rachel
Lines: Shh-shh-shh! The guys don’t know yet do they?

Name: monica
Lines: No! Joey and Ross don’t know anything and Chandler still thinks that Phoebe’s pregnant.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah that’s right Chandler does still think I’m pregnant. He hasn’t asked me how I’m feeling or offered to carry my bags. Boy, I feel bad for the woman who ends up with him.  After you of course.

Name: rachel
Lines: Don’t worry I promise that you will only have to be pregnant for a few more hours, ‘cause I’m going to tell the father today.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ooh, is it someone in this building? Is it that tall guy from the first floor?

Name: rachel
Lines: Ew! No!

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?! I think he’s cute.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well then you have his baby.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Believe me I’m trying.

Name: monica
Lines: Wow. Y’know it is so weird. I mean, you’re gonna tell this guy today and he has no idea what’s gonna happen.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah. You’re just gonna knock on his door and change his life forever. You’re like Ed McMahon except without the big check, or the raw sexual magnetism.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah. Uh-huh, I guess it is pretty big news.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Pretty big? It’s huge! God, this guy doesn’t have a clue! He’s just walking down the street thinking, ‘I had sex with Rachel Green. I rock!’ then bam! He’s a father and everything’s different.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well it’s only different if he wants it to be. I mean, I’m not gonna ask him for anything.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay. Then he still has this huge decision to make. Now he’s walking around thinking, ‘Do I want to be a dad?’ and then bam!

Name: monica
Lines: What was that bam?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I don’t. He got…he-he-he-he’s hit by a bus.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey Joey, what would you do if someone that you slept with told you that she was pregnant?

Name: joey
Lines: I shoulda never walked into that Sunglass Hut!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh Joey! Joey! No, it’s not you! You didn’t get anybody pregnant!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh. Why would you scare me like that? What the hell is going on?  Is somebody pregnant?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh yeah. That’s me.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh my God Pheebs! You’re gonna have a baby?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes. Yes I am. Oh my God, I’m gonna have a baby!

Name: joey
Lines: Whoa, wait a minute. Who’s the father?

Name: phoebe
Lines: You don’t know him. It’s not important. He wants nothing to do with me or the baby.

Name: joey
Lines: Well who is this guy?! Huh? Who is he? ‘Cause I will track him down and kick his ass!

Name: phoebe
Lines: David Lynn.

Name: joey
Lines: David Lynn! David Lynn! David Lynn!!

Name: monica
Lines: Who’s David Lynn?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh some guy from my gym. A little annoying.

Name: ross
Lines: Chandler?

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey! Did you find the cameras?

Name: ross
Lines: No. Did you?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes! And that’s why I’m under the table. Celebrating.

Name: ross
Lines: Well I checked in the uh, lost and found, I talked to the manager, no-one’s turned them.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well this is great. Y’know, those cameras were the only thing that was gonna cheer Monica up today, she’s really depressed.

Name: ross
Lines: Now you guys just got married, why is she so depressed?

Name: chandler
Lines: All my energy is going into not asking that question. I can’t believe I screwed this up!

Name: ross
Lines: I’m sorry man.  Here’s a thought. This is the same ballroom. There’s a band. There’s gonna be plenty of dressed up people.

Name: chandler
Lines: Are you suggesting we dance our troubles away?

Name: ross
Lines: No-no-no, I’m saying we-we buy more of this  at the gift shop, throw our tuxes back on, and take a few pictures. All we have to do is make sure not to get anybody else’s faces.

Name: chandler
Lines: Are you serious?

Name: ross
Lines: I’m just thinking about your new bride at home. Okay? Do-do you really want to start your life together by letting her down?

Name: chandler
Lines: Marriage advice? Really?!

Name: ross
Lines: I’m telling you, this looks exactly like your wedding! Aren’t these the same flowers?

Name: chandler
Lines: I don’t know, Monica picked out the flowers.

Name: ross
Lines: What about the chairs?

Name: chandler
Lines: She picked those out too.

Name: ross
Lines: How about the place settings?

Name: chandler
Lines: That was her.

Name: ross
Lines: What did you do?

Name: chandler
Lines: I was in charge of the cameras! Gift shop?

Name: ross
Lines: Hmm.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey! Ooh, did you do it yet?

Name: rachel
Lines: Not yet.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, well what are you doing here? Are you about to do it?  Is it Gunther?

Name: rachel
Lines: No! Phoebe, it’s not Gunther.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Thank God, ‘cause that hair on a baby…

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe the father is not here okay? I haven’t told him yet and I don’t think I can tell him at all now!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Why not?

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t know, let me think. I was walking down the street thinking, ‘I’m gonna tell the father today’ and then bam!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Bus?

Name: rachel
Lines: No, you! Phoebe you freaked me out. You kept saying how huge this all is!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well-well but it is huge.

Name: rachel
Lines: I know, but I was just thinking about how huge this is for me. I didn’t even go to how huge this was going to be for the father.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You’re thinking about this way too much. Just tell him and get it over with. It’s like, it’s like ripping off this Band-Aid.  Oh mother of…See?

Name: joey
Lines: Ooh-ooh-ooh! Are we opening presents?

Name: monica
Lines: No! No! I shouldn’t have even opened these! I mean I—Joey I am out of control!! Joey, you have to do me a favor. No matter what I say, no matter what I do, please do not let me open another present! Okay?

Name: joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Give me one more.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh good, uh you’re here. Uh Pheebs? Listen uh sit down. I-I got something I want to say.

Name: phoebe
Lines: All right.

Name: joey
Lines: Umm, now uh… It’s a scary world out there, especially for a single mom. Y’know, now I always thought you and I had a special bond so…  Phoebe Buffay, will you marry me?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God! Joey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hell yeah! I’ll marry you!

Name: monica
Lines: You can’t marry him!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey lady, your day’s over! It’s my turn!

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe!

Name: joey
Lines: Why?! Why can’t she marry me?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can and I will!

Name: monica
Lines: She’s not pregnant. It’s Rachel. Rachel’s the one who’s pregnant.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh my God.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe I think he would notice if you didn’t have a baby in nine months!

Name: phoebe
Lines: It’s Joey!

Name: joey
Lines: Who’s the father?

Name: phoebe
Lines: We don’t know.

Name: joey
Lines: Ohh… I wonder if that dude.

Name: monica
Lines: There’s a dude?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Who? Who is it?

Name: joey
Lines: About a month ago this guy spent the night with Rachel, I didn’t see who it was but…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Was that story over?

Name: joey
Lines: The guy left this.

Name: phoebe
Lines: NA

Name: monica
Lines: People have got to finish their stories!

Name: chandler
Lines: Uh, excuse me? Could you take a picture of us?

Name: chandler
Lines: Uhh… Yeah sure.  Click!

Name: ross
Lines: I heard it. I heard it.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh yeah. I’ll take, I’ll take your picture.

Name: chandler
Lines: Who are you? Ansel Adams?! Get outta here!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Look, I feel really bad about how I freaked you out before, so I called the father and asked him to meet you here so you can tell him. Go!

Name: rachel
Lines: What? Hey wait a minute! Phoebe, how do you even know who the father is?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I may play the fool at times, but I’m a little more than a pretty blond girl with an ass that won’t quit.  I believe this belongs to the father of your baby.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh God… Oh, he’s in there right now?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh. Now you can turn around or you can go in there and rip the Band-Aid off. What to you want to do?

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh, let’s rip!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Really? Are you sure?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh Phoebe!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, sorry. Yeah.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why don’t you go up on stage. I’ll get a picture of you doing the speech.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay. Okay!

Name: ross
Lines: Will the owner of a 1995 Buick LeSabre please see the front desk? Your car is about to be towed.

Name: ross
Lines: A ’95 LeSabre?!

Name: ross
Lines: A green LeSabre?

Name: ross
Lines: I’m sorry, I meant a blue LeSabre.

Name: ross
Lines: Well go! Go move it!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, you ready for the last picture?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: chandler
Lines: Get ready to run.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Rachel has something that she wants to tell you and umm, I believe that this is your red sweater.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh no. Could I get anyone a coffee or…poison? No? Just for me? Okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Nothing! Phoebe kinda made a mistake. But y’know you do wear that sweater a lot, are you involved in some kind of dare?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, it’s just not the right time.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Tag…

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m having a baby.

Name: rachel
Lines: You can go.

Name: monica
Lines: I don’t know how any of these got opened?!

Name: joey
Lines: You opened them all?

Name: monica
Lines: I know! I know! I am a terrible person! I mean, Chandler is never going to trust me with anything ever again!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh hey! You got my parent’s gift!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah. What is that?

Name: joey
Lines: Well, I don’t know. I think it does something to salami.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey! How’d it go?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah. What-what did Tag say?

Name: rachel
Lines: Tag is not the father! And Joey knows now?

Name: joey
Lines: I do Rach. I do, and I so happy for you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh wow, you didn’t even try to unhook my bra!

Name: monica
Lines: So are you ever gonna tell whoever it is?

Name: rachel
Lines: No, I will. I’m just not up for it tonight.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey Rach listen, no matter what this guy says I want you to know you’re not gonna be alone in this.

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m not?

Name: joey
Lines: Listen I uh…  Rachel Green will you marry me?

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: monica
Lines: What?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?!!

Name: joey
Lines: Pheebs, give me the ring back!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No!!

Name: rachel
Lines: No! Joey, oh you’re so sweet. You’re so-so sweet, honey. But I’m not, I’m not looking for a husband.

Name: joey
Lines: I understand.

Name: rachel
Lines: Now, if you will excuse me I am going to go and lie down.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can’t say that didn’t hurt. But I’ll take you back Joey Tribbiani.

Name: joey
Lines: Uh yeah. Pheebs, listen about that. I only offered…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ooh! A Salami Buddy!

Name: joey
Lines: There you go!

Name: chandler
Lines: We’re back!

Name: monica
Lines: Great! We’re hangin’ in the kitchen!  Let’s stay in the kitchen!

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s picture time.

Name: ross
Lines: Now you are going to love these.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh-ho, that is a picture of our first kiss as a married couple.

Name: monica
Lines: Wow! That is a great picture!

Name: chandler
Lines: Eh?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah! Oh and interesting because I found the cameras in one of our bags!

Name: ross
Lines: Huh, didn’t see that coming.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, so this isn’t a picture of our first, but it is a picture of my first kiss with…with this lady. Which by the look on your face I’m sure you’ll remember. So we don’t need——There’s no need to have this picture. How about I take the real pictures and get them developed right now.

Name: monica
Lines: That would be a good idea.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.  You opened all the presents without me?! I thought we were supposed to do that together!

Name: monica
Lines: You kissed another woman!

Name: chandler
Lines: Call it even?!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay!

Name: ross
Lines: Well, I’m gonna go get these  in some water.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wait you stole those from these people’s wedding?

Name: ross
Lines: No-no, I took them from the hotel lobby. Yeah, they think they can charge me for some dirty movie and a bag of Mashuga nuts, they got another think coming.  Hey! My sweater! I’ve been looking for this for like a month!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey! How you doing?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh hey, right back at ya.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah. She—Well, she’s one crazy lady?

Name: ross
Lines: Umm, I don’t some Italian guy. Come on, read your own label. See you later.

Name: ross
Lines: He is so weird.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey! Babe! Aren’t you excited we’re going on our honeymoon?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah I am!

Name: chandler
Lines: Bermuda, Bahama, come on pretty mama…

Name: monica
Lines: That’s right. Get it out of your system while we’re alone.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah! Have a great honeymoon!

Name: chandler
Lines: I’d better go pack.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh no, I already packed. The only thing I couldn’t find though was your Speedo.

Name: chandler
Lines: A Speedo? Uh, I don’t have a Speedo. I’m gonna go pack my regular long bathing suit.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh good you’re still here!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: I want to tell you to have a good honeymoon!

Name: monica
Lines: Thank you.

Name: rachel
Lines: And I also wanted you guys to know that I am telling the father today.  What? What? What?

Name: joey
Lines: We know its Ross!

Name: rachel
Lines: How?! How do you know?

Name: phoebe
Lines: It was his sweater, but—Oh my God!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, I so wanted Ross to know first, but I’m so relieved you guys know.

Name: monica
Lines: This is so great! And I’m gonna be your baby’s aunt!

Name: rachel
Lines: I know!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Me too!

Name: joey
Lines: I’m gonna be an uncle! Come here!

Name: rachel
Lines: You’re all gonna be aunts and uncles.

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah, but I’m the only one related by blood.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. Great! So now that you guys all know you can help me. Give me some advice on how I’m gonna tell Ross!

Name: monica
Lines: Well, what were you gonna say?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well I was gonna tell him that I’m-I’m gonna have the baby and he can be as involved as he wants.

Name: joey
Lines: Well that, that sounds good.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah but how do I start? I mean, what’s-what’s the first thing that I say?

Name: monica
Lines: Hey! Good luck!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, bye.

Name: joey
Lines: Bye.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, what was that all about?

Name: monica
Lines: Well I guess there is no harm in telling you now, Rachel and Ross are gonna have a baby.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why am I talking like this?!

Name: monica
Lines: I didn’t think you could keep it a secret.

Name: chandler
Lines: I am an excellent secret keeper. I have kept all of our secrets.

Name: joey
Lines: What secrets?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh no-no Joey, I am not going to tell you because I am an excellent secret keeper.

Name: joey
Lines: You’ll tell me later?

Name: chandler
Lines: You already know.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, it's so romantic to send people off on their honeymoon.

Name: joey
Lines: Y’know, Monica and Chandler are married. Ross and Rachel are having a baby. Maybe you and I should do something.

Name: phoebe
Lines: All in good time my love. All in good time. Oh shoot! I left my guitar in their apartment. Well you can let me in later.

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t have a key, they took mine to give to you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?! They took mine to give to you!

Name: joey
Lines: Why would they take away our keys?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Maybe they don’t trust us.

Name: joey
Lines: No that’s not it. They let me keep my key the last time they were out of town.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You mean the time you broke the ketchup bottle and cleaned it up with Monica’s guest towels?

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, I washed those!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No you didn’t.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah that didn’t sound like me.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, what am I gonna do? I really need my guitar!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, I have stuff in there too.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What stuff?

Name: joey
Lines: Monica’s chicken parm! I’ll take care of it.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Did Rachel find you?

Name: ross
Lines: No why?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh she was looking for you.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh well, I guess I’ll catch up with her later.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, she really wanted to talk to you now.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, it seemed pretty important.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh no.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: I think I might know what this is about.

Name: joey
Lines: Really?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah. Uh, uh we promised we weren’t gonna tell anybody this but uh, about a month ago Rachel and I slept together.

Name: phoebe
Lines: And?

Name: ross
Lines: Wow! I thought you would be a little more shocked.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh sorry.  And?!

Name: ross
Lines: Well, we-we said we’d just do it that one time but, but now I think she may wanna start things up again.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, I don’t think that’s what it is.

Name: ross
Lines: Why? What-what else could it be?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh wow, I don’t feel well.

Name: ross
Lines: I’m telling you. I’m telling you. That’s what it is. No wonder she was looking at me all funny during the wedding. She didn’t say anything to you?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Maybe it’s something you ate?

Name: joey
Lines: Please, just-just, just go and talk to Rachel.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, I guess I should.

Name: monica
Lines: They’re kissing let’s just go around them.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh honey, leave them alone, they’re in love.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m in love too! But in an orderly fashion.

Name: monica
Lines: Hi! Can you do that and walk? ‘Cause she said, \Next.\"

Name: monica
Lines: Did you hear that?! They bumped them up to first class because they are on their honeymoon! Come on! Let’s act like we’re on our honeymoon.

Name: chandler
Lines: We are on our honeymoon.

Name: monica
Lines: Grab my ass!

Name: monica
Lines: Hi, sorry. I almost didn’t hear you, because y’know I’m just so in love with my new husband. We’re on our honeymoon.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh no, you see we’re on our honeymoon. So umm, can you do your little thing and bump us up to first class?

Name: monica
Lines: You see, if we’d gone around them like I said, we—She would’ve given us those tickets. Damnit!

Name: chandler
Lines: 25J and K, any chance those aren’t together?

Name: joey
Lines: I still can’t believe they took away my key. You trust me with yours.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Of course I do! And I’m gonna give it back to you as soon as they’re done with it at the key shining place.

Name: joey
Lines: What the hell is that?

Name: joey
Lines: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! Treeger, what are you doing?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well why don’t you use your key?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh! We could have done that.

Name: monica
Lines: Look at that! Look at that! They’re going into the first class lounge! Do you know what they have in there?

Name: chandler
Lines: No.

Name: monica
Lines: Me neither! We have to get in!

Name: chandler
Lines: Just act like you belong.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God! Oranges!

Name: chandler
Lines: Shh!

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes, of course.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh that’s all right, I have it memorized. It’s 1A.

Name: chandler
Lines: Apology accepted. Excuse us.

Name: monica
Lines: Fine.  Go! Go! Go!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi!

Name: ross
Lines: Hi.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi.  Umm, I think there’s something that we really need to talk about.

Name: ross
Lines: Look uh, I know why you’re here.

Name: rachel
Lines: You do?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, and to save you from any embarrassment umm, I think maybe I should talk first.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay.  Uh, Ross and Rachel. Rachel and Ross. That’s been one heck of a see-saw hasn’t it?

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: I mean look, that-that one night we had was fun and…and certainly passionate, but don’t you think it’s better if we just stayed friends?

Name: rachel
Lines: Seriously. What?!

Name: ross
Lines: Okay. Okay. Y’know what? If you want to, we can do it one more time. I mean I’d-I’d be okay with that. In fact, I have some time right now.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, y’know what? Can I, can I talk now?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh sure.

Name: rachel
Lines: And you’re the father by the way—but you got that…

Name: rachel
Lines: Can I get you some water?

Name: ross
Lines: I’m good. I’m good.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross, there is no pressure on you. Okay? I mean you can as involved as you want.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, I need uh… I’m just—I don’t know—I don’t understand, umm, how this happened? We-we used a condom.

Name: rachel
Lines: I know. I know, but y’know condoms only work like 97% of the time.

Name: ross
Lines: What? What? What?!! Well they should put that on the box!!!

Name: rachel
Lines: They do!

Name: ross
Lines: No they don’t!!!  Well they should put it in huge black letters!!!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay Ross come on let’s just forget about the condoms.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh well I may as well have!

Name: rachel
Lines: Listen, y’know what? I was really freaked out too when I found out…

Name: ross
Lines: Freaked out? Hey no, I’m not freaked out! I’m indignant! As a consumer!

Name: rachel
Lines: Y’know what? Let’s, let’s talk later.

Name: ross
Lines: No! No! I want to talk now! Okay? I—In fact,  I am going to talk to the president of the condom company!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, y’know maybe I should come back…

Name: ross
Lines: Shh! Shh! Shh!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: ross
Lines: NA

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh great! And listen, could you do us a favor and not tell Chandler and Monica about this? ‘Cause y’know umm, they don’t-they don’t have any kids of their own and-and this door was like a child to them.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh no.

Name: ross
Lines: Hi.

Name: ross
Lines: Sure.

Name: ross
Lines: Namaste.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh my God! What happened to the door?!

Name: joey
Lines: So it’s noticeable huh?

Name: ross
Lines: Look, is Rachel here? I really need to talk to her.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Didn’t you two already talk?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah but uh… Okay, okay look you guys know that Rachel and I slept together, but there’s something else.  Rachel’s pregnant.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh my God!!! I can’t believe that!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Holy mother of God!!!

Name: ross
Lines: With my child.

Name: phoebe
Lines: That is brand new information!!

Name: ross
Lines: You already know don’t you?

Name: phoebe
Lines: A little bit.

Name: joey
Lines: How are you doing?

Name: ross
Lines: Okay. Okay. I mean I’ll be okay. It’s just I don’t think I handled it very well.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, what did you say to her?

Name: ross
Lines: Nothing. But the complaint department at the condom company got an earful. And then when I turned around she was gone.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh Ross.

Name: ross
Lines: But hey, in my defense I-I just found out condoms are like only 97% effective.

Name: joey
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: I gotta go find her.

Name: joey
Lines: Whoa! Hey! Whoa!! Hold up! Are you serious?! So like 3% of the time they don’t even work?! Huh? They should put that on the box!

Name: ross
Lines: Evidently they do.

Name: joey
Lines: What?!

Name: monica
Lines: I can’t believe we’re here.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh you’ve got to be kidding me.

Name: monica
Lines: What?

Name: monica
Lines: No!! You have been screwing us all day!

Name: chandler
Lines: We’re you just ten seconds later!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah! You already got the first class tickets; you got the lounge! I mean we should get free stuff too! I mean you’re not the only ones on your honeymoon!

Name: chandler
Lines: We need the stuff.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey Monica it’s Joey. Listen uh, Phoebe and I smell gas comin’ from your apartment.

Name: monica
Lines: What? Are you serious?!  Joey smells gas!

Name: chandler
Lines: What else is new?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah and we’d go check it out, but you took away our keys.

Name: monica
Lines: Well do something! Get in there!

Name: joey
Lines: How? I guess I could break down your door.

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah! Do that!

Name: joey
Lines: And-and you won’t blame us for any damage?

Name: monica
Lines: No!  Are you doing it?! I don’t hear anything! Come on!

Name: joey
Lines: Uh, okay I’ll-I’ll-I’ll break it down.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh hey hi, he’s doing it. He’s breaking down the door.

Name: rachel
Lines: If I said I was, would you judge me?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.  Oh man, I swear if they sold these at Pottery Barn…

Name: ross
Lines: Hi!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi!

Name: ross
Lines: Uh we-we need to talk.

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh-uh-uh, right now? Because I’ve kinda got an el fresco situation going on over here.

Name: ross
Lines: Please, please I want to apologize for the way I acted earlier today.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay Ross that’s fine, but can you please stand near my head?

Name: ross
Lines: What? Oh yeah.  really—I should have been thinking about you Rach…

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. Head Ross! Head Ross! Head Ross!

Name: ross
Lines: Right! Right! I just—I want you to know that I’m going to be there through this whole thing, okay? Okay? The doctor’s appointments, the uh, the Lamaze classes, uh baby-proofing the apartment—Although we could probably worry about that ‘til after we get married.

Name: rachel
Lines: What married?

Name: ross
Lines: Well yeah, I think we should get married.

Name: rachel
Lines: What, because that’s your answer to everything?

Name: ross
Lines: No, because that’s the right thing to do.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, maybe if you’re in love. But Ross, we are not in love, are we?

Name: ross
Lines: No but…but still you can’t possibly do this alone.

Name: rachel
Lines: Excuse me?

Name: ross
Lines: Come on Rach, you can’t even eat alone in a restaurant.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?!

Name: ross
Lines: I’m just saying if you can’t eat by yourself, how do you expect to have a baby by yourself?

Name: rachel
Lines: I can too eat by myself!

Name: ross
Lines: When have you ever?

Name: rachel
Lines: When certain people leave the table and I am not finished!

Name: ross
Lines: Well certain other people take two hours to eat a bowl of soup!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh please, you inhale your food!

Name: ross
Lines: I grew up with Monica! If you didn’t eat fast you didn’t eat!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh no Dr. Long, please come in. This is Ross, he is the father.

Name: ross
Lines: But not the husband, because evidently she can do this alone.

Name: ross
Lines: I don’t know why you can’t admit that you need me.

Name: rachel
Lines: I do need you! I need you to stand near my head!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh my God.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow. There it is, I see it.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: ross
Lines: Thank you.

Name: ross
Lines: Pretty amazing huh?

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t see it!

Name: ross
Lines: What? What?!

Name: rachel
Lines: I can’t see it!

Name: ross
Lines: You-you just said that you did!

Name: rachel
Lines: I know, I lied! I didn’t want her to think I was a terrible mother! I can’t even see my own baby!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh sure, come here! .

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh. Oh, it’s beautiful. I see it now.

Name: ross
Lines: Do you really?

Name: rachel
Lines: No, I don’t see it!

Name: ross
Lines: Come on! Come on! Here, okay-okay, you see this?  This tiny thing that looks like a peanut?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: Sweetie that’s it.

Name: rachel
Lines: That’s it? Well I saw that! Ohh-ohh-oh, thank you.

Name: ross
Lines: You’re welcome.

Name: rachel

I mean I’ve always had this picture of me and my next wife in bed on Sunday and, my kid comes running in and leaps up onto the bed. And we all read the paper together. Y’know? Maybe fight over the science section.

Lines: Whoa—hey—wh-wh-what do you got there? What is that? Pie?
