Lines: Yeah, you want some?

Name: joey
Lines: Ah, just cut me a little sliver.  What?! Are you afraid you’re gonna run out?! Cut me a real piece!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey! So what do you think?

Name: chandler
Lines: New haircut?  Boots!

Name: monica
Lines: Yes! Now, they’re a little more than I normally spend on boots…or rent

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: monica
Lines: I know.

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m gonna miss being able to afford food.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m sorry, they just, they just look so good! And the saleswoman was looking at me like, \Oh

Name: chandler
Lines: She had a point.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God!  Oh Monica! Those boots are amazing!

Name: monica
Lines: They’re mine!

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah well, too bad we’re gonna have to return them.

Name: rachel
Lines: Return them?! Shh! They’re gonna hear you!

Name: monica
Lines: Honey, I’m not returning them. Okay? I mean I-I know they cost a lot, but I’m going to wear them all the time. You’ll see. Besides, I love the compliments. I mean, have you ever had something so beautiful everyone wanted it?

Name: chandler
Lines: I have you.

Name: monica
Lines: Nice try; I’m keeping the boots.

Name: ross
Lines: That’s right, I love you! And-and I’m gonna play with you all the time.

Name: phoebe
Lines: How can you let him talk to your crotch like that?

Name: rachel
Lines: He’s talking to the baby.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ohh! Okay! Okay, cause when-when he said, \I can’t wait to hear your first words

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. Well, I gotta go you guys. I’ll see you later.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: ross
Lines: Bye.

Name: rachel
Lines: Bye.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh hey Rach, listen—Hi!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi.

Name: joey
Lines: Umm, can you do me a favor? I was talkin’ to my sister and she knows you work at Ralph Lauren…

Name: rachel
Lines: No, forget it! No way! I am not sending anymore Ralph Lauren clothes to prison. It is a waste.

Name: joey
Lines: No-no-no-no-no-no, not her, not her. My youngest sister, Dina, she’s really interested in fashion, and she wants to talk to someone successful, y’know, to give her some advice.

Name: rachel
Lines: I guess I can talk to one of my supervisors…

Name: joey
Lines: Oh no-no-no-no, she wants to talk to you!

Name: rachel
Lines: Really?! Oh my God! I’m successful!

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, so will you meet with her?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes! I’d love to! Have her come by the office.

Name: joey
Lines: Great! Thanks! You’re gonna love her so much. And—Oh, she’s the smartest of all the Tribbiani children. Hey, y’know the S.A.T’s?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: joey
Lines: She took ‘em!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey Ross! Doesn’t Ben go to the Smithfield Day School?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah. Why?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Sting has a son that goes there too!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah I know; he’s in Ben’s class.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You knew this and you never said anything?! With all the stupid dinosaur stuff you tell us?!

Name: ross
Lines: Fine! No more dinosaur stuff! Can I talk about fossils?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Sting’s son, seven years old and there’s a picture.

Name: ross
Lines: What are you reading? The Kidnappers Guide to Manhattan Private Schools?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, it’s New York magazine. It’s an article about the best schools in the city. So how well do you know Sting?

Name: ross
Lines: Uh, I actually haven’t even met him.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh, yeah that’s too bad. I really want to go to his concert Friday night, but it’s totally sold out. I know! Why don’t you meet him and get tickets?! If you get two I’ll take you.

Name: ross
Lines: Well actually, I’m picking Ben up tomorrow, maybe he’ll be there.

Name: phoebe
Lines: There you go! Oh, you are so lucky! You might actually get to meet Sting tomorrow! That’s why you have kids!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey guys!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey-hey.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi Monica!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi boots.

Name: monica
Lines: See Chandler? I’m getting a lot of use out of them already! They’re very practical. See, you can wear them with dresses, with skirts, with pants…

Name: chandler
Lines: You can wear them with shorts on a street corner and earn the money to pay for them.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wow! They’re beautiful!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ahh…

Name: monica
Lines: They hurt so much!

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?!

Name: monica
Lines: The guy who made these hates feet and wants to see them die!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well-well you can give them to me! I haven’t felt my feet in years!

Name: monica
Lines: I can’t! I spent so much money on them and I told Chandler that I’d wear them all the time, I just can’t give them away!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well then get your money back and return them!

Name: monica
Lines: I can’t do that either! The soles’ are already a little scuffed up and the insides are filled with my blood.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey I uh just picked up Ben from school…

Name: chandler
Lines: I don’t think you did a very thorough job!

Name: ross
Lines: I dropped him off at Carol’s.  Anyway, it turns out that I’m not going to be able to get those tickets though.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh no! Why not?

Name: ross
Lines: Well it turns out that Ben and Sting’s son do not get along.

Name: phoebe
Lines: How come?!

Name: ross
Lines: Apparently, Sting’s son made fun of the fact that Ben’s moms are lesbinims.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wait! But Ross if they don’t get along then you should smooth things over. Make them be friends.

Name: ross
Lines: Phoebe, you can’t force kids to be friends.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Sure you can! Give them some blocks, put them in a playpen!

Name: ross
Lines: Playpen?! Ben’s seven!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Your kid is seven?!  Please! Please get the tickets!

Name: ross
Lines: Look I’m sorry Pheebs, I can’t do it.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes you can! Sting says so himself!

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Rosssss can!

Name: ross
Lines: Look Phoebe, I’m sorry it’s just…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Rossss can!

Name: ross
Lines: Phoebe, I…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Rosss can! Give me the tickets! Ross can give me the tickets!!

Name: joey
Lines: Here she is! Future fashion superstar!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh Joey, I’m hardly a…

Name: joey
Lines: My little sister Dina!

Name: rachel
Lines: Right! Hi Dina!

Name: rachel
Lines: Nice to meet you.

Name: joey
Lines: This is so exciting for her. Well, I’ll let you two fash…ists get down to business.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. All right Dina, well let’s talk about the different areas of fashion that you could get involved in. Let’s see, there’s design, but you may need a whole other degree for that. Uh, there’s-there’s sales, which is great because you get to travel…

Name: rachel
Lines: And there’s marketing…

Name: monica
Lines: Ahhhhhhhh!

Name: chandler
Lines: What’s wrong?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh nothing I’m just—just was yawning.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh don’t forget, my office holiday party is tonight.

Name: monica
Lines: Honey, we don’t really have to go to this thing tonight do we?

Name: chandler
Lines: Now sweetie, I know you don’t like my office parties, but you can wear your new boots. See? Every cloud has a…supple leather lining.

Name: monica
Lines: I-I don’t-I don’t think that I’m gonna wear the boots tonight.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why not?

Name: monica
Lines: Well y’know, I’m just-I’m just worried that bosses will see them and think they pay you too much money. Or! Or your assistant will see them and-and want a raise!

Name: chandler
Lines: Do you think I work at some kind of boot pricing company?

Name: monica
Lines: Anyway, I picked up this outfit that I want to wear and the, and the boots don’t really go with it.

Name: chandler
Lines: You said that you paid all that money because those boots go with skirts, dresses, and pants!

Name: monica
Lines: Fine! If you want me to wear the boots, I’ll wear the boots. In fact, I’ll go into my room right now and y’know try the outfit on.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay?

Name: rachel
Lines: Honey, it’s going to be okay. He’s been incredibly supportive of me, and if he gets a little upset; that’s what the meatball sub is for.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! It’s my fashion girls!  What’s wrong?

Name: rachel
Lines: Honey, why don’t you sit down? Dina has something that she wants to tell you.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh. What’s, what’s going on? Is it mom? Is she sick? Is it dad’s heart? Is that a sandwich?

Name: joey
Lines: Is that a sandwich?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey…there’s something that you…should know. Dina?

Name: joey
Lines: What?!

Name: rachel
Lines: NA

Name: joey
Lines: Well obviously this is a mistake! You can’t be pregnant! Because you have to have sex to get pregnant!

Name: rachel
Lines: What?! Dina…

Name: joey
Lines: I can’t believe this! You’re the good one! You went to college! Both years! Who did this to you?!

Name: joey
Lines: You got pregnant for funny?! Dina…if he’s funny…laugh! All right, I’ll be back in a little while! You stay here!

Name: joey
Lines: I can’t look at you right now!

Name: rachel
Lines: I know.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, there you are Ben!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, I heard you’re having a problem with one of the boys in your class. And so I thought I would just come down here and sit you both down, have a little talk and make it all okay. Now umm, the boy’s name is Sting’s son.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Now Ben, sometimes people may seem like jerks on the outside, but they have famous fathers.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Him you’re friends with.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes! Yes you can, I’m looking for Jack’s parents.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh, I’m with Ben.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I am one of Ben’s mothers. I’m a lesbian. It was, it was difficult coming out to my parents.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ah! Okay so that would make me Susan.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah! Let’s do that!! That-that sounds good. We should sit down and talk, just me, my lover Carol, and the Stings. Umm, how-how will I get in touch with them?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh. Uh-huh. Umm, could-could I get a copy of that? ‘Cause Carol threw it out, she lost ours. She’s such a scatterbrain, but man what a hot piece of ass.

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know, that party wasn’t bad.

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah! I didn’t know there would be dancing. That was a fun surprise!

Name: chandler
Lines: I don’t see any uh, cabs. Maybe we should just walk?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh no, we can’t walk!

Name: chandler
Lines: What honey, it’s like fifteen blocks to the subway. Let’s go.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey! Do you think that we can get to the subway right there if we climb down through the manhole cover?

Name: chandler
Lines: What’s going on?

Name: monica
Lines: I can’t walk. Okay? Okay? These boots were a huge mistake!

Name: chandler
Lines: What?

Name: monica
Lines: Okay you were right! All right, I never should have bought them! They’re killing me! One toe at a time!

Name: chandler
Lines: So I was right. This is what it feels like to be right.  It’s oddly unsettling.

Name: monica
Lines: How are we gonna get home? Maybe a piggy-back ride?

Name: chandler
Lines: Hop on.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay. Wait, just give me a second, I need to just get my boots off first.  Ah…Ooh…Oohh…Ohh…Oh God…Ohh…Oh…Ohh…Ohhhh…

Name: chandler
Lines: Honey, I know you’re in pain right now, but I’m a little turned on.

Name: rachel
Lines: What college was that Dina?

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey, what are you doing?

Name: joey
Lines: Just what needs to be done! Dearly beloved, we are gathered here to join this man and this woman…

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh Joey this is crazy!

Name: joey
Lines: Don’t interrupt me when I’m talkin’ to God! Now where were we? Oh right, okay. Do you Dina, take this man…

Name: joey
Lines: Oh you’ll take ‘em!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! You don’t get a say in this!

Name: joey
Lines: Ahhh! I heard \I do\"

Name: rachel
Lines: All right Joey! That is enough!  Listen, as beautiful and moving as this ceremony is, it’s not legal. Okay? They-they don’t have a marriage license, they don’t have any witnesses, and the groom only has on one shoe!

Name: joey
Lines: Well what am I supposed to do?

Name: rachel
Lines: You’re supposed to realize that they are adults! And that they can make their own decisions.

Name: joey
Lines: No they can’t! They were stupid enough to get knocked up!

Name: rachel
Lines: Heyyyyy! Contraceptives are not always effective!  Right?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, come on kids! A little help here!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wow! This place is incredible!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hi!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Why else would I be here?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Umm, I’m sorry. Won’t-won’t Jack’s father be joining us?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-hmm. Okay. Well then, could we reschedule? For say, Friday night perhaps at 8 o’clock?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Concert. Yeah. That does put us in…quite a pickle. Because you see I’m very busy before and after the concert, and he’s obviously busy during.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Unless! Unless umm, okay I-I would be willing to go to the concert, umm, all the while thinking about the children of course.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, thank you. Four would be great.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh good! Then you’re in luck! Ben’s not my son!

Name: phoebe
Lines: The Police? Here? A reunion?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, ten blocks down. Five to go.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh wait! Stop! Stop! Stop!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh I’m sorry! Do you need a break?

Name: monica
Lines: My boots in tan! Hey! Can you get a little closer so I can see the price?

Name: chandler
Lines: I can see it from right here. It’ll cost you one husband.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, I’m sorry. I think I can walk the rest of the way now. Just-just give me my boots.

Name: chandler
Lines: I don’t have your boots.

Name: monica
Lines: Well I don’t have them either. Where are they?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, why don’t you check in one of my saddlebags while I chew on a bale of hay!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.  God well, we gotta go back and get them!

Name: chandler
Lines: Honey, are you seriously ever gonna wear the boots again?

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, I’m never gonna wear them again. I just didn’t get a chance to say goodbye.

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know what? You can say goodbye to the tan ones.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.  All right.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey, just because they’re not getting married doesn’t mean this is going to be a disaster. Maybe they have a plan!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh? Oh! Okay! Okay! Let’s hear their plan! Now, what’s the future look like for Dina and Bobby?

Name: joey
Lines: You were right. He is funny.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey, now wait a minute! I get when you told people at first that you wanted to be an actor they laughed at you! Now come on Bobby, why don’t you tell us a little bit about your band?

Name: rachel
Lines: NA

Name: joey
Lines: Dina, if you’re having a baby you should be married! Even if it is to Bobby!  Dude, that’s not a compliment!

Name: joey
Lines: So whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa! What are you gonna do? You’re gonna have the baby and-and raise it by yourself…without a husband?! You can’t be a single mother alone! You’re gonna ruin your life!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh excuse me! Am I ruining my life?

Name: joey
Lines: No! No! No! It’s different for you. You’re so strong and together. You’re not some dumb kid who doesn’t know what she’s doing.

Name: joey
Lines: One pregnant woman at a time, please! I just want you to be okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: So forcing her to marry Bobby is gonna make that happen?

Name: joey
Lines: Maybe!  Well! Well…so-so uh, what kind of music does Numb Nuts—Oh forget it! I can’t!

Name: joey
Lines: Because! ‘Cause… ‘Cause you’re my baby sister!

Name: joey
Lines: Well I’d be scared of them, but all right.

Name: joey
Lines: Of course he’s gonna have his Uncle Joey!

Name: joey
Lines: That’s right! By his uncle too!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay Bobby, why don’t we just come over here and let them have a little moment.

Name: joey
Lines: Come here!

Name: rachel
Lines: No! Seriously! What’s wrong with you?!

Name: ross
Lines: You’re gonna love me so much. I got Sting tickets!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God! I do love you! How did you do it?!

Name: ross
Lines: Well…let’s just say…  Rosss caaaaan!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oo, where are the seats?

Name: ross
Lines: Uh, middle balcony.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, now would you say that that’s more than 50 yards away from Sting, his wife, or a member of his family?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Then that’s not breaking the law! I’m there!

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah?

Name: rachel
Lines: Look at that guy by the window, wow!

Name: phoebe
Lines: He’s awfully short and I think he’s talking to himself. And to be completely honest, he’s not that good in bed.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, what is wrong with me lately? I mean it’s like every guy I see—I mean look here.  Look at that guy for example, I mean normally that’s not someone I would-would be attracted to, but right now, with the way I’m feeling, all I want to do is rip off his sweatpants and fanny pack.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wait a second! This is about the fourth month of your pregnancy, right?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: phoebe
Lines: This is completely normal, around the fourth month your hormones start going crazy.

Name: rachel
Lines: Really?! So this has happened to you?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh absolutely yeah! Oh and keep in mind, now, I was carrying triplets so in, y’know, medical terms I was-I was thrice as randy.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow! This explains so much! Last weekend, I went from store to store sitting on Santa’s lap.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah. Yeah, I remember trying to steal a cardboard cutout of Evander Holyfield from a Foot Locker.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ah.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, y’know what? I go see my doctor tomorrow, I’ll ask her about this. Maybe she can give me a pill or something.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah. Yeah, that’s what you need a good…pill.

Name: ross
Lines: Hi!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh great! Hey-hey Joey, do you want to check out pictures of me and Mona ice skating?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh uh, ordinarily I would love too, but I am just swamped right now.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey where-where are the pictures that creepy pretzel vendor took of us together?

Name: joey
Lines: I’m missin’ picture time?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Y’know she has a face Ross!

Name: ross
Lines: Wow! That is a good one! Wow, it looks like a, like a holiday card y’know, with the tree in the middle and the skaters and the snow.

Name: ross
Lines: Together? Like-like to people?

Name: ross
Lines: Okay.

Name: ross
Lines: Uh sure, sure.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Bye.

Name: joey
Lines: Congratulations! You just got married!

Name: ross
Lines: I know. Can you believe that?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wait, I’m-I’m sorry. What’s the big deal about a holiday card?

Name: ross
Lines: Married couples send out cards, families send out cards, people who have been dating for a couple of months do not send out cards! What-what is she crazy?!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey-hey-hey, hey that’s your wife you’re talking about!

Name: chandler
Lines: Honey, you remember my boss Doug right?

Name: monica
Lines: Yes, hi.

Name: chandler
Lines: I didn’t know you and Carol were getting divorced, I’m sorry.

Name: monica
Lines: No leg-chewing for us sir.

Name: monica
Lines: I can’t think of anything we’re doing.  Why can’t I think of anything we’re doing?

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, I’ll see you tomorrow!  I-I cannot spend another evening with that man. Do you remember how he behaved at our wedding?

Name: chandler
Lines: No.

Name: monica
Lines: That’s because he wasn’t invited because of the way he behaved at our engagement party.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh yeah. Boy, urine cuts right through an ice sculpture doesn’t it?

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: ross
Lines: Huh. Wow, this is great.

Name: ross
Lines: Well, we-we haven’t said that to each other yet, but I guess its okay to say it to other people.

Name: ross
Lines: A hundred?! Well, I-I guess I’ll take a—Mona, uh…I-I’m not sure about the whole uh, card thing.

Name: ross
Lines: Sending out a holiday card, together, I mean I just don’t know if we’re really quite there yet.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: Huh.

Name: ross
Lines: Hmm…

Name: ross
Lines: Let’s do the card!

Name: ross
Lines: The card! I think we’re there!

Name: ross
Lines: Really?! I mean, even with the card?

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, okay. Hey, can I ask you a question? Was it me, or-or was the guy who took my blood sample really cute? Y’know who I’m talking about, bald haircut, hairy fingers…

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes, you are.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, really, really good. But enough about me, come on! Where-where are you from? What do you do?

Name: rachel
Lines: Right! Right! I-I actually meant in your spare time, do you cook? Do you ski? Or do you just hang out with your wife or girlfriend?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, I love to ski! How amazing is this?!

Name: rachel
Lines: No. I’m very comfortable.

Name: rachel
Lines: No! Shoot, Dr. Schiff what kind of question is that?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well would you like me to lie down on the table?

Name: rachel
Lines: Do you feel it too?

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh hey! So, how did your doctor’s appointment go?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, let’s see. Uh, they gave me cute doctor today and in the middle of the exam I put my pinky in his chin dimple.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God.

Name: monica
Lines: Why did you do that?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, remember that little problem I was having during my fourth month of pregnancy?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh yeah, the Evander Holyfield phase. Oh man you were so hard up you practically came on to me.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You wish.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, I could’ve had you if I wanted you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh yeah? Come and get it.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, even this is turning me on!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh hey! Hey Ross! Hey how’s it, how’s it going with you and Mona? Are you guys still together?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh yeah, yeah we’re moving forward. You’ll be getting our card!

Name: monica
Lines: You and Mona are doing a holiday card together?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, we’re not just doing a card! Y’know, she-she also wants to have the conversation about where the relationship is going.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ugh! Women!

Name: ross
Lines: I know! I know! Why do you guys need to have this conversation?! Huh? I mean no self-respecting man would ask a woman, \So

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh Ross? You asked me that.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey! You were a closed book! Okay? I’m not a mind reader! Besides, I hate those conversations. I’m horrible at them. Really! Maybe-maybe I need kind of a gesture. Y’know, something that says we’re moving forward without having to talk about it.

Name: monica
Lines: Like asking her to move in with you?

Name: ross
Lines: Smaller than that.

Name: monica
Lines: Making her a mixed tape?

Name: ross
Lines: Uh, bigger than that.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Give her a key to your apartment.

Name: ross
Lines: Whoa-hello! We were closer with the mixed tape.

Name: monica
Lines: All right. Have you said, \I love you?\" You could say

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah I-I don’t-I don’t think I’m quite there yet, but I could say I looove spending time with you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, we hate that.

Name: monica
Lines: That is a slap in the face.

Name: ross
Lines: Forget it. I-I—Y’know what? I’ll just have the conversation. I’ll just say I like things the way they are, and hope for the best. What do you think Rach?

Name: rachel
Lines: I think, if it was a little colder in here I could see your nipples through that sweater.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh uh, as it turns out, we can’t do it. Monica has to work.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh uh well tomorrow’s no good for her either.

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s the semi-finals…of her…botchy ball tournament.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well now-now you’re just talking crazy.

Name: chandler
Lines: Because uh…we-we…we split up. Monica and I split up. Hold me.

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know what would really help me through this tough time is choking something. Can I choke ya?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh no-no-no, Monica would freak.  But to hell with that bitch.

Name: ross
Lines: Here we go. Mona umm, I think it’s time we-we had a conversation about-about where things are with us.

Name: ross
Lines: Aw, we-we are so…

Name: ross
Lines: I mean, there’s no point in spending time with someone if-if it’s just fun. It’s gotta be, it’s gotta be going somewhere right? So where-where is it going?  Ah! That’s-that’s the real question. And-and the answer is…is it’s going somewhere…fun. Now I-I know what you’re thinking, fun was fine for you like ten years ago y’know, but you’re-you’re not getting any younger. No I mean—No not you, not you, you—you are getting younger. I mean—you-you look like you’re getting younger by the second—What’s your secret?

Name: ross
Lines: Well, well to sum up, we’re having fun, you look young.

Name: ross
Lines: But that’s not enough. So… So…here’s a key to my apartment.

Name: ross
Lines: Really.

Name: rachel
Lines: You gave her a key to your apartment?!

Name: ross
Lines: Not just a key, I gave her the only key! I am now a homeless person in a very serious relationship.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey. Ooh Ross! How’d the conversation go?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh great, I live on the street.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Where?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hi! Okay, Monica, Rachel, this is my friend Roger.

Name: monica
Lines: Hi Roger.

Name: phoebe
Lines: So umm, I’m gonna get us some drinks.  Would you help me out?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Umm, he’s here to have sex with you.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: phoebe
Lines: You’re welcome.

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe no!

Name: phoebe
Lines: It’s okay, he’s a virgin.

Name: monica
Lines: Rachel umm, I was just talking to this guy and I think he’ll have sex with you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, okay let’s leave these two alone.

Name: rachel
Lines: No! I do not care what my hormones are doing, I am not going to just do it with some random guy!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Fine! Then you tell Roger because he was really looking forward to this!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh that’s all right sir, and that’s just one girl.

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s a hand. It’s a thing you use as a Jack and Coke holder.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh no-no-no!

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, and oh I’m gonna need a bunch of extra keys. Apparently I give them away for no reason at all.

Name: ross
Lines: No. That guy is.

Name: ross
Lines: I’m trying to tell you I made you a mix tape.

Name: ross
Lines: I love you!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hi honey I’m home.

Name: monica
Lines: From the tequila factory?

Name: chandler
Lines: It was awful. To get out of going to dinner with Doug I told him that you and I split up. So then he took me to all these strip clubs and sleazy bars, and then when I wouldn’t give him my wedding ring, he threw a soda can at a bird!

Name: monica
Lines: Come here. I can breath through my mouth.

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know what the worse part was? I got to see what my life would be like without you. It was like It’s a Wonderful Life with lap dances. Please promise that you will never leave me, that we will grow old together, and be with each other for the rest of our lives.

Name: monica
Lines: I promise. Hey, speaking of together, how about we send out a holiday card this year?

Name: chandler
Lines: Ooh, I don’t know if we’re there yet.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes. Hi, I’d like to order a pizza. Okay, can I ask you a question? Is-is the cute blond guy delivering tonight? Very Ambercrombie & Fitch.  I’ll call you back.

Name: joey
Lines: Who was that?

Name: rachel
Lines: It’s just the pizza place.

Name: joey
Lines: You hung up on the pizza place? I don’t hang up on your friends.

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m sorry honey, I’m just having a, having a rough day.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, what’s wrong?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh you really, you really just don’t want to hear about it.

Name: joey
Lines: Then why did I ask?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, it’s just—and this is really embarrassing—but lately with this whole pregnancy thing I’m just finding myself…how do I put this umm, erotically charged.

Name: joey
Lines: Is that college talk for horny?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah. So y’know, I have all of these feelings and I don’t know what to do about them, because I can’t date like a normal person, which is fine because I don’t need a relationship, I mean all I really want is one great night. Just sex, y’know? No strings attached, no relationship, just with someone that I feel comfortable with and who knows what he’s doing. For just one great night, I mean is that really so…hard…to find.  So how was your day?

Name: joey
Lines: Good, I uh, I saw a pretty big pigeon.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, I gotta get up early and it’s almost seven o’clock.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, I gotta, I gotta go to my room too.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, good night!

Name: joey
Lines: Good night.

Name: joey
Lines: I can’t do it!

Name: rachel
Lines: I didn’t ask you to do it!

Name: joey
Lines: You’re Rachel!

Name: rachel
Lines: You’re Joey!

Name: joey
Lines: You’re my friend!

Name: rachel
Lines: Right back at ya!

Name: joey
Lines: But plus, it would be wrong and weird and-and-and bad.

Name: rachel
Lines: And so bad. I don’t even know what you’re talking about because I didn’t ask you to do anything!

Name: joey
Lines: I know!

Name: joey
Lines: Do you wanna do it?

Name: rachel
Lines: No!

Name: joey
Lines: All right, me neither! I was just testing you!

Name: rachel
Lines: That’s the end of this conversation!

Name: joey
Lines: This conversation never happened!

Name: rachel
Lines: Never happened! Good night!

Name: joey
Lines: Good night!

Name: joey
Lines: Get back in there!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hi. Listen, I’m sorry about that whole thing with Roger. It really wasn’t right, and I, and I want to make it up to you, so umm, I brought you something that I think you’ll really enjoy.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey! I got you a present!!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh my goodness! Where did you hide it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I got it for your wedding and I ordered it weeks ago, and it finally got here!

Name: chandler
Lines: Pheebs you didn’t have to get us anything for our wedding you already sang…

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: phoebe
Lines: It’s a Ms. Pac-Man machine!!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I didn’t know where to put it so I just left it here for now.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh well, maybe we can put it in the guest bedroom.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, okay.

Name: monica
Lines: All right.

Name: chandler
Lines: I kinda like it here.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Do you really like it?

Name: monica
Lines: Are you kidding?! I practically spent my entire childhood at the arcade! This is like—Oh my, this is like my second favorite game!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh really? What was your first?

Name: monica
Lines: Well I-I really don’t remember the name of it.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well what did it do?

Name: monica
Lines: Well, you just—you put a quarter in and y’know pull-pull some handles and win like a candy bar or something.

Name: chandler
Lines: A vending machine?

Name: monica
Lines: Don’t feel bad for me! I won like every time!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey! Oh, I’m so glad you guys are here. I’ve been dying to tell someone what happened in the Paleontology department today.

Name: joey
Lines: Do you think he saw us or can we still sneak out?

Name: ross
Lines: Professor Neuman, the head of the department, so….

Name: rachel
Lines: They made you head of the department!

Name: ross
Lines: No, I get to teach one of his advanced classes!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh! Hey Rach, listen umm…

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: joey
Lines: I got a big date coming up, do you know a good restaurant?

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh, Paul’s Caf�. They got great food and it’s really romantic.

Name: joey
Lines: Ooh, great! Thanks!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah! Oh, and then afterwards you can take her to the Four Seasons for drinks. Or you go downtown and listen to some jazz. Or dancing—Oh! Take her dancing!

Name: joey
Lines: You sure are naming a lot of ways to postpone sex, I’ll tell ya…

Name: rachel
Lines: Ooh, I miss dating. Gettin’ all dressed up and going to a fancy restaurant. I’m not gonna be able to do that for so long, and it’s so much fun! I mean not that sitting at home worrying about giving birth to a sixteen pound baby is not fun.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, y’know what?

Name: rachel
Lines: Huh?

Name: joey
Lines: Why don’t I take you out?

Name: rachel
Lines: What?! Joey, you don’t want to go on a date with a pregnant lady.

Name: joey
Lines: Yes I do! And we’re gonna go out, we’re gonna have a good time, and take your mind off of childbirth and c-sections and-and giant baby heads stretching out…

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay! I’ll go with ya! I’ll go! I’ll go with ya.

Name: joey
Lines: I’ll be fun.

Name: rachel
Lines: All right?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No. No! Yes! Ahh. Oh, would you look at that Monica? I just knocked off all of your top scores, how sad.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, I’m next.  Don’t! Don’t start another game! I said I’m next! Phoebe!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, I’m sorry. I didn’t hear you over all the winning.

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler! Phoebe’s hogging the game!

Name: chandler
Lines: Who cares? It’s a stupid game.

Name: monica
Lines: You only think it’s stupid because you suck at it.

Name: chandler
Lines: I don’t suck. It’s sucks. You suck.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wait okay, if this game is gonna cause problems between the two of you, then maybe I should just keep it.

Name: monica
Lines: No! No-no! I love it! It is a great present! In fact, why don’t you go home and wait for the thank you card?

Name: chandler
Lines: Why do you want to play this game so bad?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah! It’s not like it spits out a Clark bar after every game.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay. Phoebe that’s it. Come on, get out—out of the chair. Get out!  Oh come…Phoebe!

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey? Could you get that?  What are you doing here? I thought you were in your room?

Name: joey
Lines: No, I’m picking you up for our date. These are for you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh, Lilies. Joey, they’re my favorite. Thank you.

Name: joey
Lines: And, a brownie!  Well, half a brownie. Actually, it’s just bag. It’s been a long walk from the flower shop and I was startin’ to feel faint so…

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh man! This is so great! I actually feel like I’m going on a real date! Although, I have a hint of morning sickness, and I’m wearing underwear that goes up to about……there.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey come on now, this is a real date. Uh, so…nice place you got here. Foosball, huh? Pizza box. Oh, a subscription to Playboy, my kind of woman.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, actually that’s my roommate’s.

Name: joey
Lines: I would like to meet him. He sounds like a stand up guy.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ah yes, but he’s very protective of me so you’d better watch yourself.

Name: joey
Lines: Ah… Hey, so this roommate of yours…is he good looking?

Name: rachel
Lines: Hm-mmm.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh yeah, it must be tough to keep your hands of him, huh?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, but I’m pretty sure he’s gay.

Name: joey
Lines: No-no-no-no, he’s not! No! Why are you trying to ruin the game? Come on!

Name: ross
Lines: …which brings us back, of course, to Greely’s theory of dominance.  Okay, that-that’s all for today. Oh, uh does anyone know where the Freeman building is?

Name: ross
Lines: What?! That-that’s all the way cross town, I’m supposed to teach a graduate seminar there in ten minutes.

Name: ross
Lines: Move it! Move it! Move it!! Hey!!! I’m the teacher!!

Name: ross
Lines: Hello.  So to sum up, I’m Professor Geller. Good job today.

Name: rachel
Lines: Now the filet mignon, what comes with that?

Name: rachel
Lines: Emmm. Now, instead of the vegetables, is there anyway I can substitute the three-pound lobster?

Name: joey
Lines: Y’know what? Bring her both, and I’ll have the same.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow! This is shaping up to be a pretty good date—Oh, I almost forgot. I didn’t pay you the rent check.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh whoa-whoa-whoa, no roommate stuff. Okay? We’re on a date.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. Wow! So I get to see what Joey Tribbiani is like on a date. So do you have any moves?

Name: joey
Lines: No! No. Umm, just myself and if they don’t like me for— I’m sorry I couldn’t even get through that.

Name: rachel
Lines: I knew it! I knew it. Come on tell me your moves.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh alright. Umm, well, okay, I usually start by having a bottle of wine sent to my table from a fan.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God. And that works?!

Name: joey
Lines: Well it does when you combine it with, \This is so embarrassing

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, you poor little famous man.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh okay, how about this one. I was gonna wait until the end of the night to kiss you, but you’re so beautiful…I don’t think I can.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! Wow! That was fantastic, I almost leaned in. I really almost did!

Name: joey
Lines: Alright, so…so tell me one of your moves.

Name: rachel
Lines: Alright. So where’d you grow up?

Name: joey
Lines: That’s your move? Boy Rach, you’re lucky you’re hot.

Name: rachel
Lines: Come on, just answer the question!

Name: joey
Lines: Queens.

Name: rachel
Lines: And so were-were you close to your parents?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, with my mom. Yeah, not so much with my dad.

Name: rachel
Lines: Why not?

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t know. I guess there’s just always been this distance y’know—I mean we both try to pretend it’s not there, but it is.

Name: rachel
Lines: It’s gotta be rough.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, it is. It’s really tough. Y’know sometimes I think—Wow!! Nice move!

Name: rachel
Lines: Huh?

Name: joey
Lines: \Where’d you grow up

Name: rachel
Lines: Thank you! And now if you’ll excuse me, I have to go to the rest room.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: And now you’re watching me walk away.

Name: joey
Lines: Yes I am! Again so simple!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey.

Name: chandler
Lines: You are not going to believe what I did today!

Name: monica
Lines: Well it clearly wasn’t showering or shaving.

Name: chandler
Lines: I got good. I played this game all day and now I rule at it! They should change the name of it to Ms. Chandler.  Although I-I hope they don’t.

Name: monica
Lines: Wait a minute, you stayed home all day and played Ms. Pac-Man while I went off to work like some kind of chump?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Uh-huh, and I got all the top ten scores, I erased Phoebe off the board! High five!

Name: monica
Lines: What is the matter with your hand?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well I’ve been playing it for like eight hours, it’ll loosen up. Come on, check out the scores. Oh, and also look at the initials, they’re dirty words.

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler, why would you do that?

Name: chandler
Lines: Because it’s awesome.

Name: monica
Lines: You think this is clever?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well y’know, they only give you three letters, so after A-S-S it is a bit of a challenge.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey wait a minute, this one isn’t dirty.

Name: chandler
Lines: It is when you put it together with that one.

Name: monica
Lines: Ah, well if you don’t clear this off, you won’t be getting one of those from me. But Ben’s coming over here tomorrow to play this game, this can’t be there.

Name: chandler
Lines: Come on, he won’t even know what they mean.

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler! He’s seven; he’s not stupid.

Name: chandler
Lines: Have you talked to him lately?

Name: monica
Lines: All right, look I’m just gonna unplug it.

Name: chandler
Lines: No-no-no, if you unplug it, I’ll have nothing to show for my day! It would be like I was at work.  Chip in it or something!

Name: monica
Lines: Honey you-you got to beat your scores!

Name: chandler
Lines: With the claw?!

Name: monica
Lines: All right fine. Fine, I’ll do it. I’ve just got to get this off the screen. Carol and Susan are still upset that you taught him pull my finger.

Name: chandler
Lines: —My hand is messed up.

Name: rachel
Lines: I am not gonna answer that!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh come on! Just pick one! Between Monica, Phoebe, Chandler, and Ross if you had to, if you had to, who would you punch?

Name: rachel
Lines: No one! They are my friends, I wouldn’t punch any of them.

Name: joey
Lines: Chandler?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, but I don’t know why. Look at me, I’m having such a wonderful time!

Name: joey
Lines: Me too! Hey Rach, can I just say I think this is the best date I ever had!

Name: rachel
Lines: I know!

Name: joey
Lines: I never laughed so hard—Did you see the wine come out of my nose?

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey, I think everyone saw the wine come out of your nose.

Name: joey
Lines: I gotta say, I never knew I could enjoy the non-sex part of the date so much.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well that is because you have never been on a date with me before.

Name: joey
Lines: Huh. Huh.

Name: rachel
Lines: All right, now don’t judge me. I normally wait until my date leaves, but you live here. I’m ripping into this swan.

Name: joey
Lines: Ah! Okay, well then you don’t judge me. I’m gonna suck on the cellophane from the brownie I had before.

Name: rachel
Lines: So tell me, what are Joey Tribbiani’s end of the night moves?

Name: joey
Lines: Ah, well, if I want the girl to kiss me, first thing I do is make my lips look irresistible.

Name: rachel
Lines: How do you do that?

Name: joey
Lines: Now you can’t tell anyone, but uh…I put on shiny lip balm.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, like a moth to a flame, I’m telling ya. Okay all right, so now you go.

Name: rachel
Lines: No, I don’t want to tell you.

Name: joey
Lines: Why not?

Name: rachel
Lines: Because it’s embarrassing.

Name: joey
Lines: More embarrassing than shiny raspberry lip balm?!  I didn’t say raspberry before did I? All right just-just tell me Rach, just tell me!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, when we’re at the door, I lightly press my lips against his, and then move into his body just for a second, and then I make this sound, \Hmmm.\" Okay

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah. Why—Yeah, that would work for ya…

Name: rachel
Lines: All right, I gotta go to bed. Honey, I had such a wonderful time.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh.

Name: rachel
Lines: …you were 50 minutes late to the class, what did you crawl there?!

Name: ross
Lines: No, I ran. It was really far, and when did people stop understanding the phrase, \Get the hell out of my way!\"

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, why didn’t you just take a cab?

Name: ross
Lines: Ugh, between the traffic that time of day and all the one-way streets it’ll take me twice as long. Besides, I teach the class three times a week, who am I? Rockefeller?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well you’re not gonna be able to keep doing this.

Name: ross
Lines: Well I have to. Okay? If I don’t, they’ll take the class away from me. And…I already put it in my family newsletter.

Name: rachel
Lines: You what?

Name: ross
Lines: You’ve seen it, the Geller Yeller.

Name: rachel
Lines: Right. Wow!

Name: ross
Lines: Besides, I-I think I figured out a much faster route, I’m sure I can make it this time. I just…I just can’t be afraid to get a little bit…hit by cars.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi! Hey, remember how last night we were talking about that movie Cujo?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh yeah, I still can’t believe you haven’t seen Cujo. What is wrong with you?

Name: rachel
Lines: Relax! It’s not like it’s Citizen Kane!

Name: joey
Lines: Have you ever tried to sit through Citizen Kane?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah I know it’s really boring, but it’s like a big deal. Anyway, I was thinking about renting Cujo sometime.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh yeah? All right, let’s do it tonight.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well don’t you have that big date tonight?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh right!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey Joey, can I ask you something?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: After our date last night, did you feel a little weird?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh my God! You did too? It totally freaked me out, what was that?!

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t know!  I’m-I’m kinda thinking it-it was the lobster…

Name: joey
Lines: Oh yeah-yeah, the lobster.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, I mean I was up sick all night.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah me too, all night.

Name: rachel
Lines: Really?! How come we didn’t cross paths?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah well that’s because uh…I stayed in my room. Yeah, you don’t want to look in my hamper.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, I got that. I’ll escape over there. I’ll come back over here. All right, come on Ms. Pac-Man. It’s got—Right— Well, you’re just a little bitch, aren’t you?

Name: phoebe
Lines: —Oh my God! Your friends have some unfortunate initials!

Name: monica
Lines: They’re all Chandler.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Chandler sucks! He couldn’t have gotten this good!

Name: chandler
Lines: I did.  But it came at a price.

Name: monica
Lines: But Ben is coming over tonight and he can’t see this.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh come on, by age seven kids have already seen orgies.  Was it just me?!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah!!!! Yes, I made it! I’m on time!

Name: joey
Lines: No-no! I’m fine. It’s just… Hey, can I ask you something? Have you ever looked at someone that you’ve known for a while and then suddenly…suddenly see them a different way?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah. Yeah, that…that’s exactly it. You’re right. Yeah.

Name: joey
Lines: Ooh! Yeah. So yeah, so you know exactly what I’m talking about.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh yeah, sure.  Ehhh.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God Phoebe, you’re on fire!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I know!

Name: chandler
Lines: One more score to go! You can do it!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Don’t touch me!!

Name: monica
Lines: Don’t touch her!!

Name: chandler
Lines: All right! Go left! Go left! Go right!! Go right!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can’t!! I can’t!!  Noooooooo!!!!!!! You son of a bitch!!!!!

Name: ross
Lines: Phoebe!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh hi Ben—No!! Don’t look at the machine!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh God! Thank God you’re home! I’m watching Cujo.

Name: joey
Lines: Alone?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes! But what is wrong with this dog?!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, did you get to the part where they’re trapped in the car and Cujo’s throwin’ himself at the windshield?

Name: rachel
Lines: No! No! Seriously, what’s wrong with the dog?! Wait a minute, what are you doing home so early? What happened to your date?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh uh, it didn’t work out.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh. Do you want to watch the rest of the movie with me?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh uh, okay. Yeah.

Name: rachel
Lines: Y’know, I never thought I’d say this about a movie, but I really hope this dog dies.  What are you doing over there? Come sit here, you protect me.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh sure, yeah, why not?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.  Okay, that’s him! That’s him! That’s Cujo! That’s Cujo!

Name: joey
Lines: All right, I know! I know. Yeah, it’ll be okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God….What’s he gonna do now? I can’t watch!  Oh. Seriously, how can you watch this? Aren’t you scared?

Name: joey
Lines: Terrified.

Name: ross
Lines: So is everybody here? I got here a little early myself. Let us begin. Now, the hydrosaurids have been unearthed in two main locations.  Now as for the hydrosaurs…

Name: joey
Lines: All right. It’s a new day. All that stuff about Rachel, you don’t feel that now. It was crazy! You’re fine. You’re better than fine! You are, as your friend Tony would say, Grrrreat! Everything’s normal! She’s just your friend Rachel! Your friend Rachel. Your friend! Rachel.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi, sweetie.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, it’s your girlfriend, Rachel!

Name: monica
Lines: Hi.

Name: chandler
Lines: Are you, are you high?

Name: monica
Lines: I just had the most amazing bath.

Name: chandler
Lines: Really? I don’t like baths.

Name: monica
Lines: Wait, you like them with me.

Name: chandler
Lines: Honey, it’s not the bath I enjoy, it’s the wet, naked lady.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, baths are so relaxing!

Name: chandler
Lines: Really? What do you do? You just sit in there stewing in your own filth.

Name: monica
Lines: How dirty do you think I am? I’m telling you, if you had some candles and some bubbles and some music, you would love it! It would take all of your stress away.

Name: chandler
Lines: Honey, it’s 2:00 on a Wednesday and I’m watching Road Rules, how stressed do you think I am?

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, Chandler, you got a minute? I-I really need to talk to you.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh! Uh, yeah! Is this a cold pizza talk or a leftover meatloaf talk?

Name: joey
Lines: Well, neither.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh my God, what’s up?!

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t know. It’s-it’s just…lately, I’ve been feeling… Okay, here’s what it is…

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh no-no, no you don’t, just come back.

Name: joey
Lines: All right. Okay. You and Monica, friends for a long time, and sure there are rules, but then you went to London. Oh, no, but that’s different. I mean, there are rules there, too! You know what I mean?

Name: chandler
Lines: Do you?

Name: joey
Lines: It was different for you guys! I mean, I mean, you were both in the same place, right?

Name: chandler
Lines: In London?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes. When Monica and I were in London, we were both in London.

Name: joey
Lines: You know what? This is a bad idea. Forget it. Forget it, and listen, do me a favor, this conversation was between you and me.

Name: chandler
Lines: If that.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi! Oh, Ross, don’t forget, we have that doctor’s appointment tomorrow!

Name: ross
Lines: Right.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey, are you going to find out the sex of the baby?

Name: ross
Lines: No-no, we talked about it. We don’t want to know. All we care about is that it’s happy and healthy.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yep! Happy and healthy! And cute!

Name: ross
Lines: And smart!

Name: rachel
Lines: Popular.

Name: ross
Lines: With an aptitude for science.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Are you two talking about the same baby? Hey! Have you started off thinking of names yet?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh yeah! I’ve come up with a bunch of ideas!

Name: ross
Lines: Really? Me too!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Me too!

Name: rachel
Lines: Really?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh huh! If it’s a girl, Phoebe, and if it’s a boy, Phoebo!

Name: ross
Lines: Maybe. But it wouldn’t hurt to have a backup, you know? Uh, Rach-Rach, what were you thinking?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay! I was thinking if it’s a girl, how about Sandrine? It’s French.

Name: ross
Lines: Huh. That’s a really pretty name for-for an industrial solvent.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay fine, what do you have?

Name: ross
Lines: Well, OK, it’s for a boy. Well, I know it’s a little out there, but…Darwin.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow, oh my God, our child will be beaten to death in the schoolyard.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, by Sandrine.

Name: ross
Lines: You’re just saying that 'cause I said no to your name!

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m really, really not.

Name: phoebe
Lines: How-how about you each get five vetoes?

Name: ross
Lines: All right.

Name: rachel
Lines: All right.

Name: ross
Lines: That sounds fair.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah! I don’t think you’re going to need it though. Okay, check this out. If it’s a girl, Rain.

Name: ross
Lines: Veto.

Name: rachel
Lines: Why?

Name: ross
Lines: Rain? Hi. Hi, my name is Rain. I have my own kiln, and my dress is made out of wheat.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I know her! I bought homemade soap from her at a Dead show!

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, how about, for a guy, Thatcher?

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross, why do you hate our child?

Name: ross
Lines: Fine, you go.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, James.

Name: ross
Lines: Huh.

Name: rachel
Lines: But only if it’s a girl.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, veto. How about—Ooh, I like Ruth! What about Ruth?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh! I’m sorry! Are we having an 89-year-old? How about Dayton?

Name: ross
Lines: Veto. Stewart?

Name: rachel
Lines: Veto. Sawyer?

Name: ross
Lines: Veto. Helen?

Name: rachel
Lines: Veto.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Is it me, or is veto starting to sound really good?

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: monica
Lines: Boy, do I have a surprise for you!

Name: chandler
Lines: Sex on the balcony?

Name: monica
Lines: No, but someone’s really not going to get over that idea, are they?

Name: chandler
Lines: What is it?

Name: monica
Lines: I drew you a bath!

Name: chandler
Lines: Honey, I don’t like baths! Could you draw me a picture of us having sex on the balcony?

Name: monica
Lines: Please, could you just try it for me? Come on, I used all my best stuff! I-I-I lit some candles. I put on some music. I used bath salts, plus bubble bath! And got you this little plastic Navy ship. So it’s a boy bath!

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, this does butch it up a bit.

Name: monica
Lines: I swear, if you try it, you will love it!

Name: chandler
Lines: All right, if I do this, can we at least discuss sex on the balcony?

Name: monica
Lines: Absolutely.

Name: monica
Lines: Bet I know how that discussion’s going to go.

Name: chandler
Lines: All right, this isn’t so bad. I like the flower smell! Which is okay, because I’ve got my boat.

Name: monica
Lines: So?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh my God.

Name: monica
Lines: I told you you were a bath person! Hey, when you get out, maybe I can give you a facial!

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m going to need a bigger boat.

Name: ross
Lines: I don’t think you had an open mind about the name Ruth. I mean, come on, little Ruthie Geller, how-how cute is that?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, oh my God! I can practically hear the mahjong tiles!

Name: ross
Lines: Uh, no. No, we’re not.

Name: rachel
Lines: But you have it right there in that file? You could tell us whether it’s a boy or a girl? Dayton or Sandrine? Phoebe or Phoebo?

Name: ross
Lines: No, no, we want to wait, right?

Name: rachel
Lines: Right. Right.

Name: rachel
Lines: So, which of these babies do you think is the ugliest?

Name: ross
Lines: What? Rach! Come on, that’s terrible! They’re…uh…they’re babies. They’re-they’re all beautiful.

Name: rachel
Lines: Third one from the left?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, why is it staring at me? I think it knows I’m talking about it.  Don’t-don’t you—Wh—Wha—Hey!!

Name: rachel
Lines: What?!

Name: ross
Lines: You’re looking!

Name: rachel
Lines: I didn’t!

Name: ross
Lines: I saw you!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay fine, I did. But I didn’t see anything, I swear.

Name: ross
Lines: Shame on you! Ugly baby judges you!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, but Ross just listen to me…

Name: ross
Lines: No, no, no, no! Don’t tell me! I don’t want to know!

Name: rachel
Lines: But I couldn’t even if I wanted to, because I don’t know! I swear; I didn’t see anything, and I don’t want to know! It was just a momentary lapse.

Name: ross
Lines: Momentary lapse. Don’t-don’t you have any self-control?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, a couple months late on the lecture, Ross.

Name: monica
Lines: Hello?

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m in the bathroom, can you come in here? I think there’s something wrong.

Name: monica
Lines: You know what? I-I think I’ll wait out here.

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m in the bathtub.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh.  What’s wrong?

Name: chandler
Lines: I drew my own bath, but I did it wrong! The water’s tepid. The salt didn’t dissolve and is now… lodged places. And the scents I used don’t compliment each other. Eucalyptus and chamomile—Oh!

Name: monica
Lines: What?

Name: chandler
Lines: The bath salts! They’re starting to effervesce! It’s different.  It’s interesting.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, let’s talk about something else.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah! Sure, sure. So, what was going on with you today? Oh-oh-oh!

Name: monica
Lines: Well, I actually had the weirdest conversation with Joey. He was talking about rules and right and wrong and…

Name: chandler
Lines: I had the exact same conversation.

Name: monica
Lines: You did? What was he talking about?

Name: chandler
Lines: I don’t know! Joey hasn’t had this much trouble getting out words since we saw him in Macbeth!

Name: monica
Lines: That was a long night.

Name: chandler
Lines: All right, let’s break this down. What exactly did he say to you?

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, he was talking about rules.

Name: chandler
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: monica
Lines: Umm, and looking at people differently.

Name: chandler
Lines: He didn’t say anything about that to me.

Name: monica
Lines: What did he tell you?

Name: chandler
Lines: He was asking all these questions about you, me, and London. And, of course the glue that holds this all together, the rules.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay. So you, me and London. Looking at people differently. Maybe he wants to do what you and I did in London with someone.

Name: chandler
Lines: But what did he mean by rules?

Name: monica
Lines: Wait a minute! He stopped talking the minute Phoebe came in!

Name: chandler
Lines: Because he was looking at her differently.

Name: monica
Lines: And Phoebe is his friend, so he thinks that would be breaking the rules!

Name: chandler
Lines: My God! He wants to do it with Phoebe in London!

Name: phoebe
Lines: You guys?

Name: monica
Lines: Just a minute!  That’s Mrs. Tribbiani!

Name: chandler
Lines: You don’t say anything.

Name: monica
Lines: Why would I say anything? That two of our best friends could start the greatest love affair of their lives! And they would have me to thank, and we could all start having babies?

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m not going to let you say anything.

Name: monica
Lines: You just stay here!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, God!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, hey, Monica, I brought back your iron.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, you had that?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: monica
Lines: I thought I lost it. I got a new one, like, a month ago.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, just as well, I broke this one.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?

Name: monica
Lines: Nothing.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: I mean, I-I, I really shouldn’t say. I mean, I’m really not supposed to.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Fine.

Name: monica
Lines: It’s a humdinger!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Then it’s really too bad that you can’t tell me.

Name: monica
Lines: Somebody likes you!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Is it Chandler?

Name: monica
Lines: No!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, then tell him to stop staring!

Name: monica
Lines: It’s Joey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Really?! Joey?! You don’t say.

Name: monica
Lines: Is it something you’d be interested in?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I don’t know, I don’t know, I don’t know. You know, I mean, on the one hand, Mother may I? But y’know on the other hand… No. No, I can’t. We’re friends. No, oh, no. I don’t want to risk what we have.

Name: monica
Lines: I guess that makes sense. So, you think you’re going to talk to him?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Sure, yeah. I mean, it’s Joey. I don’t want him to get hurt. Well, I must say, I am on fire! First Chandler, now Joey!

Name: monica
Lines: Not Chandler, just Joey.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Sure.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey.

Name: rachel
Lines: You know what? I’ve been thinking about it. I’m really coming around on the name Ruth. I think I would actually consider naming our child that.

Name: ross
Lines: Rach, I-I can’t tell you how-how much that means to me! Ohh… Wait a minute. Wait a minute. You-you hated the name Ruth! Why-why would you change your mind? Unless, you know we’re never going to have to use it. You did see the folder. You know it’s a boy!

Name: rachel
Lines: I didn’t see anything! I actually changed my mind about the name.

Name: ross
Lines: I don’t think so! You’re just giving me Ruth so you’ll get to name it when it’s a boy, and that’s when you’ll swoop in and name him Heath or Blaine or Sequoia.

Name: rachel
Lines: I would—Sequoia?

Name: ross
Lines: Veto.

Name: rachel
Lines: Fine.

Name: ross
Lines: Unless…  You anticipated that I would figure all this out and you know that it actually is a girl, and you really do want her to be named Ruth! Well, I’m not falling for that! Okay? Ruth is off the table!

Name: rachel
Lines: But Ross, you want the name Ruth!

Name: ross
Lines: Not like this!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey. Well, what’s up?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Umm, Joey, I know.

Name: joey
Lines: What?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I knooow.

Name: joey
Lines: Whaaat?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I know about your feelings.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh my God. You do?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes, and I’m sorry. I-I know things worked out for Chandler and Monica, but that’s very rare.

Name: joey
Lines: I know. I know. And this is so much more complicated than it was for those guys. I mean, it’s Rachel for God sakes.

Name: phoebe
Lines: For God sakes, it’s Rachel!

Name: joey
Lines: I know. I know. And she’s not only my friend; she’s my pregnant friend! She’s my pregnant friend who’s Ross’ ex!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah that’s Rachel.  Beat me over the head with it.

Name: joey
Lines: What am I going to do? You know, and I keep, I keep trying to get rid of these feelings, y’know? I stayed up all last night and made a list of everything I don’t like about her. You want to hear it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah.

Name: joey
Lines: She made me switch to light Mayo. That’s it! That’s all I got! And, you know what? It tastes the same and my pants fit better!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Joey, I just think you’re getting worked up over nothing. This is probably just a crush.

Name: joey
Lines: You think?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Absolutely! Y’know, you get this rush of feelings, but then it goes away.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, just a crush! That’s all this is! It’s a crush! I’m Joey; I don’t get deep feelings.

Name: phoebe
Lines: That’s right, there you go! Crushes happen all the time! I know I’ve had them for all you guys. Well, except for Ross and Chandler. And I’m sure you’ve had them for us.

Name: joey
Lines: Not really.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Mm-hmm.  Throw me a bone here.

Name: ross
Lines: So, I uh… I called the doctor and now we both know the sex of the baby.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: That’s right. The student has become the master.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross, I swear, I don’t know.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, come on, you know it’s a girl!

Name: rachel
Lines: A what?!

Name: ross
Lines: You really didn’t know?

Name: rachel
Lines: We’re having a girl?

Name: ross
Lines: No.

Name: rachel
Lines: That’s what you just said!

Name: ross
Lines: No.

Name: rachel
Lines: You said girl!

Name: ross
Lines: Yes. I’m… I’m sorry. I’m so sorry.

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m not! We’re having a girl! Sometimes I can’t believe it’s with you—But still! We’re having a girl!

Name: ross
Lines: I know! I know. You know what? I’m putting Ruth back on the table!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, yes! We’ll have ourselves a little baby Ruth…

Name: ross
Lines: Permission to veto.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes, please.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey.

Name: chandler
Lines: Do I smell essential oils?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah, I’m going to take a bath. I’m just going to get a magazine.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: What do you think you’re doing?

Name: chandler
Lines: L-leaving my troubles behind?

Name: monica
Lines: I know that you’re new at this, but this is completely unacceptable bath decorum.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, it’s so hard to care when you’re this relaxed.

Name: monica
Lines: Fine, you can have the bath, but I am taking your boat. Now you’re just a girl in a tub!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hi, Bubbles. Manly. Well, I just thought I would drop by and let you know how it went with Joey.

Name: chandler
Lines: You told her?!

Name: monica
Lines: She pulled it out of me! She’s like a conversational wizard! How’d it go?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, you were wrong, he doesn’t like me!

Name: monica
Lines: What?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah! How would you like it if I sent you to Lee Majors’ house and told you that he liked you, and you went down there and you found out that he didn’t like you? How would you feel?

Name: monica
Lines: I don’t think I’d care.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Really? Lee Majors is hot!

Name: joey
Lines: Hello?

Name: phoebe
Lines: We’re in the bathroom!

Name: joey
Lines: Why?

Name: chandler
Lines: Because it’s a relaxing and enjoyable time!

Name: joey
Lines: What are you guys doing in here?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God! A friend he’s looking at differently, but it’s wrong. It’s Rachel!

Name: chandler
Lines: You like Rachel?!

Name: joey
Lines: It’s no big deal, okay? Phoebe and I talked about it. It’s just a crush! It’s going to go away!  Dude, you gotta rearrange your bubbles! Oh!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Mazel tov.

Name: rachel
Lines: NA

Name: monica
Lines: Honey, cover it up with the boat!

Name: ross
Lines: Hello?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes we’re all in here and we would love for you to join us!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, did you, did you tell them?

Name: rachel
Lines: No, I was waiting for you!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Tell us what?

Name: rachel
Lines: We’re having a girl.

Name: chandler
Lines: I’ll…I’ll get you later!

Name: joey
Lines: All right. It’s a new day, and it’s just a crush, that’s all! Just a little crush! All that worrying I was doing, that was crazy. Crazy! Like my friend here the bird would say, \it was cuckoo!\" Everything’s going to be fine. It’s just a crush."

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi, sweetie.

Name: joey
Lines: I love you.

Name: monica
Lines: It sure is nice to do this together, isn’t it?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah. And what you’re doing feels so good.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m not touching you.

Name: chandler
Lines: You’re not?

Name: monica
Lines: It’s the salts.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, sweet Lord. New realms of pleasure!

Name: monica
Lines: Whatever keeps you off the balcony, big guy!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, what’s up?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, I left my guitar here again.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, okay. No problem.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh.

Name: monica
Lines: Here you go.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Great! Umm…

Name: monica
Lines: What?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: So do you want to hang out or something?

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe! You kinda caught me at a bad time.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh are you and Chandler…

Name: monica
Lines: Yes! Exactly.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay. Do you guys want me to play for you?

Name: monica
Lines: NA

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey Pheebs, what’s up?

Name: phoebe
Lines: You ask an intriguing question Chandler Bing.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God! You’re getting a massage! You never let me massage you!!

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe, I can explain!

Name: phoebe
Lines: You told me you hate massages!

Name: chandler
Lines: Buy stamps, pick up dry cleaning…Don’t let Phoebe in.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can’t believe this! How long as this been going on?

Name: monica
Lines: Well umm, Alexandra has been…

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, it has a name?

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe, don’t get upset!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay—Oop! Too late! I’m leaving! Come on Chandler let’s go!

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, Phoebe I thought I’d—

Name: joey
Lines: Oh okay, okay! One more push! One more push! Come on honey, we’re almost there! We’re almost there!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh Joey, I’m so happy things worked out for us that we’re having this baby together. I love you so much.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, I love you too.

Name: rachel
Lines: And I hope it’s not an inappropriate time to say this but, you’re the best sex I ever had.

Name: joey
Lines: That’s always appropriate!  Oh, okay. One more push! One more push!

Name: ross
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey! Joey!

Name: joey
Lines: What? What’s going on?

Name: rachel
Lines: Come feel this! Come feel my belly!

Name: joey
Lines: Aaaah…

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey! The baby is kicking for the first time! Will you please come feel this?!

Name: joey
Lines: Really?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, y’know what? Maybe uh, you…you should come to me. I’m a not, I’m not wearing any bottoms.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, okay!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh my, oh my God!

Name: rachel
Lines: Aw, it’s unbelievable! Wow! She is kicking so much! Oh, she’s like umm…oh…who’s that kind of annoying girl soccer player?

Name: joey
Lines: Mia Hamm?

Name: rachel
Lines: Mia Hamm!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh that’s amazing.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh-oh!! One hand on the sheet Joe!

Name: joey
Lines: Whoa-hey-oh! Sorry!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey babe.

Name: monica
Lines: Hi honey. We just got a wedding gift from Bob and Faye Bing; they don’t like us do they?

Name: chandler
Lines: Who says you can’t get a nice punch bowl for under six bucks? Maybe we can take it back?

Name: monica
Lines: No, it doesn’t say where it came from. Where would we return it?

Name: chandler
Lines: How about to the street say from the balcony?

Name: monica
Lines: Why don’t we just find a place for it?

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay. How about in that cabinet?

Name: monica
Lines: No! That’s where we keep the canned goods! Have you completely forgotten everything you learned at orientation?

Name: chandler
Lines: How about the closet by the bathroom?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, okay. Here, why don’t you let me do it?

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh no-no-no, I will do it. Honey, you have to learn to sit down and relax and let your husband take care of things once and awhile.  It’s locked, you have to help me. Why is it locked?

Name: monica
Lines: No reason. I-I keep private things in there.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh y’know, I’ve been living here a while and I’ve never seen what’s inside that closet. What is, what is in there?

Name: monica
Lines: Feminine stuff.

Name: chandler
Lines: Don’t try to make me uncomfortable with feminine stuff!

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler, there is nothing in there that concerns you! If you love me you-you’ll let it go.

Name: chandler
Lines: Fine.

Name: monica
Lines: Thank you!

Name: chandler
Lines: Love you.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You!

Name: chandler
Lines: Phoebe if it helps Alexandra has only been massaging Monica for like three years.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Why won’t you let me massage you?

Name: monica
Lines: Well it’s…I mean I’d just—I’d be self-conscious. You’re my friend; I’d be naked.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Monica! We lived together for years! I’ve seen you naked!

Name: monica
Lines: That’s different, we were roommates! And when?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: I’m curious about the human body.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey, come on Phoebe, you can understand why this would be weird for me.

Name: phoebe
Lines: But I’m a professional! And I’m really good! Look, if you’re uncomfortable we can stop. Just give me a chance, okay. Please?

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, if it means that much to you…

Name: phoebe
Lines: It does! How would you feel if you couldn’t share your cooking? Or-or imagine how Ross would feel if he couldn’t teach us about dragons.

Name: monica
Lines: Dinosaurs.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Potato, potaato.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey Ross! The baby’s kicking!

Name: ross
Lines: What?! It is?!

Name: rachel
Lines: It’s not kicking right now. Although we would love to see you do  that again.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, when-when was it kicking? What happened?

Name: rachel
Lines: Last night! I just felt it and I went into Joey’s room and he was sleeping…

Name: joey
Lines: A dreamless sleep.

Name: ross
Lines: My God, the baby’s kicking. That’s great. Although I…kinda wish I-I would’ve been there to feel the kicking for the first time y’know.

Name: joey
Lines: Well I got stuff going on in here  if you wanna feel.

Name: ross
Lines: Look, I-I don’t want to miss anymore baby stuff. So…Here. Here’s my new pager number, okay? Anytime anything pregnancy related happens use it! I’ll be there! Okay? I don’t care if it’s three in the morning and all you want is ice cream.

Name: joey
Lines: Wow! Can I get a copy of that?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Are you under the sheet?

Name: monica
Lines: Yes.

Name: phoebe
Lines: How’s the pressure?

Name: monica
Lines: Nice! Wow Phoebe you are good!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Stating the obvious, but thank you. And it’s not weird is it.

Name: monica
Lines: No. Ooohh…

Name: phoebe
Lines: That’s right, you just enjoy.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh. Oh yeah! Ohhhhh! Ohh! Oh yeah!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh God Phoebe!!

Name: chandler
Lines: I wasn’t trying to open your closet! I wasn’t trying to open your closet! I swear!

Name: joey
Lines: Whoa, Monica runs a pretty tight ship over here. What are you doing?

Name: chandler
Lines: Monica has a secret closet and she won’t let me see what’s in it.

Name: joey
Lines: Why not?

Name: chandler
Lines: I don’t know! What could she possibly be hiding in here that I can’t see?!

Name: joey
Lines: I don’t know. Ooh, I bet it’s Richard.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why would Monica be keeping Richard in here?

Name: joey
Lines: Well off the top of my head uhh, maybe she’s having her cake and eating it too. You being the cake and Richard being the too. Or!

Name: chandler
Lines: And here we go…

Name: joey
Lines: I saw this movie once where there was a door and no one knew what was behind it, and when they finally got it open millions and millions and millions of bugs came pouring out and they feasted on human flesh. Y’know it wouldn’t kill ya to respect your wife’s privacy!  Stupid closet full of bugs!

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey. Joey, something feels weird and not good weird. I don’t—Whoa!!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh hey whoa-whoa, don’t worry. Okay. When my sisters were pregnant they got every weird feeling in the book, it was always nothing.

Name: rachel
Lines: Really?

Name: joey
Lines: Absolutely. But, we’re gonna stop by the hospital just to be sure, okay? I’ll page Ross on the way. Come on.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. Oh God—Ow!—Oo!

Name: joey
Lines: Okay Rach-Rach-Rach look at me, look at me, everything’s gonna be fine, trust me. Okay. Take my hand. Here we go.  Oww crushing bones!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! So?

Name: rachel
Lines: Hmm, mild discomfort. So I take it you’ve had one of these Braxton thingies?

Name: joey
Lines: So but everything is normal.

Name: joey
Lines: And-and there’s no danger to her and the baby?

Name: rachel
Lines: Thank you doctor.  Oh thank you for being so nice and calm.

Name: joey
Lines: Calm?! I wasn’t calm! I’ve never been more scared in all my life!

Name: rachel
Lines: But wait you said everything was gonna be okay.

Name: joey
Lines: Well what do I know?! I’m not a doctor!

Name: rachel
Lines: But I—But everything is okay. I’m fine!

Name: joey
Lines: You sure?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes! Yes! I got half a mind to contract that doctor’s uterus though. Mild discomfort, what’s he talking about?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh hey-hey!

Name: ross
Lines: Is everything okay?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, everything’s fine!

Name: ross
Lines: Your page said come to the hospital, what? What was it? What happened?

Name: joey
Lines: Something called Braxton-Hicks contractions.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh. Oh. Thank God, most women don’t even feel them.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, no uterus, no opinion.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey uh, what’s with the candy?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh when you beeped me I was on line at the concession stand at the movie theater.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh you went to the movies by yourself?

Name: ross
Lines: No I—Mona!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, I gotta go back in there.

Name: ross
Lines: What? Why? What’s wrong?

Name: rachel
Lines: No, everything’s fine. I just gotta go back…

Name: ross

Name: rachel
Lines: I-I forgot my underwear.

Name: ross
Lines: So, thanks so much for bringing her to the hospital.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh hey, don’t worry about it man. Don’t worry about it, no big deal.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah but still, I mean it should’ve been me. I’m the dad.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh uh, hey. Not as good as this guy!  He brought Twizlers!

Name: chandler
Lines: There has got to be a way!

Name: joey
Lines: Easy there Captain Kirk. Oh, do you have a bobby pin?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah.  Oh no wait, I’m not an nine-year-old girl.

Name: joey

Name: chandler
Lines: Maybe Monica has a bobby pin.

Name: joey
Lines: Sure. \Monica.\"

Name: chandler
Lines: So, how’s the hideously inappropriate crush on Rachel coming?

Name: joey
Lines: Uh, really good. Really good. Yeah, I should be ready to kill myself any day now.  By the way, I have no idea what I’m doing here. For all I know I’m just locking it more. Oh hey, did you try opening it with a credit card?

Name: chandler
Lines: That’s a good idea.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.  So uh, Ross is kinda bummed huh?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, I just…I feel terrible.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, it’s not your fault. What are you gonna do? Not take her to the hospital? Y’know? You’re doing nothing wrong.  Richard? If-if you’re in there, could you pass me my credit card?

Name: monica
Lines: Hey.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey.

Name: monica
Lines: I gotta tell you, yesterday was amazing. That massage felt so good!

Name: phoebe
Lines: No-no, I got that.

Name: monica

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay. Okay but you should know though, I’ve raised my rates to $200 an hour.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.

Lines: I mean $500.

Name: monica
Lines: What?

Name: monica
Lines: What’s going on?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, you make sex noises when you get massaged!

Name: monica
Lines: What?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, and it really freaked me out! And after a while I even tried to hurt you and it just spurred you on.

Name: monica
Lines: What?! You’re crazy! There’s nothing sexual about the noises I make!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Really? There’s nothing sexual about this?  I mean hi.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my—This is so embarrassing. Oh my God, I’m never gonna get massaged again!

Name: phoebe

Name: monica

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well not clients, lovers. But let’s just y’know, try it again. Come back and-and we’ll work through it.

Name: monica
Lines: Are you sure?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes.

Name: monica
Lines: I guess.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Great! Okay, if you’ll just excuse me.  So, did you hear something you liked?

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey Ross! Check it out! I learned a new trick!

Name: ross

Name: rachel
Lines: Ohh! That’s so sweet of you! Oh yum!  Did you put pickles on this?

Name: ross

Lines: Oh Ross!!

Name: joey

Name: joey
Lines: Pickle? Pickles make her sick. Giving her pickles is like giving me salad.

Name: ross

Name: joey
Lines: I’m on it!

Name: ross
Lines: I can’t believe this! I shouldn’t be the one making her throw up!

Name: joey

Name: rachel

Name: joey

Name: rachel
Lines: But Joey, I don’t think Ross wants me to move into his apartment and disrupt his life like that. I mean——Or he does.

Name: ross
