Name: rachel
Lines: But Ross, its you and me!

Name: ross
Lines: So? Sure! But it-it wouldn’t be anything romantic. And I’m-I’m dating Mona—Damnit Mona! I was supposed to meet her like an hour ago! What is wrong with me?!

Name: joey
Lines: All right now, so? What do you think?

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t know. Is it crazy?

Name: ross
Lines: No! No it’s not. Joey, this is a smart idea.

Name: joey
Lines: Well, I was due.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, let’s do it. I’ll move in.

Name: ross

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh Rach that’s great. That’s great.

Name: chandler

Name: chandler

Name: monica
Lines: No Chandler, you don’t understand!  Okay! Okay! Okay! Fine! Now you know. Okay? I’m y’know…I’m sick.

Name: monica

Name: monica

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: chandler
Lines: So Rachel’s all moved out huh? How are you taking it?

Name: joey
Lines: Well uh, I wanted to have a few beers, but uh, I got rid of those because Rachel couldn’t stand the smell of them. But I have thrown back a lot of orange juice with calcium though. And uh, it’s a couple weeks past it’s expiration date, so it’s got a bit of a kick.

Name: chandler
Lines: Are you okay?

Name: joey
Lines: Are you kidding me? I’m great! Yeah, I’m uh; I’m better than great. I am good. And now that she’s gone, I can uh, I can do all this stuff around here that I couldn’t do before. Y’know? Like umm, I can walk around naked again. Y’know? I can uh, I can watch porn in the living room. Right? This is uh, this is good for me. Y’know? I like being on my own, I’m uh, better off this way. I’m uh, a lone wolf. Y’know? A loner. Alone. All alone. Forever. What’s a wolf got to do to get a huh around here?!

Name: monica
Lines: Ohhh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: That’s it. Just relax.

Name: monica
Lines: Ohh. Oh! Ohh!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Come on more!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh God!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, you like that don’t you?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh yeah right there!

Name: phoebe
Lines: You want it there? You take it there baby!

Name: monica
Lines: Uh Phoebe?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, say my name. Say it!  And now I’m going to cover you back up, and umm we’re never doing this again.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh! Hey, Rach!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi! Hey, Happy Valentine’s Day!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, you, too.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, so, uh, how’s it going living over at Ross’?

Name: rachel
Lines: It’s good. Except he makes us watch the Discovery Channel all day long. Did you know that something really boring happened to someone really ugly in the Middle Ages?  Oh, thank you. I’ll see you guys later.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.

Name: joey
Lines: Bye.

Name: joey
Lines: There’s one lucky to-go cup of coffee.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Honey, I wish you would get over her. I hate seeing you like this. Is there anything I can do for you? Do you want to look down my top?

Name: joey
Lines: Thanks. But maybe later.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, Gunther, can I get a scone?

Name: joey
Lines: You know what I want? I want a lot of things! I want to be with the woman I love on Valentine’s Day! And I want her to love me back! And I want just one moment of relief from the gut-wrenching pain of knowing that that’s never going to happen!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, okay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: So, how does Mona feel about you and Rachel living together?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, I’m actually on my way to tell her right now. Yeah, she’s been away all week visiting her parents, but she’ll be cool. I mean, she’s been so supportive. She-she even got the baby a tiny T-shirt that says, ‘Fossils are my friends.’

Name: phoebe
Lines: Ugh. Come on, Mona, don’t kiss ass.

Name: ross
Lines: Uh, I’m going to take off.

Name: phoebe
Lines: All right. Oh! Shoot! Oh shoot! Uh, Rachel wanted to see this tape!

Name: ross
Lines: What is it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: It’s a video of my friend giving birth. Could you just bring it back to your apartment?

Name: ross
Lines: All right.  ‘Candy and Cookie?’

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah. Candy’s the mother, Cookie’s the daughter. The father’s also Cookie. Why am I friends with these people?

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe, c’mere. I want to show you something in the bathroom.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, Monica, grow up!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, what’s behind your back?

Name: monica
Lines: Nothing. Just something I want to get Phoebe’s opinion on for Valentine’s Day.

Name: ross
Lines: You don’t want my opinion?

Name: monica
Lines: Not really.

Name: ross
Lines: Come on, I’m your older brother, ask me!

Name: monica
Lines: All right, big brother.  Which of these do you think would make your little sister look hotter, so your best friend would want to do her?

Name: ross
Lines: The red one.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey. Look, I know you’ve been really depressed lately, so I brought someone over to cheer you up. Right outside this door is a real, live, furry playmate.

Name: joey
Lines: No, I’m not sleeping with your friend Jane again.

Name: phoebe
Lines: He-hee!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey! A dog! Hi! Who, you got to admit, looks a lot like Jane.

Name: phoebe
Lines: This is the happiest dog in the world. I borrowed him from my friend Wendy. Now, you can only keep him until he cheers you up. And he will cheer you up!

Name: joey
Lines: Thanks so much, Pheebs!  Oh! Not that kind of fun.

Name: chandler
Lines: Happy Valentine’s!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay! I’ll be right out. I’m slipping into something a little less comfortable, and a little more slutty.

Name: chandler
Lines: NA

Name: chandler
Lines: I love you, St. Valentine.

Name: chandler

Lines: Hi.

Lines: I accidentally packed these with my stuff.  Who is this?

Name: joey

Lines: Why did you get me this?

Name: monica

Name: chandler
Lines: It’s yelling…bleeding…dilating. Oh, the dilating…

Name: monica
Lines: Is this the video of the baby being born? Sweetie, this is Phoebe’s. Why were you even watching it?

Name: chandler
Lines: I thought…maybe…you got me porn for Valentine’s Day.

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler, if you thought I was going to get you porn for Valentine’s Day…  Oh, wait a minute. Those aren’t stars. Anyway, you want to take a look?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I’m not really in a sexy mood right now.

Name: monica
Lines: Honey, what’s going on?

Lines: Well, remember the first time we saw Jaws?

Name: monica
Lines: Mm-hmm.

Name: chandler
Lines: How long it took to go back in the water?

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler, we can’t let this tape wreck Valentine’s Day!

Name: chandler
Lines: You don’t know. You didn’t see it.

Name: monica
Lines: Child-birth, it’s a natural thing! It’s beautiful.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, beautiful? Really? Beautiful? You think this is beautiful?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh! Oh, my God! No wonder my mother hates me!

Name: chandler
Lines: See, honey, there’s—

Name: monica
Lines: Don’t touch me!

Lines: Hey!  So, how was Atlantic City?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah?

Name: ross
Lines: Wha—? Oh, come on. You didn’t have to—saltwater taffy?!  Thanks! This is interesting. You know, most people think this is made with sea water, but it’s actually made with, uh, salted fresh water. That’s not interesting.

Name: ross
Lines: I do too! I missed you!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, it was good! It was good. Actually, the baby started kicking!

Name: ross

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, I’m missing out on all this other stuff, too. So, Joey suggested Rachel move in with me.

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: Huh…uh-huh.

Name: ross
Lines: NA

Lines: How could you not tell Mona that Rachel is living with you?

Name: ross
Lines: I don’t know, she seemed to think it was such a crazy idea! Um, plus, she, uh, she got me taffy!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Taffy, really? I’ve never had any.

Name: ross
Lines: Ever?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, I think my mother was too busy planning her suicide to provide saltwater treats.  Thank you! So what, you’re just never going to tell her?

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, no, no, no, I will! I just want to butter her up, first! You know, I’m going to take her to an amazing Valentine’s dinner. Do all this romantic stuff, and then, just when she thinks I’m the best boyfriend in the world, then I’m going to tell her that my pregnant ex-girlfriend is living with me.

Name: joey
Lines: So, between her and me being friends, and her history with Ross, it just isn’t going to happen. It would be like you falling in love with a cat.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey, buddy. How’s my favorite dog, huh? How’s my favorite dog?  Did you give him a beer?

Name: joey
Lines: No.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Will you excuse us, we need to talk for a moment.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, sure. Go ahead.  Oh, me, right!

Name: phoebe

Name: joey
Lines: Nothing. We just talked about stuff.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What stuff?

Name: joey

Name: phoebe

Name: joey

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, I’m going to take him back to Wendy’s.

Name: joey
Lines: No, no, no, no! He’s fine! Look, look, look!  Get your ball! My God, what have I done to you, huh? I broke the dog! Pheebs, I broke the dog!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, I’ve got big Valentine’s plans! I’ve got my Chinese food on the way, and the rest of your saltwater taffy!

Name: ross
Lines: Y’know, it’s interesting! Most people think that’s made with seawater, when in fact—

Name: rachel
Lines: Ooh! My Chinese food! Let me get my cash!

Lines: Mona? What are—hi! What are you doing here? I’m, um, supposed to pick you up!

Name: ross

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, hey, Mona!

Name: ross
Lines: I have no idea!

Name: rachel
Lines: I’ll be watching TV if anybody needs me.

Name: ross
Lines: Uh…lately, she just likes hanging out here.

Name: ross
Lines: I think she’s lonely.

Name: ross
Lines: I know.

Name: ross
Lines: No, no. She’s way to emotional. And by emotional I mean crazy.

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m not here! That’s just my Chinese food!

Name: ross
Lines: Mm-hmm. She’s—she’s emotional, but, but ballsy.

Name: rachel
Lines: You know what I’m going to do? I’m going to get in my sweats, and eat this in bed!

Name: ross

Name: ross

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m just going to grab the phone.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, I’m sorry! Do you need the phone?

Name: rachel
Lines: But, but, Mona, I live here.

Name: ross

Lines: 90 seconds.

Name: monica
Lines: That’s better. 90 seconds is a long time not to think about it…except all I did was think about it.

Name: chandler
Lines: You know, it haunts me? Up ‘til now, the worst thing I ever saw, was my father doing tequila shots off the naked houseboy. After this, I would gladly make that my screensaver!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, well, we have to get past this! Why don’t we get rid of the tape and pretend it never existed?

Name: chandler
Lines: I can do that.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay. Now all we’ve got to do is get rid of this chair.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, thank God!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, I know!

Name: monica
Lines: Come in!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi! I’m so sorry to barge in on your Valentine’s, but I had to get away from all the yelling. Mona is dumping Ross.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, my God.

Name: chandler
Lines: Poor Ross.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, great. We have to watch him do yoga in his underwear, but for this he closes the drapes!

Name: monica
Lines: Rach, you know that birthing tape you wanted to see? It’s here.

Name: rachel
Lines: Why? You saw it? Is it scary?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, let’s just say it’s ironic how footage of someone being born can make you want to kill yourself.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, now, wait. Now I’m all freaked out. Come on, you guys will watch it with me.

Name: monica
Lines: No, but I will leave a sweater that smells like me right next to you!

Name: rachel
Lines: C’mon, seriously, you guys, you’re not going to make me watch this alone!

Name: monica
Lines: She’s right…of course not. Honey, get the tape.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay, here we go.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.  Woah! Why is that baby torturing that woman?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Why have I seen this thing three times?!

Name: monica
Lines: It’s…still beautiful.

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh! It’s horrible!

Name: monica
Lines: I know! I know, I’m so sorry for you!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, my God!

Name: chandler
Lines: Wait, you guys, look!

Name: rachel
Lines: What? Did her ass explode?!

Name: chandler
Lines: No, the baby’s out! Look, look!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, look at those little fingers and toes!

Name: chandler
Lines: And look how happy the mom is now!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh…Rach!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, screw you guys, you don’t have to do it!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, hey, man!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey, what’s up?

Name: ross
Lines: Uh…Mona just dumped me.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, man, I’m sorry. Why?

Name: ross
Lines: Well, with everything that’s been going on lately, I haven’t exactly been the perfect boyfriend. You know, I, uh, I didn’t tell her I got Rachel pregnant. I gave her a key to my apartment, and then had the locks changed! And then I lied to her about Rachel moving in with me. In a way, I actually judge her for not breaking up with me sooner, you know?

Name: joey
Lines: Still, that really sucks, man. Especially on Valentine’s Day.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah. Wait a minute. What are you doing here? Joey Tribbiani without a date on Valentine’s Day? What’s going on, huh? Girl trouble?

Name: joey
Lines: Sort of.

Name: ross
Lines: Really?!

Name: joey
Lines: You don’t have to seem so happy about it.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, sorry. Well, look, maybe I can help you with it.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, I…I d—

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, whatever it is, I am sure it has happened to me. Y’know, actually once—once I got dumped during sex.

Name: ross
Lines: Anyway, so, uh, so what is it?

Name: joey
Lines: Forget about it. It’s no big deal.

Name: ross
Lines: C’mon! Joey! What is it?

Name: joey
Lines: It’s nothing.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, hey, it’s me. Why can’t you tell me?

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, uh…sit down.  Um… there’s this woman that I like. A lot. But, uh…it can’t happen.

Name: ross
Lines: She’s not a Tribbiani?

Name: joey
Lines: No!

Name: ross
Lines: I knew it. So, is she someone from work?

Name: joey
Lines: Yes.

Name: ross
Lines: Well, uh, does she like you?

Name: joey
Lines: Sometimes I think maybe she could. But it doesn’t matter, because I can’t do anything about it.

Name: ross
Lines: Why not?

Name: joey
Lines: Well, it’s complicated. She’s with this other guy. For a long time. Someone from work, too. And I could never do that to the guy, because we’re really good friends.

Name: ross
Lines: So, uh, this guy, she used to go out with, is, uh… is he still in love with her?

Name: joey
Lines: No. I don’t think so.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay. Um… is he a good guy?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, he’s the best.

Name: ross
Lines: Then talk to him! He might be fine with it.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, I don’t know.

Name: ross
Lines: Joey, it’s worth finding out. I mean, if you really like her.

Name: joey
Lines: I do! So much! I can’t stop thinking about her! I can’t sleep, I—

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, Joey, you know what? You have to go for it. How often does this happen to you, huh? You owe it to yourself.

Name: ross
Lines: I’m going to…uh…I’m going to, um, put the bourbon in it at home.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: Anyway… seriously, uh…just…just talk to the guy, okay? And tell me how it goes.

Name: joey
Lines: It’s Rachel.

Name: rachel
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: Hmm…maybe it starts with how she gets pregnant.

Name: joey
Lines: There’s this woman, that I like.  A lot.  Well, it’s complicated.  She’s with this other guy.  For a long time.  And I could never do that to the guy, y’know?  ’Ccause we’re really good friends.

Name: ross
Lines: So, uh, this guy, she used to go out with, is, uh… is he a good guy?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, he’s the best.

Name: ross
Lines: Then talk to him! He might be fine with it.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh, I don’t know.

Name: ross
Lines: Joey, it’s worth finding out. I mean, if you really like her.

Name: joey
Lines: I do! So much! I can’t stop thinking about her! I can’t sleep, I—

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, Joey, you know what? You have to go for it. How often does this happen to you, huh? You owe it to yourself.

Name: joey
Lines: It’s Rachel.

Name: ross
Lines: Did you um—I’m sorry, did you just say it’s Rachel?

Name: joey
Lines: Yes.

Name: ross
Lines: Um, you…you like Rachel?

Name: joey
Lines: Yes. I like Rachel.

Name: ross
Lines: Rachel?!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, okay but look, buy uh—Hey-hey, y’know, y’know who else I like? You! And it-it doesn’t get said enough. I like you Ross.

Name: ross
Lines: But R-R-Rachel-Rachel?!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, but it’s not a big deal.

Name: ross
Lines: It’s not a big deal? Oh, I’m sorry I just…um, I…what about all the stuff you-you just said? I mean how about, I like—you-you can’t stop thinking about her. Like how you can’t sleep?

Name: joey
Lines: I’m an actor, y’know? As-as a group, we tend to be over dramatic.

Name: ross
Lines: Rachel who’s carrying my baby? Rachel?

Name: joey
Lines: Look no, I-I know it’s bad, and I know it’s wrong. Okay? But-but it’s not like anything’s ever gonna happen. Y’know? These-these are just feelings, they’re gonna go away.

Name: ross
Lines: Y’know what? I-I gotta go.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh come on Ross! Hey Ross-Ross don’t…

Name: ross
Lines: I just—y’know—I-I just have one—Rachel?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh-oh! Okay, she’s kicking!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh!  She’s growing inside you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Whoa!!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh!

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow that was a big one.

Name: chandler
Lines: I think that’s the youngest girl ever to reject me.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh hey you guys!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh hey!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey listen let me ask you, do you believe in soul mates?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh yes I do. I do. I believe that there is one perfect person out there for everyone. And do you know how you find him? You stop looking for him. That’s why I stopped looking for Russell Crowe. He’ll find me.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh,  and you?

Name: chandler
Lines: No. I mean I believe that uh, certain people are more suited for each other and I believe in falling in love, but soul mates, I don’t think they exist.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, good.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well last night, I met Monica’s.

Name: chandler
Lines: What?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, I had a date with this guy, and I swear to God, he is her other half.

Name: chandler
Lines: Come on, don’t be crazy.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, what’s he like?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well he’s tall.

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh-huh.

Name: phoebe
Lines: He has brown hair.

Name: rachel
Lines: Of course, of course.

Name: chandler
Lines: A tall guy with hair similar to mine, oh unknowable universe!

Name: phoebe
Lines: He works with food!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh sure. Older?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Obviously, and he’s British.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, I was just gonna ask!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah? And, he’s-he’s so centered and mature and confident.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, it’s so sad they never had a chance to meet.

Name: chandler
Lines: Luckily, the guy she settled for can’t hear what you’re talking about.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh, I’m so sorry. Um, and maybe I’m wrong! I but—y’know I’m gonna go out with him again, I’ll find out more.

Name: chandler
Lines: You believe that this guy is destined for someone else and you’re still gonna date him?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, he may not be my soul mate, but a girl’s gotta eat.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey.

Name: monica
Lines: I just talked to Joey, I just—I want to see how you were.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh y’know, I still—I can’t believe it. Joey and Rachel I mean it’s… It’s like you and me going out, only weirder!

Name: monica
Lines: All right, I know you’re hurting, and-and I want to be supportive, but don’t say that again.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh my God! What if, what if they get married? Then he’d be the stepfather of my child.

Name: monica
Lines: Honey, I don’t think that’s something we need to worry about! First of all he’s-he’s never gonna tell her how he feels about her. And even if he did you have no idea how she’d react.

Name: ross
Lines: Sure, because women never like Joey. Y’know, I think he’s a virgin.

Name: monica
Lines: Joey…he’s not even thinking about going after Rachel!

Name: ross
Lines: He’s not?

Name: monica
Lines: No! All he’s thinking about is how you’re taking this! I mean, listen it’s totally freaking him out. He’s talking about moving to Vermont.

Name: ross
Lines: Why?

Name: monica
Lines: He says he wants to leave the country.  He thinks you hate him.

Name: ross
Lines: Hate him? I… No, I don’t hate him.  It’s just it’s Rachel, y’know?

Name: monica
Lines: Honey I can’t even imagine how hard this must be for you. But, I don’t want you to lose Joey over it. And right now he just needs to know that you’re still his friend.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay. Okay, I’ll talk to him.

Name: monica
Lines: All right. Now do it soon, he just asked me how to convert his dollars into Vermont money.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh! Hi!

Name: monica
Lines: Hi!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Umm, Chandler, Monica, this is Don.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Soul mate.

Name: chandler
Lines: What?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Soul mate.

Name: monica
Lines: So, what have you guys been doing?

Name: monica
Lines: I know! What is this, 1985?!

Name: monica
Lines: Not really.

Name: chandler
Lines: What’s wrong with sun-dried tomatoes?  No?

Name: monica
Lines: So Don, what-what other restaurants do you like?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God! That’s my restaurant, I’m the chef there.

Name: monica
Lines: No!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, I’d like a latte. Oh y’know what? If you’re gonna talk about me, I’m gonna go with you.

Name: chandler
Lines: What are you doing?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Nothing! I swear to God I didn’t know you guys would be here! And the good news is you didn’t believe in soul mates. So…

Name: chandler
Lines: I believe in tall, handsome strangers who hit on my wife!

Name: phoebe
Lines: They’re just talking, and y’know what? Just because I think they’re soul mates doesn’t mean anything’s gonna happen.

Name: monica
Lines: Phoebe, good work.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah?

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah! Oh he’s great, I love him.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Don’t worry, we’ll find you someone else.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: Look, I understand if you came by to hit me, I deserve it.

Name: ross
Lines: No, I don’t want to hit you.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh what then? Kick me?

Name: ross
Lines: No.

Name: joey
Lines: Bite me?

Name: ross
Lines: No, no I don’t want to do anything to you. All right? I just want to tell you that I’m not mad at you and…and that I certainly do not hate you. I just, I just came here to say that.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh now—Hey Ross-Ross! Do you wanna-wanna come in for a beer or something?

Name: ross
Lines: Uh…yeah sure.

Name: joey
Lines: Do uh, do you got any beer? All-all I got is this melon stuff that Rachel left. I don’t…

Name: ross
Lines: Okay.

Name: joey
Lines: NA

Name: ross
Lines: Thank you.

Name: joey
Lines: Anyway, it uh…look it’ll just…take me a while to get over her, that’s all. I’m not even sure how to do that, I mean I’ve never been in love before so…

Name: ross
Lines: What?! You’re in love with her.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, I thought you knew that.

Name: ross
Lines: Umm, no.

Name: joey
Lines: Wow. Hey look, if it helps, I don’t want to feel this way. Honest. I just keep thinking, \Ah

Name: ross
Lines: I think you need to tell her how you feel.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay that’s the green stuff talkin’.

Name: ross
Lines: No, I’m serious. You-you need to find out where she is, because if she’s not where you are, then you can start to move past this.

Name: joey
Lines: But what if uh—and I’m not saying she will be—But…

Name: ross
Lines: If she is where you are then uh…then my feeling weird about it shouldn’t stand in the way.

Name: joey
Lines: Are you sure?

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah. Look if-if she’s gonna end up with somebody else, the truth is she couldn’t find a better guy. So…

Name: joey
Lines: Hey thanks.

Name: ross
Lines: So when do you think you’re gonna talk to her?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh my God I have to tell her! I haven’t even thought about what I will say. What should I say?

Name: ross
Lines: I’m understanding, but let’s not get carried away.

Name: joey
Lines: I’m sorry, you’re right. What am I gonna say?  Oh!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, tell me about it.

Name: chandler
Lines: Cheese you say? That’s some pretty smelly work, huh Don?

Name: chandler
Lines: Cheese, it’s smelly. You must smell a lot of the time too.

Name: monica
Lines: Me too! Yeah, Chandler can’t stand it. He won’t even allow me to have blue cheese in the house.

Name: monica
Lines: You know what I’d love to do? I would like to go to France and eat nothing but bread and cheese—Not even bread, just cheese. No, I want the bread. Yeah. Ah, and pastries…  And pate. Oh, I’m really not high, it’s just I used to be fat.

Name: chandler
Lines: Is it made of cheese?

Name: monica
Lines: I’d move in tomorrow!

Name: chandler
Lines: Are you listening to this?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I’m so sorry.

Name: chandler
Lines: What do we do?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I don’t know, they both want to live in a house of cheese! I don’t know how you fight that.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay. Okay, I can do this. I can tell her how I feel. Just uh, just stand up straight.

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey? What’s up?

Name: joey
Lines: I uh, I just came by because I-I want to talk to you about something.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay what’s up?

Name: joey
Lines: Here? In the hall? What are we animals?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well honey, I’m late for a meeting. So can you just make it quick?

Name: joey
Lines: Okay umm, I just came by to tell you that I…want to have dinner with you tonight. That’s all.

Name: rachel
Lines: Sure! That sounds great! Just leave me a message and tell me where to meet you. Okay?

Name: joey
Lines: Okay. That’s good. Okay, that give you a couple hours to prepare what you’re gonna say. Good. Yeah.  Don’t you people ever knock?!

Name: monica
Lines: I’d like to have Don and Phoebe over. Wouldn’t that be nice?

Name: chandler
Lines: Sure, why don’t you set it up. I’ll just be over here, browsing through the personals.

Name: monica
Lines: Are you okay? You’ve been acting weird all afternoon.

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, fine. Fine. Not perfect!! But good enough.

Name: monica
Lines: Jeez! What is with you?

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m sorry, did you say cheese?

Name: monica
Lines: All right, what’s going on?

Name: chandler
Lines: Phoebe thinks you and Don are soul mates, and I don’t believe in that kind of stuff. But then you two totally get along. So look, I won’t stand in your way if you want to run off with Don and live in a house of cheese.

Name: monica
Lines: Chandler, you don’t believe in soul mates?

Name: chandler
Lines: No. But I’m sure  ‘tomatoes’ does.

Name: monica
Lines: I don’t believe in soul mates either.

Name: chandler
Lines: You don’t?

Name: monica
Lines: No. I don’t think that you and I were destined to end up together. I think that we fell in love and work hard at our relationship. Some days we work really hard.

Name: chandler
Lines: So you…you don’t want to live with Don in a cheese house?

Name: monica
Lines: No, I’ve had second thoughts about that. Do you realize how hard that would be to clean?

Name: chandler
Lines: I love you.

Name: monica
Lines: I know.

Name: chandler
Lines: Y’know what? I am going to take you out to dinner tonight. I found this place that makes the greatest mozzarella sticks and jalepino poppers .  No? Really? They taste so good.

Name: rachel
Lines: …and I know Chandler is kidding but it happens every time he touches my stomach. I mean I’m really worried the baby’s not going to like him.  Are you okay?

Name: joey
Lines: What? Yeah! Sure! Uh, look at the uh, the reason…—Is it hot in here?

Name: rachel
Lines: No. Not-not for me, but why don’t you take off your sweater?

Name: joey
Lines: I would, but this is a nice place and my T-shirt has a picture of Calvin doing Hobbs.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! Really?! Can I see it?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah. Sure.

Name: rachel
Lines: Huh. Wow, I wouldn’t think Hobbs would like that so much.

Name: joey
Lines: Uh… How long have we known each other?

Name: rachel
Lines: Um, seven…e-e-eight, eight years. Wow.

Name: joey
Lines: Uh-huh, long time.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: joey
Lines: But over the past few weeks…

Name: joey
Lines: Actually uh, could you give us a second?

Name: rachel
Lines: So you were saying?

Name: joey
Lines: I’m not quite sure.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, well you had asked me how long we had known each other, and I said, \Eight years.\" And the um

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, here we are. Uhh… I… I think I’m…falling in love with you.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: joey
Lines: I’m falling in love with you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. Umm… I-I…uh, wow. Are you uh… How did umm… When?

Name: joey
Lines: Does it really matter?

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow! Wow. Wow. Wow, it is hot in here.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay look Rach, I know this is a lot. You don’t have to say anything. You-you uh, you take as much time as you need.  Okay, you gotta say something!

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey, Joey I love you so much, but I…

Name: joey
Lines: But.

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah-yeah right. That’s okay. That’s fine. That’s uh, pretty much what I was expecting. So uh, it’s no big deal. All right? I think I’m gonna go.

Name: rachel
Lines: No! Joey please! Please don’t! Please don’t leave like this! Now come on, you cannot do this to a pregnant woman!

Name: joey
Lines: Don’t start doing that. You can’t do that Rach, ‘cause then you’re gonna make me do that.

Name: rachel
Lines: Can I?

Name: joey
Lines: Sure!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh Joey honey I don’t…I don’t want to lose…

Name: joey
Lines: Hey-hey-hey, hey! You can’t. Okay? Ever!

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m so sorry.

Name: joey
Lines: Oh no-no Rach, please, don’t be sorry. Okay? Don’t be sorry.  Y’know I was only kidding you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, that was a real good one.

Name: rachel
Lines: Joey? Are you in there?

Name: joey
Lines: Oh God! That’s Rachel!

Name: monica
Lines: Joey, you have to talk to her!

Name: joey
Lines: No-no, I can’t! I can’t! Not after the other night, it’s just it’s…too weird, okay? Don’t tell her I’m here!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey!

Name: monica
Lines: Hey Rachel!

Name: rachel
Lines: Is Joey here?

Name: chandler
Lines: I don’t see him.  Do you see him?

Name: monica
Lines: I don’t see him. Hey! Maybe he’s in the sugar bowl!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, at least you make each other laugh.

Name: monica
Lines: What’s up?

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, I haven’t seen him since that night that he told me how he y’know… I don’t know, I think he’s avoiding me. Why is that bagel on the floor?

Name: monica
Lines: We were playing a game.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ew, was Chandler naked? Sort of like a, like a ring toss kind of situation?

Name: monica
Lines: Sure.

Name: chandler
Lines: What?! No! No!

Name: rachel
Lines: All right. Well listen, if you see Joey will you just tell him uh…tell him I miss him.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, did you hear that?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, a naked bagel game?  Dude, I don’t know. That’s a pretty small hole.

Name: monica
Lines: Honey, you gotta talk to her.

Name: joey
Lines: I can’t! Y’know? You guys don’t know what it’s like to put yourself out there like that and just get shot down.

Name: chandler
Lines: I don’t know what that’s like?! Up until I was 25 I thought the only response to, \I love you

Name: monica
Lines: Hello? No rejection? I got shot down at fat camp! Boy, kids are mean when they’re hungry.

Name: joey
Lines: All right so, so what do I do?

Name: monica
Lines: This is Rachel. I mean, what are you gonna do, never going to talk to her again? I mean I know it’s weird, it’s awkward, but you gotta at least try.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah. Okay.  I almost forgot this was on your…

Name: chandler
Lines: We didn’t play it!!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, so when you’re done with your tea I’ll look at your leaves and tell you your fortune.

Name: chandler
Lines: I didn’t know you read tea leaves.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh yeah, I’ve done it for years. I actually stopped because I was so accurate. Y’know, and-and y’know, one of the great joys of life is it’s-it’s wondrous unpredictability. Y’know? And also tea tends to give me the trots.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, I’m done. Read mine.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay.  Which can mean either a promotion or a violent death.

Name: monica
Lines: I-I’m the head chef. I-I can’t get promoted.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-hmm. Uh-hmm, who’s next?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, I’m done. Do mine.

Name: phoebe

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh yeah. Okay, see mom, the truth is I can do this on my own.

Name: rachel
Lines: But mom, I really know what I’m doing. I can handle this.

Name: rachel
Lines: He was a hamster! I am not going to vacuum up my baby!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, come on Rach it’s present time! Y’know you’re the glue that’s holding this whole party together. It’s kinda falling apart here.

Name: rachel
Lines: Wow!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, this is from your friend at work.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my gosh! Oh wow! Oh, I know what this is!  Wait a minute. That can’t be right. Is that a beer bong for a baby?

Name: rachel
Lines: Did I say I was done guessing? Okay, thank you for that. Oh wow! What’s this?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, it dispenses clean diapers!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well that’s gross, why don’t you just take it outside and throw it in a dumpster?

Name: rachel
Lines: What?! It goes ten times a day! What are we feeding this baby?! Indian food?!

Name: monica
Lines: Rachel, listen to your mother. She is very smart.

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t know, I’d leave it on the changing table?  What?! What’d I do? What’d I do?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh come——Of course I know that. I mean of course you never leave a baby alone! I mean who would—she wouldn’t be safe as she would be with me, the baby dummy. Oh God, okay. Y’know what? I think opening the presents right now is a little overwhelming right now. So I think umm, I’m just gonna maybe open them a little bit later, but thank you all for coming. And for these beautiful gifts, and this basket is beautiful.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay mommy, don’t ever leave me.

Name: joey
Lines: In what John Houston film would you hear this line, \Badges? We don’t need no stinkin’ badges!\"

Name: chandler
Lines: Treasure of the Sierra Madre!

Name: joey
Lines: Correct! There’s a possible backwards bonus!

Name: chandler
Lines: Madre Sierra the of Treasure!

Name: joey
Lines: Yes!

Name: chandler
Lines: I’d like to go up the ladder of chance to the golden mud hut please.

Name: joey
Lines: Wise choice, how many rungs?

Name: chandler
Lines: Six!

Name: joey
Lines: That noise can only me one thing.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hungry monkey.

Name: ross
Lines: I’d like a Wicked Wango card!

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, it’s an audio question, name this television theme song.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh! Oh my God! Okay, I know this, give me-give me a second!

Name: chandler
Lines: Tell it to the Time Turtle!

Name: ross
Lines: Shut up! I Dream of Genie!

Name: joey
Lines: Yes! Yes, you’re back in the lead!

Name: ross
Lines: I’d like to spin the wheel!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh come on!!

Name: joey
Lines: All right! All right! Uh, umm, Super-Speedy Speed round!

Name: ross
Lines: Is there a hopping bonus?

Name: joey
Lines: Of course!

Name: joey
Lines: Who invented bifocals?

Name: ross
Lines: Ben Franklin.

Name: joey
Lines: Correct! Which monarch has ruled Great Britain the longest?

Name: ross
Lines: Queen Victoria.

Name: joey
Lines: Correct again! But, you forgot to switch legs between questions, so no hopping bonus!

Name: ross
Lines: Noooo!!! Every time!!!

Name: joey
Lines: Now, over to Chandler.

Name: chandler
Lines: I’d like a Google Card.

Name: joey
Lines: Are you sure?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yes!  Google!

Name: joey
Lines: Oh my God! Congratulations Ross, because Chandler, you’ve been Bamboozled!

Name: chandler
Lines: Nooo!!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah!!

Name: chandler
Lines: This is the best game ever!!!

Name: rachel
Lines: So umm, you’re gonna stay with me as long as I need you?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh mom, I swear I’m not an idiot. I’ve read all kinds of books on pregnancy and giving birth, but I-I just didn’t think to read the part about what to do when the baby comes. And-and then guess what? The baby’s coming and I don’t know what to do. Oh, can I throw up in my diaper genie?

Name: rachel
Lines: Wait-wait where are you going? Where are you going?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: It is going to be okay!  It was worth a shot.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey! Why are you all red and sweaty?

Name: ross
Lines: I just Bamboozled Chandler!  Which is not uh sexual thing. That was a quick shower.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Not if you were here.

Name: ross
Lines: Wow! It looks like we got a lot of good stuff.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh we did, but my mom got us the greatest gift of all.

Name: ross
Lines: A Play-Dough Barber Shop?

Name: rachel
Lines: No. She’s going to live with us for eight weeks.

Name: ross
Lines: Uh, what?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes! She’s gonna help us take care of the baby! Woo-hoo.

Name: ross
Lines: What—You’re not serious. I mean she’s a very nice woman, but there is no way we can take eight weeks of her. She’ll drive us totally crazy.

Name: ross
Lines: Hi roomie!

Name: joey
Lines: It’s a pleasure to meet you Ray.

Name: joey
Lines: Rightie-O Ray!

Name: joey
Lines: Hello, I’m Joey Tribbiani! Let’s play Bamboozled! Erin, you get the first question! In hockey, who is known as The Great One?

Name: joey
Lines: Correct! Now, would you like to pick a Wicked Wango card or spin the Wheel of Mayhem?

Name: joey
Lines: What—Why?!

Name: joey
Lines: Well what’s complicated? You spin the Wheel of Mayhem to go up the Ladder of Chance. You go past the Mud Hut through the Rainbow Ring to get to the Golden Monkey; you yank his tail and boom! You’re in Paradise Pond!

Name: joey
Lines: Well what’s fun about that? You expect me to be the host of a boring game that’s just people standing around answering questions?

Name: joey
Lines: Let’s play Bamboozled!

Name: ross
Lines: Well we…we don’t have a garage.

Name: ross
Lines: Y’know what? Maybe, Mrs. Green, it’s not absolutely vital that you live with us.

Name: rachel
Lines: I do. I really do. I don’t know anything.

Name: ross
Lines: I’m-I’m sure that’s not true.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh no? Pheebs? Monica? Do I know anything about babies?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, not a thing.

Name: monica
Lines: It’s frightening.

Name: ross
Lines: Well uh, y’know what? Even if she doesn’t know anything, I do! I have a son. And his mother and I didn’t live together, and whenever he was with me I took care of him all the time, by myself.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: That’s a different issue. Uh, the point is, when the baby comes I will be there to…to feed her and bathe her and change her. And more than that I want to do all those things.

Name: ross
Lines: Yes! Yes, you’re gonna be so missed.

Name: ross
Lines: Well you’re gonna be a wonderful grandma.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hello?! I still don’t know what the hell I’m doing!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, come on, every first time mother feels that way. You’ll—you’re gonna pick it up.  Hey! You will! Uh look, y’know when you first came to the city? You were this spoiled helpless little girl who-who still used daddy’s credit card. Do you remember?

Name: rachel
Lines: I hope you’re going somewhere with this.

Name: ross
Lines: Look at you! What—You’re-you’re this big executive! You are much more capable than you give yourself credit for. I-I have no doubt you’re gonna be an incredible mother.

Name: rachel
Lines: Really?

Name: ross
Lines: I’m telling you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Thank you.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh.

Name: monica
Lines: What do I do?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Nothing! You have apologized to her like a million times and she’s been nothing but terrible to you. And don’t forget you just threw her daughter a lovely, albeit slightly boring, shower, and she hasn’t even thanked you for it.

Name: monica
Lines: Y’know what? You’re-you’re right.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah I mean if you want to say anything to her, I’d tell her off.

Name: monica
Lines: Really?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh-huh!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay! I will! Mrs. Green? Mrs. Green!  It is rude to leave a party without saying good-bye to the host! Yeah, and-and also when someone apologizes to you the decent thing to do is to accept it! Now what I did to you, it wasn’t on purpose! But what you’re during to me now is just plain spiteful!

Name: monica
Lines: That’s right! Maybe it’s time you took a good hard look at a mirror young lady…old lady…lady!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wrap it up, wrap it up, wrap it up…

Name: monica
Lines: So whenever you’re ready to apologize to me, I will forgive you. Good day!  I can’t feel my legs!

Name: phoebe
Lines: You were fantastic! I’m so proud of you!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah? I’m proud of me too.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You should be!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah could-could-could you get me something to drink?

Name: phoebe
Lines: You got it!

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.  Okay, I bit my tongue, but I’m still really sorry!

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay! I’m ready.

Name: ross
Lines: You sure?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes, I’ve done my studying and I really know my stuff.

Name: ross
Lines: All right then.  How do you test the temperature of the baby’s bath water?

Name: rachel
Lines: Uh, put your elbow in it.

Name: ross
Lines: Excellent! How do you put a baby down for a nap?

Name: rachel
Lines: Full, dry, on its back, and no loose covers.

Name: ross
Lines: That’s correct! This is an audio question, what do you do when the baby makes this sound?

Name: rachel
Lines: Check if it’s wet, check if it’s hungry, burp it!

Name: ross
Lines: Excellent! Excellent, now-now do you want another question or a Wicked Wango card?

Name: rachel
Lines: A card! A card! I pick a card!

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, I’m sorry you’ve been Bamboozled! You’re gonna be a terrible mother!

Name: ross
Lines: Hey you guys I got some bad news.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well that’s no way to sell newspapers. Why don’t you try, \Extra! Extra! Read all about it!\"

Name: ross
Lines: No, Monica’s restaurant got a horrible review in the Post.

Name: joey
Lines: Man, this is bad! And I’ve had my share of bad reviews. I still remember my first good one though.  \Everything else in this production of Our Town was simply terrible. Joey Tribbiani was abysmal.\"

Name: monica
Lines: Hey!

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God! Look at all the newspapers! It must be a good review! Is it great?!

Name: ross
Lines: Umm…

Name: monica
Lines: Oh dear God!

Name: ross
Lines: But the good news is, no one in a two-block radius will ever know.

Name: monica
Lines: What about the rest of Manhattan?!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah, they all know.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God, this is horrible!

Name: chandler
Lines: I’m so sorry.

Name: monica
Lines: I’m so humiliated!

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah but y’know what they say Mon, \There’s no such thing as bad press.\"

Name: monica
Lines: You don’t think that umm,  \The chef’s Mahi Mahi was awful awful

Name: rachel
Lines: I didn’t write it.

Name: monica
Lines: Is he right? Am I really—Am I awful?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah! Yeah Monica! You listen to me, okay? And I’m not just saying this because I’m your friend, I’m sayin’ it ‘cause it’s the truth. You’re food is abysmal!

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross!

Name: ross
Lines: What?! What?

Name: rachel
Lines: I am freaking out!

Name: ross
Lines: Are ya?

Name: rachel
Lines: My due date is in one week!

Name: ross
Lines: What are you doing up?

Name: rachel
Lines: That is seven days!

Name: ross
Lines: Okay look, I had a lot of water before I went to bed. Can we do this after…

Name: rachel
Lines: No-no-no-no-no Ross! Please, come on we do not have any of the big stuff we need! We do not a changing table! We do not have a crib! We do not have a diaper service!

Name: ross
Lines: It’s funny you should mention diapers.

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m serious.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay look, there’s nothing to worry about. We have plenty of time. There’s a great baby furniture store on west 10th. Tomorrow, we will go there and we will get you everything that you need. Okay?

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. Thank you. That’s great. Thank you. Wait-wait! Where on west 10th? Because there’s this really cute shoe store that has like this little…

Name: ross
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, wait Ross! I’m sorry, one more thing!

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah!

Name: rachel
Lines: Umm, our situation. Y’know umm, what we mean to each other. And I mean we-we’re having this baby together, and we live together. Isn’t that, isn’t that weird?

Name: ross
Lines: Well uh…

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m just kidding! You can go pee!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey uh Monica, I can’t remember. Did we say we were gonna meet here or at the movies?

Name: monica
Lines: We said at the movies, but…

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, I’ll see you there.

Name: monica
Lines: Joey!  Now that you’re here…

Name: joey
Lines: Sure, I can hang out ‘til I have to meet ya.  What uh—How come you’re not going?

Name: chandler
Lines: I have a job interview I have to get ready for.

Name: joey
Lines: I thought you already have a job.

Name: chandler
Lines: And people say you don’t pay attention. No, this is a much better job. It’s vice-president of a company that does data reconfiguration and statistical factoring for other companies.

Name: joey
Lines: Wow! How do you know how to do that?!

Name: chandler
Lines: That’s what I do now.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey Joey, come taste this.

Name: joey
Lines: What is it?

Name: monica
Lines: Remember that guy that gave me a bad review? Well…  I’m getting my revenge!

Name: joey
Lines: You cooked him?

Name: chandler
Lines: The front page? You really do live in your own little world, don’t ya?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh.

Name: rachel
Lines: No-no-no! No, no, no, we’re not married.

Name: ross
Lines: We are having a baby together, but we’re not involved.  Or, yes stranger, we’d like this delivered please.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh, okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh yeah! Actually, that’s one of the reasons why we’re not a couple.

Name: ross
Lines: I chose those, I’m a paleontologist.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh. Oh yeah, don’t get to worked up over it. I mean it-it sounds like he’s a doctor, but he’s not.

Name: ross
Lines: Yeah! I-I teach it in my class.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God! I’m standing at a cash register, holding a credit card, and I’m bored.

Name: ross
Lines: That’s my gym.

Name: ross
Lines: I am like Indiana Jones.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi Pheebs!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey! Oh, how did baby shopping go?

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, it was great! We got everything that we needed! Oh and Ross, almost got something that wasn’t on the list. A whore.

Name: phoebe
Lines: What?!

Name: rachel
Lines: Well, we were paying for our stuff and this saleswoman just started flirting with him.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well did she know you two weren’t married?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh my God! Well the idea of a woman flirting with a-with a single man, we-we must alert the church elders!

Name: rachel
Lines: You don’t understand! You didn’t see how brazen she was.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Sounds like you’re a little jealous.

Name: rachel
Lines: No! I’m not! I-I-I just think it’s wrong! It’s-it’s that I’m—Here I am about to pop and he’s out picking up some shop girl at Sluts ‘R’ Us!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Is that a real place?  Are they hiring?

Name: chandler
Lines: Fatty!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey Chandler, why so fancy?

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I got a job interview. It’s kinda a big deal too. Its a lot more money and I’d be doing data reconfiguration and statistical factoring.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Wait, I think I know someone who does that.

Name: chandler
Lines: Me! I do that. So… Seriously, do I look okay? I’m little nervous.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh yeah! You really—You look great.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, just don’t get your hopes up.

Name: chandler
Lines: Why not?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, the interview…

Name: chandler
Lines: What about it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Y’know! You don’t make a very good first impression.

Name: chandler
Lines: What?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh you don’t know.

Name: chandler
Lines: Are you serious?!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yes, when I first met you, you were like, \Blah

Name: chandler
Lines: What is it that I do?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well it’s just like you’re trying too hard. Always making jokes, y’know, you just—You come off a little needy.

Name: chandler
Lines: Did you like me when we first met?

Name: rachel
Lines: Chandler, I’m not gonna lie to ya, but I am gonna run away from you.

Name: monica
Lines: Hi! Umm, I’m Monica Geller, I’m the chef at Alessandro’s.

Name: monica
Lines: I think the things that you said about me are really unfair, and I would like for you to give my bouillabaisse another chance.

Name: joey
Lines: Either eat it, or be in it.

Name: monica
Lines: Spoon?  So, what do you think?

Name: joey
Lines: Thata girl! Huh? We should get out of here; there’s a new class comin’ in.

Name: monica
Lines: I can.

Name: monica
Lines: Well umm, they both have a egg yolk and butter base, but a bearnaise has shallots, shirvel, and most importantly tarragon.

Name: monica
Lines: Monica.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: All this stuff takes up a lot of room. Hey how uh, how serious are you about keeping Ben in your life?

Name: ross
Lines: My son? Pretty serious.  What uh, what are you doing here?

Name: ross
Lines: Ah, must’ve been fairly obvious since it was the only thing left in your store.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh! Wow! Uh, yeah! That sounds great. I’m just gonna put this  back in my pocket, pretend that didn’t happen. Uh yeah, actually I’m free now. Do you wanna grab some coffee or…

Name: rachel
Lines: Horny bitch.  No! You’re a horny bitch! Noooo! You’re the horny bitch! No! You’re a horny bitch!

Name: rachel
Lines: So you guys go, have a really good time.

Name: ross
Lines: NA

Name: rachel
Lines: So, you had a good day huh? Big commission; picked up a daddy.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh yeah! Yeah please, you guys have fun.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh and it was great to see you too. And you look fantastic, although you missed a button.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh okay, I see what you’re doing there.

Name: chandler
Lines: I can’t even believe this! I really come off that badly?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Oh! It’s okay, you calm down after a while and then people can see how really sweet and wonderful you really are.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh good. Good, because I’m sure this interview is gonna last a couple of weeks.

Name: phoebe
Lines: All right, don’t freak out! Okay? I-I will help you. How long before you have to leave?

Name: chandler
Lines: An hour.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I can’t help you.

Name: chandler
Lines: Phoebe!

Name: phoebe
Lines: All right, all right, we’ll just do our best. Okay? So let’s say I’m the interviewer and I’m meeting you for the first time. Okay. \Hi! Come on in

Name: chandler
Lines: Chandler Bing.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Bing, what an unusual name.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well you should meet my uncle, Bada.  I’ll let myself out.

Name: joey
Lines: Hi.

Name: joey
Lines: When you say used, do you mean eat as a pre-cooking snack?

Name: joey
Lines: Cheese makes me thirsty.

Name: joey
Lines: All right.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh no! I don’t know anything about cooking. I had to ask someone what it’s called when the, when the water makes those little bubbles.

Name: monica
Lines: I-I-I’m sorry, your-your mouth was full, I didn’t hear what you said. Umm, hats off to who now?

Name: monica
Lines: That’s right.

Name: chandler
Lines: …I think you’ll find if I come to work here, I don’t micro-manage. I don’t shy away from delegating.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Um-hmm, that’s good to know. But let’s stop focusing on what you don’t do, and start focusing on what you do do.

Name: chandler
Lines: What I do do…is manage to uh, create an atmosphere of support for the people working with me.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I see. Nice sidestep on the do do thing by the way.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hardest thing I’ve ever done in my life.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You gotta go!

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, don’t worry. You’re ready.

Name: chandler
Lines: Really?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Absolutely! Just fight all your natural instincts and you’ll be great.

Name: chandler
Lines: Okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Y’know, you called me that before so I-I took the liberty of fashioning a star out of aluminum foil. Now, no pressure, you like my cookies, you give me the star.

Name: monica
Lines: Wow! A star!  I know you all hate me and-and I’m sorry, but I don’t care.

Name: joey
Lines: I can an A? In-in school?  Hey, I’m a dork.

Name: monica
Lines: Joey! I’m so proud of you!

Name: monica
Lines: Excuse me? He doesn’t even know what he’s doing!

Name: monica
Lines: I do! I’m a professional chef!  Oh relax! It’s not a courtroom drama!

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah!

Name: monica
Lines: I’m-I’m sorry, it’s just that umm… Well I-I cook at this restaurant, Alessandro’s, and umm I just got a really bad review…

Name: monica
Lines: You do?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, I’m totally crazy, but you-you like the food?

Name: monica
Lines: Okay then, I don’t stink. I’m a good chef. Okay.

Name: joey
Lines: Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa! I don’t want to go. I’m having fun.

Name: joey
Lines: Hey-hey-hey, if my friend says it’s time to go, it’s time to go.

Name: chandler
Lines: …also I was the point person on my company’s transition from the KL-5 to GR-6 system.

Name: chandler
Lines: That I did. That I did.

Name: chandler
Lines: All right.

Name: chandler
Lines: I see.

Name: chandler
Lines: Good to know.

Name: chandler
Lines: No don’t I beg of you!

Name: chandler
Lines: Really?!

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah I gotta say thank you, I was really nervous. Y’know I’ve been told I come on to strong, make to many jokes, and then it was really hard to sidestep that duty thing.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh my God this doesn’t count! Okay? The interview was over, that was the real Chandler Bing in there, this is just some crazy guy out in the hall! Call security! There’s a crazy guy out in the hall!

Name: chandler
Lines: I’ll look forward to your call.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey.

Name: rachel
Lines: Hi! You’re back from your date!

Name: ross
Lines: How are you?

Name: rachel
Lines: I’m fine, but that’s not important. What’s important is how was she?

Name: ross
Lines: Uhh, it was fun. We, we just had coffee.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh uh-huh, uh-huh, coffee, a little rub-rub-rub under the table.

Name: ross
Lines: What’s uh, what’s going on? Do you not, do you not like Katie?

Name: rachel
Lines: No! No, she’s—She was nice. I mean, she’s a little slutty, but who isn’t?

Name: ross
Lines: I liked her.

Name: rachel
Lines: Of course you did Ross, you would date a gorilla if it called you Indiana Jones!

Name: ross
Lines: Did you get like a fresh batch of pregnancy hormones today?!

Name: rachel
Lines: No! It’s just that, Kate bothered me.

Name: ross
Lines: Why? What was wrong with her?

Name: rachel
Lines: There was nothing wrong with her! All right? She was perfectly lovely!

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, so what’s the matter?

Name: rachel
Lines: I don’t want you to date her!

Name: ross
Lines: Why? What, what are you jealous?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes! And not because I want you to go out with me, but because I don’t want you to go out with anybody! Okay? I know it’s a terrible thing to even think this, and it’s completely inappropriate, but I want you to be at my constant beck and call 24 hours a day! I’m very sorry, but that is just the way that I feel.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay.

Name: rachel

Lines: You know what it is? It's a nice place but I gotta see I don't know if I see myself living here. Oh, oh, oh, let me see...  Yeah, I could see it.

Name: phoebe

Name: chandler

Name: chandler

Okay, so if you think that I didn't say goodbye to you because you don't mean as much to me as everybody else, you're wrong. It's because you mean more to me. Lines: I have it, I have it, I have it. Oh, okay, I can't find it, but I remember that I was in seat 32C, because that's my bra-size.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, fine! But you know what? If I was in 36D, we would not be having this problem.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, I need a ticket.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Just one? I drive you all the way down here, and I don't get to see how it works out?

Name: ross
Lines: Fine, two tickets, I need two tickets.

Name: phoebe
Lines: We're on our honeymoon.

Name: ross
Lines: I don't care. Whatever is the cheapest.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I'm so lucky I married you.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh! Shoot! Damn it! Where is it? Oh! Oh! I found it! I found it!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hah! I found it! I told you I would find it! In your face! You're a different person.

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, flight 421 to Paris. I don't see it, do you see it?

Name: phoebe
Lines: No, did we miss it?

Name: ross
Lines: No, no, no. That's impossible. It doesn't leave for another 20 minutes.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Maybe we have the flight-number wrong. God.

Name: monica
Lines: Hello.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey, it's me. Here's Ross.

Name: ross
Lines: What? Hey, hey, listen..

Name: monica
Lines: Oh my God! Ross, you wouldn't believe the cute little noises the twins are making. Listen.

Name: ross
Lines: Monica? Monica, Monica, Monica, Monica..?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, I'm sorry. Shoot, they were doing it before.

Name: ross
Lines: That's alright. Listen, listen.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, wait, wait, wait! Here they go again.

Name: ross
Lines: Monica? Monica, Monica, Monica, Monica..?

Name: monica
Lines: Isn't that cute?

Name: ross
Lines: That is precious! Listen! I need Rachel's flight information.

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, okay. Alright, it's flight 421. Leaves at 8:40.

Name: ross
Lines: Yes, that's what I have. It's not on the board.

Name: monica
Lines: That's what it says here. Flight 421, leaves at 8:40, Newark airport.

Name: ross
Lines: What?

Name: monica
Lines: Newark airport. Why, where are you?

Name: ross
Lines: JFK.

Name: joey
Lines: Don't worry, you guys, we're gonna get you out of there.

Name: chandler
Lines: And we're also gonna buy you tiny, bird hearing-aids.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay. Here goes.

Name: chandler
Lines: What's the matter?

Name: joey
Lines: I need to say goodbye to the table first.

Name: chandler
Lines: I understand.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay. Table, you have given us so many great times. And you guys, Jordan, Victor, Joel... All of you guys. What can I say? You guys make us look good. You wanna say anything?

Name: chandler
Lines: I don't know. Except that, for one last time...  Good game, good game, good game, good game, good game, good game, good game.

Name: joey
Lines: Okay, here we go. I can't do it.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, I can't do it either.

Name: monica
Lines: Hey! Did you find them?

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, they're stuck inside the table!

Name: chandler
Lines: We have to bust it open, but neither of us can do it!

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, well sure. This gotta be so hard. I'll do it. Gimme!

Name: ross
Lines: Phoebe! Wow! No, no, no!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Well, I've never gone this fast before.

Name: ross
Lines: Phoebe, forget it, okay? Newark is - is like an hour away. There's no way we're gonna make it in time.

Name: phoebe
Lines: She's got her cell, you could call her.

Name: ross
Lines: I am not doing this over the phone.

Name: phoebe
Lines: You don't have any other choice!

Name: rachel
Lines: Hello?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Rachel? Oh, good. Hey, by the way, did you just get on the plane?

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah.

Name: phoebe
Lines: For what it's worth, we would have caught her if we were at the right airport.

Name: ross
Lines: Yay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uh, Rach, hang on.

Name: rachel
Lines: Phoebe? Is everything okay?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Uhm, actually no. No, you've... You have to get off the plane.

Name: rachel
Lines: What? Why?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I have this feeling that something's wrong with it. Something is wrong with the left Philange.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, honey, I'm sure there's nothing wrong with the plane.

Name: rachel
Lines: Alright, look, I have to go. I love you, and I will call you the minute I get to Paris.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, that was just my crazy friend. She told me I should get off the plane, because she had a feeling that there was something wrong with the left Philange.

Name: rachel
Lines: I wouldn't worry about it. She's always coming up with stuff like this, and you know what? She's almost never right.

Name: rachel
Lines: Well...

Name: rachel
Lines: Wait, what are you doing?

Name: rachel
Lines: Could I get some peanuts?

Name: rachel
Lines: This is ridiculous! I...

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah, okay.

Name: monica
Lines: Alright. My job here is done.

Name: chandler
Lines: That was... Impressive.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah, you didn't even use the tools for most of it!

Name: monica
Lines: Yeah, they were just slowing me down. Alright, I have to get back to the babies. I'll see you girls later.

Name: chandler
Lines: Sorry about the table, man.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: chandler
Lines: You gonna buy a new one?

Name: joey
Lines: Probably not. Nah. I don't know how much I'm gonna wanna play after you go.

Name: chandler
Lines: Well, at least we got these little guys out.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah.

Name: chandler
Lines: Aww, we were worried about you! Hm. I guess I better get used to things crapping in my hand, huh?

Name: joey
Lines: I'm gonna miss these little guys. It was nice having birds around again.

Name: chandler
Lines: Hey, you know what? Maybe we should keep them here with you.

Name: joey
Lines: What?

Name: chandler
Lines: Yeah, I mean we've got a lot going on right now. And, plus, here they'd have their own room.

Name: joey
Lines: I could get a goose!

Name: chandler
Lines: You know, I - I think you're set with the poultry.

Name: joey
Lines: Thanks man. Did you hear that, you guys? You're gonna get to stay here! And, and it's good, you know, 'cause, 'cause now you have a reason to come visit.

Name: chandler
Lines: I think there may be another reason. So, awkward hug or lame cool guy handshake?

Name: joey
Lines: Uh, lame cool guy handshake, yeah.

Name: ross
Lines: Where is she?

Name: phoebe
Lines: I don't see her.

Name: ross
Lines: Rachel! Rachel Green!

Name: phoebe
Lines: There she is!

Name: ross
Lines: Rachel! Rachel!

Name: ross
Lines: No, no, I just have to talk to someone.

Name: ross
Lines: No, no, no, but...

Name: phoebe
Lines: RACHEL!!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God... What.. What are you guys doing here?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Okay, you're on.

Name: rachel
Lines: What? What? Ross, you're scaring me. What's going on?

Name: ross
Lines: Okay, the thing is..

Name: rachel
Lines: Yeah?

Name: ross
Lines: Don't go.

Name: rachel
Lines: What?

Name: ross
Lines: Please, please stay with me. I am so in love with you. Please, don't go.

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh my God.

Name: ross
Lines: I know, I know. I shouldn't have waited 'till now to say it, but I'm.. That was stupid, okay? I'm sorry, but I'm telling you now. I love you. Do not get on this plane.

Name: ross
Lines: Hey, hey. I know you love me. I know you do.

Name: rachel
Lines: I - I have to get on the plane.

Name: ross
Lines: No, you don't.

Name: rachel
Lines: Yes, I do.

Name: ross
Lines: No, you don't.

Name: rachel
Lines: They're waiting for me, Ross. I can't do this right now, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.

Name: ross
Lines: Rachel?

Name: rachel
Lines: I'm so sorry.

Name: ross
Lines: I really thought she'd stay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: I'm sorry.

Name: monica
Lines: Well, that's it. Everything's packed.

Name: chandler
Lines: Wow, this is weird.

Name: monica
Lines: I know.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah. Uh, does this mean there's nothing to eat?

Name: monica
Lines: I put three lasagnas in your freezer.

Name: joey
Lines: I love you!

Name: joey
Lines: Hey!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey.

Name: joey
Lines: So did you guys make it in time?

Name: phoebe
Lines: Yeah, yeah, he talked to her, but she got on the plane anyway.

Name: chandler
Lines: Where's Ross?

Name: phoebe
Lines: He went home. He didn't want to see anybody.

Name: rachel
Lines: Ross, hi. It's me. I just got back on the plane. And I just feel awful. That is so not how I wanted things to end with us. It's just that I wasn't expecting to see you, and all of a sudden you're there and saying these things... And... And now I'm just sitting here and thinking of all the stuff I should have said, and I didn't. I mean, I didn't even get to tell you that I love you too. Because of course I do. I love you. I love you. I love you. What am I doing? I love you! Oh, I've gotta see you. I've gotta get off this plane.

Name: ross
Lines: Oh my God!

Name: rachel
Lines: Excuse me?

Name: rachel
Lines: I'm sorry. I'm really sorry, but I need to get off the plane, okay? I need to tell someone that I love love them.

Name: ross
Lines: Let her off the plane!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, please, miss, you don't understand!

Name: ross
Lines: Try to understand!

Name: rachel
Lines: Oh, come on, miss, isn't there any way that you can just let me off...

Name: ross
Lines: No! No! Oh my God. Did she get off the plane? Did she get off the plane?

Name: rachel
Lines: I got off the plane.

Name: ross
Lines: You got off the plane.

Name: rachel
Lines: I do love you.

Name: ross
Lines: I love you too, and I'm never letting you go again.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. 'Cause this is where I wanna be, okay? No more messing around. I don't wanna mess this up again.

Name: ross
Lines: Me neither, okay? We are - we're done being stupid.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay. You and me, alright? This is it.

Name: ross
Lines: This is it. Unless we're on a break.

Name: ross
Lines: Don't make jokes now.

Name: monica
Lines: Okay, please be careful with that. It was my grandmother's. Be careful.

Name: monica
Lines: If that falls off the truck, it wouldn't be the worst thing.

Name: ross
Lines: Wow.

Name: rachel
Lines: I know. It seems smaller somehow.

Name: joey
Lines: Has it always been purple?

Name: chandler
Lines: Look around, you guys. This was your first home. And it was a happy place, filled with love and laughter. But more important, because of rent control, it was a friggin' steal!

Name: phoebe
Lines: Hey, do you realise that at one time or another we all lived in this apartment?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, yeah, that's true.

Name: ross
Lines: Uh, I haven't.

Name: monica
Lines: Wait a minute. What about that summer during college that you lived with grandma, and you tried to make it as a dancer?

Name: ross
Lines: Do you realise we almost made it ten years without that coming up?

Name: monica
Lines: Oh, honey, I forgot. I promised Treeger that we'd leave our keys.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, okay.

Name: phoebe
Lines: So, I guess this is it.

Name: joey
Lines: Yeah. I guess so.

Name: monica
Lines: This is harder than I thought it would be.

Name: chandler
Lines: Oh, it's gonna be okay.

Name: rachel
Lines: Do you guys have to go to the new house right away, or do you have some time?

Name: monica
Lines: We got some time.

Name: rachel
Lines: Okay, should we get some coffee?

Name: chandler
Lines: Sure. Where?
